It is an oasis in the city, featuring a luscious private front garden, with over 1000 sq feet of indoor living and a huge private terrace. Surrounded by historic buildings, the finest restaurants and best boutiques. This is your home, a secret, elegant and contemporary designer house, in the shelter of the corner from 7th
neighborhood_overview: NEIGHBORHOOD:  CHELSEA Steps away from all the great boutiques and finest restaurants, cafes, bars and clubs.  Located near the renowned Chelsea art galleries, walking distance from The High Line, Chelsea Market, Union Square, West side market, Whole Foods, Trader Joe's, Farmers Market, the Meat Packing district, West Village.  Directly accessed by train from JFK and Newark airport and directly by bus and subway from LaGuardia airport. Just 1 block from the 18 St. subway (1,2 train), 3 blocks from West 14th street subway (A,C,E trains)  As it is a central location, cabs will take you anywhere in Manhattan in a few minutes for a cheap price.
transit: Centrally located with highest walkability score, everything is within walking distance. Exploring the city can be best done by Uber or Taxi at a $8-10 rate for longer distances. Paid parking is in public garage down the street of the property.
access: Kris together with the onsite hostess will go out of their way to serve you and show you the best experience in NYC. Please see reviews to see the amazing things the guests have to say about their experience with the hosts.
interaction: Your Hostess will meet you at the house and give you the house key and show you around. Service is included in cleaning fee. House will be cleaned at check in and check out. Additional cleaning at a fee available. Full privacy at property after check in; concierge services available through email contact. Hostess on call
house_rules: Maximum occupancy 4 people. No smoking, no pets, no children, no infants, no parties or events, no loud music respect our neighbors.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: Young designer

reviews.comments:
We were fuor and stayed in the flat for three nights. The experience was simply great!

Clean, nicely decorated and very well located Kris' flat proved to be the perfect accomodation to discover New York while enjoying the feeling of being "home".

Kris's luxury apartment was the perfect base for us in New York.  We were 2 couples, so having 2 comfortable queen sized beds and 2 bathrooms was brilliant.  The apartment is spacious and very comfortable.  It was spotless with nice bed linens and towels.   The location is very good for exploring the city and has lots of cafes and restaurants within walking distance.  Kris was a great host, responding very quickly and fully to any questions and gave us some great tips and advice.  I would highly recommend staying here.

The apartment was absolutely fantastic! We stayed for over a week and had everything we needed. The neighbourhood is great within walking distance of lots of great restaurants, shops and a great coffee place (Grumpy's Cafe on 20th). Most importantly for NYC it is located at the back of the building and was nice and quiet at night so no rude awakenings!

The outdoor terrace is really good however it was too cold for us to use even with the heaters. 

Kris and Rene were great hosts and always ready and willing to offer assistance. We highly recommend their apartment.

My family and I loved our stay at Kris’ place. Kris is very helpfull and we received all the information we needed in good time before arriving in NYC - including how to get to the airport. A bottle of champagne was waiting for us in the fridge, when we came late in the eveing, which was very nice☺ 
The location of the apartment is great. The neighborhood feels very safe and is less busy than many other parts of Manhattan. There are a lot of fantastic cafe's, restaurants, food shops and cool stores in the area. The apartment was very clean and the beds were amazingly comfortable! The outdoor space was incredible and the large terrace is a great place to have breakfast or hang out at night. We stayed here for 7 days and would definitely recommend Kris’ home to anyone.

While my wife and I were'nt able to stay with Kris due to my wife's sudden, serious illness, I cannot say enough about Kris and his helpfulness during a tough time.  We cancelled and, although he didn't have to, he went out of his way to see that we got back almost all of the money that we had sent to AirB&B for rent.  I hope to do business with him again in the future.  Really good people,

Terry Lee
Fantastic apartment. Clean, great location and so easy to connect with host about arrival. Looking forward to staying here again next time I'm in the city!!

We were 2 couples. Great setup for us.
Ground floor ( a few steps down from street level)
Very quiet and cool. 
We did the classics at MoMa, Met , Guggenheim . Obviously , Kris took his cue from these in quality and presentation !!
Ahh - mazing to have a back deck to enjoy happy hour and then after dinner convo in that great outdoor space... Like our own VIP lounge!
Would stay again for sure. 
We walked to mid town and back several times.
But subway is right at the corner. 
I have 3 airbnb places and came away with several ideas from this stay to improve my guests
experience;)
Book it!!!

Kris, the host, was a great communicator both at the time of booking and also just prior to our travel.  Arrival instructions were clear, and he was able to accommodate a last-minute arrival time change due to a cancelled flight.  Thank you!

The apartment is great.  Garden level with two bedrooms and two bathrooms, just as pictured.  For two couples wanting more space and comfort than a hotel room affords, and wanting their own bedrooms and bathrooms, this place is perfect!  The open floor-plan dining, living, and kitchen space is very comfortable.  We enjoyed the complimentary Nespresso.  We would have loved using the large outdoor patio space that includes lounging and dining furniture, but the weather didn't cooperate during our stay.

The apartment is in a great location with many bars and restaurants nearby, Hudson River Park to the west, the High Line two blocks away, and the subway at the end of the block.  There are numerous grocers and drug stores within a block for grocery and personal items.

I knew this neighborhood going in, so it's exactly what I expected.  The apartment is lovely... just as pictured, and very recommended.

We stayed for a week with other couple of friends and our experience in kris apt was fabulous ! Everything was very clean and extremely comfortable. The apt is ideal for 2 couples. With 2 bedrooms each one with its own bathroom  (a luxury in ny!!) bed linen and all amenities were brand new and very cozy . It really felt like staying at home! 
The neighborhood is great! Walkable distance to excellent restaurants and bars (meatpacking district) shops, grocery stores, Chelsea market, high line and with 2 subway lines just blocks away. 
 now that the weather is great the terrace is the best spot of the apt!! Ideal for breakfast or at sunset or just to chill outside after a long day...
Kris is a great host and recommended great places to visit.
Absolutely your place in ny!!!
Fantastic apartment, clean, tidy with everything you need and more!

Our scheduled host did not greet us and we got a substitute who was t the apartment when we arrived.  the apartment was adequate however we were disappointed because it did not have a coffee pot.  We enjoy coffee in the morning and evening, we brought our own coffee and obviously were not satisfied during our stay.

The apartment was as described, clean and in a good location.
The only problems we had were that the owner did not provide a kettle, iron or ironing board however did provide a steamer.
Also when we arrived his " assistant" was not available and consequently  we did not obtain a thorough overview of how everything in the appt. operated.
To the owners credit he did allow us a late checkout which was appreciated

We went to NYC with another experienced Airbnb couple and everyone in our group was impressed with the communication from start to finish, the location and of course the place itself. It is the perfect set up to explore and enjoy NYC for two couples (or a small family).

communication from host was excellent - anything that we need was provided for and any question was answered via email, from nespresso coffee to all the basic which made the apartment feel like coming home after a long day of walking around.   High speed internet and a printer was great and very useful for important documents and flights details.  The images advertised was very accurate to the space.

Our stay in New York  was perfect. The apartment is in a great location and has everything you could need (washing machine, dryer, Nespresso machine and a chilled bottle of sparkling from the hosts!!). Would definitely come back next time I am in NYC.

Kris and Rene made us feel right at home from the minute we booked.
They helped with recommendations , of restaurants , where to shop , and what to see.
The apartment is a fantastic location , you feel like a native New Yorker not a tourist , the area felt very safe , was close to everything but away from the hustle and bustle.
The apartment was extremely clean, comfortable , great TV if you wish to chill ,and the icing on the cake was to have the outside garden to sit and enjoy the outside space in Chelsea.
We will definitely return , and would not hesitate recommending to friends and family.
Many thanks for all that our hosts did for us to make our first visit to NYC a holiday of a lifetime.
Adrian & Janice Taylor.

This is my first time using AirB&B, I was nervous about it at the beginning, but with the quick responses and replies to any of my questions from the owner Kris, I felt at ease quickly. The apartment turned out to be just as it is described on the website, even better with the homey feeling it brought me which can not be shown on pictures or  describe by words. The trip to NYC this time was to spend Thanksgiving holiday with my two college kids, the apartment gave us that warm and cozy feelings as we needed it as a home. The quality of the apartment, also with all it's furnature, kitchen supplies, bathroom toiletry supplies are all top qualities. The neighborhood is safe, location is great, with #1 subway train right on the street, it gives an easy access to every part of NYC. The Whole Food and Trader Joe's are all only a few streets away, restaurants are abundant in the neighborhood, host Kris also has a list of things to do, restaurants to go to, and shops nearby piled together for the guests. This property is highly recommended.

What can I say.. We had a great time! the place was exactly as it is described and pictured on the site... Everything was clean and neat. It was in a great location, we had so many places nearby that we simply could not choose where to go next. It was a perfect space for 4 of us. We had a perfect amount of privacy with our own walk in patio as well as a backyard patio. Unfortunately we were unable to use the backyard patio and everything was put away due to bad weather conditions. Although we did not talk to Kris directly during the trip he was very responsive, friendly, and accommodating during the booking process also making sure his assistant met us at the place and gave us a thorough walk through as well as contact information during our stay. Upon our arrival Kris and Rene had a bottle of prosecco waiting for us in the fridge which I thought was a great touch. All in all this place was awesome and I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a great centrally located apartment in a trendy neighborhood in NYC.

We had a wonderful stay. The location is perfect, and the accommodations were just as beautiful as the photos!  It's a great apartment, and the garden deck in the back is such a rarity in NYC!  We'll definitely stay again.

Très bon séjour a NYC en partie grâve au confort de cet appartemement. Propre, confortable, conforme à ce dont nous nous attendions.
Merci à Kris pour son accueil et ses conseils.

Nous vous le recommandons!

My husband and I enjoyed our stay in Chelsea-the apartment was great and close to everything we wanted to get to! Kris was very accommodating and quick to respond to any questions.  Unfortunately the weather was a bit of an obstacle so couldn't enjoy the outdoor space as much as we would have, but we will be sure to stay again when the weather improves!

We had a lovely stay. The apartment was very clean and in a great location. While we didn't meet Kris during our stay he was responsive to questions before our arrival and during our stay, providing recommendations for neighbourhood restaurants etc. The furnishings etc. were stylish and there were some lovely touches in the apartment, such as lots of clean towels, bathrobes, a plentiful supply of nespresso capsules for the coffee machine and a bottle of prosecco waiting for us.

When we arrived a lady gave us a warm welcome showed us all the amenities within and surprised us with a bottle of champagne. 
Everything that was described about the apartment was above and beyond...very well presented and maintained with modern appliances. It was well situated in good distance to the main attractions.  There are local convience/alcohol stores and variety of eateries within 5-10 mins walking distance.

We were welcomed by Natalia, who showed us round the apartment, and was both helpful and informative. The apartment was precisely as described - sadly the weather was not good enough to allow us to enjoy the outdoor space, but the living area was large and well-equipped. We found it extremely clean, and it was very user friendly. Supplying 4 sets of house keys allowed us come and go as we pleased.  The beds were comfortable, there was an endless supply of hot water and plenty bandwidth on the wifi - all in all, lots to like, nothing to complain about. And the situation in Chelsea is great, it is one of the nicest parts of Manhattan. We will certainly be checking availability before the next time we visit NYC.

The apartment was very convenient for central New York. Some lovely welcoming touches like the bottle of prosecco in the fridge, lovely linen and towels and good quality toiletries in the bathroom. Wish we had realised the lounge had no natural daylight as a bit too early to sit outside and anyway courtyard garden had not been made ready following the winter.   Very nicely furnished and extremely clean.

Oppholdet i Kris' leilighet innfridde alle forventninger. Vi hadde god dialog frem til avreise og ble godt mottatt av hans hyggelige assistent Natalia da vi ankom. Leiligheten var ren og ryddig ved overtakelsen, og hadde alle nødvendige fasiliteter. Beliggenheten i Chelsea var svært god, og sentral. Kort vei til subway, Highline og Meatpacking, og restauranttilbud og butikker i umiddelbar nærhet. Både rett etter ankomst og underveis i oppholdet hadde vi dialog med Kris og han var svært behjelpelig med å besvare eventuelle spørsmål. Vi kan varmt anbefale både leiligheten og Kris som utleier.
We were made to feel very welcome.

Nice apartment but we did find the living space a little small for two couples!
Kris was very accommodating with our checkout time which meant we was not having to kill time before making our way to the airport.
The bottle of prosecco was a nice touch

This was my first time renting an apartment through AirBnB so I didn't really know what to expect. So it was a great relief to us when we entered Kris's Chelsea flat to see it exactly like he had described it on the AirBnB website. The apartment is well furnished and very comfortable. Little touches like free Nespresso pods are much appreciated! 
It is superbly located for the Whitney museum, the Highline and all the trendy shops and restaurants of the Meatpacking district and only a short taxi ride to the plush environs of Fifth and Park Avenue.
But what made our stay even more enjoyable was our host Kris. He is super efficient and very obliging. When we asked how to turn on our aircon because it was unseasonably hot, he responded immediately by sending a man in to instal airconditioning in our bedrooms. This is service par excellence. He responded immediately to all our emails prior and during our stay. 
I would definitely recommend this apartment to all our friends and will return myself!

The apartment was just as described & pictured. We were met by the host as arranged- she showed us around the apartment before leaving us with a chilled bottle of prosecco. 

Two good sized bedrooms & the two bathrooms worked well for two couples

The apartment is in a very convenient location close to two subway stations. Lots of bars & restaurants in the immediate area. 

We would have no concerns staying in kris apartment in the future- he is an excellent host who maintained contact throughout the booking process.
Great apartment in a great location. Booking was very quick and easy and Kris was great to deal with.
Excellent apartment, very conveniently located with thoughtful touches included - prosecco on arrival, robes etc. no complaints at all and whole process was painless
The apartment was elegant, cool and comfortable. It was super close from the high line and great bars and restaurants around. Perfect place to explore NY. It is highly recommended.

Great spot to be
Location is perfect
Accommodation is a delight; spacious, modern, with private outdoor, quiet, great kitchen.
We will be back!
Everything was excellent and as expected.  The neighborhood is amazing and Natalia helped us get settled and answered all of our questions.  Thank you for a wonderful stay.

Natalia welcomed us at an agreed upon time and was very thorough and pleasant. On checking out, because my sister and her husband were leaving on a typical evening flight from JFK to London, she graciously allowed us a later check out time which again she handled in a most timely manner. The apartment met all our expectations.
The flat was very nice. It was, as we had hoped, very clean and surprisingly quiet. The private entrance is a bonus.

The flat was lovely, in the perfect location and more spacious than it looks in the pictures. We felt like locals, and the flat is full of stylish furniture and everything you could need to feel comfortable. Kris left us a delicious bottle of prosseco and some chocolates which was such a treat!!! I would definitely stay here again. Check in was easy and quick and I have no complaints at all!

The apartment was beautiful, really stylish and comfortable. It has all the amenities I could hope for.
Natalia was generous and flexible with her time, meeting me on a Saturday night to show me in.
The location is fantastic. I walked everywhere.
I took advantage of the restaurant and shopping recommendations in the guest book, which were all brilliant.
I wouldn’t hesitate to recommend the apartment to friends, and would definitely stay again when visiting Manhattan.

We loved our stay at Kris' apartment. The space is very nicely decorated and the outdoor patio is fabulous! Its a wonderful space to unwind after a busy day in the city. The apartment is cozy but by NYC standards is a really great size. It is perfect for two couples. If you want to have a few friends come by the outdoor space is absolutely perfect for entertaining. Very large sofa area and ample dining space. Just be mindful of the sound level for neighbors in the units above when on the patio. The kitchen was well equipped with most everything you could need. There are lysol cleaning wipes, all necessary paper products, cleaning supplies, towels, robes, very nice shampoo, conditioner, soap, hairdryers, etc. Pots, pans, toaster, coffee and coffee maker, spices, chocolates, and a nice bottle of prosecco are all provided. Anything you might need for food and wine can be found a short walking distance away, or can be delivered. We really loved the location, the apartment, the private entrance, the communication with the owner and his assistant Natalia. We'd definitely stay here again. If you need more space than a standard 1bed/1bath hotel room can provide, this place is perfect.

Lovely art-filled garden apartment with all the amenities - coffee (Nespresso), tons of fluffy towels, lovely soap and shampoo and conditioner, hairdryers in both bathrooms.  We were greeted with chocolates and bubbly - what could be better?  Apartment is cozy but well-lit and smartly laid out.  AMAZING outdoor space sets it apart.  Also very private.  Communication was terrific with both Kris and Natalia.

We had a very pleasant time at Kris' apartment. It was just like on the pictures. It's a quiet place and the beds are very confortable, exactly what we needed after our long walks in the city! It is very conviently located to visit Manhattan (5 minutes walk to reach the nearest subway station). 

Natalia, a friend of Kris, welcomed us with a warm smile and a bottle of Proseco although there was a lot of traffic jam coming from the airport and we arrived much later than expected.

There are a few shops to buy food and some take-away near the flat, which is a good thing when you come back home late and tired!

The communication with Natalia worked perfectly. We felt welcomed in this very well located apartment. It was very quiet, wich made us have a good nights sleep in the comfy beds . We were lucky and could take advantage of the outdoor space. We loved the artwork Kris has in his apartment. All in all it was a great NYC stay and we surely would come back next tima in NYC.

Four of us had a great stay at Kris' apartment (parents of two grown children and our 80+ year old parents).  The apartment is very spacious and quiet - particularly for NYC, clean and neat, ample towels, comfortable beds, plenty of closet space for our clothes, lovely backyard space, ample dishes and glassware, and easy access to subway. Kris was an excellent host and the Nespresso machine with ample coffee pods was just icing on the cake.  Would stay here again!

A huge thank you to Kris, Rene and Natalia for such a fantastic time.  When we arrived we were greeted by Natalia, so friendly with a beautiful smile.  She showed us around the apartment.  I can honestly say it was better than the photos on Airbnb.  It was amazing.  Very clean; comfortable beds; top quality linen and towels; champagne and chocolates and the most gorgeous outside area.  It was a delight to sit out there in the hot evenings with all the twinkly lights on.  It was a wonderful place and a great airbnb experience.  Very good location.  Convenient for shops and restaurants.  You must eat at Rosemary's.   We were even allowed to leave the property later than advertised and collect the cases once we ordered a taxi.  Thank you for being wonderful hosts.  Hope to stay there again.  Highly recommend. ☺

Kris wasabi extremely helpful host. He gave us restaurant suggestions and tips for New York which we found very useful. The apartment is beautiful and the location is excellent. Everything down to the choice of soap in the bathrooms was superb and we would certainly recommend this air bnb to our friends- especially anyone who loves art as there are some really fun pieces that he has collected.

Kris was the perfect host long before we arrived.  He and his staff, Jan and Natalia, were pitch perfect with instructions and useful information.  Through a black wrought-iron gate amd down a flight of stone steps, and we found ourselves in a private garden filled with greenery and sculpture.  The apartment itself was cozy and beautifully appointed.  There wasn't a need that wasn't met.  We would stay here again in a heartbeat.

We stayed in New York , two couples on holiday. The apartment was perfect for us. Added touches such as the Nespresso machine and luxury bathroom products made the stay even better. Chelsea is a terrific neighbourhood right outside. All the facilities were well maintained and the kitchen very well equipped - a real NYC home away from home.
All was great, just felt the apartment was smaller than it appeared in photos and being below ground it was a bit dark. But we all enjoyed the place.  No complaints.

We had such an amazing time in New York City and Kris's apartment was the perfect spot for us. Loved the location so close to the action but in a lovely quiet street. 
Loved the outdoor area which is a rare find in New York, perfect for a chill down after a long day of walking. 
Apartment was a good size for two couples - a little dark as it the ground floor but great to have two bathrooms as well. Thanks!!!
Como dije, nos fuimos a la mañana siguiente, perdimos lo pagado por la semana y nos mudamos a un hotel.

We had a fantastic stay. The apartment is spacious, well equipped and clean. The location is great, near lots of restaurants, shops and subway. It is overlooking the backyard so it is superquiet, what is rare for NYC. Only being on lower ground floor it doesn't get much daylight. 
Kris and Natalia were easy to communicate with. Kris provided us with all the necessary instructions before our trip. Upon check in we met Natalia who showed us around and gave us all additional information. Thank you both for our wonderful stay, we really enjoyed your apartment and hopefully we will come back in future.

Great place in the perfect location! My
Parents and parents in law stayed there and had a wonderful time. The Apartment is well equipped and very comfortable. Thank you for everything!

This place is amazing! I loved how you have your own private entrance, and the place is tucked 40 feet away from the street making it super quiet! I will check availability here every time I come to NYC, thanks again!
Great place to stay in a cool location in the city.  Recommend 100%

Kris's place is wonderful. It's cozy and private, yet steps away from the liveliness of the Chelsea neighborhood. The generous bedrooms both have lots of closet space as well. I cook when I travel and the kitchen is well-equipped, neat and orderly. Overall, a great stay. Booking again!

This is my second time booking with Kris and I will book again. Kris is a great host; Natalia is always prompt and helpful to settle you in. The apartment is wonderful - loads of amenities, great space, back garden is a nice escape from the city. Safe, convenient and definitely feels like home.

Perfect apartment for a week in NYC.
The neighborhood is very cool.
The communication with Kris was excellent.
Little surprise in the fridge ;-) Thx 
Do not hesitate...
Beautiful large Apartment! Lovely clean linens, all the comforts of home. Plenty of room. Nice and quiet. Within walking distance to all your needs. Fantastic location! Great outdoor patio space!

I get to NYC for business 10-12 times a year and so have stayed in a lot of neighborhoods, both in apartments and hotels.  I have to say that so far Kris's home is in by far my favorite location: this area of Chelsea has really come up in the last 4 years so it is near great restaurants and shopping.  The Whitney Museum and galleries are mere blocks away.  Ditto three separate subway lines.  Also I run and the fact that the westside boardwalk has been re-done made for gorgeous runs.  (The apt itself was also perfect, but you can see that from the pics - I'm focusing on the neighborhood as that is always a bit of a question-mark when searching for places to stay....)
The apartment is very comfortable with everything you need.  I love the location.  Easy to walk everywhere.  We were lucky to have a warm weekend and be able to enjoy the garden patio.

We absolutely loved Kris's apartment. It was perfect t for 2 couples. The apartment is spotless. In a great location in Chelsea. Loved the neighbourhood vibe and living New York like a local !! The outdoor space was great especially with the gorgeous fairy lights on !!! Super quiet and easy to sleep.  Kris is an excellent trustworthy host who responses very quickly with lots of info and tips. 
Tip - Huu sushi on the corner is delicious and nice to eat in or takeaway. Also for a healthy , delicious , cheap take away dinner or lunch Wise Fish Pike directly across the road is an absolute winner ! We enjoyed ours with a glass of wine in the courtyard !!! Thanks Kris ❤️'d NYC  and ❤️ your place
We loved our stay here. It was easy to get anywhere we needed to go and offered a lovely respite from the bustle of the city when we wanted it.

The apartment is in a great location and is very private. Another couple and my wife and I spent 14 days in the apartment The outside courtyard is wonderful to use in the early summer. The fittings and fixtures were most comfortable. The linen and towels were good quality and the was well stocked with items for personal use. My wife and her friend were most impressed with the washing machine and dryer and would give these two items 6 stars!

Kris' place is very good. Central and close to everything, in the heart of Chelsea. 

Was definitely worth the stay.
The apartment was great!  Other than the refrigerator being loud we have no complaints.

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at Kris' apartment. It offered exactly what we required. An excellent location in the heart of Chelsea. Yet the apartment was quiet from the hustle and bustle of Manhattan. 

Kris introduced me to Natalia and Yoshi as our local host. Both were extremely accommodating especially with my delayed flight arriving 9 hours after our original ETA. 

We hope to rent from Kris in the future.
Excellent location

Great location in the heart of Chelsea! Walking distance to the West Village and Soho, close to 14th street transport, and all around great apartment. We loved the outdoor patio and how quiet the apartment was at night. All-around great place and great host.

Very well located apartment, small but probably what one could expect in NY. The kitchen was  very user friendly with everything you would need as was the laundry. Bedrooms a little small and they windows could do with so decent curtains, the aircon in the main bedroom is very noisy.
Overall I would recommend if you have no issues with the curtains and aircon.

We've been visiting NYC once a year for the last decade, and this was our best stay yet. Terrific location, thoughtful amenities, and (most importantly for me) unbelievably quiet and secluded for Manhattan. Will definitely book again next year. Thank you Kris and Natalia!
Best place to stay in New York! Loved the location. Place was amazing, very homey and classy. Great place as has great privacy

A wonderful apartment in a fantastic location.  Great beds & linens.  Perfect for 2 couples.  Lots of great restaurants nearby plus the Chelsea Markets and High Line.  Kris & Natalia maintained great contact.  Thank you for the champagne, chocolates and flowers.  We hope to return one day.

Right from the first point of contact Kris responded quickly and answered all our questions. As this was our first AirBnB stay he made us feel comfortable with the process. As for the apartment we couldn’t fault it. Located near bars, restaurants, markets, landmarks and public transport. The list is endless. The apartment is also set back from the street. So security and privacy were never in question. All the amenities were good quality and all in working order. The beds were comfortable and we didn’t notice much street noise at night. Cannot recommend this place highly enough. Stop looking and get booking. This is the best and most authentic New York experience we’ve ever had.

The apartment is fantastic, the location was ideal, the position was perfect, the greeting on the check in and the hospitality was great.
I wish to thank-you immensely and I can guarantee that we will be back!!

This was our first Airbnb experience and Kris and Natalia really made us feel at home. From initial contact on booking, through to really good tips and information and very fast responses to questions, they really were very focused on the guest experience. The apartment itself is in a fabulous location in Chelsea - loads of places nearby, for food, bars and shopping. The apartment was very well equipped and very stylish and clean - nespresso machine, water machine (even a soda stream - I haven’t seen one of those in years) and there was a lovely gesture of a welcome bottle of bubbles in the fridge. Plenty of towels and hairdryers provided. Highly, highly recommended. Thank you Kris and Natalia.
Very clean, cool and stylish apartment in an incredible neighborhood. We were provided with many tips and recommendations. I highly recommend!!!

Highly recommend Kris’s apartment. !! It was close to everything!!  The apartment is roomy and the beds are very comfortable. I’ve been to NYC about 10 times and this is my favorite stay. After this experience, I can’t imagine staying in a hotel in NYC ever again!!. Was nervous about booking Airbnb since I’ve tried once before and was canceled by the owner at the last minute, but that wasn’t an issue with Kris. He and Natalia, the host who met us to check in was on top of everything !!  And the apartment just felt safe and tucked away. I even left the apartment alone at 1:00 am to walk to a nearby pharmacy. I felt that safe in the neighborhood.  I wouldn’t hesitate to stay here again !!!

We will be coming back! Awesome space, very private yet close to everything! Super clean. Comfortable beds and sofa. Outdoor space is a huge bonus!!! Great communication with Kris and also he had some great recommendations! We would recommend this apartment to our friends and family! Thanks Kris!

This home in Chelsea did not disappoint. We are a family of four with 2 teenaged kids, and we made it a point to have two bedrooms with 2 baths and available facilities for laundry. This had it all and then some. The kitchen was fully equipped. All the basic amenities were readily available for our use. The place was very neat and tidy with fascinating pieces of art. Truly a home away from home. If Spring had  just come a little earlier we would have been lounging in the private terrace the whole day. The location is just great and an easy walk to Union square or SoHo and even up to midtown. Our host was truly gracious. The Champagne a nice touch. Thank you for a great stay.

Hemos estado en casa de Kris dos parejas durante una semana , la casa es tal cual veis en las fotos tiene dos dormitorios de matrimonio espaciosos uno de ellos con el baño dentro el otro baño está afuera , la decoración está con mucho gusto  , la cocina muy completa tienen el detalle de tener cápsulas de café y de bienvenida una botella de espumoso y bombones no falta de nada hemos estado muy agusto como en casa , la comunicación tanto con Kris como con Natalia ha sido siempre estupenda y rápida para lo que necesites, y la situación es estupenda cerca de todo y en una zona más tranquila sin duda alguna lo recomiendo 100% , nos ha encantado Gracias Kris y Natalia.
Great place very stylish and a perfect location for all the city. Definitely would recommend to anyone.
Excellent location, easy and accommodating check-in, nice touches and accommodated our group of 4 adults easily and spaciously!   Would definitely come back & stay here.
Excellent spot. Very clean and well located with beautiful garden area!
excellent communication! very helpful! Made a business booking very easy!

The apartment was furnished/equipped wonderfully. Examples: PLENTY of towels, coffee maker AND espresso machine (with coffee already there), bottle of champagne in refrig, etc.  We were there during hot days but A/C cooled place down quickly.  Location was great; plenty of great restaurants nearby and subway close. Host was VERY accommodating: our 19 year old daughter arrived a day before we did but was greeted kindly and shown around. And when our flight out was delayed, they let us stay late. Would DEFINITELY stay here again!
Main bedroom needs a better mattress and air conditioning unit in bedroom was extremely loud but the rest of the apartment was fabulous.
Great stay, the rooms were private and had televisions, and the little outside area is nice too!

Fantastic place in a great location. First night there they were filming ‘law and order’ outside. Perfect for two couples. Natalia was there at check in and showed us around. We were able to have a late check out and so we washed/dried and put away the towels to help. Fab washing machine and tumble dryer. Coffee from machine was lovely. Shampoo, conditioner  and shower gel are supplied and great quality. Prosecco in fridge was a lovely touch. Would highly recommend. Thank you Kris and Natalia.

We had a great experience at Kris’ place.  Not only is it exactly advertised, but we were actually pleasantly surprised by how stylish the place is and the many amenities/appliances offered, from the back yard, to the huge and beautiful TV, to the full range of kitchen appliances.  The list goes on and on.  I also loved how clean the place is.  Location was also top notch, right next to Chelsea market, numerous shopping options and the metro.  Finally, we also had a great experience communicating with Kris and his team.  All and all a great experience in almost every aspect I can think of.

The place was everything I expected and more. Great host and check in experience. Extremely clean. Large space for New York. Centrally located. 

If I am back in New York, I wouldn't hesitate to stay at again!

Lovely, spacious, arty apartment in a great location and has everything you need for your stay.
Great hosts; attentive, strong communication.
Highly recommend!!!

I have to say that kris place is probably the best in NYC!!!  
What you see is what you get and much more!
thank you kris, it was the best place to in the city and will come back again :)

What an amazing apartment!  Kris provided everything we could possibly need for our stay in NYC!  The apartment is located near some fabulous restaurants and bars, and is very close to several subway stops.  We will definitely be back!

This apartment is truly one-of-a-kind. The location is amazing - a few blocks from major Subway stations. The spaces are unbelievable - spacious living room and bedrooms, comfortable kitchen, and a really cool outdoor terrace. I highly recommend this apartment.

If you are looking for a quiet, urban retreat in an ideal location, and with all the amenities and service you would expect and more, then this is your choice.  Kris and Natalia were perfect hosts, and their home exceeded expectations in terms of space, comfort and amenities.  I was amazed how quiet the bedrooms were.  Beds/linens were incredibly comfortable, the kitchen was superbly stocked, and TV/wifi were perfect. Could not have asked for more, and would definitely stay here again.

We stayed at Kris’s Garden apartment over the Thanksgiving holiday and the location is outstanding! Our favorite things about the apartment was  the private entrance, very nice kitchen and comfortable beds!  We also love the dining room table for eating in and playing games! The outdoor space is Super nice unfortunately the weather was cold and we didn’t get to use it! Next time!! The washer and dryer was an added bonus. My husband and son loved the large TV for watching football! Overall it’s a wonderful place and you’ll enjoy your stay there!
Great place. I highly recommend it. Comfortable, stylish, and good location! Host was great and perfect!

Great place to stay in NYC.  Close to the action but on a quiet residential street.  Couldn't be happier with the location.  We were met at the apartment at Natalia.  The unit is just as described.  Very comfortable, good sleeping arrangements, well equipped-kitchen--everything you could need or want.  And leaving us some Prosecco and chocolates was a nice touch as well.  Would definitely stay here again!

We highly recommend Kris’ place. It as even better than described, in a nice location (Nice to be in a quiet space still so close to walk to most areas) and spotlessly clean with great amenities - to name just a few - newish large TV’s in the lounge and all bedrooms, great coffee machine and capsules, lots of towels.  The outside area would be awesome in Summer.  It was very easy to get around NYC from this location - we walked almost everywhere and used a few Uber’s.  There are some good restaurants close by - don’t miss the Tapas and Paella restaurant almost directly opposite the apartment: amazing service, food and cocktails.  Communication from Kris was super quick, friendly and helpful and check-in a breeze with Nicola.  Thanks Kris, for the lovely French sparkling and chocolates, they were greatly enjoyed on NYE!   Also, many thanks for the early check-in, it helped a lot after our 23 hour journey.   Hopefully, we can stay again on our next trip to NYC during spring or summer to enjoy the outside area.

name: Casa em vila piscatória, Afurada - 1 piso
summary: Situada numa das margens do rio Douro, perto das famosas caves do vinho do Porto e da zona histórica de Gaia/Porto. A curta distância encontramos o mar e uma larga costa de praias, classificadas de bandeira azul.
space: Situada numa das margens do rio Douro, perto das famosas caves do vinho do Porto e da zona histórica de Gaia/Porto. A curta distância encontramos o mar e uma larga costa de praias. A casa foi recentemente renovada em 2015. Situa-se na freguesia d'Afurada, na margem esquerda do muito próximo rio Douro. Uma vila voltada para o rio e mar com gente simples, simpática e acolhedora. Desportos náuticos e zona de bares podem ser encontrados na Douro Marina; a uma curta distância encontramos também a Reserva Natural do Estuário do Douro, que faz a fronteira entre o rio e o mar. Área total de 80 m2: sala c/ sofá cama, sala de jantar, cozinha, WC serviço, 2 quartos, WC com chuveiro. A casa está equipada com: frigorifico, microondas, torradeira, jarro eléctrico, ferro de engomar e tábua, aspirador, secador cabelo, maquina lavar roupa, toalhas e roupa de cama.
description: Situada numa das margens do rio Douro, perto das famosas caves do vinho do Porto e da zona histórica de Gaia/Porto. A curta distância encontramos o mar e uma larga costa de praias, classificadas de bandeira azul. Situada numa das margens do rio Douro, perto das famosas caves do vinho do Porto e da zona histórica de Gaia/Porto. A curta distância encontramos o mar e uma larga costa de praias. neighborhood_overview: Rio, praia, historia e cultura num lugar singular e pitoresco!
transit: Transportes públicos para Gaia e Porto, com ligação a estações de metro e comboio. Travessia de barco entre as margens. Aluguer de bicicletas na Douro Marina. Aeroporto do Porto (Francisco Sá Carneiro) a 15km. Public transport to Gaia and Porto, connecting the metro and train stations. Boat crossing between the banks. Bicycle rental in Douro Marina. Porto airport (Francisco Sá Carneiro) 15km.
access: Sinta-se em casa! Make yourself at home!
interaction: Disponíveis para ajudar! We are here to help you!

host.host_about: Responsável e bem disposto

address.street: Vila Nova de Gaia, Porto, Portugal
address.government_area: Santa Marinha e São Pedro da Afurada

reviews.comments:
Le logement est un peu loin du centre, pour s'y rendre le moyen le plus simple et le moins onéreux est de prendre un uber ! 
Mis à part sa localisation, le logement est très jolie et spacieux. Il est très bien équipé et confortable. 
A proximité, on trouve des restaurants, des boulangeries et une petite supérette. 
Joao n'était pas présent à notre arrivée et à notre départ mais ceci n'a pas été dérangeant car il est resté disponible et a répondu à toutes nos questions. Il a été très à l'écoute et très arrangeant. 
Nous avons passé un excellent week-end entre amis !
Nos han tratado muy bien, 100% recomendable!

name: Caliu, Friendly Rentals
summary: This apartment has: 1 double bed, 6 single beds, 1 double sofa bed. Spacious for family or friends In a prime location, this very spacious apartment is the perfect base for families or groups of friends who want to enjoy a holiday in Barcelona. The area surrounding the Apartment:- This apartment is in a very central location in the Eixample area of Barcelona,  the birthplace of the Modernism movement. When looking to experience Barcelona's world renowned reputation for leading 19th century architecture, you should go no further. There are many "must see" attractions in this area, especially the Gaudí sites - the impressive and famous Sagrada Familia, the two famous Gaudí houses La Pedrera and Casa Batlló in the Manzana de la Discordia - all within walking distance.
space: This apartment has: 1 double bed, 6 single beds, 1 double sofa bed. Licence number: HUTB-002002 This apartment is perfect for families or groups of friends. Each of the bedrooms is exterior allowing the mediterranean sunlight to flood the apartment. There is a huge living dining area with comfortable seating for a large group. One part of the living area features a corner sofa, TV and DVD and can be separated from the other living/dining area by a large sliding door. This sofa converts into a sofa bed for the 9th and 10th guest. The other living area with sofa and armchairs is the perfect spot to relax in after meals to enjoy a nice Spanish wine. The fireplace (not functioning) is only one of the original features maintained during the renovation. As you pass through the apartment, you can't fail to notice the beautiful ceilings and original doors/windows. The dining table is large enough to accommodate your group and is right next to the small, but complete kitchen. There are 4 bedroo

Spacious for family or friends In a prime location, this very spacious apartment is the perfect base for families or groups of friends who want to enjoy a holiday in Barcelona. Each of the bedrooms is exterior allowing the mediterranean sunligh
neighborhood_overview: Barcelona´s  19th century Eixample district is the birthplace of the Modernism movement  where Antoni Gaudi is considered the leader. When looking to experience  Barcelona´s world renowned reputation for leading 19th century architecture,  this area is king. With all the Gaudi sites within reach like the grand and  impressive famous Sagrada familia, the two famous Gaudi houses of La Perdera  and Manzana de la Discordia, the sprawling Hospital de la Santa Creu i Sant Pau,  you´ll spend hours rambling along and looking upwards. This grid-patterned area was created in the  19th century to accommodate the overflowing population from old Barcelona; luckily this coincided with Barcelona’s golden age of architecture..  Gaudí, Puig I Cadafalch, Domènech I Montaner were employed by the wealthy to  build townhouses, each one more daring than the last… The  Eixample district is divided in two, the Eixample Dreta (right side) and  Eixample Esquerra (left side), this divide is marked by Passeig de
transit: Ideal to discover the city either on foot or by public transport.
access: Travellers will have access to the entire apartment.
interaction: We will be more than happy to help you with anything you need. We can organize a transfer from the airport to the apartment.
house_rules: CHECK-IN Week Days: The check-in and key collection takes place at: Friendly Rentals, Passatge Sert, 1-3 - Barcelona. Weekend and bank holidays: The check-in and key collection takes place at: Friendly Rentals, Carrer Ausias March, 27 - Barcelona. Important:  Late arrivals between 21:00 and 02:00 hrs require an extra service fee of 30€ which must be paid to the late service agent at Check-in.  Loud music and parties are strictly prohibited. Guests in a Friendly Rentals apartment should be aware that if loud music is played, or a party is held, and the neighbours complain and/or police are called, you may be immediately removed from the apartment regardless of the time, day or night. Noise regulations and respect for other residents between 22:00 and 10.00. We would appreciate your full cooperation in this matter and we hope you understand that these rules are necessary, as our apartments are located in residential buildings with people that have to get up early and go to work. The quie

host.host_about:
¡Hola a todos! Soy Claudia Castillo y formo parte del equipo de Friendly Rentals. Una empresa con sede en Barcelona especializada en el alquiler de apartamentos vacacionales. Llevamos 14 años trabajando con un claro objetivo: ofrecer a nuestros clientes la mejor selección de apartamentos a precios competitivos. Garantizamos además la calidad de los mismos y el trato más Friendly. Actualmente contamos con apartamentos en 23 ciudades alrededor del mundo y estamos continuamente ampliando nuestras ofertas y destinos. 

El equipo de Friendly Rentals es joven y dinámico, tan sólo en nuestra sede en Barcelona disponemos de más de 60 personas que hablan español, catalán, inglés, francés, italiano, alemán y holandés. Siempre ofrecemos una atención personalizada a todos nuestros clientes y disponemos de equipos locales en todos nuestros destinos, de este modo somos capaces de ofrecer una atención personalizada 24 horas al día, los 7 días de la semana. 

Por supuesto, somos expertos en turismo así que sea cuál sea tu duda coméntanosla ¡estaremos encantados de ayudarte a preparar tu estancia! Te ofreceremos todo tipo de consejos y sugerencias, los mejores lugares para comer, visitas imprescindibles, actividades recomendadas si viajas con niños… ¡toda la información que pueda serte de utilidad! Queremos que tu estancia con nosotros sea realmente fantástica, ¡nuestra casa es tu casa! ¡Te esperamos! 





--------------------------------------


Hi, everyone! My name is Claudia Castillo and I’m part of the Friendly Rentals team. Friendly Rentals is a company based in Barcelona that specializes in holiday rental apartments. Over the past 14 years, we’ve been working hard with a clear goal in mind: providing our customers with the best selection of apartments at the most competitive prices. We guarantee quality apartments and a friendly service at all times.

We currently have apartments in 23 cities worldwide and we are constantly adding new destinations and offers.
Friendly Rentals’ team is young and dynamic. In Barcelona alone, we have more than 60 employees who speak Spanish, Catalan, English, French, Italian, German and Dutch. We have local representatives in all our cities, which allows us to provide a personalized customer service 24 hours a day, 7 days a week.

As trusted tourism experts, we can help you out with any questions you may have! We offer you the best travel tips, recommendations on where to eat, best places to visit, activities for children… all the information you need to plan your trip! We want your stay with us to be one you remember; our home is your home: we look forward to welcoming you!

reviews.comments: Great place, very large too.

Exactly as posted in airbnb. Huge rooms, dining  area and.living room. Host is readily available. Easy to contact for your needs. Oscar even gave us tips on where to go. Clean apartment and the towels and bed sheets smells good.
An excellent, spacious apartment. Suitable for a large group.

The city tax wasn‘t mentioned in the pricing, which was a bit unpleasant. Furthermore, the neighbors are very sensitive to noise, we has a dinner with 10 people, some background music and animated talk, and at 11pm Friendly Rentals called because some neighbor had complained. I understand neighbors are annoyed by holiday flats, but I guess it’s important to know before booking. Also, Friendly Rentals gave us only two sets of keys, which is complicated if you travel as a group of 10 persons who might have different plans in the city. Bur apart from that, the flat is super nice, clean, well equipped, rooms are well distributed. Also nice: we could check in earlier than announced.
Great place and great location. We forgot some valuable items at the apartment and they kept it apart for us. Definitely recommend this place.
Good location!
位置好,环境不错,空间大,房东热情｡
Lindo y espacioso. Buena ubicación.
La ubicación está muy bien. Pero lo más molesto es la hora de salir y la recepción de la empresa.

The apartment is spacious, well furnished and was clean. Each double bedroom has a little balcony, as well as the living room. As it is run by a big company, you don't get the AirBnb experience (e.g. you have to pick up the keys from the office), but for the price it was well worth it.
The location is quite central, but therefore far from the beaches. We loved our stay here!
The AirBnb was as described. The reason for 3 stars was for the difficulty contacting the host during our stay, and also the unresponsiveness from the host prior to our arrival.

ideally located apartment, central for shops, restaurants and attractions (Sagrada familia only 7 blocks away). Also good for transport as the Metro (3 blocks) hop-on/hop off busses (two blocks), and Airport Connection (P-De Gracia = 3 blocks) are all nearby.
The apartment is in a lovely location and spotlessly clean. We enjoyed our stay very much a recommend it to everyone.
Well located, clean and spacious. Would recommend to others.
A lovely apartment with plenty of room for 10 guests

This place is so spacious with an unreal view!! There’s balcony access in the main rooms that bring you out to the most stunning view of the area and sunsets. The area is so beautiful to walk around and see, as well as amazing restaurant choices all within walking distance. My family and I truly enjoyed our stay here!
Great location and lots of space.  As noted by another review there is some wear since photos were taken.

Muy bonito departamento, muy buena ubicación cerca de la parada del autobús  V17 y 47 que te traen desde barrio gótico. La sagrada familia está a unos 15 minutos caminando. Para desayunar hay muchos lugares ricos alrededores.  Muy recomendable, seguro regresamos 
Saludos desde Alemania

El alojamiento estaba en una muy buena ubicación, para ir andando a todos lados, la zona muy linda. El apartamento limpio, ordenado y como se ve en las fotos. 
Tuvimos un inconveniente con el agua caliente el día que habíamos llegado. Luego de pasar un día entero en aeropuertos sólo deseábamos llegar a bañarnos y había problemas con el agua caliente, así que me comuniqué con el teléfono que tenía de contacto pero lo único que me decían era que eso no era un hotel con servicio 24hs así que no pudieron ayudarme, quedaron en comunicarse conmigo al siguiente día pero no lo hicieron, por suerte pudimos arreglarlo nosotros mismos.

The flat is really beautiful and huge, it’s perfect if you want to spend time with a big group or family. However you need earplug to sleep because the noise from the road is pretty loud. We really enjoyed it!

name: Dali IV, Friendly Rentals
summary: This apartment has: 1 double bed, 2 single beds. Central, Barrio Gotico and Port Vell!!! A central hideaway in the heart of Barcelona. This cosy and perfectly situated apartment is a perfect base to explore all Barcelona has to offer. Central to all the major tourist attractions of the old town and gothic quarter, any guest will be glad of the location. The area surrounding the apartment: The Dalí IV apartment is situated in the heart of the Barrio Gótico (Gothic Quarter) which really is the true heart of Barcelona. It is located on Paseo de Colon amidst a concentration of medieval Gothic buildings only a few blocks from Paseo del Born. This area is a maze of interconnecting dark streets linking with squares, and there are plenty of cafés and bars. The apartment itself is across the street from the Port, just two blocks from the amazing gothic church of Santa Maria del Mar, near the Picasso Museum, the Cathedral, Las Ramblas and the wonderful shopping area called Portal del'Angel....
space: This apartment has: 1 double bed, 2 single beds. Licence number: HUTB-003343 The Dalí IV apartment has been completely renovated while carefully conserving the original charm of its 1900s architecture. This 2nd floor apartment (with elevator) is perfect for a couple, a couple with a child or a small group of friends. The bedroom area is the main focus of the apartment and has a double sized bed (160 x 200) and a comfortable couch, as well as two single beds (80 x 200) for the 3rd and 4th guests that can also be used for seating when one bed is stored under the other when not in use; this can also be set up as a double bed - this area can also be made private by closing the doors. The great decor and attention to detail in the Dalí IV apartment make it a really comfortable and relaxing choice for your visit to Barcelona. One of the nicest features of this apartment is the original 14th Century gothic window which was a lovers corner in it's day... a place where courting couples would si

neighborhood_overview: The Barrio Gotico or Gothic Quarter is the heart of  old town Barcelona and one of the best preserved  medieval quarters in Europe, with various  Roman remains to be found. The area itself is a body of pedestrian,  interconnecting, narrow cobble stoned streets where you can wander around  aimlessly for hours, taking in all the wonderful bars and cafes, restaurants  and shops… as well as Barcelona’s very famous “La Catedral” (gothic cathedral)  which is magnificent and a must see for all visitors. There is another very distinguished  - but less visited Gothic church in this area also, the Santa Maria del Pi. The  quiet and attractive Plaça del Pi in front of the church is filled with bars  and restaurants with outside seating where a cup of coffee goes down well while  watching the quirky street performers which congregate to entertain the  visitors most days. The Municipal government (Ajuntament) and Catalan  regional government (Generalitat) are in this area standing opposite each  ot
transit: Ideal to discover the city either on foot or by public transport.
access: Travellers will have access to the entire apartment.
interaction: We will be more than happy to help you with anything you need. We can organize a transfer from the airport to the apartment.
house_rules: CHECK-IN Week Days: The check-in and key collection takes place at: Friendly Rentals, Passatge Sert, 1-3 - Barcelona. Weekend and bank holidays: The check-in and key collection takes place at: Friendly Rentals, Carrer Ausias March, 27 - Barcelona. Important:  Late arrivals between 21:00 and 02:00 hrs require an extra service fee of 30€ which must be paid to the late service agent at Check-in.  Loud music and parties are strictly prohibited. Guests in a Friendly Rentals apartment should be aware that if loud music is played, or a party is held, and the neighbours complain and/or police are called, you may be immediately removed from the apartment regardless of the time, day or night. Noise regulations and respect for other residents between 22:00 and 10.00. We would appreciate your full cooperation in this matter and we hope you understand that these rules are necessary, as our apartments are located in residential buildings with people that have to get up early and go to work. host.host_about:
¡Hola a todos! Soy Claudia Castillo y formo parte del equipo de Friendly Rentals. Una empresa con sede en Barcelona especializada en el alquiler de apartamentos vacacionales. Llevamos 14 años trabajando con un claro objetivo: ofrecer a nuestros clientes la mejor selección de apartamentos a precios competitivos. Garantizamos además la calidad de los mismos y el trato más Friendly. Actualmente contamos con apartamentos en 23 ciudades alrededor del mundo y estamos continuamente ampliando nuestras ofertas y destinos. 

El equipo de Friendly Rentals es joven y dinámico, tan sólo en nuestra sede en Barcelona disponemos de más de 60 personas que hablan español, catalán, inglés, francés, italiano, alemán y holandés. Siempre ofrecemos una atención personalizada a todos nuestros clientes y disponemos de equipos locales en todos nuestros destinos, de este modo somos capaces de ofrecer una atención personalizada 24 horas al día, los 7 días de la semana. 

Por supuesto, somos expertos en turismo así que sea cuál sea tu duda coméntanosla ¡estaremos encantados de ayudarte a preparar tu estancia! Te ofreceremos todo tipo de consejos y sugerencias, los mejores lugares para comer, visitas imprescindibles, actividades recomendadas si viajas con niños… ¡toda la información que pueda serte de utilidad! Queremos que tu estancia con nosotros sea realmente fantástica, ¡nuestra casa es tu casa! ¡Te esperamos! 





--------------------------------------


Hi, everyone! My name is Claudia Castillo and I’m part of the Friendly Rentals team. Friendly Rentals is a company based in Barcelona that specializes in holiday rental apartments. Over the past 14 years, we’ve been working hard with a clear goal in mind: providing our customers with the best selection of apartments at the most competitive prices. We guarantee quality apartments and a friendly service at all times.

We currently have apartments in 23 cities worldwide and we are constantly adding new destinations and offers.
Friendly Rentals’ team is young and dynamic. In Barcelona alone, we have more than 60 employees who speak Spanish, Catalan, English, French, Italian, German and Dutch. We have local representatives in all our cities, which allows us to provide a personalized customer service 24 hours a day, 7 days a week.

As trusted tourism experts, we can help you out with any questions you may have! We offer you the best travel tips, recommendations on where to eat, best places to visit, activities for children… all the information you need to plan your trip! We want your stay with us to be one you remember; our home is your home: we look forward to welcoming you!

reviews.comments: J'ai déjà conseillé Claudia de mettre des précisions concernant l'appartement concernant la bruit et la manque de luminosité et les marches en pierres partout dans l'appartement donc dangereux pour les familles avec des enfants ou des personnes à mobilité réduit.

Although we never met Claudia, communication was excellent from the start. The apartment is in a great location in the Gothic quarter and close to the seafront, with easy access to all the sights, bars, cafes & restaurants. The neighbourhood is lively at night and can be noisy at times. The apartment has some interesting features and is clean and comfortable for two, although gloomier-looking than in the photographs. Wifi is excellent, there is a good supply of hot water but the lift can be unreliable. I would recommend it as a great place for a couple who want to enjoy all the sights of Barcelona.

Beautiful apartment! My sister, roommate and I had so much fun staying here and it felt like home. I would note that you have to pick the keys up at a separate location, but apart from that we had zero issues and would definitely recommend to anyone.
A lovely place just in the outskirts and away from the tourist crush of the Gothic Quarter.  We would certainly stY again. A wonderful spot.
Small nice apparent. Simple interior. For four persons OK if you manly only sleep there. Rental was uncomplicated.

Overall this was a comfortable and clean stay in Barcelona. The room was well furnished and the staff at check-in were great. You can also leave your bags at the check-in location in case you want to explore before 3pm. 

Just a few things to note that made this a 4-Star stay. The lighting in the room is abysmal and no matter the time of day/windows open the space feels gloomy and dark. Just need to add some more central lighting to fix this. Secondly, the sink caused some issues as it was stuck in the closed position with no apparent way to open it. After a day we finally managed to jam it open by using a knife and propping it up, but this was a bit frustrating to do.

This apartment is in a great location, right by the beach and a 5 min walk to la rambles. It was easy enough to pick up the keys from the other office and the flat was in a safe location. My only negatives were that the flat is very very very dark! Limited windows and the windows that they do have look out onto a dark dingy alley way. The lights in there too weren't very good and some of the lamps didn't work. For all the girls out there there was limited mirrors which makes getting ready quite difficult! Also some of the plug sockets didn't work. Apart from those few minor things we had a great time, thanks!
Es una compañía que alquila departamentos. Funciona muy bien.

great location, professional organisation. 
the curtains are light-blocking which is nice (and rare in Spain), and the house has lovely ornamented windows.

Die Wohnung ist gut gelegen. Man kann alles ziemlich schnell zu Fuss erreichen und in der unmittelbaren Nähe hat es tolle kleine Bars und Restaurants. Das Zimmer ist allerdings tatsächlich extrem dunkel, sodass es nicht zum verweilen einlädt. Es ist alles sehr laut und der Lift wollte irgendwie nur hinauf fahren, nie runter. Die Schlüsselübergabe ist super weit weg.
Excelente lugar, muy agradable y en un lugar muy cercano a todo. Recomiendo el apartamento, espero poder regresar.
Qualità prezzo era ottimo e mi sono ritrovato bene.
Bon appartement, proche de tout.
The place is clean and roomy. Has lots of character. In a great location. Close to the water in the midst of Gothic among lots of food options.

Piso Bien ubicado cerca de la costa, el problema es que se trata de una agencia de rentas, no de un particular y te piden que firmes contrato y recojas la llave en un lugar distinto al del hospedaje lincual dificulta el traslado porque debes andsr con tu equipaje por toda la ciudad hasta que llegas al apartamento . En mi opinión contraviene la idea de que airb&b es una app para facilitar y abaratar el servicio de hospedaje no un negocio que compite de mala forma con los hoteles establecidos
Good place, good location, looks as on pics
Brilliant apartment and location for anyone wanting to see barcelona!

It is an apartment managed by a big company. The space is ok, but there is not a personal touch. The double bed room has no door, so there is no privacity. The single bed room has no window. The intercom was not working and the elevator just move up, not down. The bathroom is inside the single bed room, and it is a little inconvenient. The space was clean and it is as the pictures show. The location is very good. It is a little noise, but not able to disturb our group. It was ok for few days.
Small cozy flat, excellent location. The apparent has all needed for staying. However the flat is smaller than shower especially bathroom (the shower is tiny and dark). The flat is also quite dark.
Pretty cool spot! Thanks!
Excelente ubicación!! Hermoso departamento!!
Excelente ubicación. Muy cómodo. Maximo 4 personas. Para varios días si tenes hijos chicos está ok.
The place is good very close to Gothic Quarter, very dissatisfied with Friendly Rentals service

The location in the gothic section was great. This place is managed by a large rental company. Communication was frustrating. The place developed a leak into floors below prompting building owners to shut off the water without notice. Management eventually moved us to another place but with very confusing instructions. Would not recommend.
Buen anfitrión y servicio, solo recomiendo mejorar tv y comedor!

This was such an amazing place to stay! It was in the heart of the Gothic Quarter. It was very easy to get around the city from this space and the apartment itself was very clean and well furnished. Thanks Claudia!
Excellent location, excellent for families.  Having laundry was a great bonus. Great value overall.

Central place. Very simple but clean apartment. Key pickup from different location and no flexible checkin/checkout times.
Can recommend the apartment in general.
Excellent location. We stayed for three nights and had a pleasant and hassle free stay. Very good value for money.
location is great. tons of stuff to do all with walking distance.
Entrée dans une ruelle. ce qui n'est pas indiqué. 1 chaise manquait (3 chaises).

la verdad de todos los Airbnb que use, fue la peor experiencia: desidia. El dpto estaba sucio, eramos 3 y dos toallas, no había elementos de limpieza en la cocina, le falta amor o servicio.... le falta mantenimiento, pisos rotos, techo con maderas podridas en el baño. Puede venir bien para estudiantes, pero para una familia, no me pareció o fue el peor.  la ubicación es un 10. si le hicieran mantenimiento puede ser muy bueno. Ojalá lo hagan.
Great location. Everything you need in an apartment. Floor can get quite cold so bring along your house socks or slippers.
good location right in the gothic quarter

name: Central, Spacious, Safe, Seaside Flat
summary: This flat is located in Kalamis/ Fenerbahce, Kadikoy. Perfect, quiet, convenient and safe neighborhood. It is about a 20 minute walk, 5 minute ride to the main transportation hub in Kadikoy. Walk out the front door and cross the street. There you will find, the sea, marina, and Kalamis Park. There are local markets and plenty of restaurants less than 2 mins away. Dolmus's (shared taxi) drop you off on the street of the flat. So getting home is no problem, at anytime during your stay.
space: The flat is modern, spacious, yet cozy and quiet. There are two bedrooms. The master bedroom has a king size Tempur-Pedic bed with a large wardrobe. The second room has a comfortable, single bed and wardrobe. The bathroom is a nice size with a shower, small tub and washer. We will provide soap, towels and a hair dryer. The kitchen has all of your common necessities: plates, glassware, cooking ware, a refrigerator, stove, coffee maker, etc. The living room is very spacious with a balcony attached. Inside the living room there is a dinning table, couch (suitable to sleep on), and a 47" LCD flat screen TV with cable and internet.

neighborhood_overview: We are located next to the sea and marina so life here is relaxed. Visit Kalamis Park, Fenerbahce Park and Ozgurluk Park for some relaxation outside of the city. You can also walk to Bagdat Avenue for some upscale shopping. If you don't need an escape from the city, no problem. You are located very central.
notes: We will provide a detailed list of restaurants, shops and transportation for you. It will be on the coffee table, in the living room. There you will find maps, directions on how to get to all of the main tourist locations as well as some local favorites.
transit: Details will be provided.
access: The flat is located on the second floor of the apartment. You will have access to all rooms and space during your stay.
interaction: We will be traveling but will have our phones and access to communicate with you, if needed. Family lives on the first floor, so if necessary, we can contact them for immediate help.
house_rules: - Smoking is not allowed inside the apartment, but you may smoke on the balcony.  - Please take shoes off at the door.  - Quiet hours between midnight and 6am. - Wash dishes after use.  - Turn off Air condition/ heater while not in the flat.

Appartamento impeccabile con tutto ciò di cui hai bisogno. Ottima vista, un bel balcone e una grande terrazza comunitaria. La zona "Poblenou" è una delle più belle per alloggiare e a due passi dalle migliori spiagge di Barcellona.
Nice place to stay!

Appartement très propre, bien équipé, literie confortable. Bonne communication avec Ceci pour la remise des clés.

Ceci was very friendly and helpful. The apartment was clean and spacious, and perfectly located.
