host.host_about: Sou advogada, 53 anos, trabalho homeoffice, gosto de viajar e conhecer pessoas. Gosto de animais, gosto de música, artes em geral. Falo inglês e espanhol. Vou amar conhecer pessoas novas e poder recebê-las em minha casa.

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments:
Isabel is an amazing person, so kind and helpful, we went to walk around and she invited me to try the best ice cream in the are, prepared dinner and breakfast for me and that was awesome, her little dog Bibi is super cool and friendly and not to forget her cat, I haven't seen a quiet cat like her haha, 
Thank you Isabel and for the good conversation we had, your English is great
I highly recommend Isabel place, it's super clear and in decent area, you are 15 Rs away from the beach if you use Uber, 
They provide free shuttle to the metropolitan shopping mall, 
Book with Isabel don't waste time looking 
Cheers

A Isabel é uma anfitriã maravilhosa! Muito atenciosa, gentil e cortês, de uma hospitalidade incrível! Sempre disposta a nos fazer sentir em casa, com seu atendimento e receptividade amável. O apartamento é muito bem localizado, praticamente em frente ao Centro Olímpico, próximo a tudo: restaurante, supermercado, drogarias, transporte público, etc. Além disso, o apartamento da Isabel é muito bem decorado, bem organizado, bem limpinho, muito aconchegante! Vale muito a pena!
Ótimo lugar! Calmo, tranquilo, seguro. Próximo aos transportes públicos. E a Isabel uma ótima e incrível pessoa.

Faltam palavras para descrever a excelência na hospitalidade. Aluguei um quarto e fiz uma amiga!
Imagino que para quem viaje sozinho seja um ótima opção, ao final do dia terá uma pessoa super agravável para conversar e compartilhar as aventuras, os pensamentos e sentimentos. 
Sem falar nos dois peludos que adoram fazer amizade e se esfregar na gente! 
O que a Anfitriã oferece, não se acha em nenhum hotel!
Lugar aconchegante e com uma anfitriã simpática e atenciosa.
muito bom recomendo
A recepção da Isabel é sensacional, me senti super a vontade. Conversamos bastante também. Muito bom mesmo!
Ótima recepção é excelência na hospitalidade. O apartamento é bem localizado na região e confortável.

Com certeza uma excelente hospedagem, ótima localidade (perto de BRT), segurança, comida maravilhosa, a Isabel foi muito atenciosa comigo, sempre muito gentil. Se eu pudesse ficaria um pouco mais. Obrigada por tudo Isabel!

A Isabel me recebeu muito bem em sua casa! Muito antes da viagem ela já me ajudou em dicas de como chegar e notícias sobre o Rock in Rio.
O apto está localizado num condomínio em frente ao Parque Olímpico.  
Local seguro, apto limpo, bem ventilado e aconchegante.
O quarto tem boa cama, excelentes lençóis e banheiro com ducha maravilhosa.
Ela foi muito amável, me recebeu com muito carinho e ainda me preparou um delicioso café da manhã!
Me senti bem recebida e voltaria com certeza. 
Obrigada por todo o carinho e gentileza, Isabel.
Um beijo.
A Isabel é muito atenciosa, minha estadia não poderia ter sido melhor, deixei tudo para a última hora e ela foi além para me ajudar. O apartamento é limpo e aconchegante. Super recomendo.

Minha estadia na casa de Isabel foi minha melhor experiência Airbnb. O espaço é perfeito, impecável e Isabel é de longe a melhor anfitriã, que acolhe o hóspede como ninguém. Me senti como se estivesse literalmente em minha casa. Uma estadia inesquecível!
Anfitriã perfeita. Organizada, inspiradora e cuidadosa. Acomodação extremamente limpa e amigável. Espero poder voltar logo.
Isabel was my first contact with cariocas and first time using airbnb. It couldn't have been any better!! She's the nicests most caring woman you will find around. Much love for she and her dog :)
Muito simpatica e fez até um almoço pra mim. Tudo certo!

It’s my second time that I stay at Isabel place, and the reason why I chose it again, is because she’s incredibly amazing host, such a warm welcome, and her kindness, she’s just amazing 
Thank you Isabel, will see you again for sure

Ótimo espaço, ótima anfitriã
Recomendo 100%

O local é muito perto da Arena Jeunesse. Eu ia a pé e voltava varias vezes por dia! A anfitriã é sensacional, simpática, atenciosa e flexível. O apartamento é limpo e confortável, eu me senti em casa. O sono é tranquilo, porque o condomínio é seguro e o ambiente é familiar. Tem um hortifruti muito bom e farmácia na esquina (tudo muito conveniente). Recomendo! E retornaria com certeza! ❤️

Isabel é muito atenciosa, me recebeu com carinho e deixou tudo já limpo e preparado. Cheguei cansada do aeroporto e tirei uma soneca, quando acordei, ela me ofereceu café da tarde. 
Sempre calorosa, ela ajuda com todas as direções que precisar para se locomover pela cidade, sem contar que a entrada do condomínio é na frente da Arena Jeunesse, perfeito pra quem vai em eventos lá ou no Parque Olímpico em geral. Super recomendo!

Uma pessoa maravilhosa e muito simples sem deixar de ser sofisticada.
Parabens
Ambiente ótimo, tranquilo e a Isabel é uma pessoa maravilhosa

Excelente localização, fui extremamente bem recebido pela Isabel, que se mostrou disponível o tempo inteiro!! Quarto simples, pra quem precisa de uma estadia curta, recomendo e muito!! Isabel é uma pessoa sensacional!!
Isabel é uma excelente anfitriã. Super simpática e superou as expectativas. Quarto conforme anunciado, limpo, boa localização. Super indico ela sim, e voltarei caso precise novamente.
Ótima Anfitriã, localização e mobilidade, ambiente muito bonito. Voltaria a me hospedar com ela!
A Isabel é uma anfitriã excelente, muito anteciosa e prestativa, o local também é excelente, tem tudo próximo, foi tudo maravilhoso, melhor do que eu esperava!

name: RENOVATED STUDIO in Astoria!!! 15mins to the city
summary: Completely renovated studio apartment in the Heart of Astoria.  3rd floor walk up.  Conveniently located just 3 blocks away from the subway (M, R Steinway station) - just 15 mins away from Manhattan. Beautiful clean apartment in a very safe area. The apartment has King size bed and a twin air mattress, so would be perfect for 2 or 3 people. There is a supermarket, 24hr pharmacy, laundromat just 2 mins away.  Perfect for NYC explorers, who wants to stay close to Manhattan and save some money.
description: Completely renovated studio apartment in the Heart of Astoria.  3rd floor walk up.  Conveniently located just 3 blocks away from the subway (M, R Steinway station) - just 15 mins away from Manhattan. Beautiful clean apartment in a very safe area. The apartment has King size bed and a twin air mattress, so would be perfect for 2 or 3 people. There is a supermarket, 24hr pharmacy, laundromat just 2 mins away.  Perfect for NYC explorers, who wants to stay close to Manhattan and save some money. You will have laundromat on the block, as well as organic supermarket and 24hr pharmacy. There is never a problem with early morning or late night check in. I'm available to help my guests with anything they need most of the time during their stay. The safest area in Queens.  The closest spot to Manhattan (just 10-15 mins away). Quiet & residential, but in the same time has busy nightlife on Friday & Saturday. 3 blocks away from the famous Steinway st M, R train ( Steinway st station) goes straight
neighborhood_overview: The safest area in Queens.  The closest spot to Manhattan (just 10-15 mins away). Quiet & residential, but in the same time has busy nightlife on Friday & Saturday. 3 blocks away from the famous Steinway st
transit: M, R train ( Steinway st station) goes straight to Manhattan - 6 stops. Will take you just 15-20 mins to get to the city. Or TAXI 5-10 min
access: You will have laundromat on the block, as well as organic supermarket and 24hr pharmacy. There is never a problem with early morning or late night check in.
interaction: I'm available to help my guests with anything they need most of the time during their stay.
house_rules: - We do not allow any crazy parties in the apartment causing a lot of nice. no super loud music.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States

reviews.comments: It's a good place to stay, especially for the price. The neighborhood was quaint and felt very safe walking around during the day and night. The subway isn't too far away, so that was pretty sweet as well.
This was a great place to stay while visiting New York city. It was close to the train and not very far from Manhattan. There were great shops and restaurants down the street.
Great value! Great stay! Great communication!
Great location, has everything you need and the hospitality was great!
Yauheniya is a great host, the place is wonderful and good for 3 guests and close to Subway. She is very nice and helpful. It was a great stay.

Cozy little place with all your basic amenities. Full kitchenette with a stove/oven, microwave and fridge. Yauheniya is friendly and lives right next door. She'll help settle you in and provide anything you might need to make your stay comfortable!

It tends to be a bit loud on weekend nights due to the restaurant located on the ground floor. But if you are not a light sleeper, you should be okay. 

There are establishments located nearby, including a rite-aid and a pizza shop that are open late. Many bars open for drinks late at night too.

The apartment itself isn't too bad and the location for the purposes of getting a subway and traveling to Manhattan, isn't bad either. Cleanliness could be improved not just of the apartment but also of the building.

There are two positive things about this tiny apartment. 1) It is located close to 3 different subway stops that connect the area to Manhattan in a few minutes. 2) It has a nice double bed and an inflatable mattress next to it. (Very little space)
Things that need to be improved: 1) the entrance door and stairs are very dirty. Walls and door need to be painted, and the stairs to be washed and brushed. 2) It is necessary to mention in the listing that the apartment is 2 floors up by foot. Hard to bring up suitcases, and get up and down.  Some people cannot do stairs 2) the stove in the tiny kitchenette needs to be cleaned and fixed, or changed all together (the oven doesn't work), 3) it would be good to add some other chairs or stools. There is just one, when the room is supposed to hold 3 people.
Otherwise, Yauheniya is a very nice young hostess.

Perfect location for our needs, which included being close to Manhattan and in a Queens neighborhood close to family.   There is a wonderful bakery on Broadway just around the corner from the apartment.

CMB

Lugar: Apegado a la descripción del anuncio, muy cerca de Manhattan y del transporte publico;hace falta mencionar que es en un 2do piso.
Comunicaciòn: Deficiente, no hubo asesoría de lugares ni de servicios básicos como la cuenta y clave de WiFi del departamento.
Limpieza: Aceptable

A no-frills place that's exactly WYSIWYG. On the edge of lively Astoria, it's a good spot for those looking to avoid the trappings of touristy-NYC. But it has all that one needs: a bed, a kitchen, a few subway lines on walking distance, loads of bars and shops in the direct vicinity. Jane is very helpful too. Recommended!
I love the place and area. It's really near the subway and lots of restaurant near by. :)
Great place. Great host.

We had a great time in Janie's house. The location was the best neighboring 3 subway stations. Despite being older than we thought, we had had no problem in the house. In fact, we had slept so deeply that we enjoyed NYC to the fullest. The host was nice and kind and cared much about us.

Our stay at Yauheniya was great. I liked the studio even more than the photos showed. The communication with her was perfect and she was VERY helpful prior to our arrival and during our stay also. 
On the other hand, the cleanness of the front could be improved as it was a bit dusty. The location wasn't as I expected but it was good according to the price. The station is only 3 blocks away. There are nice shops in the main avenue. I especially liked one that was 3 blocks away and had bagels. 
Finally,  beware if you're traveling on weekends. The subway services change and it took us a long time to get to Manhattan. Mainly because we got really lost but also because you have to go through a longer route.
Anyway it was a really nice stay and we enjoyed it very much.
To get around from this location is very easy and do check out the neighborhood you will find great places too. Yauheniya is a very responsive host, thanks again!
Good communication nice place
We had a great Time in this flat Near to Manhattan and public transportation. Our guest was really welcoming !  I recomand it

We had a great time at Yauheniya's place. The apartment is actually biger than we thought and was clean. The only issue is that it is on the 3rd floor, not easy stairs if you have luggage. The neighborhood feels safe and there are lots of restaurants and grocery stores, we would stay there again if we go back to NY. Our host was very helpful with everything we needed and answered our questions quickly but we didn't get to meet her.

We loved our stay at Yauheniya's place. Super close to public transport and plenty of food places close by - the smell of fresh bread from the bakery downstairs was the best! Good value and had everything we needed.

Ottimo alloggio per visitare comodamente NY risparmiando! 
Quartiere molto tranquillo, a due passi da Manhattan, very American people! 
Comodissimo alla metro, due fermate veramente vicinissime! In 15 min sei in centro! Appartamento molto più silenzioso di quelli che si trovano a Manhattan ovviamente, con tutti i confort necessari! 
La proprietaria è pronta a rispondere alle tue esigenze in tempi rapidi ed è molto cordiale! Assolutamente da tenere in considerazione! 
Check in e check out assolutamente flessibili, a noi ha fatto rimanere fino alle sette di sera tranquillamente!
Nice location, close to public transportation, good value and equipped with everything we needed.
Perfect location, very clean apartament. It was a perfect choice to stay there :)

Yauheniya’s place is awesome close to the subway which takes you into the city in just a few stops. The neighborhood is super safe with nightlife super close. The studio is a perfect size and super clean. Will be booking again soon.
Yauheniya's apartment was much bigger than we expected and perfectly located. We had a great stay and I would thoroughly recommend it!
Great location. A bit hard to carry luggage up if you’re traveling with a big suit case, but definitely do-able. Great communication, would definitely stay again.

If you're looking to stay in NYC somewhere for a good value this is a great spot. We really just needed somewhere to crash at the end of a few long days of activities so this was great, but we ended up really liking the area- we had some good food, saw some interesting sites, and even saw a stand-up comedy show in Astoria. But since it's right next to a few different subway stations it was easy for us to get to Manhattan and Brooklyn too. Would recommend!
The host canceled this reservation 95 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

It’s loud from the neighbors (who is also the owner). We could not get a decent night sleep.  If you stay up till all hours of the night it will probably work just fine.  Perhaps for the younger crowd with different living hours.
The unit is clean, good location for getting aroung Astoria and into the City. 
Owner was prompt in letting us in.
The stairs are fine if your are in shape which we are.
Un excelente sitio... bien ubicado, con muchas opciones de comida, varias estaciones de trrn
Very accomadating and awesome space :) it’s perfect!
Good location in relation to NYC and metro. On the weekends the bar below the apartment has live bands that play until 3-4am. It’s so loud it shakes the apartment. The weekdays are quiet.

Great location - a lot of nice restaurants near-by (try the bareburger next door) and a rather cheap supermarket with a great selection. The hostess was super helpful and easy to reach and she responded really quickly to messages. We had no problems whatsoever and very much enjoyed our stay :)
The host canceled this reservation 13 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The host canceled this reservation 27 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The host canceled this reservation 27 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

The studio was clean and quiet. It's well located, only 3 blocks from a subway station and in 30 min you get to Midtown in Manhattan. The neighborhood is nice with plenty of mini markets around and well-lit at night.  Yauheniya is kind, she let us check out late because our flight was in the evening and she answered  my questions quick.

El apartamento es muy recomendable para visitar Nueva York y evitar los precios de Manhattan. Muy cerca del metro y con corto viaje al centro. Durante los fines de semana es un poco ruidoso y los cerrojos interiores de la puerta dan poca sensación de seguridad aunque no da la impresión de ser un barrio conflictivo. Por lo demás, fenomenal.
She was a great host and so nice. We had no problems and we also got a late check out which helped us a lot. The apartment was perfect for our stay in NY and the area was great as well :)

Appartement conforme à la description et donc à nos attentes. L'emplacement est très pratique et idéal pour visiter Manhattan (métro direct à moins de 5' à pied). Le quartier est calme et résidentiel. Yauheniya est très réactive (par mails et par sms), elle a été flexible sur notre heure d'arrivée. Prévoyez des boules Quies pour la clim (indispensable l'été). Bref, bon rapport qualité / prix, je recommande !
Great location, safe place and very fast and easy to get to manhattan by car or by subway and airport is very close as well.
Great place with easy access to the subway. Highly recommend

l'appartement est a 3 rue du métro a 30 min de times square
il n'est pas rénové depuis peu la clim est bruyante mais nécessaire
le quartier est très sympa le bar à chicha en bas de l'immeuble est top avec un accueil génial! 
l'appartement est très calme et on entend aucun bruit ! 
il est très suffisant pour 10 jours à NYC ou l'on y est que pour dormir !!!
Nice apartment on second floor. Very close to subway stop that brings you straight into Manhattan. Good local amenities and we had a wonderful time.
Great location, very close to a subway station.
Perfect place to stay for a trip to New York. Apartment located in a lovely neighborhood in Queens and only a short ride on the subway away from Manhattan!

The apartment is a very good option since it is very close to the subway station and to Manhattan, the hostess is very kind and attentive. The apartment has all the necessary for a tourism stay. We only had problems with the lock of the entrance , the rest was all good
El departamentos es una muy buena opción ya que se encuentra muy cerca de la estación de metro y de Manhattan, la anfitriona es muy amable y atenta . El departamento tiene todas las comodidades necesarias para una estadía de turismo .Sólo tuvimos problemas con la cerradura de la entrada que se trababa, el resto todo bien
La casa está muy bien situada y con todo lo necesario para pasar unos días allí. Hay dos paradas de metro cerca y en 15-20 minutos estás en Manhattan. Muy recomendable!

Great Host. Great Place.  Great location.  The place was very clean, neat and comfortable. I felt like I was right at home. Yauheniya was awesome. I would recommend this place to stay if your visiting NYC.

EG.

Honestly it’s not a renovated apartment. It’s very loud when neighbors walk out of their apartments. You can hear every word spoken in the building. The bath is dirty and the shower isn’t working very well. Actually you have to choose between extrem hot and cold. The location is pretty nice because you have two subways close to the apartment.

We Would come back :)

The place is near to a Subway station, is a quiet place. The apartament had everything we needed for our stay. Very nicr

We absolutely loved the location and the host was friendly, kind and helpful. We negotiated the 32 narrow, steep stairs (we're in our seventies) just fine. What was problematic was the loud, vibrating drum machine coming from the hookah lounge below on Friday and Saturday night. It was impossible to sleep.

Séjour parfait! Appartement idéalement situé dans un quartier calme et agréable. Boulangerie, pharmacie, supermarché tout se trouve tout près de l’appartement donc c’est vraiment idéal. Le métro est vraiment tout proche et la ligne permet d’aller rapidement à Manhattan (environ 15min) sans changement.

Nous recommandons vraiment ce logement où nous sommes restés 9 jours. 
L’hôte a été très accueillante et surtout très arrangeante, nous sommes arrivés tard et nous sommes repartis également tard et cela n’a pas posé de problème.
Muy buena opción para visitar New York!! Todo estaba como se esperaba.
The host canceled this reservation 248 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

The location of the apartment is excellent! Overall is a comfortable space, but it needs a little more cleanliness and care in the bathroom area. Overall it was a nice neighborhood and I was satisfied with my experience.
The host canceled this reservation 38 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

name: Peaceful Retreat less than 10mn from ferry
summary: This apartment is my every day happiness fix. I rent it only because I'm travelling and I want to keep it alive and welcoming to others. It's 2-floor apartment with 2 rooms on the 1st. Only the guest room is available, as I keep my room closed, however you have access to the full appartement. There is a fantastic Penthouse/rooftop on the 2nd floor, where I usually practice Yoga or other sports. This is a peaceful place, uncommonly quiet and cosy.
space: This place is really unique, ideally located around 6mn from the ferry pier, in the Yung Shue Wan part of Lamma Island. You will find everything you need at a short walking distance from the place. Laundry and grocery shop just down the stairs, bakery, food and restaurants. Their is a beach at around 15mn walk. The place is really quiet, sunny, and benefits from a fantastic view to the sea and mountains. The kitchen is equipped with a gas cooker, gas oven, micro wave, and cooking ware. There is both a bath and shower in the bathroom.
description: This apartment is my every day happiness fix. I rent it only because I'm travelling and I want to keep it alive and welcoming to others. It's 2-floor apartment with 2 rooms on the 1st. Only the guest room is available, as I keep my room closed, however you have access to the full appartement. Laundry and grocery shop just down the stairs, bakery, food and restaurants. Their is a beach at around 15mn walk. The place is really quiet, sunny, and benefits from a fantastic view to the sea and mountains. The kitchen is equipped with a gas cooker, gas oven, micro wave, and cooking ware. There is both a bath and shower in the bathroom. You can a
transit: The ferry to Central is less than 10mn walk from the flat, and takes you to Central in about 25mn.
access: You can access the entire apartment.
interaction: I won't be in the apartment during your stay, however you can always reach me through (Hidden by Airbnb) for any questions related to your stay.
house_rules: - Only very quiet guests

host.host_about: I'm Antoine, frequent business traveller and both host and guest of AirBnB. I love quietness and nature as much as tumult and buildings.

address.street: Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

reviews.comments: This is an amazing find - very well located, with lots of character, fantastic views from the balcony and the rooftop, and nice design inside. We haven't met Antoine but communication was very easy. Overall a very pleasant stay!

This is a wonderful retreat from the bustle of Hong Kong island, and only a short 20 minutes or so ferry ride away from Central. Antoine is the perfect host, considerate, kind and welcoming. If you're looking for something really special for a couple of with one child, look no further. Even if you're on your own, this is an ideal way to unwind after a hectic day in downtown Hong Kong, and enjoy the wonders of Lamma island.

This place is in a fantastic location to get away and relax. Very convenient with a ferry going direct to Central. Was great to be able to go and enjoy the shopping and culture that HK has to offer, and return to the serenity of Lamma!

Antoine is a very friendly host. Provided clear instructions to find place and all round good communication. 

Hope to stay again!

What a great place to stay! Location is perfect. Next to shops and restaurants but also close to beaches and easy to hike and walk around the beautiful Lamma island. Quiet place, clean and with a beautiful view from the terrace. 

I didn't meet Antoine personally but he replied fast when I had questions and to arrange things. 
Would definitely stay again at Antoine's place when in Hong Kong. Thanks Antoine! :-)

Antoine's apartment is in our top 3 of all airbnb wéve been (and we are strong user for 6 years). 

The appartement itself is well conceived, bright, with view on the sea, terrace, all you need inside and nice decoration. 

The location is ideal :
- coming back from Hong Kong island with the ferry (20 minutes journey, every 30minutes), enjoying the view on the bay, is a must itself (and after a day in such a busy city, it's a great relief too!).
- waking up in Lamma, enjoying beachs,  nature trails, nice restaurants with view on the harbour, family and friendly atmosphere (even a great vinyl record store!), etc

We had easy and friendly communication with Antoine. 

Thanks Antoine for everything !
The host canceled this reservation 30 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

This place is on the sweetest walking island away from the city vibes. It was a perfect place to come back to and relax to the sound of the ocean and birds. We spent many days walking around the island getting lost in the trees and local smiles. Thank you Antoine!

name: Cute Room in Upper West Side (FEMALES ONLY)
summary: Cute, quiet, comfortable room in Upper West Side. The Space - I have a room available to rent in  my 1 bedroom apartment.
space: PLEASE MAKE SURE YOU READ ENTIRE LISTING BEFORE BOOKING :) The room itself is furnished with a queen bed (which fills a large portion of the room) Bedroom has A/C unit for you to use and a window that mainly stays closed. Bedroom HAS NO DOOR ( recently a curtain was installed, please see pictures), no closet and its right next to the living room where I spend/stay/sleep (when in the apartment)  most of the time since I work from home. The apartment's layout is railroad meaning that if you go to the bathroom/kitchen from your room you have to go throughout the living room (my space where I sleep in a couch, please see pictures). The room is comfortable for someone who wants throw their feet up and relax after a day of exploring the city and does not need a big room. I provide clean linens, towels and soap.

notes: Apartment is located on the 1st floor. Please make sure that you read carefully  the listing before booking :)

interaction: I am easy to get along, very patient and will answer your questions :)
house_rules: - NO SHOES IN THE HOUSE PLEASE :) The house is a strictly non-smoking and alcohol/drug-free environment. ONE PERSON OCCUPANCY. No unauthorized overnight guests. Guests are expected to clean after themselves when using shared rooms. No pets. THis is my home:) I live here.  Therefore the rules of the house are the basic rules of any family house, respect, common sense and mutual trust :) - Please be careful about other peoples rest once you've entered the building - this is an old building with NO SOUND ISOLATION, if you talk loud in the hallway, inside their homes, people will hear you as if you were in their living room :)

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States

reviews.comments: Ana was a great host, communicated very quickly and helped me with any information I needed. The place was ideal in a good location, very close to the subway in a nice neighbourhood. Would recommend!
Ana was absolutely lovely and made sure I had everything I needed. The apartment was beautiful and the room was very clean. She let me leave my stuff there until I had to leave which was very kind.

Ana is a fantastic host and her apartment is great. Clean and quiet the bedroom is located towards the back of the building so you can sleep peacefully without any road noise. There's great bars and restaurants with in walking distance and  easy access to the subway as well. Ana is accommodating and considerate, I would recommend her place to anyone looking to stay in the area!
Ana's place was great! VERY clean and a perfect location. Ana is super friendly and she was very helpful as well. Perfect for a short trip!
Highly recommended!
Great house, nice room, quiet area!

This place was crowded with little privacy unless the host disappeared. The bedroom was sparse and lacking any place for your stuff. Regulating the light and temperature was too difficult or impossible. There was no comfortable place to sit---anywhere. The host was a lovely, young woman.
Ana' s place is very clean, quiet and comfortable which was exactly what I was looking for. Ana was very helpful, accommodating and responsive. I highly recommend.

Hi Ana, I really enjoyed staying at your place and wanted to thank you for being such a great host! The coffee and the breakfast were delicious and without your precise directions, I would have had a hard time finding my way around when I arrived in NY. Cheers, Peter
Ana is a nice person who has lots of patience and passions, helping me to adapt the American life and suggesting me so much. Thanks a lot for her support.
I really enjoyed staying at Ana's place. She is a great host and the flat is clean.

Ana is very clean, friendly and attentive. The place is near by Subway 1, citibike dock and within walking distance to Central Park and museum of nature science and MET. She also provided breakfast when I was home and allowed me leave luggage there after checkout time which is huge help. There is curtain instead of door for the bedroom but it doesn't bother me.
Ana is amazing! Sweet, accommodating, always ready to help. The place is very convenient and safe. All in all, I had a great time!
The host canceled this reservation 15 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Ana provided me with everything I needed and was extremely welcoming. Her apartment had a good location and was a perfect place to go back to at the end of a long day in the city.
I had a very nice stay at Ana' place. Ana is very friendly and helpful.

Ana has been a nice host, she helped me out with my baggage at arrival and departure. As described, Ana is staying in the apartment, sleeping on a couch in a room you have to cross to go from the guest bedroom to the bathroom or the kitchen. If this makes you uncomfortable, just look for another room. Otherwise, you're warned! Everything was clean and comfortable. Nice stay.
Ana was open and an understanding host to my needs. She was great :)
Es una persona muy atenta y te hace sentir como en tu propia casa. Muy amable y servicial. Realmente recomendable.
