reviews.comments: The host canceled this reservation 3 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

I strongly recommend Joè Maria homestay!
The flat is clean, nice, well ubicated and he reslly took care of me from the very beginning!I really enjoyed my days in the flat and his company!

José María responde enseguida. La habitación es súper grande y cómoda y tiene una tele grande. Da a la calle así que tiene una linda vista al edificio de enfrente. Está a una cuadra del metro urgell y a 50 metros de la parada del bus a1 y a2 que van al aeropuerto. 
Además, uno de los amigos de José que vive en en el departamento (que en realidad no están casi nunca en casa y ni se les escucha), tiene un restaurante cerca Chaitea, en plaza universidad, que está genial y vale la pena visitar. 
Se puede usar La Cocina que está muy bien equipada con todo. 
A José le gusta que los huéspedes se sientan incluso mejor que en casa. 
Lo recomiendo 100%

We only stayed one night but Jose Maria was very accommodating even though we got into Barcelona late. He was very friendly and welcoming. The flat has been newly renovated and very spacious and comfortable. There is a Wii U with Netflix and a very big comfortable bed. The location was ideal and easy to get to from the aeroport shuttle. Overall a great experience and we wished we had stayed there for longer. Recommend +++

The room is super spacious, private, clean and has a large, comfortable bed. Location is awesome, walkable from cafes, restaurants and bars. Very friendly people in the apartment. Would definitely recommend.

We stayed at Jose Maria home for 2 days. Our room was clean, cozy and well equipped. I really enjoyed king size bed and we had no problems during our stay. The apartment has a good location. At the same street there is a small healthy food restaurant «Itacate» that I can recommend for breakfast or fresh juice/smoothie.

Lori and I enjoyed our 5 night stay in Barcelona at Jose's Apartment.  He joyfully met us upon arrival and assisted my wife with her luggage.  The place had an small elevator that took us to the 3rd floor. The apartment was very clean and we shared it with 2 roommates who were very welcoming and friendly. Jose offered  us one shelf in his refrigerator which we appreciated.  The location of his apartment was outstanding.  Close to large grocery store, subway, restaurants and 1 block from direct bus to international airport. We used the subway several times but due to prime central location managed to walk to La Font Magic at night one evening,  Parc de Montjuic, Museu Nacional D'Art De Catalina, Olympic Stadium and more.  We stayed during a heat wave in Barcelona and Jose had a large fan in his room for our comfort and mentioned he was planning to have AC installed in apartment in near future.  We were very happy that Jose opened his home to us travelling Canadians

The place was excellent, clean, well located, and the room comfortable. 

Jose helped us out at checkin, and provided some guides for the city. The bathroom is shared with others in the apartment and can be a bit busy, but far from a deal breaker on this great place. 

Thanks Jose.

We had a very nice stay. We only met Jose for a brief second as he was going away for a few days but he was really nice. Be aware that he has a roommate and we noticed they had friends that were staying there as well. There is no lock on the door so I strongly advise that you do not leave any valuable items in the room.
Very easy to communicate with Jose Maria and the room was very clean and spacious. Would definitely recommend if you don't mind walking/taking public transit
El departamento de José María esta muy bien ubicado, siempre estuvo atento y muy cómoda la habitación, lo recomendaría a otros y volveria a Barcelona y al departamento de José maria
It was a good vacation, very good area

We Had a Perfect week in Barcelona. The flat is in a Perfect Location (City Centre)!! The room was very clean and big!! Jose and his friends were so friedly and Nice!! If i Visit barca again, i would sleep Here again' !!
O atendimento foi perfeito, super educado, prestativo, disposto a ajudar. Super recomendo

Good location.  Lots of shops, cafes, restaurants nearby.  Bedroom spacious, comfortable, but no frills.  Need to share bathroom with others.   Barcelona a magical fabulous city, so worth it!  Friendly hosts.
Ha sido un placer quedarnos en este piso precioso, super limpio y extremadamente confortable con una cama cómoda y salón propio. José María es un afitrión fenomenal. 100% recomendable.
The host was incredible till the very end! Highly recommended.

Jose is so nice !! The room is really spacious and trust me it is even better than pictures.. clean, close to everything, everything ! I would totally go back to this place when I’m in Barcelona. Thank you Jose !

Great location in the center of Barcelona. Easy access to the metro, only a couple of blocks away from Urgell station.  Bedroom is large but the bed is on the floor and the only light is a small lamp at the far end of the room. The overhead light doesn’t exist, only bare wires hanging from the ceiling. 
Host seemed nice enough but not very welcoming. He never asked if everything was okay or if we needed anything. He had a friend over with a dog that was cute and they sat in the kitchen all night talking quite loudly as we did t feel welcome to join them or use the kitchen so we went out for dinner. We’ve stayed in several Airbnb’s and this one was disappointing.
Everything was great. Amazing host! Always again!

name: Cozy flat,elevator, good location,man-mo temple
summary: 我的房源適合情侶､獨自旅行的冒險家､商務旅客｡
description: 我的房源適合情侶､獨自旅行的冒險家､商務旅客｡

address.street: Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

name: La vraie vie de quartier à Montréal
summary: Dans Rosemont-La Petite-Patrie, un quartier dynamique, sécuritaire et en plein cœur de l’Ile de Montréal. L’appartement est lumineux, accueillant et bien équipé. Il comprend une entrée privée et deux balcons dont un dominant une des plus belles ruelles vertes en ville.
space: Les propriétaires occupants habitent le rez-de-chaussée du duplex. Conçu pour une personne seule désirant découvrir la métropole pendant une période de 1-6 mois. Il est tout de même fonctionnel pour deux personnes pour de plus courts séjours. Possibilité d’accommoder deux adultes et deux enfants.
description: Dans Rosemont-La Petite-Patrie, un quartier dynamique, sécuritaire et en plein cœur de l’Ile de Montréal. L’appartement est lumineux, accueillant et bien équipé. Il comprend une entrée privée et deux balcons dont un dominant une des plus belles ruelles vertes en ville. Les propriétaires occupants habitent le rez-de-chaussée du duplex. Conçu pour une personne seule désirant découvrir la métropole pendant une période de 1-6 mois. Il est tout de même fonctionnel pour deux personnes pour de plus courts séjours. Possibilité d’accommoder deux adultes et deux enfants. • À l’étage, escaliers larges en deux paliers • 3 pièces + salle de bain (40 m2) • Salon ouvert sur chambre • Lit double + canapé-futon • Salle de bain/douche • Cuisine toute équipée, plaques, four, frigo, lave linge • Coin TV, coin lecture • Chauffage, électricité et internet inclus Contactez-nous par courriel ou par téléphone. Disponible en tout temps sauf la nuit dans notre fuseau horaire ;-) Occupons le rez-de-chaussée penda
neighborhood_overview: Le centre-ville et toutes les universités sont facilement accessibles par le métro ou le vélo (avril à octobre). Pourquoi j'aime tant mon quartier? Tous les services sont accessibles à pied, les citoyens se parlent entre eux, les ruelles vertes sont magnifiques et sécuritaires, il y a des petits cafés, des parcs, des pistes cyclables, la meilleure SAQ sur l'île et bien sûr le marché Jean-Talon!
transit: À proximité de tous les services! À moins de 500 mètres: • Station de métro Fabre (ligne bleue) • Autobus vers le Plateau, le Mile End, le Centre-ville • Bornes de vélo Bixi (en saison) • Supermarché 7 jours de 8hres à 22hres • Pharmacie 7 jours 8hres à 22hres • Banques, hôpital et cliniques médicales À moins de 2 km: • Piscine intérieure publique • Cinéma de répertoire (Cinéma Beaubien) • Boulangeries, épiceries-santé, bons restos, bars, cafés • Grand parc et centres sportifs • Marché publique (Marché Jean-Talon)
access: • À l’étage, escaliers larges en deux paliers • 3 pièces + salle de bain (40 m2) • Salon ouvert sur chambre • Lit double + canapé-futon • Salle de bain/douche • Cuisine toute équipée, plaques, four, frigo, lave linge • Coin TV, coin lecture • Chauffage, électricité et internet inclus
interaction: Contactez-nous par courriel ou par téléphone. Disponible en tout temps sauf la nuit dans notre fuseau horaire ;-) Occupons le rez-de-chaussée pendant le séjour des voyageurs.
house_rules: Intérieur non-fumeur. Pas trop de bruit le soir et la nuit, s'il vous plaît. Garder l'endroit propre. Pas d'animaux sauf chiens-guides.

host.host_about: J'ai vécu en Pologne, en Jamaïque, en France, en Nouvelle-Zélande, en Allemagne, en Angleterre...pour aboutir dans une des villes les plus dynamiques et les plus créatives au monde: Montréal!

reviews.comments: Un appartement chaleureux et très bien équipé, très propres, un environnement calme est à deux pas d'un petit centre commerciale, extrêmement pratique. A 5 minutes du métro à pied, et à une station du marché de Jean Talon. Catherine et Sébastien m'ont très bien accueilli, et étaient à disposition pour m'aider en tous temps. 3 semaines à Montréal, qui ce sont déroulées dans la bonne humeur, et dans la découverte d'une ville génial, ainsi que de ses habitants. Je vous conseille une escale chez Catherine pour tous les futurs visiteurs de Montréal.

Nous avons passé une très bonne semaine de Noël dans l'appartement de Catherine et Sébastien. Très chaleureux et accueillants, ils ont tout fait pour que notre séjour se passe au mieux, se souciant régulièrement de notre bien être et de nos attentes. Avec un supermarché à 2 minutes à pied et le métro à 400 mètres, ce logement est très bien situé (très joli quartier aux maisons en brique et escaliers sur la façade, beaucoup de charme!), agréable à vivre et décoré avec goût. Il ne manquait rien, et nous avons été touché des gentilles attentions de nos hôtes. Je recommande cette location aux futurs visiteurs de Montréal, que du bonheur!!

Fantastic stay in Montreal with Catherine and her husband.
Apartment was lovely, and the neighbourhood suited us perfectly. Jean-Talon market within walking distance, filled with fresh foods. Great wine store nearby. All kinds of good restaurants including some of the best El Salvadoran food I've ever eaten.
Hosts were fantastic, invited us down for a lovely evening of wine and cheese, but otherwise left us alone...except when we needed something or had a question.
It is well located, with two metro lines and buses nearby. As we are mostly walking people, we loved the location in the very heart of the island. Very nice neighbourhood.
My wife and I would happily stay there again and look forward to our next visit.

Minha experiencia foi gratificante, a moradia e exatamente como nas fotos, estava limpa e inteiramente equipada. A Catherine e uma otima anfitria. Recomendo a moradia para aqueles que pretendem passar uma temporada em Montreal.

The flat is very clean and beautifully/simply organized, with all basic accessories you need for an extended stay, including the kitchen and bathroom. The neighborhood is quiet, but close to a lot of great restaurants, and walking distance to many wonderful parts of the city. The hosts were very kind and accommodating, I would highly recommend staying here.

Merci à Catherine & Sebastian pour ce séjour. L'appartement est superbe et très propre dans un quartier sympathique, mais sur une rue très calme. Proche du métro & commerces. On peut aller au marché Jean Talons à pied environ 20 minutes de marche agréable. On a beaucoup apprécié les petits détails & les petites attentions. On recommande cette appartement pour un cour & un long séjour à Montréal.
Catherine et son mari sont des hôtes charmants, l appartement est très bien agence et joliment décoré rien ne manque. Je recommande fortement ces hôtes.

Catherine et Sébastien ont été très accueillants. Appartement chaleureux, très bien situé, à proximité de tout. Studio joliment aménagé, efficace et décoré avec soin... Rien d'inutile et tout est là, literie, savon, champoing, etc.

Toujours extra chez Catherine et Seb, ne venez pas... comme cela il y aura de la place pour Moi !!!!
sans rire c'est une super place et des hôtes parfait

Catherin and Sebastian were absolutely wonderful.  Catherine kept in close touch with me and was patient enough to answer all my pre-travel questions.  They greeted us at the door on the day of our arrival and gave us some very valuable information about getting around town and where we could find the best gelato :). We were so relaxed here that I was able to read 5 books during our 9-day stay!  My parents are considering coming up next June for the F1 race also and I will certainly be hooking them up with Catherine and Sebastian.
The host canceled this reservation 39 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
beau séjour calme et agréable ! merçi CATHERINE

Chère Catherine;
Nous avons passé de très bonnes vacances, votre accueil était très chaleureux ça nous a donné l'impression que nous vous connaissions depuis longtemps. Nous étions comme à la maison et nous avons pu admirer un pays extraordinaire qui mérite d'être visité plusieurs fois afin de découvrir une bonne partie de sa grande richesse.
Merci encore une fois pour votre accueil, l'appartement est un vrai nid douillé 
nous vous disons à la prochaine et restez comme vous êtes ne changez rien
Claude et son épouse
Everything was perfect. The apartment had everything I needed, was close to public transport and groceries, and was in a nice neighborhood. Communication was excellent and the hosts were very kind.

Nous avons été magnifiquement reçus à l'appartement par ces hôtes d'exception!

L'appartement est très confortable, chaleureux et bien situé pour une vie de quartier avec un accès facile et simple à toutes commodités.

Je recommande grandement de séjourner ici!

Excellent séjour chez Catherine. Nous avons beaucoup apprécié la localisation: proche des commerces, du marché Jean Talon, des transports. L'appartement est agréable et en tout point conforme aux photos: lumineux, propre et calme. L'accueil est chaleureux, Catherine est une hôtesse extrêmement cordiale. On aurait plaisir à rester plus longtemps!
Dont waste your time this is by far the perfect accommodation.

Catherine and her husband were awesome hosts. They kindly provided us with   nice recommendations about Montreal and were able to accommodate our request for a late check in when we arrived. We enjoyed our stay at Catherine's place and everything was according to what is described. Also, the place is near to public transport and is within car2go zone in Montreal.
Bon emplacement, près d'une épicerie et près du métro. Studio propre, bien meublé et confortable. Catherine et Sébastien sont accueillants et sympathiques.  Tout est en place pour un séjour agréable.

We had a wonderful stay! Great apartment, clean and stylish, with all the amenities we needed for a long term visit in Montreal. Located in a quiet area, but still very close to the Metro as well as awesome restaurants and stores.  Our hosts were very friendly and accommodating. Their recommendations for dining and shopping were very helpful. We would definitely stay here again! Thank you :)

name: Magnifique Appart Plateau Mont-Royal
summary: Notre logement est proche du métro, la rue Mont-Royal et ses innombrables Resto, Pub et commerces. Vous apprécierez notre logement pour le confort, la hauteur des plafonds, l'emplacement, le silence des environs et les gens. Mon logement est parfait pour les couples, les voyageurs d'affaires et les familles (avec enfants).
space: Deux chambres, environ (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) ), plus un balcon de 200 pi2.
description: Notre logement est proche du métro, la rue Mont-Royal et ses innombrables Resto, Pub et commerces. Vous apprécierez notre logement pour le confort, la hauteur des plafonds, l'emplacement, le silence des environs et les gens. Mon logement est parfait pour les couples, les voyageurs d'affaires et les familles (avec enfants). Deux chambres, environ (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) ), plus un balcon de 200 pi2. Logement disponible partout sauf walking qui inclut les affaires personnelles des proprio. un ami sera disponible si besoin ou probleme
access: Logement disponible partout sauf walking qui inclut les affaires personnelles des proprio.
interaction: un ami sera disponible si besoin ou probleme

host.host_about: amateur de grand espace, aime les arts, marcher et marcher!

reviews.comments: This is, indeed, a magnificent place, especially (for me) the balcony - which is the size of three or four normal balconies in other cities. You can enjoy the full sun on it in the morning and have shade by afternoon. Luc and Constance clearly love their place and keep it well. If you are the type who wants every last technological comfort this may not be for you, but if you don't mind living without, say, a microwave or can deal with a bit of difficulty getting in and out of an older bathtub, and you love lovely spaces - this is for you! (that said there is a still a large tv screen and cable which you don't get everywhere). Downstairs, Jean, the owner is also very welcoming and accommodating should you need anything.
Great place, great host, great location - highly recommend!

Great place; it really makes you wish you could just take over Luc’s lease and stay here permanently. The main feature of this apartment is the great balcony in the back. We stayed here 3 weeks. Living in his neighbourhood and this apartment in the summer, you are really living the best Montreal life possible.

Good location, wonderful balcony with many flowers. We were with two kids and balcony was a very good option for all of us while we were there since our kids like to be outside. The place has almost everything you might need at your own home except A/C. You need to climb stairs. But it's only for one floor. We didn't have any problem using it. The floor is wooden so it's a little bit creaky. Overall very good place to stay. Thank you Luc for being a great host.

name: Bright room in sagrada familia
summary: Read full add before make reservation ;) The apartment is well located. 5 mins walking from nearest tube station "L2 Encants",5 mins walking from Sagrada Familia, 5 mins walking from Mercat Encants (one of Europe's oldest open-air flea markets).Taking the bus 5 mins from the beach,taking the tube Plaza Cataluña is 4 stops away,taking the bus Park guell is 20 mins away. The room (3m x 3,60m) has two single beds (1,90 x 0,90),desk,shelves,coat rack and hairdryer.
space: You can only use the kitchen to prepare breakfast and until 11:00 am.  You can also use the fridge. WARNING : The apartment is located in a fifth floor without elevator. Must remain completely silent while using the stairs to don´t bother the neighbors  I recommend backpack instead of suitcase because of the stairs. There´re restaurants, bars and supermarkets in the area. The house has internet connection Wi / Fi. I provide free towels,bed linen, shower gel and shampoo. I'm only looking for quiet, clean and respectful people.
description: Read full add before make reservation ;) The apartment is well located. 5 mins walking from nearest tube station "L2 Encants",5 mins walking from Sagrada Familia, 5 mins walking from Mercat Encants (one of Europe's oldest open-air flea markets).Taking the bus 5 mins from the beach,taking the tube Plaza Cataluña is 4 stops away,taking the bus Park guell is 20 mins away. The room (3m x 3,60m) has two single beds (1,90 x 0,90),desk,shelves,coat rack and hairdryer. You can only use the kitchen to prepare breakfast and until 11:00 am.  You can also use the fridge. WARNING : The apartment is located in a fifth floor without elevator. Must remain completely silent while using the stairs to don´t bother the neighbors  I recommend backpack instead of suitcase because of the stairs. There´re restaurants, bars and supermarkets in the area. The house has internet connection Wi / Fi. I provide free towels,bed linen, shower gel and shampoo. I'm only looking for quiet, clean and respectful people. Yo
access: You will only have access to your room and the bathroom, kitchen only for breakfast until 11:00 am. You can use the fridge to put your food.
house_rules: - Not making noise in the stairs -No visitors allowed -Check-in after 22:00  +€10

reviews.comments: Our time at Jeremys place was lovely! He is really caring and reliable. Room had really great price and good quality. Sagrada familia just 5 mins away, 24 hours markets at every corner. Jeremy really made our trip better! Strongly recommend him as a host. 5 stars!!!

I had a great time in Jeremy's house. The position was very central, walking distance from the Sagrada Familia and the tube station. The room was so nice and clean, with everything I needed and Jeremy was an amazing host. Fully recommended.

The room and the bathroom were very clean. We had a very good stay in Barcelona. Only the street was very loud, but after walking the whole day we slept good anyway. I would come back everytime again.

Great  communication with the appartment owner, absolutely great location, we didn't had to use the metro because everything is very near to the appartment. So in conclusion we couldn't asked for anything better, i would definitely recommend this place
Apartamento céntrico, cerca del metro. Inmueble antiguo pero muy limpio. Calle con mucho tráfico y por lo tanto ruido. Jeremy nos indicó muy bien para aparcar el coche.
Todo fue perfecto en la casa de Jeremy. La habitación genial y la ubicación estupenda. Volvería a repetir, sin duda.
Very clouse to main dominantou.
Everything was good! Nice place!
Excellent attention, propre et proche de tout ;) à refaire

Great location right next to sagrada familia and close to park guell, farther from the port and ramblas. Not a very modern flat but good for people who have a budget. Close metro stops! Fine place for accommodation in Barcelona.
Overall a very good stay. It was exactly what we expected given the pictures and description provided. Jeremy is a great host and was there to answer all of our needs.
Merci pour votre hospitalite
Thanks for your hospitality! Nice room, we had everything we needed!

We stayed here because of the cheap price and Jeremy's apartment was good value for money. Jeremy was very welcoming and the balcony was a great bonus. Good public transport connections to the busier areas of Barcelona. Thank you Jeremy!

Jeremy is a very good host and helps you with everything you need to know before arrival. It's easy to communicate with him, always quick responses - which is important when you're planning a trip. He also helped me carrying my luggage upstairs, a real gentleman! The room is exactly as shown in the pictures; the apartment is clean and well located. There are some shops around, and it's very easy to get to the subway or train station nearby. We enjoyed our stay, quality/price ratio is great! I definitely recommend Jeremy's place and would go back again next time I'm in Barcelona :)
Muy limpio y confortable. Habitación amplia con todas las comodidades. Jeremy es muy agradable, flexible y está dispuesto a ayudar en lo que sea. Repetiría sin duda alguna.

Had a great stay with Jeremy. He was great at working with us with check in and out and made the room very comfortable. The place is super close to public transport and convenient even if you want to just walk the town. It was the perfect place to stay in Barcelona.

Nice room, perfectly according to description. It's very clean and the beds are conformable (even for someone with back problems like me). Jeremy is a friendly and helpful host, while being super discrete at the same time: detailed travel info received, solution offered to leave our luggage after our check-out. There were even towels available. Don't forget your ear plugs, though, because it's really noisy from traffic on the street. Otherwise, perfect stay !
Very good apartment except there was no air con and was very noisy! Great area to be in and great value for money.

Good room in a good location. It has really good transport links. Jeremy was great in meeting us. We didn't bump into anyone in the flat and were able to use it very easily. There was a fan and mosquito plug provided which was an extra bonus as it does get very hot! The room is very well priced and would suggest it to anyone looking to stay in Barcelona

Super accueil de Jérémy. 
On recommande !
It was a lovely place, great location, but the stairs were a struggle at times and the noise during the night but other than that it was amazing!

This was a nice place to stay in Barcelona. Everything in the city was accessible by metro or walking, including some nearby supermarkets. Jeremy was very helpful whenever we needed anything and the room was clean and comfortable. It was a bit warm but having the fan and the window open made sure it was cool enough to sleep. Thanks for a lovely stay

Recomiendo este sitio 100%, Jeremy es muy buen anfitrión, fue fácil encontrar la dirección gracias a las explicaciones. El depa queda en un lugar super céntrico, el metro está a 3 cuadras y te conecta con la mayoría de atractivos de la ciudad. Nuestra estancia fue placentera, el cuarto estaba impecable! Lo único difícil fue subir los 5 pisos! Pero te acostumbras!! :)

Sinceramente não  tenho  nada que reclamar, pelo contrário,  Jeremy foi espetacular, nos recebeu muito bem, além de ter aceito em nos receber antes do horário do check-in, explicou-nos os supermercados mais baratos na redondeza e tenho muito que agradece-lo por ter deixado nós tomarmos banho muito tempo depois do check-out :).
O quarto era bastante limpo e ajeitado nos mínimos detalhes, ficamos muito a vontade, parecia que estávamos somente nós em casa.
Jeremy é mais que recomendado.

Ce logement est tout près de la Sagrada Familia, donc des centres d'intérêt, et l'accès au métro est assez rapide. Mais étant très près d'une avenue où les voitures roulent très vite (souvent 90km/h), il y a beaucoup de bruits et cela peut déranger la nuit. Si on ferme la fenêtre, il faut supporter la chaleur l'été. L'appartement se trouvant au 5e étage, la chaleur monte très tôt et devient étouffante, malgré le ventilateur présent.

Tout ceci est compensé par le super accueil de Jeremy, qui propose un logement très propre et bien équipé. Tout en restant discret et respectant votre intimité, il n'hésitera pas à vous aider si vous avez besoin de quoi que ce soit.
Super  cómodo, agradable y tranquilo. Está cerca al metro gracias
Bem localizado, linhas de metrô perto, próximo a Sagrada Família. Sinal do Wifi estava péssimo e as vezes nem funcionava. Quarto amplo e bem confortável. Jeremy é atencioso.
O apartamento é agradável, limpo e bem localizado. Jeremy foi atencioso  e muito receptivo.

Jeremy is a lovely host and his apartment is super clean and organized. 
Description about room is 100% correct and you will have your privacy.
Bad thing is that room is on sunny side and sometimes fan is not helping. If you open window noise from the street below will not give you to sleep. Suggest some aircondition for that (or ear plugs :) Thank you Jeremy for all help and informations you gave us!

During our visit we didn't have any problems when it comes to our apartment or host cause everything was the same as written in the description of the flat. We had towels, keys, wifi password etc at our disposal in the room so everything was clear. The location was also great as it was only 10 minutes walking to metro station and Sagrada Familia! We can certainly recommend this host to anyone who is willing to discover Barcelona :)
Really nice stay. The owner is friendly and always helpful. The room was clean and had everything you need!
Stanza spoglia ma ottima posizione

Jeremy's apartment is exactly as pictured. It is in a great location, only a 10 minute walk from the Sagrada Familia itself. There are a lot of stairs to walk up but it is manageable. Jeremy was very kind and gave us everything we needed. He was also happy to give us advice for activities. We felt welcomed and enjoyed our stay.
Все полностью соответствует описанию.Нас очень понравилось.Лестница до квартиры-хорошая тренировка))обязательно вернёмся сюда ещё.Рекомендуется 100%
Appartement conforme aux attentes, Jeremy nous a très bien accueilli à notre arrivée. Très bon séjour!

Jeremy nos recibió en su espacio. Muy cómodo cerca de la Sagrada Familia y muy bien conectado.

Todo funciono como lo esperábamos, recomendable
We liked it a lot at Jeremy's apartment. We had a late chack-in, he waited us and gave us all necessary instructions. the room is great, inough place for 2, with everything needed.
Jeremy was a very nice host. He waited for us to late hours and was communicative. the localization was good. However, kitchen and bathroom weren't clean enough.

Jérémy nous a chaleureusement accueillis malgré notre arrivée très tardive. L'appartement est très bien et dispose de tout ce dont vous aurez besoin. Le seul problème est le bruit de la rue en bas : prévoyez des boules quiès si vous voulez dormir sereinement.

Jeremy szuper házigazda, a lakás elhelyezkedése nagyon jó, pár perc sétára több busz és metró megálló, ennél fogva hangos is a környék, de minket nem zavart. A szoba pont annyira felszerelt amennyire kell, mérete is optimális, tisztasága is teljesen megfelelő volt. Árérték arányban klassz, ajánlom!
Jeremy's house is a good choice to stay in Barcelona. Recommended for backpackers. read the instructions well before making your reservation !!!
Amazing views and great location! Everything was as described we had an absolutely wonderful time during our stay!
Jeremy er en venlig vært, der er rent og det har en forholdsvis god beliggenhed.

Jeremy war sehr nett und die Kommunikation lief gut. Auf meine Fragen wurde schnell geantwortet.
Das Zimmer ist simpel und spartanisch eingerichtet. Alles, was in der Beschreibung steht, steht zur Verfügung. Die Wohnung ist sauber.
Super ist die Lage und die Nähe zur Sagrada Familia!
Man sollte allerdings Ohropax gegen den Lärm der Straße mitbringen.
Alles in allem war es ein angenehmer Aufenthalt!

Jeremy wydawał się być sympatyczny. Nie było problemu ze wcześniejszym zameldowaniem, wniósł walizkę na 5 piętro i był to ostatni raz, kiedy go widziałam. Sam pokój czysty, dość prosty, jednak nie zamyka się od zewnątrz, okno jest nieszczelne, przez co w nocy jest zimno nawet pod 2 kołdrami (okres jesienny). W pokoju są kubki, kawa i herbata oraz czajnik i prostownica. Bardzo mała kuchnia, brakuje szafek i talerzy. Łazienka nie jest zamykana. Mata w wannie bardzo śliska, zamiast ciepłej wody leci wrzątek, a kiedy ktoś w mieszkaniu obok używa wody, w słuchawce prysznica zmienia się ciśnienie i woda prawie nie leci. Mieszkanie nie jest zbyt czyste - kurz, brudna podłoga w łazience, stara gąbka w kuchni. Mieszkanie jest bardzo blisko kościoła Sagrada Familia (niecałe 10 minut spacerem), ale jest raczej daleko od centrum i innych atrakcji (ok 30-40 minut). Sam pobyt w Barcelonie wspominam bardzo miło, miasto jest piękne, czego niestety nie można powiedzieć o mieszkaniu - jego największy plus to niska cena.

Jeremy was very nice. When we arrived he even came to help me with the luggage. At the very beginning he gave us couple of advices how to move around the neighbourhood. Everything was provided including towels, shampoo, shower gel and even tea and coffee in the room.
Jeremy was a great host!  Everything was close to walk and the room was very clean and comfortable! !
交通很方便,临近圣家堂｡房间干净,房东很热情｡但是房间没有锁｡而且窗外车很多,晚上睡觉吵｡其他还好
Clean, good location and nice host! My recommendations!

Great Tourist location. La Sagrada Familia is right around the corner about 5 min walk, right next to it is the metro. Jeremy’s place is very clean and room is very spacious. We stayed around winter which is pretty cold, but Jeremy makes sure to keep the room warm.
Top je recommande

La ubicación del lugar está Super!! La habitación es espaciosa y además jeremy  había dejado preparado dentro de la habitación quitaesmaltes, cremas, desmaquillante y para tomar una infusión cuando lo desees, te café capuccino (esto me ha parecido muy bien).  Recomiendo este lugar!

El hospedaje es tal cual como se muestra en las fotos, la ubicación es inmejorable si quieres tener una mayor accesibilidad a los diferentes lugares de la ciudad, Jeremy fue muy amable durante nuestra estancia y la comunicación fue rápida.
De kamer was op de 5e verdieping en heeft een prachtig uitzicht. De kamer is schoon. De communicatie was erg makkelijk en hij reageert snel.

El apartamento totalmente limpio, acogedor y cómodo, con un anfitrión quête puede aconsejar, ayudar en lo que pueda. Una estancia inmejorable para quien vaya a Barcelona y super cerca de la sagrada familia y el metro. Increíble en pocas palabras.

Location is very good. And Jeremy is a very good host. You can ask anything about the city life. He prepared coffee,tea and muffins before I arrive. I was very thankful for that. And he answered my questions very quickly. I recommend him and his place.

First of all, the apartment is in a really good location, 5 min walk from Sagrada Familia, 5-10 min of walk (or one station by metro) from the train to the airport, and other sights are very easy to reach by the very good and frequent metro and bus lines in the area too. The details of room perfectly described on the page, you get what you can see on the page, no tricks, no lies, and a simply perfect, clever, comfortable choice for travelers. Jeremy was very kind and on our first day he helped us with tips about where to find things in the area. Recommended!

We appreciate the small acts of kindness  especially when we were late and appeared to be lost. As well as the maps, pamphlets, coffee and tea. Furthermore, the local tips of where to eat and buy food was really helpful. 
We felt secured that he was always there to help us or answer our questions. 
Also, for any traveller that wants a convenient location (near stations, tourist attractions, supermarket) that is not crowded, it's a good location to stay. 
We would definitely stay at your place again if we ever come back!
Thank you for being a great host!

Jeremy was a really good and responsive host. The location is just perfect. 8 minutes to sagrada and you have 3 metro stations within 10 minutes walking distance. Might not be too peaceful at night because - 1. it is barcelona (it is not supposed to be peaceful). 2. it is on one of the major roads in barcelona.
all in all i can just recommend this wonderful listing.

Jeremy è stato un host molto disponibile, ci ha fornito ogni indicazione utile durante il nostro soggiorno a Barcellona. La stanza era molto pulita ed aveva tutto il necessario. Ci ha messo a disposizione cartine della città e dolcetti per la colazione oltre ad un bollitore per il thè. Molto consigliato.
Toller Aufenthalt!

Jeremy fue muy amable, me ayudó a cargar mis maletas. Nos había dejado magdalenas, té, café, para el desayuno. Él fue muy receptivo a los mensajes y siempre a nuestra disposición para preguntas. Recomiendo este alojamiento Muchas gracias !
Great communication before arrival and the best location:)
Die Unterkunft war super. Perfekt von der Lage, großartige Ausstattung und freundlicher Gastgeber. Jeder Zeit wieder!
Jeremy fue muy atento, el lugar estaba muy limpio, cerca de las paradas de trasporte público. Muy recomendable!!
La stanza era molto più grande di quanto ci aspettassimo e molto vicino alla sagrada familia e in generale al centro di bcn, consigliamo di soggiornare da jeremy! :)
Jeremy was a wonderful host! He provided directions even when we were late to check-in and provided great hospitality. Location was great, and price was just right. Thank you Jeremy!
Jeremy es un gran anfitrión siempre atento y dispuesto. Responde muy rápido y te ayuda en todo lo que necesitas. El cuarto es todo lo que necesitas para una buena estancia, y su ubicación

Jeremy is amazing host. The flat is really clean and nice. The room was beyond our expectation: big beds, a lot of light, and there were a lot of things for a comfortable stay. 
Our stay at Jeremy’s flat made our trip to Barcelona even more awesome. Only the best emotions!
La ubicación del departamento es muy apropiada para quienes quieran recorrer la ciudad. Y las condiciones de la habitación son impecables.
Muy bueno!!
Un sitio muy céntrico (al lado de Sagrada Familia) y muy acogedor para pasar unos días estupendos en Barcelona. Además, en lo que respecta al anfitrión, amabilidad ante todo. ¡Muy recomendable!
Jérémy is a very nice host. The  place is conform to the description

At Jeremy's house we felt a bit like at home.
Jeremy is the perfect host: helpful and kind not unobtrusive, always ready to gives suggestions replying immediately. The faster and most efficient host-comunication ever.
This has been our first experience in a shared house, and it couldn't be better. All there is clean,  orderly and scented. The room is minimal but very nice, there you will find also the electic water boiler, tea, coffe, sugar... moreover there's a pretty kitchen that you can sue whenever you whant.
Yes, the stairs can scared, but it gives at all an incredibile sense of autenticity also thanks to the the architecture, that's so charming. 
5 minutes walking from the Sagrada familia, but also if you like walking - as us- 15 from the Arc de triomf, 30 from Passeig the Garcia, 20 from la Ciutadella park and more others, so this is also a well-positioned "base" for discover Barcelona.
Thanks to Jeremy for allowed us to fall in love with this colorful and magic city.
We'll come back as soon as possible!
Super suggested!

Ilaria and Alessandro
Location is great -- steps from the Sagrada, and only half an hour from the Gothic District by foot. Jeremy is very kind and hospitable

Jeremy’s place was such a nice choice! The place is really close to everything - if you like to walk or if you prefer to get the metro the place is perfect.
Not only this, Jeremy was so kind and nice with us, during our staying.
Paula

Jeremy fue muy amable y nos aconsejó sobre algunas cosas de la ciudad. Se encuentra cerca de la sagrada familia y del metro. Son 5 pisos por escalera. Las camas eran cómodas y había productos de perfumería y secador de pelo que los podíamos usar. En el baño sólo era posible ducharse con el duchador en mano porque no se podía colgar. Podíamos usar la cocina aunque no lo hicimos, y teníamos pava, te y café en la habitación. La habitación tal cual la foto, el departamento muy sencillo. Recomendable.

The listing was very accurate. But it is so loud on the road that we had a very hard time sleeping. Also the WiFi was a major issue, it kept kicking us off. There is also no key to be able to lock the door to your room. It’s a good location though and very clean. Great place to stay if you’re on a budget
It was pretty great and Jeremy is a great host. Can’t wait to come back
La chambre et L'appartement est très propres, le bruit du boulevard ne permet pas de dormir au mieux.. l'accueil est au top!

Creo que el alojamiento de Jeremy es la solución perfecta si queréis estar algunos días en Barcelona a un precio barato. La habitación es muy limpia, Jeremy es muy disponible y la casa está muy cerca de la Sagrada Familia. 
!Lo recomiendo vivamente!
Nice and clean room In a great area!

Jeremy fue muy atento, respetuoso y servicial, nos espero en las estación de bus y nos acompaño hasta el piso, incluso nos ayudó a subir el equipaje ya que no estábamos acostumbrados a subir tantas escaleras.. la ubicacion creo que era inmejorable, a dos cuadras de la sagrada familia y con muy buen acceso al transporte público.  El cuarto es espacioso y limpio. Lo que no nos gustó ha sido que el cuarto no se puede cerrar desde afuera, la puerta del baño no tiene seguro y hay un mal olor en el pasillo de las escaleras que se siente en el baño y en la cocina.

The time we spent in Jeremy's place was really good. Jeremy is a really nice host (the poor guy carried our bags for like a million stairs when we arrived -thank you again Jeremy!! And kindy let our baggage stay in the apartment after our checkout time so we cought enjoy the city a little longer). 
The air conditionar in the room was a bless (the city was so HOT in our stay!) and the space was really well cleaned. 
The other people in the house were nice and quiet.
Thank you Jeremy your place and sympathy made our stay in Barcelona even better!
Jeremy nám vždy pomohl s čímkoliv jsme potřebovali.

Tutto ok come da annuncio, risposte di Jeremy sempre molto veloci, dettagliate e precise... camera piccola ma con tutto ciò di cui uno ha bisogno... i 5 piani di scale sono veramente scomodi, per il resto non ci si può lamentare... cucina piccola ma essenziale, bagno piccolo e con vasca non con doccia. Complessivamente molto buono per qualità / prezzo
Muy buen host.  Se preocupo en todo momento por nosotros. Recomendable al 100%

Apartamento aconchegante, bem limpo, cama confortável e com toalhas, travesseiro, geladeira e cafeteira a disposição conforme o descrito no App. Ótima localização e preço justo. Jeremy, o anfitrião é bastante simpático e atencioso, sempre responde as mensagens de imediato, nos recebeu muito bem e não nos incomodou durante nossa estadia. Recomendo o apartamento.
Jeremy's place is a good place to stay in Barcelona and Jeremy is a nice host, very helpful and receptive - I will recommend it !
Everything is right as it was at description. Location is good, Sagrada Familia is very close. Many shops , cafe and little park is near too. Jeremy is very kind, friendly and helpful ! Thank you ! ☺
Jeremy is a nice host, room in the apartment is just as described - causy, central, nice equipped. great value for money.

Jeremy è stato un host perfetto, ci ha accolti personalmente ed è rimasto sempre a disposizione, dandoci consigli e info utili sulla città. La stanza è come in foto, perfetta come punto d'appoggio, e l'aria condizionata è stata davvero un sollievo! Nella stanza c'era anche il necessario per il bagno e per la colazione (bollitore, the, caffè..), oltre che una scrivania, un appendiabiti e la guida della città. Non abbiamo usato la cucina ma è possibile cucinare, il bagno condiviso è piccolo e funzionale, e la privacy della stanza è garantita. Unica pecca i cinque piani senza ascensore, ma trascurabile vista l'invidiabile posizione della casa, praticamente dietro la Sagrada Familia e ben collegata a tutto.
Расположение-супер. Хозяин общительный, поможет. Но имейте ввиду, что этажи в Испании считаются иначе. Он не 2, а 5. Шуметь нельзя совсем, гостей тоже совсем.
Wondering host, quick responses, clean facilities and awesome location. A++++

Verry nice place, well located, clean, and there were lots of brochures and books on Barcelona to look at. There was a lot of noise from the street making it difficult to sleep, but the host was very nice and the room was very nice.
Жилье соответствовало описанию, удобное расположения. Рядом метро и супермаркет.
The flat is in good location and Jeremy was really kind.

Pokoj je v pátém patře domu nad  velmi rušnou pětiproudovou silnicí, která je poměrně dost slyšet. Byt je sice vybaven jen minimálně, zato je čistý a komunikace s Jeremym byla vždy na jedničku. Dům se nachází v dobré dostupnostupnosti k metru a obchodům.
Jeremy is a great host. Everybody recommend your's room.

Everything was fine except the big noise from the street because there is a main route going in front of the building. Also that the AC couldn't be switched on/off or changed from the room because Jeremy wanted to have the controller so it was a little inconvenient. Anyway I completely recommend the place for staying in Barcelona.
Jeremy is very friendly and is open to help you. The place is good located and has a good price-benefit value.

we had a very good time in Jeremy's place! the house is clean, well equiped and in a perfect location. the metro was just a few minutes walk from the house! I reccomend to everyone who wants to spend a few days in Barcelona :))))) lol

Jeremy was very polite. The apartment was clean, everything you need for a comfortable stay. Very convenient location - only 7 minutes walk to Sagrada. Nearby there are cafes and supermarkets, Jeremy will gladly tell you where to shop. The only small minus is in the evening and in the morning it is a bit noisy, as the windows overlook the roadway, but if you come to Barcelona to get acquainted with the city, this is unlikely to prevent you from falling asleep after an interesting day! I liked everything very much, I recommend!

Квартира расположена в хорошем районе, рядом метро и супермаркеты. Хозяин был очень приветливый и внимательный, подробно описал как добраться и оперативно отвечал на сообщения. Комната чистая, все необходимое имеется, продуманно все до мелочей, очень приятно. Так же Jeremy предоставил путеводитель, карту метро и много другой полезной информации.
Muy buena ubicación, cumple con lo (Website hidden by Airbnb) habitación muy cómoda y la  hospitalidad de Jeremy fue genial!
This was a good trip. Jerremy is verry cool and helpfull to us. Good to be there

Had a great time staying here! Everything was nice and clean, the room is quite spacious. It can be a little noisy sometimes as windows face the street but it’s not really bothering. Jeremy is a great host honestly, would totally recommend to stay at his place!
Спасибо. Все было замечательно

Jeremy’s place is a prefect spot to stay in Barcelona. Room is very comfortable and equipped wity everything you need for couple of days. Communication with Jeremy was great - he was responding fast and was accessible whenever we needed him. More than recommend!
local ótimo! 5 andares de escada cansavam um pouco, mas a localização é ótima e compensa. quarto com camas bem boas também!
Todo impecable y el anfitrión muy amable, cómoda habitación y buena ubicación

Die Unterkunft von Jeremy war gut gelegen, alles war mit den öffentlichen Verkehrsmitteln oder sogar zu Fuß gut zu erreichen. Der Check-In hat auch sehr gut geklappt und dank der genauen Beschreibung konnten wir auch gut vom Flughafen zur Unterkunft gelangen.
Leider haben wir uns im Apartment nicht wohl gefühlt und sind deswegen für eine Nacht noch bei Freunden untergekommen. In der Wohnung fällt Vieles fast auseinander, flüstern ist besser als normales Reden und die Stimmung mit dem Gastgeber war höchst merkwürdig. Wir würden nicht nochmal zurückkommen. Wenn man jedoch nur zum Schlafen ein Bett braucht ist es (gerade aufgrund des Preises) vielleicht ausreichend.

Jeremy es el mejor anfitrión, siempre estuvo disponible contestaba súper rápido, dio recomendaciones súper amable, la habitación muy limpia todo fue excelente. Lo recomiendo sin duda alguna. Además de los servicios estoy encantada y excelente ubicación a unos pasos como 10 min de la sagrada familia. O menos.

Das  Preis-Leistungs-Verhältnis stimmt für eine einfache Unterkunft, die hauptsächlich zum Schlafen gedacht  ist. Die gesamte Wohnung  ist sehr hellhörig. Check-in und ihr hat super geklappt und zeitlich abstimmbar. es war sogar möglich nach dem checkout noch den Schlüssel zu behalten und das Gepäck dazulassen.
Consigliatissimo, posto in centro, 5 minuti dalla metro e 10 minuti a piedi dalla sagrada familia. Jeremy è gentile e cordiale.
Wounderful host and brilliant location. Recommended
Very near to Sagrada Família. There are many places to eat something near the house. The host was very kind. He helped us to carry our luggage to upstairs to the room.

The room is comfortable and as described. It is a bit noisy due to the road, but is mainly just passing traffic, hardly any horns. Jeremy provides great amenities in the room (coffee, tea, muffins, wine). Very quiet inside the apartment. Not good if you have a lot of luggage (stairs, as mentioned in the post). Recommend!
和描述相同,房东人超好,还帮我们搬行李,还有准备小蛋糕,靠近马路有一点点吵,提前准备耳塞就没问题了,其他都不错,离地铁站和圣家堂都很近

Everything was like we expected it to be. The room was very clean and just like in the describtion. Jermey was a kind host and he even got us some snacks as a welcome gift and we could leave our suitcases in the appartment after the checkout and get it later. This was really nice so we could enjoy some more time in Barcelona without carrying around our bags.

We had a really pleasant time at Jeremy's! The localization was great (near public transports and really close to Sagrada Familia). Also Jeremy was very nice letting us keep our bags inside the house after the checkout time!
Jeremy es una persona muy cálida, dispuesto a ayudar y que pases la mejor estadía
Everything went well.

name: Spacious Private Bedroom super close to METRO&CITY
summary: Private spacious bedroom in a 2-bedroom apartment, in a safe family neighborhood, big park right across the building! -Very central, only a 5min walk to 2 metro stations & close to all amenities (grocery, bank, post office, pharmacy, etc) -Only a 20min metro ride to/from downtown Montreal -From the apartment you can walk to some very popular Montreal attractions: hike to Mount Mont-Royal, walk to Lac-aux-castors, get a high top view of the city from Belvedere or visit Saint-Joseph's Oratory
space: - You have your own private bedroom in a 2-bedroom apartment with your own closet, desk and a chair.  - The room is very spacious and bright and has two windows (one is on the balcony door).  - You can smoke or read a book in your own private balcony!
description: Private spacious bedroom in a 2-bedroom apartment, in a safe family neighborhood, big park right across the building! -Very central, only a 5min walk to 2 metro stations & close to all amenities (grocery, bank, post office, pharmacy, etc) -Only a 20min metro ride to/from downtown Montreal -From the apartment you can walk to some very popular Montreal attractions: hike to Mount Mont-Royal, walk to Lac-aux-castors, get a high top view of the city from Belvedere or visit Saint-Joseph's Oratory - You have your own private bedroom in a 2-bedroom apartment with your own closet, desk and a chair.  - The room is very spacious and bright and has two windows (one is on the balcony door).  - You can smoke or read a book in your own private balcony! - Kitchen:  You can cook, make coffee/tea or microwave a meal. The kitchen is fully equipped (blender, toaster, pots & pans, etc)!  - Living Room & Dining Area: There are two comfy leather couches, a nice big table where you can sit to take your breakf
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is in a safe, family oriented neighborhood that is very safe. There is parking on the street (no vignette required). The apartment building is right across a beautiful park with lots of trees, a playground, space to run, play soccer and basketball, etc. There is a grocery store, bank, pharmacy, coffee shops, restaurants, fruit market and lots of small ethnic restaurants and shops just a few steps away. There is a gym and a pool 2 minutes away as well.
notes: - Only 11$ for a 2nd person (for couples) per night - Due to my work schedule, check in available anytime until 12pm (noon) or after 5:00pm and weekends anytime. I can be flexible either way, please communicate your time of arrival in advance to make sure I can open for you :)
transit: The apartment is a 5 minute walk to metro station "Cote-Sainte-Catherine" and a 7 minute walk to metro station "Plamondon". It takes between 20-25 minutes to get downtown by metro!  For those of you who prefer the bus, there is a bus stop right across that takes you right downtown as well. Also, we are 2 mins away from highway 15 and boulevard Decarie, it takes 15 to 25 mins (depending on the time of the day) to get to Montréal-Pierre Elliott Trudeau International Airport and/or downtown.
access: - Kitchen:  You can cook, make coffee/tea or microwave a meal. The kitchen is fully equipped (blender, toaster, pots & pans, etc)!  - Living Room & Dining Area: There are two comfy leather couches, a nice big table where you can sit to take your breakfast or read in front of big sunny window, there are lots of books, blankets to hang out on the couch and enjoy the day light or beautiful sunset colours. Feel free to hang out there anytime! - Free WiFi access - Washer & Dryer (coin operated) in the building available as well - Free parking on the street (no vignette required in this neighborhood!)
interaction: I will be staying in the 2nd bedroom of the apartment, and I am reachable by phone or email anytime. Gimme a shout for anything else you think you might need.
house_rules: - No drugs - If you need toiletries please ask before using any as they are personal to your host and may not always contain what is written on the bottle! - Entry to the other bedroom is off limits, no exceptions. Respect of the privacy of the other bedroom is required and any violation will be subject to the guest being expelled from the premises.  - Keeping the shared areas tidy and washing your dishes or anything else you use would be greatly appreciated! We are very easy going and accommodating, you are more than welcome to use any area in the house so you can enjoy yourself. All we ask is to respect the premises and leave the house equipment at the place and the way you found it :)

host.host_about:
I am very inquisitive, enjoy reading, cooking and hanging out with friends over a glass of wine. I can't live without cheese or taking pictures and I have the worst sweet tooth. I enjoy learning new things every day and trying new foods. I work for a Canadian satellite TV provider so if I am not busy with work youll find me out in the city doing various activities, relaxing with Netflix or reading a book.

As a guest: I am respectful, adaptable and clean. When I travel I spend most of my days outside exploring, though I enjoy a good chat with the host.

As a host: Easy going, I give guests their space and I appreciate a good communication between host/guest so I can better accommodate you. I love to cook and will be happy to share a meal or a drink with you.

Looking forward to meeting you!
~ioni

reviews.comments:
A veryyy nice place to reserve 
I have no doubt on recommending this wonderful private room
The host really made me feel at home !

Very spacious room with balcony 
Every thing is well organized and tidy and super clean 

And dealing with the host she is a kind person , well organized and helpful , she provides u at the morning a very nice & healthy breakfast 
You can share some area with her and get a chance to see one of her great movies
Her house is near to a lot of places and to the metro station and also to the bus stop
Excellent hosting. The room is big, quit and comfortable. My best experience.
Ioni is an excellent host. She was extremely kind and very accommodating.  The apartment is very clean and the bedroom very large and comfortable. I highly recommend recommend her place.
Good location, easy approach, and smooth check-in. She was available on phone when needed. Room and apartment was clean and host was caring.

I had to come back again to Ioni's private room after staying in 2 other houses , what makes it special the room is spacious with a desk and chair to study or finish up your work 
And again , everything in Ioni's house is tidy and clean .
A Lovely stay in her private room while I was in Montreal..

Highly recommended !

Idéalement situé près du métro et des plusieurs commodités. Très pratique quand on débarque sur Montréal. Séjour vraiment agréable, grande chambre confortable et une hôte au top! Très bon rapport qualité prix, je recommande sans hésitez :)

Excellent accueil, Ioni est très sympathique, discrète tout en étant à l'écoute. J'ai passé un excellent séjour et recommande vivement ce choix, très bon rapport qualité / prix. Appartement vaste très soigné et décoré avec simplicité et gout...

Ioni was such a great host !
So friendly, her apartment was cozy, the room too.
She left me something for breakfast every morning before she left for work ! So nice of her.
I highly recommend her place.
If you want to go Downtown on foot it will take you about 1 hour and a half which is great because the neighborhood is very nice but don't worry if you don't want to you have a metro station very close to her apartment!

Ioni was an excellent host. We arrived late and she was totally fine about it. She was so kind!! During our stay she woke up before us just to make us coffee and to leave some nice muffins and bread for our breakfast. All this on a weekend... She could be sleeping, but no, she took really good care of us!
Also, we must mention that the house and room were spotless!   would love to stay again when we return to Montreal!
Great host, Thanks.
The place is very clean, Ioni is a very nice host although she is rarely at home, but knows how to take care of her guests.

Ioni was a great host! We felt very comfortable there, wi-fi worked well and it was easy to communicate with her when we needed to. Great access to the metro and city buses. The place was clean and safe, and she left us some breakfast in the mornings, which was super helpful to get our day started. Would definitely go back again next time.

Ioni is an amazing host. The apartment is really pretty and close to public transportation, the neighborhood is also very quiet and lovely. She is a very kind person and she's also super fun. The place is charming and confortable, also Ioni provides you of everything you need. Definitely I would stay with her again!
beau logement propre avec une hôte sympathique et tranquille,  calme comme endroit,  rien de négatif a mentionner.

The place is at a fantastic location (i.e. for grocery-shopping and metros) and Ioni was a fantastic and understanding hostess. She made my stay very enjoyable and she was always happy to help or offer ways to make my stay better!
I had a great stay at Ioni's place! She is so kind, helpful and easy to talk to. Went above and beyond helping me settle into the city of Montreal. Love the proximity to the metro station!
Ioni est une personne agréable et accueillante. J'ai bien aimé mon séjour et je recommande cet endroit.
Première semaine parfaite dans cette chambre conforme à la descritpion, pour une arrivée PVT en douceur !
The place was exactly as listed. In a very safe neighborhood, close to the Metro, and parking was no problem. Highly recommend if you are looking to explore Montreal.
Fantastic location only minutes away from the metro so easy to get to the downtown area and explore Montreal. Room is very large, exactly as advertised and just what I was looking for! Thanks Ioni.

This is my second time staying with Ioni, so I obviously had a great first-time experience with her! I had a fantastic time staying with her for the second time as well. The room is spacious, the place is clean, and Ioni was pro-active in making sure I was comfortable. The location is also terrific, with two metros and a grocery store nearby!

Ioni is an amazing host, I strongly recommend her and her apartment to everyone looking for a beautiful, safe, conveniently located, and private room in Montreal. Ioni was always fast on replying to my questions, she accommodated to my arrival and departure, left treats in the morning for me, and was always available with useful tips about getting settled in Montreal. Her apartment is very nice, beautifully decorated, the kitchen is fully equipped, and the room is really cute, big, and private. The location is a real plus, about 1 block or so from a metro station and walking distance to Cote-des-Neiges where you can find everything. The biggest plus is Ioni's personality, she is really easy going, very respectful of giving her guests their own private space, so responsive to the guest's needs and questions, great positive energy to have in a host!
Ioni is very warm-hearted, she offered breakfast. And the location is also good. But the floor is creaky, so you would hear clearly when someone walks upstairs.

This was my first stop in the city of Montreal, and Ioni's hospitality really made me feel at home. Her place was clean and had everything you'd need for a great stay. Ioni was also very thoughtful and left snacks and little notes on the table in the mornings. She also gave me advice on navigating through Montréal, finding a good mobile network plan, etc. She was really easy going and it was a pleasure sharing the house with her.
Le séjour était parfait ! Rien à redire, je recommande sans hésiter :)

Great host!
Everything very clean
Very good 
Thanks so much
Great value, awesome location and an amazing host

Ioni is a lovely host who makes effort to ensure her guests feel at ease. The room is large and kept clean, and has all the amenities needed to make a stay comfortable. The apartment is only 5 mins to the nearest Metro station and then approx. 20 mins into the centre of Montreal. I felt safe in the neighbourhood at all times.

A great stay. Ioni is respectful and very, very kind. One of those people who are chill in the best possible way. Let's you enjoy your visit, but at the same time she's always open to questions. Easy to get in touch with, so there was no problem with checking in. 

So, thank you for allowing me to stay in your home and for letting me drink all that green tea.^.^
Value for money, great communication, clean. Ioni is a great host and I can only recommend her.
Loved staying at Ioni's!! Place was nice and super clean! She is so friendly and am awesome host!
Nice host!

Arrivé dans le cadre d'un PVT, très confortable et calme pour une première sur Montréal.
J'ai passé un très bon séjour.

Ioni es una chica muy linda, amable y súper atenta, nos dejaba detallitos de desayuno, es una chica muy muy linda siempre dispuesta a resolver tus dudas y ayudarte en lo que necesites, respeta tu espacio y te hace sentir en casa ! 
El lugar es un departamento muy limpio y cálido, de verdad te sientes en casa, tiene todo lo que puedas necesitar para cocinar; siempre te provee de toallas limpias, sábanas cuando lo necesitas, la ubicación es muy buena, está a 5 min del metro, del súper y llegas en 15 min al centro ! 
Realmente recomendable ! :)
A very nice place with a nice host
Hôte facilitante et sympathique. La proximité avec la ligne orange du métro est un atout non négligeable pour une premiere découverte de montreal.

Appartement au top, grand, super bien équipé, joliment décoré. Ioni est une super hôte aussi avec un accueil exceptionnel malgré mon arrivé tardive. En plus le logement est à 5min à pied du métro qui lui même est proche du centre. Vraiment un logement à recommander !

Ioni's place is great; a lovely character building with high ceilings and lots of space. Ioni is a very welcoming host, and it was great to have use of the kitchen to cook! The place is close to the metro and buses, and I found it relatively easy to park in the surrounding area. Also close to a lovely little park and a theatre!

J'ai passé une très bonne semaine chez Ioni. L'appartement était chaleureux (même avec les -20°C extérieur), parfait pour une première semaine pour s'installer à Montréal, proche du métro, etc. Je recommande !

It is located next to the Diagonal Metro station (L3, FGC) and Verdaguer (L4, L5). It also offers breakfast service from Monday to Friday and laundry and ironing of clothes once a week, all included in the price. neighborhood_overview: The students and young professionals residence is located in l'Eixample in the city center, tourist and leisure hub, and only one street away from Paseo de Gracia. This is a middle and upper-middle class neighborhood. It is perfectly connected by all kinds of means of transport, it is located next to the metro station Diagonal and Verdaguer. -------- La residencia de estudiantes está situada en l’Eixample en el centro de la ciudad, foco turístico y de ocio, y a una sola calle de Paseo de Gracia. Se trata de un barrio de clase media y media-alta. Está perfectamente comunicado por todo tipo de medios de transporte, se encuentra al lado de la estación de metro de Diagonal y Verdaguer.
transit: Very well connected by Metro stations diagonal (L3 Green, L5 Blue and FGC) and Verdaguer (L4 Yellow, L5 Blue) and numerous bus stops that are on the Diagonal and Passeig de Gracia. -------- Muy bien comunicado por las estaciones de Metro de Diagonal (L3 Verde, L5 Azul y FGC) y Verdaguer (L4 Amarilla, L5 Azul) además de por las númerosas paradas de bus que se encuentran en la Diagonal y Passeig de Gracia.
access: Nuestro apartamento consta de varias zonas comunes, como la cocina, los baños, el balcón y el salón comedor. Los inquilinos tienen libre acceso a todas ellas, disponiendo además de espacios privados de almacenaje en la nevera y en los armarios de la cocina. ------- Our apartment consists of several common areas, such as the kitchen, the bathrooms, the balcony and the dining room. The tenants have free access to all of them, also having private storage spaces in the refrigerator and in the kitchen cupboards.
house_rules: Los inquilinos deberán cuidar los bienes de la vivienda, respetar a los compañeros de piso, a los empleados y trabajadores de la empresa gestora y a los vecinos. No hacer ruidos excesivos que puedan molestar y las fiestas o quedadas no están permitidas. Queda estrictamente prohibido el consumo, el uso o la mera tenencia de drogas o sustancias ilegales en la vivienda o la finca en la que esta se ubica. El inquilino arrienda una habitación de uso estrictamente personal e intransferible con derecho de uso de las zonas comunes de manera compartida con el resto de los compañeros de la vivienda y debe permitir el acceso a los agentes y trabajadores de la empresa gestora en todo momento, para que puedan hacer su labor de limpieza, mantenimientos, inspecciones periódicas del inventario y comerciales enseñando el piso y las habitaciones a potenciales nuevos inquilinos.   Esta habitación está pensada para estudiantes universitarios o jóvenes profesionales para uso de vivienda por motivo de estud

neighborhood_overview: Plaza   Cataluña Catalonia Square is the largest square in the centre with 30.000 meters square    it is the third biggest square in Spain. Some  of the most important streets and   Avenue interconnects with this important square, famous for its fountain, and   statues. Until almost half of  19th century the Plaça de Catalunya was mainly a   rural zone located outside the city walls. It was only in 1858 that the Madrid's   central government finally ordered the defensive walls to be torn down.,   approving also the construction outside the walls so a public contest was   organized in search of a  design of a new district. The first place was awarded   to a design by Rovira i Trias but the head government ended up choosing a far   more modern design with a grid plan by Ildefons Cerdà. Eventually the local and   head government agreed add a new plan. A design by the architect Puig i   Cadafalch (author of the  modernist building 'Casa de les Punxes') resulted in   the current enormous sq

Weekend and bank holidays: The check-in and key collection takes place at: Friendly Rentals, Carrer Ausias March, 27 - Barcelona. Important:  Late arrivals between 21:00 and 02:00 hrs require an extra service fee of 30€ which must be paid to the late service agent at Check-in.  Loud music and parties are strictly prohibited. Guests in a Friendly Rentals apartment should be aware that if loud music is played, or a party is held, and the neighbours complain and/or police are called, you may be immediately removed from the apartment regardless of the time, day or night. Noise regulations and respect for other residents between 22:00 and 10.00. We would appreciate your full cooperation in this matter and we hope you understand that these rules are necessary, as our apartments are located in residential buildings with people that have to get up early and go to work. host.host_about:
¡Hola a todos! Soy Claudia Castillo y formo parte del equipo de Friendly Rentals. Una empresa con sede en Barcelona especializada en el alquiler de apartamentos vacacionales. Llevamos 14 años trabajando con un claro objetivo: ofrecer a nuestros clientes la mejor selección de apartamentos a precios competitivos. Garantizamos además la calidad de los mismos y el trato más Friendly. Actualmente contamos con apartamentos en 23 ciudades alrededor del mundo y estamos continuamente ampliando nuestras ofertas y destinos. 

El equipo de Friendly Rentals es joven y dinámico, tan sólo en nuestra sede en Barcelona disponemos de más de 60 personas que hablan español, catalán, inglés, francés, italiano, alemán y holandés. Siempre ofrecemos una atención personalizada a todos nuestros clientes y disponemos de equipos locales en todos nuestros destinos, de este modo somos capaces de ofrecer una atención personalizada 24 horas al día, los 7 días de la semana. 

Por supuesto, somos expertos en turismo así que sea cuál sea tu duda coméntanosla ¡estaremos encantados de ayudarte a preparar tu estancia! Te ofreceremos todo tipo de consejos y sugerencias, los mejores lugares para comer, visitas imprescindibles, actividades recomendadas si viajas con niños… ¡toda la información que pueda serte de utilidad! Queremos que tu estancia con nosotros sea realmente fantástica, ¡nuestra casa es tu casa! ¡Te esperamos! 





--------------------------------------


Hi, everyone! My name is Claudia Castillo and I’m part of the Friendly Rentals team. Friendly Rentals is a company based in Barcelona that specializes in holiday rental apartments. Over the past 14 years, we’ve been working hard with a clear goal in mind: providing our customers with the best selection of apartments at the most competitive prices. We guarantee quality apartments and a friendly service at all times.

We currently have apartments in 23 cities worldwide and we are constantly adding new destinations and offers.
Friendly Rentals’ team is young and dynamic. In Barcelona alone, we have more than 60 employees who speak Spanish, Catalan, English, French, Italian, German and Dutch. We have local representatives in all our cities, which allows us to provide a personalized customer service 24 hours a day, 7 days a week.

As trusted tourism experts, we can help you out with any questions you may have! We offer you the best travel tips, recommendations on where to eat, best places to visit, activities for children… all the information you need to plan your trip! We want your stay with us to be one you remember; our home is your home: we look forward to welcoming you!

ótima localização, apto muito espaçoso e amplo, com todos os itens inclusive maquina de lavar e secar, próximo a restaurantes e lojas , enfrente a loja de departamento El Corte Ingles e metro Plaza Catalunia .  Voltaria a me hospedar neste local !

name: SUÍTE COM ENTRADA PRIVATIVA Ipanema / Carnaval
summary: Uma suíte, com entrada independente. Total privacidade, na melhor localização de Ipanema, a duas quadras da praia, com mercado, bancos, farmácias e vários restaurantes e bares. Gostamos que você fique totalmente à vontade aqui em casa, e se precisar cozinhar alguma coisa, fique à vontade. Se for necessário, a máquina de lavar fica na área de serviço.
space: Uma suíte confortável, com banheiro privativo. Entrada independente, com acesso a cozinha e a lavanderia. Um quarto grande, confortável, limpo, silencioso, agradável, claro, ventilado, cama de casal nova e confortável, armário grande e espaçoso, TV, Ventilador de Teto, ar condicionado e internet sem fio, WI-FI. O banheiro é de exclusividade do hóspede, localizado dentro do quarto. A limpeza do Quarto e banheiro: toda semana. A troca da Roupa de cama e Toalhas de Banho: toda semana, forneceremos uma toalha de banho e uma de rosto por hóspede, para serem usadas em casa. Para a praia temos toalha própria, basta solicitar.

O Prédio está locali
neighborhood_overview: Ipanema, é um bairro nobre da Zona Sul do Rio de Janeiro. Tudo acontece primeiro, em Ipanema.  O imóvel fica próximo a Feira Hippie (aos domingos), Praia do Arpoador e a duas quadras da Praia de Ipanema. Farmácias, bancos e supermercado na mesma quadra do imóvel. Muitos bares e restaurantes da moda e badalados, estão a poucos passos. O Bairro é muito seguro e bem policiado, devido ao número de visitantes.
notes: Além disso, também temos disponível: - Barraca de praia - Cadeira de praia - Toalha de praia - Bolsa térmica para levar suas bebidas para a praia
transit: A poucos metros da Praça General Osório, tem uma estação do metrô. O hóspede pode se locomover tanto para o Centro da Cidade como para a Barra da Tijuca. Na praça tem o ponto do sightseeing rio, ônibus turístico que vai de Ipanema até a Zona Portuária, onde o hóspede poderá visitar o Museu do Amanhã, o MAR (Museu de Arte do Rio), o Boulevard Olímpico, o Aquário do Rio e conhecer a arquitetura do Centro dá Cidade. Super bem localizado, cercado de bares, lanchonetes, mercados, restaurantes, lavanderias, bancos e lojas. Região super tranquila para sair a noite ou voltar tarde da noite. Estamos exatamente no meio entre as duas estações de metrô, a duas quadras de distância de cada uma delas (estação General Osório ou estação Nossa Senhora da Paz) - A Lagoa Rodrigo de Freitas fica exatamente atrás do apartamento - A praia de Ipanema fica a duas quadras, super próxima - A praia de Copacabana e a Pedra do Arpoador ficam a uma curta caminhada e são locais onde vale muita a pena a visita É muit
access: O Prédio está localizado em uma rua segura e privilegiada da Zona Sul do Rio de Janeiro, a uma quadra da rua Farme de Amoedo, uma das rua mais movimentada e com vida noturna de Ipanema, vários restaurantes, bares, lanchonetes, padaria, farmácias e clínicas particulares, tudo é muito perto, supermercado, lojas, agências bancárias, casas de câmbio, transportes urbanos e outros serviços, a 2 quadras da Praia, a poucos metros do Metro, ponto de Ônibus na porta e a 1 quadra do ponto de Táxi ( táxi 24 horas ), facilitando a estadia e circulação por toda cidade. Pode ir caminhando para os bairros: Arpoador, Copacabana, Leblon, Jardim Botânico e Lagoa Rodrigo de Freitas. Tem uma estação de aluguel de bicicletas.  O prédio tem um eficiente sistema de segurança, com monitoramento de câmeras e porteiro 24 horas.
interaction: Minha mãe, Dª Lu, mora no apartamento e poderá orientar em qualquer necessidade. Estamos sempre disponíveis para ajudar com dicas e informações sobre a cidade e o bairro, como sugestões de lugares para ir, para conhecer ou para comer. Fique totalmente à vontade para me ligar ou enviar uma mensagem caso necessite de algo, e aproveite o Rio de Janeiro como um Carioca num dos melhores bairros da cidade Maravilhosa.
house_rules: Festas e reuniões não são permitidas. É necessário boa convivência com os vizinhos, e barulho, som alto ou falar alto após as 22:00 não é permitido. Se for fumante, por favor abrir a janela e fumar perto dela. Drogas não são permitidas. Sou alegre, comunicativa, atenciosa, organizada, limpa e prestativa SERÁ UM PRAZER HOSPEDAR VOCÊ! FAÇA DA MINHA CASA A CONTINUAÇÃO DA SUA. ________________________________________ NÃO PODE RECEBER VISITAS de pessoas estranhas dentro do apartamento, pedir para aguardar na Portaria do Prédio, para sua segurança e minha também. PROIBIDO ANIMAIS DE ESTIMAÇÃO. FUMANTES SÃO BEM-VINDOS! A COZINHA pode ser usada para preparar o café da manhã, lanches e refeições rápidas, após usar, deixar tudo limpo, organizado. Muito obrigada! RETORNANDO DA PRAIA: encaminhar-se à garagem do prédio localizada no andar térreo, portão de entrada ao lado da portaria social , lá você encontra um lava pés, bica, para retirar o excesso de areia. Homens são proibidos de entrarem e saí

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.host_about:
Minha mãe, Da. Lu mora no apartamento e tem uma suíte disponível para receber hóspedes.
Sou brasileira e ela é portuguesa, adoramos receber.
Será um prazer fornecer dicas de lugares, praias do que fazer no Rio de Janeiro. Estaremos a sua disposição para qualquer informação ou apenas para um bate papo.
Seja bem vindo ao Rio de Janeiro.

reviews.comments:
El departamento estaba impecable y las instalaciones muy cómodas. Dispones de baño privado y entrada independiente para ingresar. La  ubicación es excelente, estás a tres cuadras de la playa de Ipanema y hay muchos lugares para comer y comprar lo que se necesite (hay un supermercado en la esquina). Hay una estación de subterráneo a una cuadra lo cual es genial para poder trasladarse al centro u otros lugares si se necesita. 
Ludo y Katya han sido muy amables y atentas con nosotros. ¡Recomendamos este lugar!
