Approx 5min easy walk. 350m
access: Main front door of house Netflix Wifi Internet ADSL 2+
interaction: We will meet you at check in whenever possible.  During your stay we generally would not interact with guests during your stay unless you need help or advice.  We are more than happy to help.   We hope you enjoy your privacy and your stay in our lovely house. Please do not hesitate to contact us if there is anything we can do to make your stay as comfortable as possible.
house_rules: Access to keys will be via a lockbox.  Code will be provided by SMS or message 24hrs before your arrival  2 keys in lockbox - one to take and one to leave in box just in case you loose the first key.  Please close lockbox then unscramble code  Checkout When you checkout, pls put all dishes into dishwasher and turn on(tablets under sink).  Lock all doors and close windows, put key back in lockbox and unscramble code Additional blankets, pillows & heater in wardrobe in bedroom  Iron & board in wardrobe  Torch in bedroom side table  First Aid kit in bathroom cabinet Fire blanket and extinguisher in bottom drawer under kitchen sink Please leave our place as when you checked in - neat & tidy Wifi:  Network: HomeFFE-24 or 5 PW: ilove548

host.host_about:
We are a family with 2 beautiful teens. We love travelling on family holidays, cruises and especially to new places overseas. 
We are a busy family with work, sport and planning for our next family holiday. :)

reviews.comments:
A gorgeous townhouse, with old world charm and modern features. The location is great, really central with yummy cafes within walking distance. Parking was easy too. The furnishings were all lovely and the kitchen is a great size and well equipped.

The bedroom was cosy with a sunroom at the front which was great to relax in, have a chat or read a book with a glass of wine. 

We'd definitely look to stay again next time we're visiting Sydney.

Patrick & Christine's place was amazing. Spacious rooms (the photos make it look smaller instead of bigger!), the area is quiet and peaceful. The sunroom is PERFECT for sitting around with a cup of tea and a book. Communication was clear and friendly, buses right outside and a short walk to a train station, a quick drive/uber/taxi/bus to nightlife in Newtown, it's got everything you'd need. 

Couldn't recommend it enough. Thanks again Christine and Pat!

Patrick and Christine's place was lovely, and beautifully renovated with very modern touches. The unit was actually  much bigger and spacious compared to the photos. It was well equipped with comfortable and cosy furniture in particular  the lounge and the bed was extremely comfortable. All the linen from the towels, to the bedding, extra blankets etc were of high quality. The little court yard was a great little outside area where you could bask in the sun, great for my 3 yr old boy! Check in was easy and the communication between the owners and myself were always prompt and friendly. Thank you for our stay :-)
Great hosts. Very clean and tidy. All good.

We were very happy with our stay at the cottage. It is in a great location for public transport including buses, light rail & rail. The local shops at Dulwich Hill have all your grocery needs with lots of great cafes & bars to choose from. The internet was great & Netflix was a nice bonus. Patrick & Christine responded immediately to nay issues or queries we had. The appliances were modern & worked well. Bedding was of a high quality & the bed very comfortable. Everything was as listed on the amenities site. The pantry items & consumables supplied were a lovely bonus. The only downside was that the 2 radiators were inadequate for the area to be heated. We would recommend this cottage.

This is a very good stay with plenty of space. We would have liked curtains in the bedroom rather than just frosted glass as it was very bright at night. The radiators worked well keeping us warm (it was slightly less cold than it had been). It was absolutely spotless, and the hosts were super efficient in their communication.

Stayed 2 nights in July 2017.  This lovely 1 bedder is handy to everything and was extremely neat, clean and presented beautifully.  Bedding, linen etc were beautiful and everything you could possible need in the kitchen.  Will definitely book again next time I'm in Sydney.  The hosts were great communicators and obtaining access to the accommodation was no trouble.  Parking in side street only a few meters away.
The house is located in a quiet place, if you're not in a hurry to do some business or traveling through cities, this house is a good choice. The host is very kind and nice!

Although based on a main road we were able to find parking easily and the traffic noise was not too distracting. We were able to create a cosy space with the heaters and fantastic bedding and appreciated the local menus left - highly recommend Zeus for souvlaki! The wooden floors next door meant the noise carried through however this wouldn't stop me staying here again. Fantastic check in process and such lovely, warm attentive hosts.

Business like and efficient communication from the hosts and an easy check-in process. My 5pm arrival was slightly challenging in terms of traffic and getting to the correct side of the road, then finding parking in an adjacent street (if you are not used to Sydney traffic this can be a bit stressful). Comfy bed and a spacious and modern unit.
Wow! What a place. All looks so tidy and clean! The place is located in a good spot and you really can chill, Pat and Chris will have everithing sorted out for ya'all.

Very clean and comfortable. Spacious well thought out, everything you need for a comfortable stay. Close to shops and cafes 
Light rail. Child friendly (I had my 2 grandsons). Would stay again. 
Sue

Superbe petite maison qui permet d'accueillir jusqu'à 4 personnes (1 chambre avec lit double et canapé/lit double dans le salon)
Quartier très calme et agréable. 
10 min à pied de la station de train Dulwich Hill et du Light Train (tram) permettant d'accéder rapidement à l'aéroport et au centre. 
Lignes de bus proche. 
Nous avons adoré notre petit séjour et nous reviendrons lors de notre prochaine visite à Sydney.
Great accommodation. Clean and comfortable. Highly recommend!
Very good experience. the house is far beyond our expectation. very tidy and very new. We cooked everyday. the washing machine was the best.

This was the perfect location for me. The house was very clean and tidy.  The bed was very comfortable.  I really appreciated the sunny nook as the weather was quite cool.  The house had everything I needed, even a washing machine, although I didn't get a chance to use it.  I would definitely stay again for the location and value for money.

A perfect location for visiting family or friends in the Inner West.
My relatives were absolutely delighted - and told me to keep this address in mind for any future visits :-)
Top score in every respect, thank you Patrick and Christine.
Great location; great facilities; great value.
Really lovely home. Cozy, clean, quiet neighbours. Easy to navigate to and from, already had all the necessities in the house. Will definitely look to stay here again in the future
It was clean and good for spending time with our family. It was easy to use transport because the bus stop and light rail station was close.

We had a very comfortable stay at Patrick and Christine’s place. The location is great, close to bus and tram public transport, along with a good selection of GoGet vehicles. There are some great shops, pubs and places to eat nearby, with every cuisine catered for.

The house itself is well appointed, modern and clean with everything you expect and need for a comfortable stay. Patrick and Christine responded quickly to all communication and the 12pm checkout was fantastic. 10am is such a hideously early checkout time. I’d definitely stay here again.
My parents stayed here for about a week while visiting me. They had a great time and really enjoyed the house.
Nice cosy place, perfect a weekend getaway, close to darling harbour
Location is excellent for an inner-city-kind of experience. Only a five-minute walk to the light rail. Home was charming, with gorgeous wood floors, updated bath and kitchen.

This place was great. Much more spacious than I expected for a one bedroom unit (long hallway, big kitchen, lounge room and bedroom). The place was absolutely spotless when we arrived, especially the bathroom, which is always so important (hate when the bathroom is dirty!) Patrick and Christine were so accommodating when we had a last minute change of plans and asked if we could check in early to get ready for an event that afternoon. I will definitely stay here again!

Gorgeous new kitchen and bathroom, lovely bedroom. The second bed, a sofa bed in the lounge, is really only useful for a child and takes up the only living space. This house ideal for a couple, not so great for two adults who were not sharing a bed. Great public transport options nearby. Christine very responsive on checkin and purchased a fan for us as it was quite hot in the house. No screens on any windows or doors mean you have to lock up everything at night. Shared wall with neighbours quite thin and wooden floors throughout are lovely but noisy from next door, especially when heels are being worn there! Thank you Christine and Patrick.
Absolutely gorgeous place!  Really spacious and comfortable.  Would highly recommend.

Patrick and Christine's place is well located, close to food options and public transport. We enjoyed a delicious dinner and breakfast based on their recommendations, and found our way quickly into the city via the light rail.
Patrick and Christine's place is ideal for a small family or couple. The house is very clean and cozy .

Nice accommodation 
And basic amenities were provided including equipment for young kids
lovely place
Great location and good value for money.
Excellent value. Patrick and Christine were very accommodating to all our needs
Patrick and Christine's place was great! Hosts were very helpful and easy to communicate with!!! Conveniently positioned, immaculately clean and perfect for a short stay. Thanks guys!

We had a lovely stay. The house was just like in the photos. Confortable bedding and a cute courtyard where thé kids could go outside. Situated on a main road so maybe a bit noisy because of vehicles at times. Very clean. Duplex.
Lovely house

What a great little home! Everything we needed plus more. Clean and tidy, comfortable bed and plenty of fans to keep the place cool when it was hot and sticky outside!! Patrick and Christine were prompt to communicate and helpful. The location suited us perfectly, being close to public transport and restaurants (and a stones throw from where our daughter lives!!) We will be recommending this property to our friends and family.
Great house, great location!
Great place to stay !

Christine and Patrick were amazing hosts! Their beautiful one bedder is modern, stylish and extremely clean. The house is just a short walk to the train station and main street. Thank you again for a fantastic stay!

This is the second time we have stayed in one of Christine and Patrick’s Airbnb’s and we loved it. Comfortable, clean and close to great things around the inner west. 

Thank you! We will be back. 

Trish

It was really amazing ,good location , cleanness ,perfect hospitality ,thanks a lot  Patrick and Christine 
Giuseppe

I booked this AirBnB for my parents who were visiting me nearby. The place is lovely, spacious and well appointed, and not far from the bustling Dulwich Hill shops. The bed was very comfortable and my parents enjoyed their stay here.

A lovely stay here at a stylish place. Good location for cafes nearby, Greek food delivered for dinner. All the things you need for a nice stay plus a bonus little sun room. Bed comfortable. Bathroom is gorgeous and new. Above all that, Patrick and Christine kindly accommodated me and our schedule for check-in which was much appreciated. Thanks again. Anna and Ash
Thank you. Great location, no fuss.

This Dulwich Hill house is a great little pad for a couple or small family. Full kitchen, laundry, bedroom and living spaces with a great little sunroom for toy play! Don’t be fooled by main road location - parking actually very easy. Thanks for a great stay!
This is a lovely, clean & comfortable ‘all of house’ accommodation. Everything that is stated on the information for this place is accurate. The hosts were quick to respond to any queries we had.

This AirBnB  is well located in Dulich Hill . We enjoyed being able to walk to the Marrickville shops ,train stops  and local restaurants. The house was spotlessly clean and contained a well  appointed kitchen and laundry. It has a cute backyard that captured the afternoon winter sun no was completely private. There is also a cute small sunroom off the main bedroom that captures the afternoon sun also.
This place was spotlessly clean, private and comfortable. Location was central and close to transport and checking in/out was easy. It was like a more private, more cosy hotel. I would stay again.
Good property, well maintained, clean and warm
Such a large and comfortable and well equipped Airbnb is hard to find in this area.  It has lots of space and is extremely well equipped. A gem.

Patrick & Christine's place is so nice, quiet, stylish and charming - very clean and well-equipped. The tram and train stations are in walking distance (7mins and 15mins respectively). We would love to stay longer!

Patrick and Christine’s place was immaculate and great for getting to know Sydney! It felt very homely and was handy for bus, light rail and train - perfect for getting around everywhere. Would recommend!
Patrick and Christine’s house is a lovely place to stay and just right for my husband I and our son to stay for the weekend.  Clean and tidy and comfy bed.
Very comfortable house with every appliances well equipped. We had very nice time there. Strongly recommend to couples.

Really great experience. Coffee in the sun room was great. Only thing is that the person staying next door seemed to be walking around in high heels at 1am and it was very audible through the wall. Other then that amazing.
the house looked so much better than the photos! definitely a 5 stars choice!!! zero hassle, easy parking and sparkling spotless house. what more can you ask for!
Neat and tidy home.
Great would stay there again
Lovely clean and comfortable place. Close to transport and very well equipped.
Lovely place to stay in a neighbourhood with lots of public transport options. We really enjoyed our time in Sydney, thank you!
Great spot for us, spacious and surprisingly quiet given the location. Would highly recommend. Thanks so much.
Excellent accommodation

Christine and Patrick’s place was perfect for our stay. We were there for a week and it had everything we needed! It was very clean, had plenty of amenities, the check in process was simple and the on street parking was easy. We enjoyed our stay and next time we’re back for a week or so we’ll be checking if this place is available!
Great place! Very clean and bright! Loved our stay here
我们居住得很舒服,房间干净,整洁,离公交站很近｡
Great place for couples or those with baby or toddler. Easy to get around and lots of nice touches to make it feel like home

My parents were very happy after their 4 days stay at Christine and Patrick. The place is nicely decorated, the bed is very comfy and the location is very convenient if you want to be in the Inner West. All this combined with good and timely communication. I highly recommend this place :-)

Excellent place to stay- clean, accessible, spacious (even for 3 people!) and easy to communicate with Christine and Patrick. A lot of basic bits in the house to help with cooking and general ease of living. Thank you again!

Lovely Australian home with real character. Beautiful details and high ceilings. Good to have private outside space. Well appointed galley kitchen. Transport (buses and trains) close by and easy to use. Very comfortable and relaxing space to relax in after busy days in Sydney. We had a lovely time.

Had a great stay at Christine and Patrick's when visiting family that lives nearby. Plenty of room for the two of us. My son was lucky enough to score the main room while I was fine on the sofa bed. Easy check in. Secure place, very clean and had everything you need to stay. So grateful for the shampoo in the bathroom as mine had exploded in my suitcase during my flight. These little touches make a difference! Most appreciated the check out time of 12pm!  Very comfortable space we would stay again. I can definitely recommend. Thanks Christine and Patrick:)
Amazing and cool house for a short getaway for the weekend. Reasonable proximity to the airport and good access to public transport. The bedroom is awesome with a sunroom to the front to chill.
My parents enjoyed a great stay at Christine and Patrick's place, it is comfortable and well appointed. Perfect for visiting my family in Dulwich Hill
Beautiful home in a fabulous area.  very clean, lovely bed and everything you need.  We enjoyed our stay very much. Thank you for having us.

name: Beautiful apartment AG905
summary: Lugar perfeito para vivenciar as experiências de ser um carioca e ter um clima de praia e sofisticação ao mesmo tempo, dentro de uma mega cidade. Esta decorado e todo ele tem iluminação secundária indireta.
space: Apartments with kitchen, refrigerator, microwave, tv, office, internet, wifi, kitchen utensils, bed, closet, spacious bathroom with entrance to the washing machine. This decorated and all he has secondary indirect lighting. It is the building of the famous BIP-BIP. A bar with samba and soft that does not bother the neighbors. It is considered one of the best bars choro (a type of samba) in the south of Rio de Janeiro. Street closed. Possibility to park in front of the building. Location surrounded by restaurants, cinema and supermarkets. It is 200 meters from Copacabana polo bohemian.

Preserve the planet. 6) If the apartment has some damage caused by the host or is missing items conferred on checkin, the damage will be paid by the end of host lodging. 7) The check out, or the output will always be 12:00 on the day of departure. After that, you'll be charged the daily.

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.host_about:
Olá, sou formado em administração de empresas. Trabalho no ramo da saúde a mais de 10 anos. Em 2012 comecei a gerenciar apartamentos e por isso, ofereço por aqui apartamentos por temporada no Rio de Janeiro, localizados na zona sul, próximo a praia. Chamamos nosso grupo de Rio Habitat.
Nosso objetivo é oferecer um lugar muito agradável e estamos em desenvolvimento de uma estrutura ao turista.
O grande bacana é que estou começando a conhecer pessoas por aqui.
Essa comunidade tem tudo a ver com o conceito que tento trazer para a minha vida pessoal e empresarial.
Não estou sozinho operando os apartamentos. Posso contar com uma equipe que me ajudam no dia-a-dia.
Então, não se surpreenda se falar com os três na sua hospedagem.
Adoro tecnologia e espero que isso seja o nosso grande diferencial. 
Iremos recebê-los com grande prazer.

reviews.comments:
Back in DK after 50 amazing days in Rio.

Stayed and lived in Diogo`s nice apt. without any problem, the apt was clean with very good furniture, good TV with sat ch., fast WIFI that worked every day.....
Diogo is a very friendly, nice and helpful guy and if you SMS, mail or call him, he will answer very quickly... and he`s employees the same.
I can and will recommend Diogo and Riohabitat to anybody...
/Torben
The apartment was fantastic for our needs in Carnival. Recommend highly to anyone wanting to stay in a great location in Rio for an affordable price. Thanks Diogo.

Gracias Diogo por todo! El apartamento está a media cuadra de la playa, justo encima del clásico Bip Bip para quienes gustan de la buena música, aún cerca de N.S. de Copacabana es muy silencioso, espacioso y sumamente cómodo. Con la kitchenette, aire acondicionado y TV Flat es realmente como ser un Carioca en pleno Rio. Muy Recomendable

Thanks Diogo for everything! The apartment is half block from the beach, just on top of the classic Bip Bip for those who love good music, and even so close to N.S. de Copacaban it's very quite, spacious and comfortable. With the kitchenette, AC and Flat TV you feel right at home in Rio. Very much recommended.

Muito obrigado por tudo Diogo! O apartamento fica a media quadra da praia, bem em cima do clássico bip bip para quem gosta da boa música, está bem pertinho da N.S. de Copacabana, é silencioso, espaçoso e muito (Website hidden by Airbnb) a kitchenette, o ar condicionado e a tv flat é como ser mesmo um Carioca mais no Rio. Super recomedável.

Our experience with Diogo was awesome! His comunication was awesome and he went above and beyond for us on this trip. 

The apartment was exactly how it looks in the picture and the location is even better! I would reccommend anyone travelling to Copacabana to check this place out!!

Good value for money (although we paid the World Cup premium on rent). The location couldn't be beat. It was right off of Copa Cabana beach. We were there during World Cup which meant it was a bit noisy but that was expected. We were able to walk to all the Fan Fest activities on the beach within a few minutes. There were grocery stores and restaurants close by. We didn't make much use of the kitchen but it is stocked with the basics if you want to eat in. The bed was comfortable but the sofa (which turns into a bed in the living room) was not ideal to sleep on. The shower was hard to figure out and water turned cold over and over again which would require you to turn the hot water on and off again to relight the flame in the portable water heater. The building was secure with a doorman 24 hours.
Great location, great apartment. Fit the needs of 3 guys perfectly. Diogo provided an extra mattress for the 3rd person. Already missing the neighborhood.

Acredito que o apartamento precisa de alguns ajustes como: o ar condicionado, que tem um problema com a mangueira e o outro também não funciona; aumentar a quantidade de copos e xícaras; arrumar a cafeteira que não funciona; e também não disponibilizar aos futuros hóspedes o sofá como uma cama, porque é simplesmente impossível dormir minimamente confortável lá.
Se forem feitos estes ajustes, o apartamento ficará perfeito!!

Nossa experiência foi ótima, o apartamento é exatamente como demonstrado nas fotos e as coisas mais importantes do apartamento foi a localização e o ar condicionado. Gostamos muito da receptividade e tudo que a gente precisou o Diogo nos atendeu! Além de tudo, o apartamento fica em uma rua bem movimentada e é muito seguro de chegar em qualquer hora da noite! Recomendadíssimo! Vamos voltar assim que pudermos!

Bom dia, gostaria de partilhar com todos a nossa satisfação quanto a nossa aquisição neste apartamento, o anfitrião Diogo muito atencioso juntamente com seu parceiro Gilmário, nossas espectativas foi satisfatória e tudo que haviamos deixado acertado foi cumprido pontualmente, o apartamento oferece tudo que é necesário e  no meu ponto de vista fica em um dos melhores lugares de copacabana. 
Pra finalizar eu recomendo.
Att: Simone
Tudo correto, o apartamento é como descrito nas fotos, o Gilmar nos recebeu super bem! Obrigado Diogo
Adoramos o apartamento. Exatamente como nas fotos. Localização excelente, muito perto da praia. Diogo muito atencioso e prestativo. Recomendo!
Muy buen lugar. Excelente ubicación. El departamento tiene todo lo que necesitamos. No nos faltó nada.
O apartamento estava impecável e até melhor que nas fotos. Segunda vez que nos hospedamos em um apartamento do Diogo e novamente ficamos feliz pela ótima recepção. Recomendo!

Adoramos nos hospedar no apartamento, conforme previmos no site, ótima localização e de fácil locomoção para os outros bairros, perto de supermercado, farmácia, bancos e restaurantes, tivemos uma ótima recepção e agradecemos a disponibilidade de ficar mais algumas horas no apartamento já que nosso voo era no final da tarde. Numa próxima oportunidade com certeza retornarei a me hospedar neste apartamento.

Nous n'avons pas vu Diogo à notre arrivée car nous sommes arrivés à 20h30 au lieu de 19h00, mais le gardien était au courant de notre arrivée. Diogo a été disponible tout le long de notre séjour par téléphone. Le quartier était très animé, et la résidence sécurisée.

O apartamento estava todo organizado, limpinho, tinha tudo que precisamos. Ótima localização, no posto 5, juntinho da praia e da nossa senhora de Copacabana, embaixo do apartamento tem um bar incrível, com rodas de choro, samba e bossa nova. Contudo não atrapalha no silêncio do apartamento. 
Diogo e gustavo nos recebeu muito bem, muito solícitos!!
Voltaremos a nos hospedar lá, sem dúvidas!!

Apartamento em ótima localização em Copacabana, há apenas 1 quadra da praia (posto 5) , perto de supermercado, farmácias, restaurante e agências de turismo. 
Ou seja, tudo que você precisar estará ao seu alcance !
O apartamento é bem amplo com ar condicionado na sala e quarto o que ajuda muito porque o RJ tem um clima quente ! Acomoda bem 4 pessoas , se forem em 5 também da mas já fica mais apertadinho ! 
Apenas não tem máquina de lavar roupa , porém tem uma lavanderia na esquina do prédio ! 
Tivemos uma ótima experiência no carnaval com os bloquinhos passando perto do apartamento, dando para ir a pé; e para os bloquinhos que aconteciam mais longe , a estação de metrô (que está incrível , estilo gringo ) fica a poucas quadras!
Desde já agradeço ao Diego por sua atenção e comprometimento conosco. O apartamento é ótimo, bem localizado não tivemos nenhum problema. Parabéns Diego.
Appartamento perfetto con ottima posizione! Gentilissimo e super disponibile il ragazzo della casa! Consigliato al 100%
Minha estadia estava perfeita, tudo conforme combinado. Obrigado Diogo.
Adoramos nossa estádia. O apto estava bem limpo. Anfitrião muito simpático e atencioso. Fica perto de tudo e de transportes para qualquer lugar.
Apartamento com boa localização, confortável, limpo, fácil comunicação com a equipe do rio habitat. Voltaria a me hospedar outras vezes.
Excelente estada. Localização perfeita. Anfitrião atencioso. Espaço melhor do que esperado. Recomendo e pretendo voltar em breve!
Apartamento melhor que aparenta nas fotos, super recomendo e com certeza voltarei outras vezes!! Atravessou a rua estamos na praia, próximo a mercado, bancos, lotérica!!

name: Whole apartment,w/balconies. Close to airport
summary: My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travellers.
space: Lovely  spacious apartment with balconies at both ends. 2 single beds (beds can be pushed together) Shower/bath  Laundry facility  Flat screen tv  with kodi box
description: My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travellers. Lovely  spacious apartment with balconies at both ends. 2 single beds (beds can be pushed together) Shower/bath  Laundry facility  Flat screen tv  with kodi box Access to a private pool/ jacuzzi for residents only Zetland has plenty to offer and it’s very convenient.  •5-10 minutes  max walk to train station.  •2 supermarkets within 5-10 minutes walk along with EAST VILLAGE shopping centre that caters for most of your needs.  •Plenty of cafes ,restaurants ,bars  and takeaways within 5-15 minutes walk.  •plenty of BBQ areas  •3 gyms.  Personally,Me and my partner love the vibe here and have no plans of moving. Green square train station  is the airport line which is a  30minute commute from the apartment to the airport.  The iconic Sydney opera house and harbour bridge is a 25 minute commute from the apartment taking  only one train. Coogee beach is a 12-15 minute uber ride  costing around $18 or your cheaper optio
neighborhood_overview: Zetland has plenty to offer and it’s very convenient.  •5-10 minutes  max walk to train station.  •2 supermarkets within 5-10 minutes walk along with EAST VILLAGE shopping centre that caters for most of your needs.  •Plenty of cafes ,restaurants ,bars  and takeaways within 5-15 minutes walk.  •plenty of BBQ areas  •3 gyms.  Personally,Me and my partner love the vibe here and have no plans of moving.
transit: Green square train station  is the airport line which is a  30minute commute from the apartment to the airport.  The iconic Sydney opera house and harbour bridge is a 25 minute commute from the apartment taking  only one train. Coogee beach is a 12-15 minute uber ride  costing around $18 or your cheaper option would be to catch one bus taking around 30mins.  It’s roughly the same to Bondi beach except public transport takes a little longer.
access: Access to a private pool/ jacuzzi for residents only
house_rules: - Smoking on balconies only!!  - Must respect neighbors - we ask guests to be cautious and clean spillages that may occur as we have  carpet fitted through out apartment. - apartment left relatively clean on departure.

host.host_about:
Hi, my names Keith and I’m 33 yrs old. Myself and my fiancée,Danielle are from the UK and we’ve lived in Sydney for 3 and a half years. 
I work in construction and Danielle works in insurance. 

We absolutely love to travel and want to see as much as we can before we settle down.

reviews.comments: The host canceled this reservation 56 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Keith was a great host. Everything was well organised. My parents had a lovely stay. It's definitely a place that I will recommend to anyone who wants to stay somewhere quiet, convenient and very comfy.

name: Sunny Born with Balcony
summary: Mi alojamiento es bueno para parejas, aventureros, viajeros de negocios, y familias (con hijos).
description: Mi alojamiento es bueno para parejas, aventureros, viajeros de negocios, y familias (con hijos).

host.host_about: La mejor opción en Barcelona! Me gusta que los visitantes tengan la mejor experiéncia durante sus vacaciones en mi ciudad.

address.government_area: Sant Pere, Santa Caterina i la Ribera

reviews.comments: I really enjoyed my time there. El Born is definitely one of the most attractive parts of Barcelona, eventhough it smells a bit sometimes. The apartment has been gorgeous. It was like living in a IKEA example. Everything you need is available in the kitchen, internet is fast and you can reach nearly everything in Barcelona easily by foot or metro. Visitors haven't been any problem for the host, which i really appreciated.

While small, this apartment was perfect for 2 people + 2 little doggies for a month while we looked for our permanent apartment. The location is great, one of the quieter main streets in el Born, but with plenty of places around to eat and drink.  This was a great place to stay to get a taste of barrio style life.  Kitchen had everything we needed for preparing meals. 

3rd floor with stairs was a little painful for groceries and luggage, but manageable.  Heating/aircon stopped working, but Emelia provided another heater for us to keep the place warm in winter. A little noisy at night from tourists.

name: One Bedroom In New Luxury Building
summary: One bedroom apartment, in a brand new building in Brooklyn. We have a few roof decks - to lounge or BBQ, a gym and a kids play room. We are a quick train into the city and surrounded by fabulous restaurants and activities. An easy walk / train to Prospect Park and Brooklyn Bridge Park as well.
space: We are the first tenants in a brand new building. We have AC/heat control, great pressure in the shower and are in a great location.

We are a quick train into the city and surrounded by fabulous restaurants and activities. An easy walk / train to Prospect Park and Brooklyn Bridge Park as well. We are the first tenants in a brand new building. We have AC/heat control, great pressure in the shower and are in a great location. Apartment (included laundry) We love Gowanus! It is an easy ride into the city and an easy walk to many bars, restaurants, music venues, activities, and parks. Close to the F,G and R trains. A short car into the city as well.

reviews.comments: The host canceled this reservation 43 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Really loved this place.  In an incredible location, close to the subway and delicious places to eat.  Sam was extremely communicative and I would absolutely recommend this place to anyone traveling to Brooklyn.
Great place! Convenient, clean, and pretty.

name: Large 2 Bedroom Apartment close to Bondi Beach
summary: This apartment on the border on Bondi and Dover Heights is only a quick walk from all Bondi has to offer. The apartment itself is a large, light and airy apartment, with amazing city views. Open plan living flowing on to a balcony with outside table and bbq. The apartment comes with Pay TV, super fast wifi and is great for couples or young families, located in a secure building and close to Public Transport.
description: This apartment on the border on Bondi and Dover Heights is only a quick walk from all Bondi has to offer. The apartment itself is a large, light and airy apartment, with amazing city views. Open plan living flowing on to a balcony with outside table and bbq. The apartment comes with Pay TV, super fast wifi and is great for couples or young families, located in a secure building and close to Public Transport.
house_rules: No Parties

reviews.comments: Fantastic apartment! Great location, 5 minute walk to Bondi Beach, no hesitation in recommending this place to stay! Really nice modern feel to the apartment as well, felt right at home! Top it off with great views looking across Sydney from the Balcony! We'll be back for sure :)

Perfect place for a small group. The house was very comfortable and the balcony was awesome for sunsets - you can see the Opera House and Harbour bridge. You can walk to Bondi beach in 15 and about 20-25 minutes to the heart of area on Hall Street; the walk back is uphill! Communication was great and made for an easy check-in and check-out process.

name: Private Room in Brooklyn Brownstone
summary: My place is in the heart of Bedford Stuyvesant, a beautiful and diverse residential neighborhood in Brooklyn. Close to many bars and restaurants, and nearby other great neighborhoods, including Clinton Hill and Fort Greene. Blocks away from the Kingston-Throop C stop. 20 minutes to Manhattan.
space: You would be staying in the largest and brightest room in a three-unit cozy apartment. A full size bed sits next to three large windows, with a fire escape. The apartment is on the top floor of a corner brownstone on a tree-lined block, with a lovely stoop and incredible light. You will have access to the fully equipped kitchen. The apartment has a dining room table, accommodating four, and a small sitting area. Each room has it's own heat & AC unit.
description: My place is in the heart of Bedford Stuyvesant, a beautiful and diverse residential neighborhood in Brooklyn. Close to many bars and restaurants, and nearby other great neighborhoods, including Clinton Hill and Fort Greene. Blocks away from the Kingston-Throop C stop. 20 minutes to Manhattan. You would be staying in the largest and brightest room in a three-unit cozy apartment. A full size bed sits next to three large windows, with a fire escape. The apartment is on the top floor of a corner brownstone on a tree-lined block, with a lovely stoop and incredible light. You will have access to the fully equipped kitchen. The apartment has a dining room table, accommodating four, and a small sitting area. Each room has it's own heat & AC unit. You will have access to everything in the apartment. You can reach me by email or message with any question or concerns. I live with two wonderful and thoughtful roommates, who can answer any basic questions you may have about the apartment and neighb
neighborhood_overview: BedStuy is a fabulous neighborhood with so much to offer and is perfectly located to get to other great parts of Brooklyn and Manhattan. It's a quick train or bus ride to Fort Greene Park, Brooklyn Academy of Music (where you can see theatre, dance, music, and films), and the Barclay Center. You can also easily get to downtown Brooklyn and Dumbo. There are great restaurants and bars just a few blocks away from the apartment. Try Peaches and Saraghina Bakery & Restaurant for a delicious brunch or dinner. There are tons of coffee shops in the neighborhood, such as Anchor Coffee and Bohaus, where you can sit outside with a fresh pastry and coffee. Bar Lunatico is just around the corner if you're in the mood for live music and great cocktails, or Lovers Rock for a night of dancing.  The apartment is also just a 20 minute walk to Franklin avenue, where there are even more restaurants and bars.
transit: The apartment is a 5 minute walk to the C at Kingston-Throop Avenues and a 10 minute walk to the A/C at Utica Avenue.
access: You will have access to everything in the apartment.
interaction: You can reach me by email or message with any question or concerns. I live with two wonderful and thoughtful roommates, who can answer any basic questions you may have about the apartment and neighborhood.

We really enjoyed staing a Hallies place and recommend it!

name: Loft with balcony and view of Casa da Música PORTO
summary: New apartment, modern space, very nice and completely renovated overlooking the "Casa da Música".  Ready for 2 or 4 people! Towels and bed linen included. Lift, fitted kitchen, balcony, cable tv. Free Wi-fi, private parking, 5 minutes from the metro and 8 minutes from the city center via metro.  Special prices for our clients:  - Tourist bus  - Cruise tour  - Experience caves Porto.
space: The apartment is located in Boavista, downtown Porto, in front of Casa da Música. In the immediate vicinity you will find supermarkets, the new market "Bom Sucesso" and Shopping Porto, with services, shops and restaurants.  5 minutes from metro station "Casa da Música". 8 minutes from the city center by metro.
description: New apartment, modern space, very nice and completely renovated overlooking the "Casa da Música".  Ready for 2 or 4 people! Towels and bed linen included. Lift, fitted kitchen, balcony, cable tv. Free Wi-fi, private parking, 5 minutes from the metro and 8 minutes from the city center via metro.  Special prices for our clients:  - Tourist bus  - Cruise tour  - Experience caves Porto. The apartment is located in Boavista, downtown Porto, in front of Casa da Música. Car: - Private parking is available for 5€/day (paid on the check in) with direct access to the building. Subway:   - If you come by metro, the exit station is "Casa da Música", 5 minutes walk from the apartment. -   8 minutes from the city center via metro. Special prices for our guests: - Tourist bu
neighborhood_overview: By Lonely Planet: - The longest avenue in the city runs through Boavista, where Porto takes a giant leap into the 21st century, with rooftop bars, urban hotels and landmarks designed by the Pritzker Prize duo Álvaro Siza Vieira and Eduardo Souto de Moura. - "Rotunda Da Boavista", also known as "Mouzinho de Albuquerque Square", is a large roundabout in Oporto, Portugal. He honors Joaquim Augusto Mouzinho de Albuquerque, a Portuguese soldier who fought in Africa during the 19th century. - Casa da Música is a large concert space in Porto, Portugal, home to the cultural institution of the same name, with its three Orquestra Nacional do Porto, Baroque Orchestra and Remix Ensemble. Claimed as the European Capital of Culture in 2001, it was only completed in 2005. Soon it became an icon in the city. With a 1,300-seat auditorium covered in natural light, it is the only concert hall in the world with two walls made entirely of glass.
notes: Check in from 4:00 p.m. to 9:00 p.m. Check-in after 21:00 is priced at 10 € Before you check out, make sure that the front door of the building is open.
transit: - Estação de Metro "Casa da Música" 5min a pé.  - Há uma paragem de autocarro perto do apartamento.   Temos preços especiais para os nossos clientes:  - Passeios de Cruzeiro  - Visitas às Caves do Porto  Por favor, pergunte por mensagem ou no check-in.
access: Car: - Private parking is available for 5€/day (paid on the check in) with direct access to the building. Subway:   - If you come by metro, the exit station is "Casa da Música", 5 minutes walk from the apartment. -   8 minutes from the city center via metro. Special prices for our guests: - Tourist bus (Hop-on / Hop-off) - Bus stop in front of the apartment. - Cruise Tours - Experience in the Porto cellars Please ask for message or check-in.
interaction: I am always available for any question you need!
house_rules: Tem varanda , pode fumar no exterior do apartamento .

host.host_about:
Je suis de Porto , j'ai fait mes études en France ( Normandie ), j'ai travaillé aux îles Canaries, j'ai une experience des voyages que  j'adore , j aime recevoir et faire découvrir ma ville , très belle , propre et sécurisé .
Porto est une ville très agréable et accueillante , les rues commerçantes, ses plages et son fleuve Rio Douro , ainsi que ses fameux vins de Porto et la trés bonne nourriture typique.
Bien sûr à ne pas oublier son climat très ensoleillé.
Ville à découvrir !
A très vite , je vois donnerais la maximum d infos que vous souhaiterais .
À bientôt “ je vous attend “

reviews.comments: Ha sido una estancia estupenda, el apartamento es genial.

Logement magnifique, face à la Casa Da Musica. Nous avons pu profiter de 2 concerts sur la terrasse!!! Le logement est magnifique, très propre. Très facile à trouver. Idéal pour 2 personnes. Très proche du métro. Taxi à proximité. Au top
Everything was good . Perfect flat just in the cities center.

Logement neuf, nous semblions être les premiers à avoir logé ici! Tout est conforme aux photos, le loft est agréable à vivre, le lit double extra. Le quartier est calme, loin du tumulte. Donc de fait, pas vraiment à proximité des quartiers "vivants" de Porto... Mais comme le métro est au pied de l'appartement, ça ne pose pas de problèmes. Bref nous y avons passé un bon séjour. 
Maxime.

Logement super propre, très bien équipé. Si vous venez en voiture, il y a un parking privé. Tous les moyens de transport en commun sont à quelques mètres. 
La situation de l'appartement permet de prendre l'air par rapport à l'agitation du centre ville. 
Nous avons été très bien accueillies.

Parfait pour un séjour à Porto ! Bien desservi métro, bus ou axes routiers pour bouger. Quartier proposant restos, commerces et concerts de musique. Avenue du logement amenant à une Plage. Le loft est très propre et spacieux nous avons beaucoup apprécié !

Acabamos de pasar 4 días geniales en Oporto. Hemos estado dos adultos con dos niños y la experiencia en el alojamiento de Alexandre ha sido perfecta. Loft moderno y limpio. Situado en zona moderna y bien comunicado por metro y bus. A 20 minutos andando del centro. El parking privado se agradece.
Muy cerca de la preciosa playa de  Matosinhos. La ciudad preciosa.

Loft excelente, localizado numa região do Porto que particularmente me agrada muito, muito bem servida de transportes públicos, restaurantes, centros comerciais, a dois minutos do mercado do bom sucesso. Boavista é um charme, perto da baixa e pontos turísticos, mas ao mesmo tempo a salvo da confusão. Quanto ao espaço do Alexandre, maravilhoso!  Muito bem decorado, tudo cheira a novo, o apartamento tem todo o conforto que é preciso para uma otima estadia, a limpeza, tanto do espaço quanto das roupas de cama e banho, os utensílios de cozinha, impecavelmente dispostos nos armários, cápsulas de café e sachês de chá como cortesia, os lençóis da cama muito bem alinhados, diga se de passagem, nem em algumas redes hoteleiras de 5* que conheço encontrei tantos cuidados com os detalhes. O ar condicionado quente/frio mantém o clima adequado do lugar. Para quem leva o carro,  a facilidade do estacionamento privativo por detrás do prédio é mais um ponto positivo a ser posto, já que na região há uma concorrência grande por vagas e o local é em sua maior parte parqueado, enfim, não tenho pontos negativos a colocar. Fui  gentilmente recebida pela simpática e sorridente Patrícia, no horário combinado, sem atraso e sem surpresas desagradáveis. Acredito que se todos os hóspedes cuidarem dos espaços em que se hóspedam, seja esse o mais simples, ou o mais luxuoso, todos poderão desfrutar de um lugar agradável e confortável para uma bela estadia. Super recomendo!
Nice comfortable room opposite the Casa da Música. The Metro is nearby and easy to get into the centre.

El apartamento es como sale en las fotos. Limpio, ordenado, con todo lo necesario para pasar unos días como si estuvieses en tu casa. Nos atendió Patricia, muy amable y simpática. La ubicación muy buena. Aconsejable 100%.
El apartamento es muy comodo y Limpio.Buena ubicacion,aunque no esta en el central turistico. El barrio es muy agradable cerca de centros commercials y restaurantes.
Clean apartment, nice host and good communication.

The apartment was very nice : super clean, very well decorated and a huge shower. The metro station Casa da Musica and a supermarket are at walking distance. Casa Agricolo, also walking distance, is a very good restaurant. A private parking at the back is available. Patricia was very easy to reach. Enjoy Porto !

Beautifully renovated loft, very clean and located in an authentic neighborhood. Shops, supermarket and Metro station nearby. I have stayed twice at Alexandre's place in this location and I shall be back!
Excelente!!!

We had a very wonderful time in this beautiful loft apartment. It was so comfortable and it felt so good to be in a beautiful and stylish place. The location is very good, too, and the apartment was spotless and the WiFi is very fast. Definitely a five star experience! The Al Porto Italian restaurant is just down the street, very delicious food and good prices, friendly and fast service. There are grocery stores nearby, the metro is about a 5 minute walk, and there is also a nice mall within walking distance.

Beautiful, cozy and extremely well located place! Alexandre's loft is complete, renovated, clean and its sweet Portuguese-style balcony offers the best view possible to Casa da Música! I recommend it for both long and short stays  - staying here feels even better than being at home! :)
Totally recommend! Beautiful and clean - great stay both for tourism or professional trips.

Great host and great place. I stayed in Alexandre’s loft for the past 5 months and  loved everything about that space: decoration, clealiness, location, comfort and specially the amazing balcony with a special view to Casa da Musica. Hope to go back to Porto and repeat this stay! Definitely felt like being at home - or even better! What made a total difference to guarantee a great time in a new city :)

This was a great flat with everything you need close to hand. Lovely cafe on corner of street and really fab indoor cool eating and drinking venue with lots of choice. Beautiful shopping centre if you want high end clothes and easy spot to get to Porto downtown or centre by metro or bus or taxi

I've stayed at Alexandre's place for 5 months before and now for another 3 weeks. It was great to be back - extremely clean, beautiful and cozy place, will miss it! The high windows with a balcony facing Casa da Musica is simply amazing and rare to find. Alexandre is very gentle  and will guarantee you'll  have a great time in Porto.

We had a wonderful stay, the check as quick and hassle free, the apartment is lovely and clean with all the basics ameneties we needed and the location was extremely comfortable for getting around, a plus was the view to casa de musica just across the street. A truly wonderful stay (:

Great location close to the metro, clean apartment and good communication with the owner. Some days there were concerts outside Casa de Música, so we could just open the balcony doors and enjoy the music. Cheers!

Mooi stijlvol appartement, kraaknet, goede voorzieningen, wel jammer dat er geen wasautomaat aanwezig was ...
Prachtige locatie, zeker als je van muziek houdt. Elke vrijdag- en zaterdagavond worden er kleine life sessies gehouden tegenover het appartement. Top!

Very good location if you want to visit Porto with all points of interests - good connections with metro/bus. Especially interesting if you are looking for concerts - you have concert hall on the other side of the street. You can reach nice sandy beaches very easily with a bus or metro/tube. Appartment itself is very convenient, good furnished. You can always count on prompt help/info from owner so you can feel like at home.

We loved this apartment! We were 4 people and stayed there for one week. It worked out great with one bed and one sleep sofa. The whole apartment was clean and stylish. Especially the shower was awesome! Its close to the metro station casa da musica from which it takes 3 stops to the city centre. With Uber or Bus you're at the beach in approximatly 15 mins. The only thing we didnt find that good was the big street right next to the apartment. But if youre not bothered by traffic noise than you'll be perfectly fine!
We stayed for a week and everything was perfect. Very quick responds from the hosts if anything needed. We could even check out later on the last day, since there was no new guest arriving. Thank you

We thought the apartment was really well located next to Cafe de Musica and it was fairly simple to use the bus and metro system and also to walk!! We visited the historic areas as well as the waterfront and also Serralves (to see the gallery and the pink villa) and the beach at Matsinhos. Walking to the Jardin de palacios cristal (spelling?) was wonderful as it was not far and the gallery had an interesting exhibit and we liked the building’s design. Visiting the Lello bookstore and the landscape building near it were also great. The spaciousness and clean modern design of the apartment and the casa de musica plaza was a welcome contrast to the small medieval streets....very pleased with this selection and I will admit the thoughtfulness of providing some coffee etc was really lovely! Thanks again!

A wonderful apartment, located very well in the city. Extremely stylish, great balcony and felt at home from the moment we touched down. 

The check in was easy and we were greeted warmly.

I wouldn't hesitate to recommend this apartment to anyone staying in Porto
Very good location and very neat place. Was just not perfect as the AC (heating) was not working and it took a couple of days to get a temporary solution (heater).
apto muito bem localizado com uma ótima vista da casa da música! patricia foi muito simpática na recepção!

name: SLEEP TO THE SOUNDS OF THE OCEAN
summary: SPECTACULAR SWEEPING PANORAMAS OF THE PACIFIC OCEAN. (THE REVIEWS CONFIRM EVERYTHING)THE PRIVATE BEDROOM AND PRIVATE BATHROOM LOCATED ON THE FIRST FLOOR OF THIS 4 STORY HOME. YOU WILL HAVE ACCESS TO THE ENTIRE FIRST FLOOR. A LIVING ROOM AND DINING AREA-WET BAR KITCHENETTE COMPLETE WITH A KITCHEN SINK and MINI REFRIGERATOR-MICROWAVE. YOU ALSO HAVE ACCESS TO THE SWIMMING POOL.
space: Over  2000 square feet of living space for your total comfort.  Theres the private marbled floor bedroom with balcony and private marbled walled bathroom--please note **this is NOT an ensuite thus your private bathroom is located down the stairs next to swimming pool. It is a large marbled walled bathroom.  You also have a living room and dining area with a mini-kitchen/wet bar.  There's also a swimming pool for you to use.  There is another airbnb room on this floor that may b occupied. Complete total privacy is getting 2 rooms and then you can easily have 4 to 6 people.  The 2 bedrooms and the living room all have a balcony. The swimming  pool is on the edge of the mountain. See the attached pictures. Remember to stay in your space as the other parts of the home is for someone else. **DO NOT TAKE PICTURES  OF OTHER HOMES IN THE COMMUNITY***
