YOU WILL HAVE ACCESS TO THE ENTIRE FIRST FLOOR. A LIVING ROOM AND DINING AREA-WET BAR KITCHENETTE COMPLETE WITH A KITCHEN SINK and MINI REFRIGERATOR-MICROWAVE. YOU ALSO HAVE ACCESS TO THE SWIMMING POOL. Over  2000 square feet of living space for your total comfort.  Theres the private marbled floor bedroom with balcony and private marbled walled bathroom--please note **this is NOT an ensuite thus your private bathroom is located down the stairs next to swimming pool. It is a large marbled walled bathroom.  You also have a living room and dining area with a mini-kitchen/wet bar.  There's also a swimming pool for you to use.  There is another airbnb room on this floor that may b occupied. Complete total privacy is getting 2 rooms and then you can easily have 4 to 6 people.  The 2 bedrooms and the living room all hav
neighborhood_overview: It's a quiet, private and a safe neighborhood. Please refrain from taking pictures of other homes as residents who live here want privacy. Keep in mind it's not a public neighborhood where you can walk around or go jogging. Residents who live here do so for privacy and we need to respect there privacy. It is the safest and most secured neighborhood/community in the state of Hawaii.
notes: Home is located in the safest neighborhood in the islands.   There are 3 shopping centers located  near by.  1- aina haina shopping center -10 minute drive. Starbucks-CVS drug store-Foodland-and a few eateries/fast foods 2-Kahala mall- 5-minute drive-Whole Foods - Macy's - CVS- theaters  3- Hawaii Kai Town Center -10 to 12 minute drive. Safeway -costco's -theaters-ROYS restaurant. Much more.
transit: Renting a car is the most convenient and easiest way to getting around the island of Oahu.
access: First floor and the pool area.  MAIN FLOOR AND TOP FLOORS are not accessible. The first floor and pool area is about 2000 sq feet. Living room -(shared if the other room is occupied) It's large and  comfortable. You will be amazed at the view from EVERY ROOM. Laundry service is provided when you stay 3 days or more-WILL (the Host) will explain-ask him when you check in
interaction: I'm available 24/7-I answer all my text msg.
house_rules: ***WHEN COMING ON PROPERTY-(IN THE DRIVEWAY) PLEASE REFRAIN FROM MAKING LOUD NOISES AND TAKING PICTURES--you'll be able to take all the pictures you want when you are on the 1st floor---be respectful of the neighbors (people living next door) and other Airbnb guests --when exiting  vehicle gather your things and proceed to your first floor space---remember NO footwear in the home. All Floors are cleaned daily. There might be other airbnb guest so let's be respectful of there spaces.  Swimming is at your own risk. There is no life guard on duty. Swimming hours are 7am till 7pm daily. There always exceptions. You can use the lounge chairs that are located in the living room-when done please return to the living room where you got them from. The white bath towels are for bathroom use only. The pool towels are located next to the lounge chairs. Please do not take the white towels off the property.  No smoking allowed in the house. Smoking allowed outside by the swimming pool area. Be consi

reviews.comments: Will was a fantastic host and went out of his way to make sure I got settled in.  I've never felt so comfortable! His home is beautiful and the views will take your breath away!! I would definitely stay here again and you can't beat the price.
very nice place to stay and friendly host. worth every penny; great ocean view
Awesome location and awesome house. Will was a great host. Would recommend to anyone and would stay again!

Will's place is truly spectacular, We had the time of our lives. 
Will is very courteous, from day one, from the minute you check in till you leave he takes care of every minute detail. The place is spotlessly clean, the quality of the bed and pillow and the extra extra clean bedsheets and comforter and towels needs a special mention. 
The bathrooms are very clean,
Will was very nice to supply us with basic toiletries, we didn't have to go shopping for those items.

Now comes the spectacular views from the balcony's bedrooms and bathrooms and even from your bed which cannot be described, it has to be experienced. We will never get over the almost 270 degree view  of mountains and blue Pacific Ocean and blue skies. Watching the breathtaking sunrise from the balcony was a treat everyday.
It's located at the best spot on the island with easy access to beautiful beaches and the city.

It's a neat and clean and super safe place with a wonderful host .
It has all the ingredients for a perfect holiday!!!!!!
Great location, great hosts, always willing to make your stay more enjoyable.

This place was absolutely amazing! Will was extremely helpful and very welcoming. The view was like something out of a movie. Everything was extremely clean and tidy, and I felt very welcomed. The entire experience was amazing, and Will can easily charge 2x more than what it's listed for. Phenomenal experience!

Excellent location and good price. It's located in a safe, quiet and peaceful gated community with a fantastic view and a relaxing sea breeze. Location provides convenient access to the highway. The rooms are clean and well kept. Will is a kind, trustworthy and responsive host.  I recommend this place to couples, especially if staying at least one week or more.

There are two rooms so another guest might be present. You do not have to share a bathroom. If staying here, you should rent a car. Parking can be tight.

Amazing views! Very clean from the moment you enter the property. Will is such a humble and kind person. We are so glad we booked his place for our last days on our honeymoon! Everything is about a 5-10 minute drive. A must to book when you are in Honolulu.

As many other guests have described before me, the place was spotlessly clean and the views were out-of-this-world.  Will was such a gracious host with a kind heart who attended to our every need - super responsive and accommodating.  The neighborhood was quiet and peaceful - all of us felt very safe staying here. Centrally located to just about everything, very, very convenient!  Would definitely stay here again - highly recommended!
Will provides a lovely clean home with spectacular views . Great for couples or a single get away.

Will and his wife are awesome hosts, super kind and caring to their guests! His home is immaculate and the view is breathtaking. We rented the whole first floor for a couple days and my favorite thing was waking up each morning to the ocean breeze, birds chirping, and gentle sunlight! That's no joke!! This AirBnb is definitely worth it and I highly suggest it. Thank you again Will for your hospitality! We enjoyed every moment of our stay, take care!!
Wonderful haven. We were pleasantly surprised with Will's open home and heart. Clean, welcoming and convenient home. Thank you Will!

Will was a terrific host; accommodating, kind and responsive. The facilities were fully stocked and the bedding/towels were changed daily. As someone that grew up a stones throw from this house, I can attest to its breathtaking view and secluded comfort.

The only downside of my experience was that I was traveling for business and didn't get to spend enough time there!  Will is an absolutely amazing host and human being who goes above and beyond to meet and exceed needs that I didn't even know I had!  All of the other reviews are on point, so in addition to echoing their platitudes, I thought I'd mention a few things that I don't recall see being mentioned.  1. it's such a nice place to be, it hurts to leave each day ;)  2. There's a beautiful and very challenging ridge hiking trail just up the road that is worth every bit of effort you put into it... one of my favorite parts of the trip! 
Thanks, Will!

Everything about this stay was top-drawer.  From the amazing views from his condo, to how much care Will extends to his guests.  There were snacks on hand, coffee, bottled water, fresh towels and sheets, and friendship.  Everything was immaculate, and Will was willing to meet any need that popped up, including receiving a hula hoop I had sent there, and helping me pack it to carry back on the plane.  Let him know what you need and like a genie, he will make it appear.  The pool was refreshing. The condo is a great place to hang out when you've had enough beach and traffic. I would stay there again in a heartbeat.  Thank you, Will!

Where to begin, everything about our stay was absolutely amazing. From the view to the gracious hosts, anytime we needed anything Will was more than happy to help us out. When we return to Oahu, we definitely know the first place we will try to stay.
We loved Will and the view! Very accommodating and kind.
Amazing view and I had everything I needed, including water, breakfast snacks, shower items. Great location and loved going to bed with the doors open and listening to nature.
Will's place is simply amazing with truly spectacular views.  Wonderful to wake up in the morning to island breeze and birds singing.  Will and his wife are gracious hosts.  I strongly recommend!
The host canceled this reservation 149 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Will has been very accommodating and easy to work with. His responses are quick. He provides a snack bar and daily fresh towels! My stay has exceeded all my expectations. Location is an extremely safe  residential area. Close to shopping centers, hikes, beaches, and Costco!   The room comes with a ocean view that is breathtaking. Really can't find a better deal elsewhere! If I'm back on the island, I'm definitely coming back to him!

The wonderful view and location to hiking and snorkeling are fantastic!!
Thank you Will for a wonderful stay and making me feel so welcome.
Most excellent.. will stay again!!!

Aloha
 It was important to me to experience Hawai'i away from tourist, noise, traffic but still be a few minutes away from the touristy area and this location was a true gem. The area is quiet and kinda like Beverly hills of Hawaii. The room had the most beautiful view with a balcony Great for capturing the beautiful sun rise and looking out to an endless ocean. The room was a great size for two people. Clean towels daily and "a bonus" snacks for our pleasure in the communal living space (a separation from the main house but living room shared with other guest). The pool overlooked the ocean. Will, was such a great host and offered a true "at home experience" they even provided toiletries for guest who possibly forgot body wash or shampoo. Parking was not permitted in this community but that was not a problem the host offered rides up and down the hill at any hour and only took 5 minutes. If you are looking for a nice clean room, with a beautiful view, and a great host I recommend booking this location. Will is not only a host but now a friend and I know I will definitely be back. I  hope Will would be gracious enough to host me again. Mahalo
Amazing place. Outstanding view
I'll always remember the beautiful views.  Will was a very accommodating host.

This is true paradise. Will's place is immaculately clean, has comfortable beds and a view that will take your breath away. It is a gated community so you will be shuttled in and out but Will is very accomodating to your departure and arrival needs each and every day of your stay. If you want to know the true spirit of Aloha you should stay here. Will has provided an oasis for people to stay that is much better than any hotel in Waikiki and we will be back again and again.
The place is clean, quiet and safe. Highlight is the view that is absolutely breath taking!
This is the best host ever!! Very considerate and caring, I felt like I'm at home and never wanna leave the place! The view from the house is spectacular, a must stay in Hawaii!

Will is a very attentive host! He fulfilled our wishes almost before we could tell him. The room is very clean and the view from our room and balcony was more then amazing! The place is in a secure area and is closed with a gate. That’s why you can’t get there with your own car. Will offers a 24 hours shuttle and it was incredible how fast he came to pick us up!
Thank you very much!

Loved this place as its far from the hustle and bustle of waikiki and close to hananuma bay. Will is an exceptional host and went above and beyond all reasonable expectations of hospitality. This is the spot to rent if you want a view, peace and quiet, and dont mind putting in a bit more effort for transportation as most pick up and drop off points are located in waikiki. Overall I was very happy with my decision and meeting Will was a pleasure.

Will is a awesome host. We have a great time living in Will's house. Will is friendly and easy to communicate. We had our own bathroom and snacks he provided everyday. Most importantly, we had the best view in town from Will's house. If we come back, we will definitely choose Will's again!

Will was a really great host, he responds to our messages really fast and gave great tips for where to eat and go see on the island. We will definitely stay at Will place again when we come back for a visit. We highly recommend Will place if you looking for a great view and place to stay. Thank you again Will for making us feel welcome and comfortable. You make our honeymoon a very great trip!!!

Considering the numerous number of amazing privileges that staying at this Airbnb comes with, being on the receiving end of Will's hospitality was by far the best. He truly embraced the phrase "make yourself at home", by going and beyond to ensure our stay was pleasant and flawless. Strong, immediate and straightforward communication at all times meant pick-ups, drop-offs and requests were fulfilled promptly. The entire host-guest interaction was friendly and non-intrusive.
The bedroom, bathroom, kitchenette, lounge and dining areas were consistently kept clean and perfectly maintained, with daily maid service. This included an unheard of perk of daily laundry done for stays over 3-nights.
The ocean views are unparalleled and A MUST-SEE is the sunrise, from the balcony adjacent to the bedrooms. No noise, fan in bedroom, all amenities included.
Convenient location (7-min from Hanauma Bay, 10-min from Waikiki, 5-min from major highways and supermarkets).
This place is a true rare find. Dear future traveler, go ahead and make this booking a part of your Oahu experience with confidence.

Had an amazing visit to the island and enjoyed our stay at Wills place!! So peaceful, clean and breathtaking views! Thanks for your help and responsiveness! Don’t hesitate if your thinking of staying— you will have no regrets!

5 stars across the board-immaculately clean bedroom/bathroom, laundry service, provided snacks/bottled water daily and 24/7 shuttle. Will is a genuine and thoughtful guy who provides the best service to ensure the best stay. The view is amazing and one that most people wouldn’t get to experience without an opportunity like this. We would recommend to other couples in a heartbeat. Thanks for the excellent stay, Will!
Anyone traveling to Oahu, Will’s place is a must stay!

Will's place is incredible!  Will is so quick with communication, no matter the hour, and makes anyone feel comfortable in his home.  He was attentive to our questions and always flexible with our plans and shuttling us to/from the car.  The home is beautiful with a gorgeous view of the sunrise and the ocean.  Snacks, coffee, fruit, and breakfast items are also provided, which I found very convenient.  Laundry service is also provided - we didn't even have to do it ourselves!  Will's home and hospitality is such a steal, book it now if there's availability.  I highly recommend this place!

A beautiful hillside place with excellent views of the coast and Diamond Head. Stunning pool, well appointed and spacious rooms and a very attentive host: all this at a reasonable price. If you aren't interested in the busyness of Waikiki and want a stunning retreat with easy access to the outdoors, this is the place for you. A beach park is at the bottom of the hill, grocery and other shops are nearby and its only a few minutes to some of Honolulu's top attractions.

Will is the best! This was my first time using Airbnb and I couldnt believe how great it was. Woke up every day to catch the sunrise over the mountains from the balcany. Amazing location, the pool overlooking the ocean, the place was cleaned daily, just overall incredible stay. If its available book it and you will be so happy you did. Only advice i have of what i did wrong is when you book give Will all your details and questions because he will go out of his way to give you some advice and ideas on how to make your trip run smoothly.

Will's place is one of the most amazing places I've stayed in. We definitely enjoy waking up in this beautiful place. The room and pool both have amazing sea view. I'd suggest to plan minimal  activities when you are staying  at Wills place as it's great to just relax by the pool. I loved this place. Will is a great host and catering to our schedule/needs.
Hope to be back soon!

Will's place is great! Set in a super safe gated community, perched on the side of the cliff face with 180degree stunning ocean front views, the kind you pay $$$$$ price for! Will was super easy to communicate with, a kind and friendly person,  and provided everything we required for an enjoyable stay. We chose to use the outside, downstairs (Website hidden by Airbnb) was just a bit inconvenient however still very equipped and pleasant. I highly recommend his place and would certainly stay again. Thanks for everything Will.
Will is a very attentive and supportive host. We enjoyed our stay in his home. Thanks Will!

This was one of the BEST experience and housing I've could have ever imagine. Will was alway on point when responsing and very fatherly like. The view, the pool, the tools within the house was all a queen could ever want. I would definitely book with him again.
We throughly enjoyed our stay and hope to return
Will was very accommodating and did everything he could to make sure I was comfortable and enjoyed my stay. The views are gorgeous!

Will is a tremendous host who does his best to take care of you during your stay. He truly provided shuttle service 24/7. We enjoyed visiting with him and getting helpful tips about where to go and what to do. The views from the home are as amazing as advertised. We felt safe even with doors and windows open. There was always a nice selection of quick breakfast items to choose from.
Overall we had a wonderful stay.

The house location is wonderful ,on the hill ,with sea view.  you can enjoy the view  in the swimming pool .we can see sunrise every morning.
the house is safety and room is very comfortable.
the host is very kind, and provide drink and water snack. 
we spend a wonderful two days.
we will select it again when we come Hawaii next time.
Great!!!

This is an extremely expensive house in a very safe and quoted guard gated community band and homes for a list celebrities. The view from all of the bedrooms, For that matter of the house, is stellar. As you can see from the picture the view from the pool is outstanding and shared by the rest of the house. There are many complementary snacks/food/water/coffee/tea
This place is unreal! Great location, beautiful pool, super friendly host.  Will's place is a perfect place to chill! So relax and enjoy the unbelievable views! Thanks Will, will def come back again.

Will is an excellent host who goes the extra mile to make sure his guests are looked after. The view at Wills place is stunning. Be aware this is a secure gated community and you have to be escorted in and out by Will, who is available 24/7 to pick up and drop off. House is on bus route about 20 mins from Waikiki, Will was always helpful to drop us to the bus stop.

Will's place was perfect for us to stay. Away from the hustle and bustle of Waikiki but still easily accessible with a car. It is located in a private gated community which makes it super safe and quiet. The views from the house are absolutely breathtaking, perfect to watch the sunset from the private pool. Amenities at the house is great, there is always bottled water and snacks available. The place is kept immaculately clean, with towels being replaced daily. Will is such a great host and is always happy to offer helpful suggestions. Would definitely stay here again when we visit Oahu again!

The view is breathtaking. Will was a wonderful host. He made our stay so easy and comfortable.  Great snack amenities in the fridge with plenty water and other drinks. Bedroom had a balcony with a fabulous view. Comfortable bed. We will be back! Soon hopefully!

We absolutely loved staying at Will's! The house and the view were even better in person. While some areas of the house are shared with other guests, we always felt that we had ample space and privacy. 

Will was a marvelous host. He was fast to respond to our messages, very accommodating, and extremely knowledgable when it came to making suggestions for things to do, places to eat, etc, around the island. 

Our laundry was done for us when we left our clothes basket out, we had beach towels available that could be taken off the property when we headed out, the wifi worked well, the bed was comfortable, that pool/jacuzzi were clean and beautiful, I could go on all day. 

Absolutely recommend a visit to Will's, our expectations were exceeded and we left wishing we had booked our stay for longer. We will absolutely return, thanks again, Will!
Will is a fantastic host and will go out of his was to assist. He has a lovely home that is quiet and a great escape if your looking for a base outside the touristiness of Waikiki
写真の通り素晴らしい海を眺め暮らすことができました｡洗濯物とﾀｵﾙは毎日清潔｡ﾐﾈﾗﾙｳｫｰﾀｰやｽﾅｯｸを常に用意してくれました｡ﾎﾃﾙでは経験出来ない貴重な旅をすることができて感謝いっぱいです｡ｳｨﾙさんのおもてなしは完璧です｡

If you're searching for a luxurious and relaxing home, you need not look any further.  I've stayed at a variety of airbnb's on the island but Will's home tops them all in beauty and tranquility. Will is a true superhost. Quick to respond via text and very professional. The pictures do not do the home justice. The kitchen area is stocked with an abundance of snacks, coffee, tea's, milk, creamer, bottled water, soft drinks, etc. 
There is a refreshing breeze 24/7, and the evenings are very comfortable given that the home is on a hill. The neighborhood is one of the most secure and quite in the island, so the doors and windows can all be left wide open. The other guests in the home were very quiet and respectful of each other. You have your own bathroom, but mine was down the stairs in the pool area as the one adjacent to my room was for my neighbor. Due to security, you park at the base of the hill in a park (safe area), and Will chauffeurs you to and from the home (just needs 10 minute notice before you arrive or want to step out) any time of the day or night. Walking around the neighborhood is also a no go given the high level of privacy desired by this community. However, once you see the view from your bedroom/balcony, or pool and the amenities Will has, you will have no desire to leave the home except to go to the beach, to dine, or explore the island. If you have a car, I highly recommend staying at Will's home!!!
It was a perfect Time and a great place! The view and the house was amazing and Will help me a lot at any time! I will come back!

The house is located on the half way of a small mountain and its location is perfect. The bedroom window and the pool area overlook the Pacific Ocean. In the morning when the Sun rises the view from bedroom window is awesome. In the evening when one is in the pool/jacuzzi or lying on a pool lounge, the view of the ocean and lighting of the street/houses below is fabulous too.

The house was clean and well maintained. The kitchen count-top and the refrigerator were fully filled with various snacks, fruits, juice and bottles of water. All these were free. Furthermore, Will was such an outstanding host. Basically, he was available 24/7. Not only did he answer questions and do general things, butalso he was genuinely willing do extras for the guests.

Amazing place, amazing services and amazing host!

Will’s house was great. Bedrooms and bathrooms were clean and comfortable. Will was quick to respond whenever we needed a lift anywhere and was always available. No aircon but the breeze at night time was great! Great view!!!!

Definitely amazing view from the pool deck and balcony. Will is a great host, he picks us up on time and very friendly, he also give us kona coffee before we check out. make sure you read the description carefully about the rules before check in. Cheers
Beautiful space with great views! Will was very communicative and nice. We will definitely stay again!

Impressed! My daughter and I stayed at Wills place for 5 nights! 

Any word used to describe the view will be an understatement. The breeze alone is worth the vacation. We left our windows and door open the entire time.. (we stayed first of August). 

The pool and hot tub are nice. The room is a significant size. Large closet is lovely. The bedding is comfortable. The bathroom is luxurious. The kitchen bar is stocked with lots of snacks to choose from. There are cooled drinks available in the refrigerator. Living area is a nice size. 

Will is the best host I’ve had the experience of meeting. 

I hope we can stay at Will’s every time we visit Hawaii! 

:)
AMAZING HOST WITH AN AMAZING VIEW. GREAT LOCATION AND PRICE. THANK YOU FOR THE HOSPITALITY!!

Will was one of the best, if not, the BEST Airbnb host I’ve come across. Even though this place was a little price-y for me, I have to say, each cent was well worth it! The views were stunning, the snacks were comforting, the jacuzzi was AMAZING, and the stay was riveting. Truly a beautiful house in a beautiful place. Will was willing to reply back to my texts at any time of the day, literally drove us back to our cars whenever we wanted, and had a multitude of snacks that we could munch on whenever we wanted! I would 100% without a doubt, come back to this Airbnb if I had the chance. If you’re on the fence about spending those extra dollars, let me just say it was ALL worth it! You get such a nice view by the pool! The pictures do not do it justice. Love this place!

will was extremely kind and nice with his guest. he gets up at 4am to drop us ..he is available any time. the house was super, clean, quiet with a hot tub and swimming pool with a wonderful view on the sea and honolulu. 
i recommand, thanks again and c u an other day

Spectacular stay. The pictures don’t do the place justice. Security, amenities, and Will’s services are incredible. We’ve only had family hosts treat us with such hospitality. Stay here, you’ll love it so much you won’t want to leave. We will definitely be back on any future Oahu visits and will stay here with Will.

Will’s place was awesome! It was located in such a safe and beautiful neighbourhood. The view from our balcony was incredible and we also liked how he had lots of complimentary snacks that we could chow down on after a busy day in O’ahu. Will was very helpful and responded very quickly to all of our messages. Definitely recommend this place as it was one of the best air bnb’s we have stayed in!

The place has an amazing view! The bedroom is nice and the large bed is very comfy. I shared the living room with two other people and it was fine. Will is an amazing host and will make sure you are set up nicely.
Great location, amazing views, superb host and very accommodating. Laundry, room and bathroom was cleaned every day. Would highly recommend

Will is a fantastic host, and made our 11 night stay memorable and relaxing. His shuttle service to parking allowed time for him to give us tips on traffic, parking, scheduling activities, where to eat, and where to shop.  Will has a great sense of humor and really enjoyed his take on local culture and events. 

Air B&B did not have the correct address for the property, but Will drove out and met us (on arrival in Oahu we had some problems accessing the e-mail message he had sent with the correct address for the parking lot) and we were able to easily follow him to find parking. 

As the listing states, we found this to be a very safe neighborhood, and after the first day it did not bother us to leave the doors and windows open to the tropical breezes. I have suggested to Will that a key lock for the room door, with a matching keyed lock for the private bathroom - downstairs by the pool as the listing states - would provide an extra measure of assurance of safety - and security when one is out touring around Oahu.  

The location was perfect, especially having a car, which I recommend. It is a short drive into Waikiki (park near the zoo for free) and an even shorter drive to Hanauma Bay and the famous blow hole and beach. There are plenty of amenities close by, and If you give Will a bit of notice, he will have the hot tub ready for you after a full day of touring.  

The rooms were clean, and the bed was very comfortable. No air conditioning, but the tropical breeze (assisted by the ceiling fan) was constant, and we slept vey well.

The two bedrooms on this floor would be ideal for two close couples or a family of four, and the pool and hot tub are for the exclusive use of the guests in these two rooms.

The decor could use some updating, but with all there is to do on Oahu, we didn’t have time to sit around the apartment anyway.

Just as the pictures show, the house is gorgeous, the view outstanding. Will is very accommodating, doing everything possible to ensure a happy stay. Room is cleaned every day and fresh towels provided. Very much a quality property. Thanks Will!

Absolutely beyond amazing. The views of Diamond Head / the ocean are unbeatable. Will is so kind, helpful and reliable. We would stay again in a heartbeat. Snacks left out daily along with water, coffee, and reallt anything you ask for!

This is a 10! The views are exceptional and the hosts hospitality equally the best! The small touches such as the extra towels, Hawaiian soaps, cold water in the fridge, breakfast bars, coffee just made our daily sojourn to see the island so much more easier. Coming ‘home’ to such a special place will redefine the word vacation! Word of warning, your expectation for every Airbnb experience will go up a couple of notches. Enjoy, we certainly did.

Will was an awesome host! The place was very clean and the 1st floor had the pool which was a very nice place to lay out for the day! Will also had everything you need and supplies a 24 hr shuttle! Highly recommend
Will was very hospitable. He treats you like family. The views from your room are beautiful and the pool deck. Also it was nice to be away from the busy parts of Waikiki

Will was very hospitable and kind! He was very attentive and made sure we had everything we needed, even beach towels ! His home was beautiful and we enjoyed the jacuzzi at night, take advantage of that. He had snacks, water and coffee. If there were 10 stars, I'd give him that! One of the best hosts/locations my boyfriend and I have stayed at.
数ヶ月前に滞在しました｡今回は短い滞在でしたが変わらないｻｰﾋﾞｽで良い時間を過ごすことができました｡ありがとうございました｡
Will is a great host who goes above and beyond to ensure his guests are taken care of.
We enjoyed a lot during our stay. Will is great host, make us feel comfortable. The view is stunning, unbeatable. We watched sunset every morning and enjoyed hot-tub during the night.

We had the most amazing week in Hawaii. This is one of the best Airbnb we have stayed in. The neighborhood is in a prestigious gated community. There is no parking on the premise; parking was down the hill (VERY SAFE). Will is there 24/7 to shuttle us to our car. Location was just perfect, not too far from Honolulu/Waikiki. Diamond Head and Hanauma Bay is less than 5 miles away. It is close to the main highway and lots of local places around to check out. The house was beautiful, clean and spacious. A plus is that this is a very safe gated community. One night @ around 2am, I had left my wallet in the car and Will was one text away and within 5 minutes he was there to take me down to the car. Will treated us like Family and was always genuinely helpful and communicative. Whatever we needed / questions he is always a text or a phone call away. I cannot thank him enough for everything.

Our room was always cleaned, fresh towels were always stocked. Falling asleep with the windows open and listening to the ocean breeze was just full bliss and the sunrise every morning was spectacular. The views from every window will take your breath away. We will definitely be coming back to visit! Thank you so much Will!

Will’s space was such an amazing experience. He gave us amazing suggestions and was so helpful from the very beginning to the end of the trip. One day me and my girlfriend left the lights on on our rental and Will came to help us jump the car. Will is very involved in the air bnb experience and you have to have a lot of contact with him. With that being said, we thoroughly enjoyed the entire experience and wouldn’t have had it any other way.
Amazing view and great hospitality!!

A fantastic place to stay to experience a different part of Oahu!! Will’s home is absolutely gorgeous and when you send your family and friends pics of the view and pool, they will definitely believe you’re in paradise!! A beautiful, comfortable place to stay, with a very kind and hospitable host. Located close to Koko Head and Hanauma Bay, we were also to easily drive to local locations (renting a car will be very helpful for certain locations). Highly recommend to check this spot out when you’re staying in Oahu! Thank you Will for a wonderful start to our honeymoon!

This airbnb stay was the best that we ever had!! Will’s service is better than in 5 star hotel. It’s always been clean, fresh towels changed daily. He has snack bar that available daily and includes tea, coffee, granola bars belvita, soups etc. That’s a huge plus. Will treated us like his family. He was kind to us. His shuttle service is available 24/7 and he was always courteous and punctual when it came to pick up or drop down us for the day. The photos cannot show the most beautiful view from his villa! Sunrises from the balcony were breathtaking. In the evening you can also submerge in jacuzzi and watch the stars. Community is safe and very quite. We never even locked our door during stay. We’re so happy that we took our vacation at Will’s place. If you want vacation one of a kind, then don’t hesitate and book his place when available. You won’t regret!

My husband and I absolutely loved our stay at Will’s home! The location was amazing (in close proximity to the airport) and his home was stunning! We would absolutely stay here again and hope to again in the future!!

Will’s place was amazing and much better than in the pictures! Great views, great amenities, and great service. It’s also very convenient as it is really close to many stores, restaurants, beach, and some good hiking spots. Will was available 24/7, super responsive, and was more than willing to drive me wherever I needed to go. Definitely would stay there again when I come back. Thank you, Will!

The views are even better in person! The house is in a great locations with things to do in either direction. The house itself is really nice and it’s stocked with everything you’d need. You won’t regret staying here! :D
Will went above and beyond to accommodate.   He is very kind and his place is spotless.  We appreciated the extra snacks you had out for your guests.  Outstanding.

Will is super nice and hospitable. He is definitely a great host and being! Will’s place is clean and spacious. The view is absolutely STUNNING!!!!!!!!!!!! I highly  recommend Will’s place to anyone who wish to experience the most out of their stay in this beautiful island! Mahalo Will!

If you are hoping to book this location because of the pool, I would strongly suggest against it. The pool definitely had not been cleaned for quite some time and the jacuzzi did not heat up. The bathroom does have a jacuzzi, but when we went to turn it on, there was debris coming out of the jets as it hadn't been used since who knows when. Will is a very nice and accommodating host, but its unfortunately not enough considering how much the room costs and the fact that you're in Hawaii. I'm also quite disappointed that we had to be shuttled in and out of the property throughout the whole trip. Although Will was available anytime to give us a ride, it definitely took time out of our trip, especially if we just wanted to head back to our airbnb just to freshen up before heading back out. If you were hoping to avoid paying more for a hotel, evaluate your budget and try to go that route instead. The location is quite far from Waikiki, the amenities were either not working or not clean, and its quite inconvenient to be shuttled in and out of the property.

Incredible House on top of the hill. The view is stunning. Will is very available and kind .
Suerelly when will come back in O'Aho , we 'll  choise it again.
Aloha!

Will has an amazing place in a stunning community. The sights are unbelievable from the bedroom and balcony! Will is an unbelievable host & is super responsive. Just give him 15 min heads up when you want to head out or are heading back and he will be there to take you to/ from your car. The place is a great location, close enough to Waikiki but far away enough to be out of the crazy traffic! Definitely recommend staying here.
Will and his son will go out of there way to do anything to help. Great hosts
They care about everyone great host. Would recommend

description: 公共交通方便,免费停车方便,街角有便利店,购买生活用品便利｡全新装修,居住舒适 (Website hidden by Airbnb) 這個房間在另外兩個房間中間,與其中一間房間的隔牆有窗,但是不能通風｡房間內提供風扇降溫｡ 位於聖勞倫斯河邊,附近有大片綠地和公園,兒童遊樂設施,比如鞦韆､滑滑梯等,以及免費室外公共游泳池｡     街道免費停車非常方便,幾分鐘車程可達25和40號高速公路｡ 廚房､洗手間 我喜歡與房客多交流 法語區,靠近聖勞倫斯河,步行距離內有公共游泳池,兒童遊樂設施,小學,雜貨店等 去市中心:周一至五上午12點半前,乘坐快線 (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) 分鐘可達｡ 其他時間,乘坐189或者22去往綠線地鐵站(約15分鐘),然後乘坐地鐵到市中心(約15分鐘)｡ Please DO put the master key back to the master lock box after use RIGHT AWAY. Please lock the entrance master lock from inside after you entered and when you are going out the appartement. Please put the garbage bags from balcony to the sidewalks in front of the appartement Thursday Night. Thanks!

reviews.comments:
very care-taking host, always trying to help.
price is unbeatable, neighborhood is next to the nice walk on the river bank. 
recommended for a budget stay.

Caroline est une hôte sympa et accueillante. La communication est facile et l'organisation du séjour s'est très bien passée.
Appartement agréable. Chambre propre et lit confortable. Bien pour les budgets serrés.

Caroline est une super hôte très accueillante. La chambre sans ouvertures est propre et est situé dans un quartier calme et à une heure de transport du centre ville, mais très bien desservie. Très bien pour les budgets serrés.

C'étais ma première expérience avec rbnb et elle étais en 100 procents réussite. Caroline et Mustapha m'ont accueillié très chaleureusement, je me suis sentie comme à la maison. Les propriétaires n'hésitant pas à donner l'aide quand il faut. J'ai passé un moins chez eux et c'étais une excellente séjour. L'appartement est propre, l'accès à la cusine sans aucun problème, rentrée dans l'appartement a l'heure flexible est très pratique. Le prix est équivalent au qualité donnée. Je vous recommande fortement de louer une chambre chez Caroline, vous pouvez être sûre que vous n'allez pas regretter! :)
Very solid, affordable. As advertised. Good communication and response.

Caroline is a great host , quick to respond to requests . the place is well organined at the moment you enter , there is information to guide us with questions we may have wich is realy convenient also .

bed was real confortable , there is a kitchen were we can cook also . would go back to sleep a t Caroline s place
Caroline is a good host with nice communication and willingness to support visitors. The place is fairly cheap to stay.
Great host. Good place, thanks.
Pour petit budget
Very nice host, quick response

The host was argumentative when I told her there were no drinking glasses in the kitchen. She expected me to use one of the tiny little expresso cups. There were a sink full of dirty dishes from the time I got there until the time I left. We found a dead mouse on the kitchen counter one day. The bathroom sink was disgusting when I got there but cleaned, but not well, a couple days later. The outside door was not just unlocked but open when I got there because it was broken. It was fixed a couple days later. There were new windows being put in the week I was there. She failed to tell me that until after I was there. The workmen were there too early in the morning for me and made a lot of noise which effected my sleep. You needed to take a long bus ride to get to the grocery store. Luckily, there was a well stocked variety store just minutes away.

Although I did not meet her my first day, Caroline was very helpful  and provided very clear and straightforward instructions for checking-in. She was also very quick to answer any questions I had via text. The room is simple, warm, and looks just like the photo. Location is convenient as the bus towards downtown Montreal runs on the same street. I would not hesitate to book again.
房东人非常好,热情,周到,出行购物方便

Mon fils a habité un mois dans cette chambre ,il n' à jamais rencontré l'hote,par contre très facile à rejoindre répondait rapidement ,la chambre est fonctionnel et propre ,par contre les airs communs auraient besoins d'un peu de ménage .

Great deal for travellers looking for a place to rest.

It is in the suburbs. Accessible by public transit via Metro and then the 189-E Bus from the Honoré-Beaugrand station. Which drops you 1 block from Apt. also take the 189-O bus to the metro from George V road. 
Convenience store within 1 block of apartment for essentials. 
Subway, indian and Vietnamese restaurants about 1 mile walk.
I had cool roommates during my stay so hopefully you will too.

Conclusion: I would stay here again

Situé à une trentaine de mètres du merveilleux parc Bellerive, cet appartement reste un espace idéal pour celles et ceux qui n'aiment pas le bruit. La tranquillité est frappante. Le confort du lit ne passe pas inaperçu, plutôt remarquable. La cuisine est en libre service....
Un petit bémol tout de même, la propreté des espaces en commun dépend des différents colocataires...(cuisine, salle de bains).
Ne vivant pas elle-même dans cet appartement, Caroline est très réactive à tout mel, message... Et comment faire fi de sa sympathie et surtout de son souci de s'assurer de votre bien-être? Impossible.
Je la recommande vivement à tou.te.s
Liria
great location, great cozy room for the price...best value for money place in montreal. Caroline is quick at responding..and was a wonderful host

Caroline et une hôte exceptionnel , très bonne accueille , très accessible et joignable en cas de souci , niveau qualité prix c'est vraiment correct , le quartier et pas le plus jolie de la ville mais le parc bellerive et vraiment nice , pis l'arret de bus et vraiment comme vraiment proche et nous somme à 20 minutes en métro du downtown !! Je recommande !!! :p
Nice place but the beds are small
good host

name: Comfortable Room (2) at Affordable Rates
summary: Once a massage parlor, this has now been converted to a apartment nestled in Makiki. A fifteen minute walk puts you in Waikiki without the Waikiki prices. Need shopping, there's a Walmart just 5 minutes from here. Ala Moana Mall is just down from Walmart.
space: This is a spot on review by one of our guests: "This is a no-frill hostel type situation. You get exactly what’s described and what you paid for. You get a small private room in a large apartment-like layout. The bed is very comfortable and fits two easily. There’s a night stand and a lamp, as well as a rack to hang up your clothes and a mirror on the wall. All the above takes up the entire room. There is hardly any more space. When you check in, the linens are changed and you get fresh towels. They can do with a new set of each to be honest. There are two shared bathrooms, one for men and another for women. It was mostly kept clean for the entire week we stayed there. There’s a kitchen with a table and stove where you can cook some basic meals. There’s a free washer/dryer which were a perfect addition. There are about 8 rooms all in all. The walls are paper thin and it can be a little noisy, and there’s a lingering odor in the place from being old. The location is the best you’ll find

host.host_about: I'm a business woman that loves the day to day challenges of everyday business life.

reviews.comments: Katherine was a very good host and ALWAYS helpful. The room was clean and the location absolutely perfect. I would rent this place again :)
It was a nice place to lay my head and save a little to spend elsewhere. The discription was pretty spot on and Rick and Katherine were very accommodating.

Interesting fun location with a lot of urban culture. Close to downtown so be ready for that experience. Little karaoke bar next door is fun and nice people. The other guests in the building are definitely characters. Place is very clean and I imagine staying here is as close as you can get to a international city vibe. Real people doing real life.

I arrived late, so the late check in wasn't a problem, that was great!
But in the night we had a problem with a drunken man inside and that makes me afraid of. We had to call the police, after that it was very quiet there. Maybe it was a "creepy and rarely" night for everyone in the house.
It's close by the Walmart and the roommates were nice as well.

Loved staying here. Katherine and Rick are outstanding hosts, operating a comfortable and safe location in the heart of Honolulu. Would highly recommend. Thanks for the great time, guys! See you again.
Very accurate listing , no frills place to rest your head , no window so hard to judge time without looking at your clock

My room was quiet and I had access to a washer and dryer, kitchen, shower with good water pressure and WiFi! Mattress was comfy, too. 

Rick showed me around once I arrived and helped me understand the room in relation to surrounding features. Waikiki is a short walk and even shorter drive and parking was never an issue for me. 

Be sure to grab some shave ice from Joycup on your way to Waikiki or just because--- Rick and Katherine put out tasty frozen treats!
Good place room in value price.

Loved how you had your own private room with kitchen availability and the air conditioning was phenomenal. They were also very accommodating with my late flight and arriving late! Finally I received great directions! Would strongly suggest!

This place is in a good location, close to lots of shopping and downtown Waikiki was a quick trip! It's perfect if you just need a place to sleep and will be away for most of the day. The hosts were very flexible and easy to contact when we had questions. Thanks!

I stayed 2 nights in Katherine and Rick's clean, comfortable, secure, and affordable room in a suite of a mixed-use 4-story building. The location is conveniently within walking distance to major sites/activities in Honolulu and Waikiki and it was just beyond the major tourist area which made for quiet sleeping. The hosts are friendly and communicated well; Rick met me at my arrival to orient me with the property and neighborhood. They also run Joy Cup shaved ice and bike rental shop a couple blocks away which I would recommend. Overall, the room was a great value and I would stay there again. Definitely recommend.
Basic accommodation. Nothing fancy, nothing terrible

The place is like in the ad. You got everything you need for a few days on Oahu. Public transport just around the corner. People very nice and helpful. No problem with early check in or to store my baggage for a few hours, due to my late flight. Great to stay there.
Thanks katherine
Nice room! Close to transports and food options, quiet, comfy.

Katherine’s place is exceptional and a great location.  Close to everything - food, shopping & activities.  My preferred place to stay when in town.
Comfy bed. Close to public transport. Food and shops are nearby within walking distance

I was pretty satisfied with staying this parlor like hostel.
Bet was comfy, bus stop(and Biki station) was near, and our friend Jerry was amazingly kind!:)

I can't say this was a luxury stay, but I would come again to enjoy Hawaii at most affordable price in Waikiki!

I really enjoyed my stay at Katherine’s place, the room is a great value for money, if you need a place to sleep and put your things it’s perfect. The location is great, very close to a public transport hub with buses that take you everywhere, I haven’t been to Waikiki much but you can walk there too. Communication was good and Jerry, the guy who takes care of the apartment is a very nice person.

The location was great! Walkable! Close to everything! Bus 2 takes u to whatever u want! Bus 9 takes u to airport. Quit place. Everything was really amazing! In addition, the area was really safe during night. I was able to walk around after 10 pm or 12 am without getting in a trouble. My trip was for business, I was outside almost the whole day. I only came to sleep. Room was perfect to me. Bathroom was shared however I was able to enter it every time without waiting the other people, so I did not have any problems with that at all. Finally, I would like to thank Jerry for not sleeping and waiting me for checking in (12 am).

This place is especially good if you're arriving late from the airport as they accommodate late check-in.

Great location

Nice location.  Parking close after 6PM to 7 AM.
方便

There were a few issues that led to me leaving the Airbnb early, some issues I had,  such as noise was immediately taken care of when communicated with the host. However I found the reviews on the listing to be inaccurate. There are two long term male residents that live within this apartment listing. I would not recommend this listing for hypervigilant travelers/single women as there were no locks on the bathroom, nor shower doors. The doors on these two are sliding doors which made me uncomfortable that anyone could have entered at any time while I was inside. The bathroom and shower are separated by a frosted window, which I could see the outline of the person's body in the bathroom while I was in the shower. 
There is a reason why the bathroom and shower photos are unlisted, please be aware of this before booking this option.

I would definitely stay here again. It was very convenient and for the price it was exactly what I needed. I was satisfied with the amount of privacy that I had on the house which is why I would recommend and book again.
Basic bedroom clean, no tv,no door on shower ,bathroom does not lock   safe and convenient. Host responsive and friendly.

I agree with the review from Jennifer below. And unfortunately, that review got posted only a couple days prior to my arrival. Because of my personal work and travel and visiting circumstances, I decided it was too difficult for me to try to find a new place and I stayed for the duration of my planned visit (6nights). I find many of these reviews and the description of this posting to be inaccurate. However, the 3 hosts (2 males and Katherine) running this place were kind and responsive. I personally also manage short-term and long-term sublets and vacation rentals and an inaccurate listing to book more guests is, as nicely as I can say it - not cool. There were some good things here and I did stick out my stay. See below for details. --This is set-up like a hostel. 4 rooms total - 2 male residents and 1 other Airbnb room. (When booking on the Airbnb App it does not say "hostel"! This is an App issue) --This is NOT an apartment (as is described), nor is this an apartment complex (my assumption). There are many apartment complexes in this area and so I was fooled. And with real estate booming in Honolulu, it seemed reasonable for a commercial building to be transformed. This was NOT transformed. --This is an office/commercial lease. Within an office/commercial building. --This space is not and was not intended for living. --The kitchen is really a kitchenette (per reasons listed above). --The kitchen was dirty and smelled mildewy. When I asked for the kitchen to be cleaned they did, very kindly, do their best. But because this space was not meant for living, it was difficult. And new dish rags / drying towels were needed. --(per reasons listed above) There are no windows in the room or space. This was hard for me. --Even though the room is listed as non-smoking, the shared space smelled like smoke (smoking occurred in the space). The room itself did not smell and was fine. --The parking lot is NOT $6! This is intentionally inaccurate. The parking guard told me that by mid-April the lot would be 'automated' pay, which will increase the hourly rate. There will not be a guard in this lot (who currently only works daytime). Currently the $6 refers to business hours (9am-5/6pm) on business days when the guard is working. After that and on weekends and holidays, the cost is pre-pay $1/hour/cash, paid into a drop-box. Again, this cost will be increasing. Makes sense since this is for a commercial parking lot and is not residential. You'll have to be comfortable playing the parking game, finding street parking and moving your car around. I did OK, but I wish this was more honestly stated. Fixes/improvements since past reviews: --The translucent glass on the bathroom and shower doors got painted. Thank you. --Locks were placed on the doors. --The shower got cleaned. The good: --The room itself was accurate. Decent. Cleaned. --The toilet...
Good pace for this price!

Katherine,  Am I glad that you accepted my request fo my brief Stay in your lodging.I shall look forward to meeting you  next time. Since our paths did not cross each other this time. The # 2 bus was the connecting  Bus for all other Buses.
Chandrasegaran   Balendran

The price / quality value is great. 
Enjoyed staying in Katherina place, you have everything you need, clean and Jerry was very helpful. No problem with early check-in and late check-out.

I can confirm what other reviews are stating, such as a lacking window and missing pics of kitchen/bathroom.

However, from looking at the listing and its reviews, guests should know what to expect. This is a well-priced, functional Airbnb in a central location plus multiple bus stops nearby.
Very nice host. They reply very fast to my questions. Place close to many attractions and the bus nb 2 stops just behind the house. The nb 2bus brings you to waikiki. Center etc. Very good bus...

Accueil vraiment sympathique Jerry fait de son mieux pour vous accueillir
Chambre aveugle et sans possibilité d’aération directe donc difficile d’y rester dans la journée cuisine très petite et pas de pièce commune

I stayed in both this room as well as another room that Katherine has posted during a separate stay (a room in the same building, but in a different apartment upstairs).  Both times were pleasant!  The rooms are not fancy, but they are comfortable.  If all you need is a place to sleep, then this place offers a great value.  Even though the bathrooms are shared, I rarely had to wait to use them.  The other shared spaces (kitchen, etc.) are on the older side, but they still have the basic conveniences, including washer/dryer if you bring your own detergent.  The neighborhood can be a little noisy and the walls are kind of thin, but this did not really bother me.  Plus the rooms have air conditioning, which is not always offered in other places.  All in all, I think this is a great budget option - thank you!

Amazing place, and amazing permanent resident, very welcoming, polite, and friendly. I was very impressed with the way he makes the beds, very neat. I loved my room, AC was a major plus. Oh and let me tell you about the EXTREMELY comfortable mattress, I slept like a baby. I got super lucky on parking also. The place is very quiet and very peaceful, would definitely stay here again next year.

The place and other reviews are accurate. Very kind and accommodating host.
If you just need a place to crash for the night, this is a good place to go to.

For a budget room i would say it was a great experience. The host was very responsive. The rooms and washrooms were clean. The room was a bit small but enough for a single person. The only negative thing i would say was that there weren't any windows in the room.

I’m disappointed in the experience I had at this place, I was confused about who to communicate with, the room was stuffy with no airflow and the shower/bathroom was a mess. The worst part was the extremely loud tv until midnight. It ruined my sleep and I needed to get up at 430am. I am very tired and grumpy and feel very ripped off to be honest.
This place is really conveniently located at the center of the city, good eateries and shopping mall within walking distances. Jerry was really hospitable, enjoyed really much.
alright place.

Quick & easy to find.
Mr. Gerry is friendly & helpful getting there.
Wash/dry a major plus.
Great location (wal-mart,target, don quijote) all nearby in 10 min walk.
Value ia good. 
Right off the bus line #2.
Room has A.C. & privacy

The room was very neat and Wi-Fi was enough speed. The location was also great. You can go to Ala Moana Center in about 15 min by walk. There are many bus stops, so it's easy to go for many sightseeing spots. It takes about 15 min to go to Waikiki beach by bus.
The only thing I worried about was the lock of restroom and shower room, because of U-buckle door lock only.

The space is as described. Do not go into it thinking 5 star hotel. Think more like your family member’s home. It reminded me of when I stayed with my Filipino grandparents. I liked the little touches in the room I stayed in. It was small, but definitely a cute little space for the travelers who don’t need much in order to feel comfy during their stay. The only thing is that the windows are blacked out so it leaves the room feeling very dark. But other than that, nothing that would stop me from staying here again if necessary!
Really cool place to stay if you travel alone

This room was just what I needed after flying into Honolulu and needing to kill some time before the rest of my party arrived for our vacation. 

The reviews and descriptions you’ll see in the listing are pretty accurate. This is a no muss, no fuss, clean and comfortable room. I found it to be mostly quiet, though it shares a wall with the bathroom, so you will be aware if anybody is in there. 

Jerry was a very friendly host, and we shared a little small talk when he let me in, but offered plenty of privacy when I was ready to get settled in. 

As many have said before, this is an excellent  value. Thanks!

This place is exactly as advertised. You have your own cozy little room in a sort of apartment like layout. Not a lot of space but exactly what you need if you just need the basics. This is the best place to stay for price vs location value!

Needed a place to crash. The bed was clean, blanket was warm and ac blew cold.. Def not a ritz Carlton but for the price I guess it was ok.. wouldn’t recommend it esp cause the kitchen was dirty and I would have loved coffee but the trash smelled so bad I couldn’t even be in there to make my coffee. Bummer but oh well.
Good value considering great location
It was nice.
Good location. Room was clean and comfortable. Great for its price. Jerry was great with check in
Great place to stay at. Well located. Jerry was very helpful.

My Fiancé and I loved it! Linelle's place was by far my best AirBnb and i have stayed at 5. The accuracy and cleanliness was great perfect. It was like having your own studio apartment. The amenities were great! The bed was so comfy, shower was hot, seats comfy, super clean. She has stuff to surpass your expectations. Great stay and we will return!

Great value for money, very close to the beach and public transportation. Perfect place for a short trip to the seaside. Dedicated parking space is an important asset for NYC! Linelle was very helpful and so quick to respond, we could book this place on a very short notice.

This was my first time using Airbnb so I was skeptical at first, but I had a great time and loved the place. Linelle was so helpful towards my boyfriend & I. She helped us with directions getting there, getting all settled in, and the place felt so welcoming. I would defiantly come again!

If you want to go to the beach, go to this place! Its very comfortable and the host is very, very nice and caring about the guests. As the description says: you really cán feel the love around the house, it's lovely! Definitely recommended.
