Linelle's place was a very comfortable stay. The beach is indeed close by, and if you are inclined to explore up and down Rockaway, it is very close to a Q22 bus stop to do just that. She is a very communicative host who looks out for your comfort and I felt very good at her place.
Linelle was just so lovely. She has terrific taste and her place was so close to the beach and easy to get to. She is a gem and I am so grateful for her hospitality.
Beautiful room, walking distance from the beach and Linelle was a very considerate host!

This was a comfortable room just a few blocks to the Boardwalk. 
I was performing at a summer camp VERY close by so the location was the best for my needs. We had a nice chat about the role of "hosting" and I wish Linelle all the best!
Linelle is friendly and so helpful, and she wants to make sure your stay is comfortable! Our stay worked out well, we brought bikes from the city and we were able ride to the beach and night life!
The space was exactly as described and as it appears in the pictures.  Linelle was very accommodating and quick to respond to questions.

Linelle's place is absolutely gorgeous!! The post truly doesn't do it justice, it is a hidden gem. You will get a private room rate but will experience what is basically your own little private studio apartment sanctuary. TV w/ cable, mini fridge, microwave, and perhaps most importantly: a  private bathroom and completely separate entrance. Oh did I also mention your very own parking spot right next to your private entrance? I really can't say enough positive things. I have already planned my next stay!

Very spacious and beautiful room with private bathroom and entrance! I arrived late and had to leave early so I was worried but Linelle was awake and helped me into the room. Exactly what I needed in between long flights

After Delta cancelled 25 flights after mitnight at JFK, I needed a place to stay. No hotels were available. So I checked airbnb. I sent messages at 1:30 am. 
Miraculously Linelle responded. And while her place was booked, she found another place for me. She even came and picked me up at JFK!
I was able to get a good nights rest and catch my rebooked flight the next day. Thank you Linelle!  I will never forget your hospitality!

Eine angenehme Unterkunft für alle, die dem Trubel Manhattans am Abend gerne entkommen möchten. Das Preis-Leistungsverhältnis ist gut und Linelle eine zuvokommende, herzliche Gastgeberin. Allerdings darf man nicht lärmempfindlich sein, da das Haus hellhörig ist und man je nach Wetterlage auch die Flugzeuge vom JFK-Airport hört. Wir würden das Zimmer trotzdem empfehlen und auch gerne wiederkommen.

I absolutely love this place the  accessible to everything set in communications with the host was excellent  separate entrance and offstreet parking space was a plus size nice and quiet street there was absolutely nothing negative that I could say about her place in the  there was absolutely nothing negative that I could say about her place I can and will recommend replace to everyone that I know.

由于我的航班抵达的比较早, Linelle很快帮我准备好了房间,非常感谢.
房间非常干净,设施比较齐全.门口停车比较方便.
非常感谢Linelle提供干净整洁的房间.

La chambre de Linelle est assez bien située, à 15 minutes de l'aéroport et à une centaine de mètres des plages.
En revanche cela aura été notre pire expérience airbnb. Les sols de la chambre ainsi que la douche n'étaient pas vraiment propre.
La chambre n'est vraiment pas bien insonorisée, on entend tout ce qui passe en haut et le sol grince horriblement, nous avons très mal dormi.
Point positif, une entrée séparée pour la chambre et Linelle est gentille.
L'appartement de Linelle est très accueillant et très facile d'accès. Idéal pour un ou deux jour de calme côté plage!

Great first experience with using airbnb! Comunication was perfect from the beginning. Linelle picked me up from the airport. She offered to take me to Mc Donalds for dinner as I arrived quite late. 

Linelle is very attentive and super helpful hosts. She takes her hosting responsibility very serious and her attention to detail show up in everything she make me welcome and comfortable in my stay!

The place fully met my needs! The room is absolutely beatiful, stylish and well equipped! King size bed is extremly comfortable! Plus the location is really convenient, only a short walk to subway, boardwalk and beach. 

Linelle was a wonderful host and went beyond all expectations! I really recommend this great spot to anyone who want to visit Rockaway! I would love to stay there next time for sure! 

Linelle, thank you once again for sharing your home! Hope see you soon! :)

Lots of love from Brussels! X

Linelle's place was absolutely wonderful! You basically have your own whole place minus kitchen! Everything she described is accurate - private entry, bathroom, comfy bed, etc. It was very clean, fully equipped with all things necessary (I.e water, microwave, toothpaste, big TV), and overall very cozy and comfortable! She was easily accessible as well! 

Just FYI, it was quite a distance to get into manhattan (~1h) but that is beyond her control.

Otherwise, it was a great experience and I would definitely stay there again :)

Linelle was a great host. She helped us a lot in everything.

Her place is nice and cosy.

It's 40 minutes from downtown but there is a train right near the place which takes you directly there.

Awesome place.

Thank you.

Linelle was a fatanstic host. We had trouble with another airbnb and when we contacted Linelle she cleaned the room as fast as possible so we could rent it. She went above and beyond. The private room is downstairs from the house, has it's own entry and bathroom. It's almost like having your own hotel room. Gteat stay!
the room was perfect for us, a private bathroom, and much space for a family of 3. location close to the subway station. highly recommend.

Linelle's rental is just like the pictures.  Our only complaint was that you can hear everything the neighbors do through the walls.  They are not loud neighbors, but the walls are definitely thin.  But the location was perfect for us;  just a quick 10 minute drive to the beach.
Schöne Wohngegend mit kurzem Fußweg zum Strand und zur Subway.

Cozy and clean room, match description, has TV, microwave and hot water heater in the room. Linelle even provide first morning cereal, coffee etc. About 4 minutes walking to Metro line A station, and 70 minutes to Manhattan.  Recommend to travelers.
Linelle was so friendly and helpful,her home is impeccably clean and welcoming. We truly felt at home and will definitely stay again. would absolutely recommend:)
My expectations were completely met.  On a very cold evening, my room remained toasty, with no draft! The space was stylish, comfortable, perfect amenities, and a comfortable bed!

Con: The noise from the home owner will go away around 11pm or 12am and quiet afterward. For one night, the house alarm system went off at least three times and we were just so tired to turn off after that. Sadly, we had horrible sleep the 1st night. Showers is small thus i dont reccomend for a heavier person. I hit my head n shoulder twice.

Pro: Family was kind. The room beautifully decorated. The location is convenient (10 mins walk to metro) and safe. The room cleanliness is overall ok. Private parking next to door aka side of the house. The bed is medium firm, lots of pillows, tv has verizon cable but tv volumn cannot be changed and stayed medium to low volume. Mini refrig and microwave was a great touch and very clean, instant krogers coffee, lil complements, and steam water pot was provided.

Overall, we enjoyed our stay which could be 5 stars if the house alarm was not the issue.
Linelle’s place was very cozy, clean, and warm. She provided what we needed, gave us privacy, was very communicative. We had a very nice stay.
Terrific Host!  Love staying with this hos
Exactly as described!  The location is perfect. The environment is clean and comfortable.  Communication is within a very reasonable amount of time and effort is definitely made for my comfort!

We had a great time at Linelle’s place. It was great to have a convenient, clean and well-kept place to stay with easy parking. Linelle was very responsive. As others have said, there are sounds from the other apartment, but that’s just life in a city! Thanks for having us!
Exactly as advertised!  Close to public transportation, neat and perfectly cleaned. Just enough amenities to help you relax from the day! Looking forward to my next visit!
Warm and inviting!  Comfortable and homey.  I sleep well and wake up refreshed and ready for my day.  Linelle is very responsive and makes sure that I am able to stay relaxed during my stay.
Amazing beautiful home with an amazing Host!!!
Its cozy
Absolutely loved Linelle’s space! It made me feel right at home, and with suck close access to the train I was able to go back and fourth to New York with ease!
Super clean and cozy definitely a place to book when I'm in town...great amenities cable tv and a comfortable clean area...the host was always available and pleasant

Linelle's place was very convenient. If traveling to the Far Rockaways and you do not want to rent a car, this place is perfectly located near stores and public transportation as well as JFK. 
The room was very clean and all the extras were provided per her description as well as additional amenities. I liked having a private bath. This was the biggest feature that I truly appreciated. 
The room was a comfortable size for the two of us staying there. We did not feel cramped at all. 
Linelle responded promptly to communications so since this was my first time using airbnb, she took the worry out of the experience. 
I would definitely be open to coming back here again and would recommend this spot to other travelers.

Linelle's place was an excellent weekend getaway. She had stocked the apartment with linens, snacks, drinks, bath and body needs. I wasn't expecting for her to have half of what she did. She was very quick when responding to my texts. The area itself was okay, but the street Linelle lives on was very quiet. We were 5 minutes away from the beach, and 10 minutes from town where there were lively restaurants and clubs. I would recommend checking out Cabana or Speakeasy for dinner if you are visiting this area. We had such a nice stay. Thank you Linelle!

I rented this space just for one night, it was perfect get away for me from my my apt in Harlem. Everything is close, ocean, public transportation. Linelle, the host, let me stay few hours longer which was great! She’s very fast with responding. Also that space has a separate entrance, we were not bothering each other, that’s another awesome thing!   Definitely coming back for a longer stay and more rockaway adventures!
I very much enjoyed my stay at Linelle’s place as it was very clean and cozy. The location was perfect and close to everything. One of the best Airbnb experiences we've ever had!
Linelle ist eine herzliche, kooperative Gastgeberin. Die kleine Wohnung ist liebevoll eingerichtet.
Special thanks to Linelle for staying up late to help us check in. We were here for one night in summer and had a comfortable stay. Its a clean and cozy place with all the required amenities present.
Lots of small thoughtful touches

This host goes above and beyond for her guest! I 120% recommend booking her for a stay. She is very thoughtful and has provided everything you could ever need for a great stay. Will be booking again in the future

Linelle’s place was very nice. Just as pictured and described. Check in was very easy and communication with her was excellent. She had nice touches throughout including snacks and other items that are needed during a stay away from home in case you needed them. Would definitely recommend staying with her!!

It’s a very comfortable and cute place! Hospitality was amazing!
Definitely recommend it!
Very nice and clean. Host was welcoming and responsive and very nice. The place had everything you could ever need.

This was the perfect place to stay. Not only because it was literally blocks away from my boyfriends relatives but the location made it so easy to access the beach & the train. It was also a quiet location. I am big on SLEEP. I’m a light sleeper and I wasn’t disturbed once the 4 nights I stayed here. 

So there is a train station that is literally 2 blocks away from this place. It took me about 3 minutes to walk there. The entrance to the beach is actually right next to the train station. You can either go to your right and walk up the steps or keep straight and walk onto the beach once you turn on the block of the train station. 

Linelle gave clear and specific directions on where the room was located and how to gain access. It has its own entrance which was perfect. Coming in late wasn’t an issue because we didn’t have to worry about disturbing anyone in the home. During the day you could hear footsteps upstairs being that the room is at the lower level but it wasn’t a concern. If you’ve ever lived in an apartment on the lower level, that’s what its like. Our privacy was respected which was greatly appreciated. I did get the pleasure to meet Linelle coming in from dinner one evening. Very nice & welcoming. 

The neighborhood seems like a neighborhood where everyone kind of knows each other. The neighbors were respectful and spoke when you walked by. 

As for the room, it was gorgeously decorated. I felt right at home. The bathroom was stocked with different shampoos, conditioners, & body washes. There was a wardrobe that was also stocked with clean linen & towels. There is a dresser to store your clothes and belongings. A fridge and microwave as listed. On top of the microwave were little snacks like popcorn as well as condiments. I didn’t think there would be an iron so I packed mines but turns out there was an iron as well as an ironing board. 

Overall my experience here was amazing. Highly recommended.
A nice cozy place to stay and have your privacy.
Definitely a home away from home.  Being right next to the beach during the Full Moon was amazing lol The train was convenient & food spots weren't to far away. Great stay!
The host canceled this reservation 17 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Cosy space, with a few thoughtful touches. Great hospitality and a nice stay altogether.

name: Quarto - ap com vista pro mar e Cristo
summary: Quarteirão da praia, com vista lateral para o mar e o cristo. Rua do metrô.
description: Quarteirão da praia, com vista lateral para o mar e o cristo. Rua do metrô.

host.host_location: Casimiro de Abreu, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments: A Paula é bem atenciosa, adorei tudo, o apartamento fica num ótimo lugar! Sempre ficou perguntando se tudo estava certo!
Adoro o local, direto vou lá ! Tudo maravilhoso !
O local é ótimo e próximo do que for necessário, inclusive metrô. A Paula foi bem atenciosa e foi tudo como combinado. Nós gostamos e recomendamos!
Muy lindo lugar , muy amable Paula, todo de 10
Apartamento bem localizado, limpo e organizado. Porteiro 24hrs e a Paula sempre prestativa. Adorei o local.

name: Beautiful studio, amazing location!
summary: Beautiful studio apartment with amazing outdoor private patio and garden. This is a stylish, very spacious (450sqf), bright apartment right in the heart of central Hong Kong. Next to the iconic Graham street wetmarkets, a rare treat in the "old Hong Kong". Features a double bed and couch that folds out to single bed. Full wall windows make this place bright and happy, but also very quiet for its location. Behind the building is a park &birds can be heard from patio. Kitchen is gas and induction, shower, washing machine and all basic household items provided. You will love it!
space: Very stylish and unique apartment, fresh and clean but has the charm of a traditional walk up building.
description: Beautiful studio apartment with amazing outdoor private patio and garden. This is a stylish, very spacious (450sqf), bright apartment right in the heart of central Hong Kong. Next to the iconic Graham street wetmarkets, a rare treat in the "old Hong Kong". Features a double bed and couch that folds out to single bed. Full wall windows make this place bright and happy, but also very quiet for its location. Behind the building is a park &birds can be heard from patio. Kitchen is gas and induction, shower, washing machine and all basic household items provided. You will love it! Very stylish and unique apartment, fresh and clean but has the charm of a traditional walk up building. Bed linen and towels  Wifi access Kitchen and fridge Iron and ironing board Washing machine (outdoor clothes drying only) All basic kitchen amenities (no microwave) (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN) is easiest to contact anytime during HK daytime hours. I can also answer via the Airbnb app or email, but not as immedia
neighborhood_overview: This a great part of central Hong Kong. It is right in the heart of the famous areas - but due to Gage street itself being more of a market street - it is very quiet at night. The local market stalls are fantastic to roam around, many cafes nearby and even a French wine shop right next door. You are steps away from Hollywood road, 1 min  all to shueng wan MTR station and can even walk to Hong Kong airport express station in 10 min. I absolutely fell in love with this location and I am sure you will really enjoy it too!
transit: MTR station shueng wan is a couple Min walk. Taxis come every few seconds at nearby intersections just a minutes walk away (lyndhurst terrace is best) Many buses go along Wellington street and Hollywood as well as down on queens road, just a short walk away. Short Walking distance to LKF, soho, shueng wan, IFC shopping mall and many more central locations.
access: Bed linen and towels  Wifi access Kitchen and fridge Iron and ironing board Washing machine (outdoor clothes drying only) All basic kitchen amenities (no microwave)
interaction: (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN) is easiest to contact anytime during HK daytime hours. I can also answer via the Airbnb app or email, but not as immediate.
house_rules: This is a traditional walk up building so it has a few special points: Please follow water heater instructions on wall beside switch in kitchen. Please do not leave the heater on constantly as it is dangerous and can overheat/leak. It only takes around 10min to warm up and often the water will stay hot for a long time after. The water in the kitchen is not connected to the hot water cylinder. If you really need to wash something with hot water, will need to boil the kettle and add to sink.   Feel free to use the kitchen and basic such as oil/salt/sugar etc - if you need any other ingredients the market is just downstairs or feel free to message me a question.  I have a dog who lives in the apartment normally. As I am away I will take her away during bookings, but please keep this in mind if you have strong allergies as she would have been in the house and despite thorough cleaning this could still cause you irritation if you are allergic to dogs. Wifi is provided and will send a passwo

host.host_about: Born in Russia but grew up in New Zealand, I now live and work in Hong Kong. Travel often for work and for fun, I am happy to share my apartment with fellow travellers so they can enjoy the heart of Hong Kong.

address.street: Hong Kong , Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

reviews.comments: Отличное месторасположение. Пешая и очень удобная доступность до всех транспортных узлов (метро, автовокзал, порт). Рядом магазины  и рынок со свежими овощами, фруктами, рыбой, мясом. За бутылочкой вина вообще в тапочках можно сходить. Прекрасная, внимательная хозяйка. Квартира небольшая, но уютная, очень спасает терраса. Наверное можно сказать о том, что есть небольшие бытовые неудобства в виде отсутствия горячей воды на кухне и душевая кабина находится на террасе, но нам это никаких проблем не доставило. Единственное серьезное неудобство - отсутсвие переходников под евро вилки, но я думаю, что Катя купит еще штучки три-четыре и тогда все будет просто прекрасно.
nice stay and Katya is a very helpful host
Great location and wonderful host. Katya was very responsive and attentive even when she was traveling abroad. Her place was clean, comfortable and cozy. Definitely recommend it!

房子很干净,整洁,需要的东西全都有,空调冰箱淋浴洗衣机都很好使｡沙发可以拆成一张床,我们三个人住正好｡Katya还给我们准备了零食和饮品放在冰箱里,非常贴心!!还准备了很多贴士给我们提醒和参考｡房屋处于港岛的生活区,非常有香港气息,夜晚安静不喧闹,适合居住｡房子位于中环和上环之间,靠近上环,距离地铁站不算远｡但是对应的地铁口到站台的距离有点远,而且从地铁站到房屋一路都是上坡路,带大件较重行李,建议打车前往｡第一次去可能有点晕,房子在蘭芳園那条路上,房间楼门口隔壁是家水果店｡房间在二层,但是走楼梯的感觉像在三层,没有电梯,同样较重行李的朋友请考虑｡不过我们三个妹子提着重重的行李一样上去了!总的来说房子很不错,交接也很简单,非常方便!

Thank you Katya, even if only one night, we had a great stay! So nice location and mini terrace outside (cosy:)). I just feel a little bit unconvenience of mirror not being in front of basin but generally ok. I also loved the atmosphere of your travel experience a lot. Hope you have a better days nowafter
Great location, easy access and amazing wine bar downstairs
Katya is nice and helpful. Good location and easy to access. Apartment is clean and tidy.

The flat is perfectly situated if you enjoy walking to the city. There are lots of third wave coffees nearby. The market is round the corner and supermarkets as well. The metro is about 10 min walking distance. We definitely recommend staying at this place as it is cosy, perfectly equipped with everything you need. Katya was a perfect host, available via (Hidden by Airbnb) all the time!

This is one of those reviews that you don't want to write because the more people know how wonderful Katya's place is, the harder it will be to find available dates for a return trip! :-)
Seriously, best. Airbnb. experience. EVER. The studio was perfect for us, with kitchen and patio space. The host is the sweetest I've never met :-) The location is silly, you can't throw a rock without hitting a Michelin rated restaurant, many of them reasonably priced and even doable with a toddler. Yes. Toddler.  There are two grocery stores just on her block, though again, with the restaurant options, why bother? Oh! because sometimes it is lovely to just relax on her patio with a glass of wine and snacks and a moment of privacy in this busy and beautiful city. There is some construction happening in the area, so if you like to sleep in that might be the only *minor* hesitation. But honestly, you're in Hong Kong - sleep can happen when you go home ;-)
And Katya was beyond thoughtful and accommodating with all of our questions and late arrival. How should I wrap this up? Oh yeah... 
Best. Airbnb. Ever. 
Enjoy!

일단, 제가 가본 홍콩 숙소&호텔중 가격대비 가장 마음에들었습니다. 또 좋아하는 식당근처여서 위치가 저한텐 정말정말 좋았습니다. 체크인 체크아웃도 간단하면서 정확했어요. 방도 넓고 딱 필요한것만 있어서 여행자들한텐 딱 좋은 곳인듯 합니다. 
다만 ‘호텔이 아니라 진짜 사는집입니다’ 라고 공지해주신대로 집안이 좀 춥고 샤워하기가 아주 쬐꼼 불편했지만 다른것으로 다 커버되는 그런곳이네요. 다음번에도 또 홍콩을 가게된다면 꼭 이곳에 다시 묵고싶어요 ^.^ 

Katya’s house is good location, simple check in-out and cozy room. i hoep to booking If i travel to HK again.
Katya is a very good host, she replied messages very quick! The house is very stylish and you will really love it :)

Having been to Hong Kong a few times for both work and fun, Katya’s place is one of the ones which has been the most central and amidst the bustle of night life and drinking places. We were only able to book the place a few days before our trip, but we were lucky to have chanced on this gem of a house. 

While most apartments in Hong Kong are small and have just enough space for sleep and daily activities, Katya’s space was slightly larger than the norm and had a beautiful terrace that overlooked a quiet street. The apartment was opposite a construction site during the time that we rented the space, it also meant that the street was secluded while still being in a central location in which most of the bars and restaurants were within walking distance. The construction also only started at later times and our sleep was never disturbed! 

We were in Hong Kong for the art events that were taking place and we were happy that the apartment was near H Queens and we could access Art Central and Art Basel by walking (although that was of a slightly longer distance so we took Uber instead.) The apartment was also near some of the cool, hip shops and cafes which meant that it was easy to drop off items that we bought before heading to another location. 

Katya also left little notes around the house and a booklet which made us feel welcomed and comfortable at this space. She also provided some bottles of water and some snacks which was really nice after a tiring flight. 

This was definitely one of our best experiences in an airbnb in Hong Kong and would love to stay in this great place if we ever visited Hong Kong in future!
Excellent location and nice room though the room was a bit too dusty and did not have any shampoo or soap.
Great location, surprisingly quiet. Really good communication from Katya. Thanks!

Katya are affable, friendly and considerate, she’s prepared some snacks and cook book for me❤️

Cozy place and worth it, but the TV and audio is not working.

Perfect little apartment right in the center of town. Even though you are in the busy part of central, it feels calm and secluded in the apartment, but you get full access to all the local spots in central. Katya is a great host and is very responsive. Would definitely stay here again!
地理位置很好,katya人很nice,很不错的地方!
Lovely flat, right in the centre of Hong Kong. Perfect for my first HK experience.
We had a very nice stay at Katya’s place. Very well located and convenient flat. The communication with Katya was very nice and smooth.
Good location

部屋全体にﾎｽﾄの生活感や使用感がかなりありました｡
表面的には片付けられていますが､ほこりや動物の毛があり､清潔とは言えませんでした｡
また､部屋には常に特有の匂いがありました｡
用意されているはずのﾀｵﾙはありませんでした｡ﾎｽﾄはすぐに対応してくれましたが､個人的な引き出しにあるものを使用するように指示されたので､抵抗を感じました｡
ﾗﾝﾄﾞﾘｰには､洗濯物がそのまま放置されていました｡

また､ﾎｯﾄｼｬﾜｰがすぐに水になり､満足に入浴できませんでした｡
部屋の解錠に常に時間がかかり､ｽﾄﾚｽを感じました｡

値段は相場より高く感じましたが､滞在中にｽﾄﾚｽを感じることが多かったです｡

Katya's place is just few minutes from the centre where you can find lots of restaurants and bars. very convenient! you can also chill in the balcony with pot plants. the bathroom is also in the balcony area but it's not a problem at all. would definitely recommend it!

Very easy check in, host was very communicative. Katya is also super thoughtful and suggested some vinyl records for us to listen to from her collection. Location is excellent, very close to all transportation and in the heart Hong Kong.

This is a great (and rare!) flat in the center of HK! I especially liked that it had a charming little outdoor space. This space may be less attractive in extreme weather, but luckily we had a great time while there. Katya made our trip extra special by leaving wine, snacks and a guide for us. We appreciated all the finer touches! Perfect location for site-seeing and enjoying HK Island. Thanks Katya!

name: Family Vacation in NYC, Close to the City!
summary: Huge duplex in a classic Brooklyn Brownstone. 2 bedrooms, three bathrooms, amazing chef's kitchen, deck and back yard just short walk to the nearest metro (J/M) and around the corner from one of NYC's best restaurants (Saraghina)! Close to Manhattan and neighbor to Williamsburg! Central AC, heat, free WIFI, washer dryer, shampoo, hair dryer, iron and ironing board and other necessities included! Queen bed, full bed, comfy cot and sofa sleeps a total 6. Base rate includes linens for two beds.
space: The living room and kitchen and one of the three bathrooms are on the first floor of the house, just up the stoop stairs. The bedrooms are on the top floor along with two bathrooms with skylights and tons of space! Parties of 3-4 requiring the cot and/or sofa for sleeping will pay a one time linen fee of $20 for each.
description: Huge duplex in a classic Brooklyn Brownstone. 2 bedrooms, three bathrooms, amazing chef's kitchen, deck and back yard just short walk to the nearest metro (J/M) and around the corner from one of NYC's best restaurants (Saraghina)! Close to Manhattan and neighbor to Williamsburg! Central AC, heat, free WIFI, washer dryer, shampoo, hair dryer, iron and ironing board and other necessities included! Queen bed, full bed, comfy cot and sofa sleeps a total 6. Base rate includes linens for two beds. The living room and kitchen and one of the three bathrooms are on the first floor of the house, just up the stoop stairs. The bedrooms are on the top floor along with two bathrooms with skylights and tons of space! Parties of 3-4 requiring the cot and/or sofa for sleeping will pay a one time linen fee of $20 for each. You'll have exclusive access to everything you see in the pictures including the deck. The back yard is shared with our tenants below but they are rarely out there and very nice! We l
neighborhood_overview: Bed Stuy is a vibrant neighborhood in Brooklyn that is famous for it's upstart restaurants and it's booming real estate market. Bed Stuy boasts some of the most classic architecture of Brooklyn and beautiful tree lined streets and is the destination of many film makers. Countless TV show and films set in NYC or BK has been filmed, at least in part, in Bed Stuy, often transforming the streets into a scene from the late 1800's because that's when all of these homes were built! Boardwalk Empire, The Knick and countless other shows are filmed here.  We've got a great selection of hip restaurants and cafes in the neighborhood and one of NYC's finest restaurants, Saraghina, is just around the corner. We've also got a French restaurant just on the next block!  There is a bustling shopping area on Broadway, where you will usually take the train, so you can food shop on your way home from a long day's adventure! Our guests tend to love the neighborhood and we suggest you read our reviews to get
notes: The sofa in the living room is huge and very soft and comfy. It is not a sofabed but it might as well be! It makes for a great bed for one person and if you are a party of five or six we will make it up as a bed with linens and pillows. It's like sleeping on a cloud!
transit: We are only 0.6 miles away from two different metro stations serving three different trains. Our favorite is the Halsey street J train which runs above ground on parts of Broadway so you get a rare view from on high using our favorite train! Using the A/C trains you can get to places in Manhattan like the 9/11 memorial in 35 minutes door to door or be in the heart of the Lower East Side (Essex Market) in just 30 minutes! Other destinations further north take a little longer but everything is within reach of our house! Williamsburg is 20 minutes away using the metro.
access: You'll have exclusive access to everything you see in the pictures including the deck. The back yard is shared with our tenants below but they are rarely out there and very nice!
interaction: We love to chat with guests but if privacy is what you want we understand! We only enter the house if there is something to fix or if you have asked us to visit.
house_rules: - 1)No mail deliveries - 2)No moving furniture - 3)No guests other than those on the reservation - 4)Please respect our neighbors and keep the volume down between 10pm-7am - 5)Respect the check in/out times

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: Hi, I'm Savannah! I live upstairs from the apartment. I love travel and great food which is why I'm a chef here in NYC! I've worked in several restaurants in and around BK and my job keeps me busy and happy! I love hosting on Airbnb because of all of the interesting people that I get to meet. Welcome to Brooklyn, one of the best cities on earth!

reviews.comments: My BEST Airbnb experience yet! The house is beautiful and well situated in a great neighborhood just a short walk from an AMAZING restaurant! The metro is only a short walk away and gets you into the city in about 35 minutes! Savannah was great and very helpful. I'd definitely stay here again! My family and I all had more than enough room in this HUGE home! I always have pretty great experiences when I stay in Airbnbs, but this was by far the best I've ever seen. The value for the amount of space and all the amenities (washer and dryer! Score!) felt like I was let in on a little secret of Brooklyn. Thanks again, Savannah!

Very helpful and kind hosts. The place had everything for our week's stay - washing machine, tumbler, open kitchen, lounge space, good bedrooms. Everything worked perfect. Hosts were very quick and responsive.

Savannah is a great host. She is very responsive and easy to reach. The rooms are nice and clean. The area is quiet and not far from the subway. I loved the piano in the house!! Definitely recommend staying at their place!

Savannah's place is amazing! We loved it. It's spacious, great location, beautifully decorated, amazing value. All around great. We vacation in Brooklyn every Memorial Day and hoping to stay there again next year. Our kids were sad to leave the house.  Can't wait to visit again.

What a lovely home. And huge! We really enjoyed having so much space instead of a cramped city hotel room. The kitchen was a joy to be in and we had everything we needed. We felt like real Brooklynites! Brooklyn has a great vibe, quite different than Manhattan, and worth some time exploring. Williamsburg is a fun place with lots to do. We ended up taking Lyft rides everywhere because we were visiting locals that had certain places they wanted to go, so I can not report on using the subway from this home. Carsten was super helpful as well. Great time had by all.

Savannah was very communicative. The place was great, just as advertised and we really enjoyed our stay. Highly recommend it to anyone and I would definitely stay here if i'm back in Brooklyn with my friends again.
The space was amazing! Carsten was very responsive and helpful. Check-in and check-out was extremely easy. I would love to stay there again when I return to NYC!

The house is well equipped and of a great size for 2 couples or more. The lounge is comfortable and the kitchen has everything you would need. A short walk from the Metro or an uber/taxi to Manhattan. Check in was easy and Savannah helped us with our bags for a late flight. Great AirBnb!

Savannah's place was clean and exactly as advertised. It is a very spacious unit with plenty of room for multiple guests: 2 bedrooms, a pulled out bed, large couch, and 3 bathrooms. She was very easy to contact and communicate with and was very patient with our questions. The outdoor deck area and fenced in backyard was a nice addition to the unit. The place was well equipped with everything we needed for a weekend away in Brooklyn!

Cette maison est parfaite pour passer des vacances en famille à New York. Elle est bien située dans un quartier pittoresque et dispose de tout ce qui peut faciliter la vie en vacances. L'arrivée et le départ sont très pratiques. Merci à Savannah qui a accepté de garder nos bagages quelques heures pour que nous puissions profiter de notre séjour jusqu'au dernier moment.
Terrific place

We had a lovey stay in Brooklyn. The place was just as pictured, clean, and spacious. The walk to the subway (Utica station) wasn't too far. We didn't use the kitchen but it was lovey and seemed ready to prepare a feast if that's your fancy. We really appreciated the washer and dryer as it was super hot and humid while we visited, so we threw clothes in the washer once we arrived home from exploring for the day. The neighbors were friendly and we felt safe walking anytime, morning and night. Savannah and Carsten were super helpful and answered all of our questions quickly. They also suggested the Honduran restaurant when we requested a recommendation. We ate at Milk and Pull and Natural Blend around the corner on Malcolm X and enjoyed it. We also ate at La Perla Del Ulua a short and cheap Uber or Lyft ride (less than $10) away. The restaurant is authentic Honduran, we enjoyed the carne asada, baleada, and tajeditas con carne. It is cash only and the a service was a little inattentive but the restaurant was slow and the waitress was quick to respond to any of our requests. My Honduran husband was please with the traditional cuisine and we always appreciate being able to get a little taste of home. We would love to stay at Savannah's place again if we were to return to Brooklyn.

Great place, really lovely, spacious, beautifully  decorated, sweet yard out back. Totally unexpected for New York. Neighborhood is gritty, urban and partly gentrified. We loved it. And loved the restaurant recommendation (Saraghina, for both pizza and for morning pastries). Savannah was a great host and the directions, check-in and check-out were super easy (we had to check in very late). Five stars!

Belle maison au coeur d'un "vrai quartier" de Brooklyn. Belle expérience à vivre. Tout le nécessaire est présent dans la maison pour passer un séjour formidable. La petite supérette Healthway située au carrefour en face est parfaite pour gérer le quotidien et compléter les produits frais achetés sur le marché d'Union Square. Deux stations située à 10' (Utica & Kosuscko) permettent d'atteindre le coeur de Manhattan en 40' et de gérer facilement ses déplacements avec les subways directs ou locaux. Nous reviendrons à NYC !!

The house is beautifully designed; very comfortable and attractive. The subway network was good and the apartment was a ten minute walk from the station we used. Unfortunately we didn't meet the host or have much contact which was a shame. Otherwise a great stay.
Savannah's place is quite lovely. Updates are beautiful, beds are comfortable.  Thank you for sharing your wonderful home with us.

Amazing place, first time staying in Brooklyn, we really enjoyed the location. 
A lot of food nearby chinese, thai, indian, jamaican, indonesian.  Subway will take you to manhattan in 30'.
The apartment is lovely, clean, silently, safe neighborhood, we did appreciate the washer and drier.

Absolutely loved Savannah's place.  Pics depicted exactly as her home is and would move into a home like this tomorrow, very quirky and lovely design features.
Subway about 15 min walk from house which was no problem in morning but in the evening after shopping / sightseeing felt like a hike.  One of the three nights we stayed we had comments made at us by people on the stoops as we passed by which was a little uncomfortable.
Really lovely outside area at the house but would benefit by table chairs on the deck as downstairs area felt as if it belonged to downstairs neighbours and weather would encourage outside living which we couldn't experience.
The house felt like someone else's home and that we were somewhat intruding, there was food left in the fridge and freezer, yet the dinnerware available was not suitable for 4 guests or cooking dinners.  Aircon in house very noisy but nothing good earplugs won't sort out.
On our last night there was what sounded like gunshots outside the house with a police helicopter hovering above for most of night and next morning when we left.  This may have just been an isolated incident that we were unfortunate enough to happen upon.
Putting the negatives aside, we loved the house.
Savannah's place is located in the heart of Brooklyn. There are groccery stores near by. It takes a bit long to get into the city because of the traffic. But very easy parking. Thank you!

Very big and nice house in a typical neighborhood. We just missed a little more care of the details in the kitchen.
We didn't meet Savanah personally but she was very helpful at any time answering our questions.

Our stay in New York, at Savannah's home has been such great experience for our family. Her house is very nice and confortable. Brooklin looks like being in a movie. Communication and suggestion made by our great host was very helpfull ! Thank you so much.

Savannah and Carsten were great hosts!!!  If you're heading to a vacation in NYC this Airbnb is a MUST book. The pictures don't do her place justice.  It's beautifully decorated, airy, clean and the linens are top quality. The location was perfect for exploring Manhattan, Coney Island, Dumbo, Brooklyn and so much more. Carsten was very helpful to our family of 5 and stopped by to make sure we had enough linens and such. The cot and couch were made up for our boys and turned out to be very comfortable for both of them (each boy is over 6'2ft). The kitchen was perfect for cooking, and the deck/garden area was very nice as well.  I can't wait to return to Savannah's and know I will be in my home away from home.

Nous avons passé un très bon séjour chez Savannah. L'appartement est grand et confortable. Le quartier est "pittoresque". Nous n'avons jamais eu de sentiment d'insécurité de nuit comme jour. Il faut près de 35 minutes en métro pour rejoindre le centre de Manhattan, métro accessible en 10 minutes à pied. Nombreux commerces et restaurants à proximité. Nous n'avons pas rencontré Savannah mais nous avons eu une bonne communication.
This place is cozy and magical. Small town vibe in the middle of the big city. You'll love it

Прекрасный дом! Мы жили семьей из четырех человек, всем было комфортно и уютно, очень чисто. Классная кухня, много посуды и различных специй, готовить было одно удовольствие. Удобное расположение, безопасный район, рядом метро и продуктовые магазины. Всем рекомендую!
We loved the neighborhood. The home is beautiful and well kept. Breakfast or lunch at the Healthyway a must!!
Logement super! Très jolie déco. On n'a vraiment pas été déçu. Le seul hic un peu loin de Manhattan en transports publics (bon c'est surtout qu'on n'a pas l'habitude des longues distances en Suisse;)
Such a cute and quaint place. Very spacious living room/ kitchen area. Great bedrooms and bathrooms. Everything as pictured. We really enjoyed our stay.
Great locations! Even better host!
These accommodations are among my favorite! Just gorgeous space- great for 2 couples! Great value.

Beautiful home, perfectly clean. A few options exist for buying groceries just one or two blocks away. We found parking very near the front door. Overall it was a lovely stay in a lovely home in a lovely part of NYC.

The brownstone was beautiful; huge, bathrooms and kitchen were all updated. It was so nice to have a separate bedroom and bathroom for the kids. 
Only concern was location. We didn't feel safe walking around at night and had to rely on Uber. Everywhere we wanted to go during the day was quite a walk. We did take the subway into Manhattan one day, but didn't feel comfortable coming back on subway and taking the walk back, so we ubered. 
Check in and check out was super

The place is beautiful. Worked perfectly for us with two bedrooms and three bathrooms. The washer and dryer was a lifesaver, since two of us came from another trip and one was headed on another directly from Brooklyn. Go to Manny's for breakfast -- only a few blocks away!

We had a fabulous week staying in Savannah's house, 10 min walk to the subway gave us easy access to anywhere. The local area has plenty of choices for delis and several eating out options within a few minutes walk. THe immediate area was quiet (by NYC standards) and people were very friendly. We didn't meet our host but communications were good and check in and out was easy. The house itself is lovely, my daughter enjoyed playing the piano. the master bedroom was super comfy. the bed in the second double room was quite firm but was fine for us, the single bed in the living room was ideal for our teenage son. We didn't cook but the kitchen was well equipped for anybody who wanted to use it. All in all, a great place to stay.

Le logement de Savannah est formidable. Un salon avec un divan hyper confortable, des lits super confortables aussi, 2 salles de bain (dont une pour la chambre des maîtres), une salle d'eau au rez-de-chaussée. Le style de l'appartement est magnifique. Savannah nous a donné de précieux conseils avant d'arriver à New York. Le dialogue avec elle est très simple. Nous n'avons pas eu besoin de ses services lors de notre séjour à New York. Le lieu où est situé l'appartement nous a un peu déçu. Le quartier n'est pas des plus accueillant mais tout est sécuritaire. Il ne faut pas se laisser impressionner par ce qu'on voit. Tout le monde est bien sympathique. Mais bon, ce n'est pas encore Williamsburgh, Greenpoint ou Bushwick. L'appartement est situé à 15 minutes du métro. Le soir, après une longue journée de marche à travers la ville, ça peut être un point négatif! Malgré tout ça, je recommande sans hésitation cet appartement.

We loved Savannah's house.   It exceeded our expectations. 
It was comfortable, clean, attractive, well-lit, well-equipped and with many interesting touches - art works, quirky furniture etc.  Bathrooms and bedrooms were absolutely up to standard.  

Having a piano was a bonus.

Thank you Savannah and Carsten.
Everything was perfect ! We've loved Savannah's lovely home, very comfortable and well decorated. My family and I have had a great time here. We highly recommend this place !
Geweldig huis in een opkomende buurt. Vlakbij winkels en restaurants.
great stay! large, two bedroom, two floors.  good kitchen for a full thanksgiving feast!

We enjoyed our stay in Savannah’s home! I like the clean, stylish and lovely house. 
Bathroom and bed are very clean and comfortable.
We are really satisfied our stay.

Loved this place! Lots and lots of quirky atmosphere, 10 minutes walk from Utica Avenue Station on the A or C line which takes you directly into Manhattan. The place was super clean, with all amenities as described by Susannah. If you like cooking like me, the kitchen is your dream come true. Cozy, nice and warm in these winter days, we truly enjoyed staying and would love to repeat the stay some time in the future.

we had great day and feel like at home, it is very well located, you can move through Brooklyn by bus and in Manhattan by subway, many nice restaurants within small walk and people around are nice and friendly, we like to come back one day.

Me and my friends stayed in this awesome house for 9 nights. We lived without any inconvenience during our stay here. Also, it was warm even though there was a snow storm.

Good atmosphere, comfortable and a stylish interior.

There were many subway stations, bus stops and marts near the house.

We loved it so much, thank you.

Das Haus in Brooklyn war genau das, was wir gesucht hatten. Die Bilder beschreiben das Haus ziemlich gut. Die Ausstattung ist super, es lässt sich alles damit kochen. Fast direkt nebenan ist ein kleiner Laden und mehrere Subway Stationen sind in 10 min Laufentfernung. Das Preis-Leistungsverhältnis ist großartig.
Savannah is a wonderful host. The home was clean, beautiful designed and easily accessible to where we needed to get to. Highly recommend!

name: The Lighthouse @ Iluka Resort Apartments
summary: The Lighthouse is a light filled well appointed apartment located in Palm Beaches exclusive Iluka Apartments in the heart of Palm Beach Village.
space: It's only a hop, skip and a jump to Snapperman Beach's fine white sands opposite, or linger by the pool and spa in the grounds. Relax and enjoy a morning walk along the beach to the ferry wharf, or just listen to the waves curl on the shore. Convenient alternate exit to nearby gourmet cafes & resort boutiques ... not a high rise in sight. Ideal for relocation stays - a home away from home  Weekly rate available upon request Features include Queen bed in master 2 single beds in alcove style room Full bathroom Plus powder room Internal laundry facilities. Full size fridge Microwave / convection oven

It's only a hop, skip and a jump to Snapperman Beach's fine white sands opposite, or linger by the pool and spa in the grounds. Relax and enjoy a morning walk along the beach to the ferry wharf, or just listen to the waves curl on the shore. Convenient alternate exit to nearby gourmet cafes & resort boutiques ... not a high rise in sight. Full size fridge Microwave / convection oven The guest has the entire apartment to themselves to enjoy. Access to the apartment is via the building front door back gate and roller door. Early check in can be arranged by prior arrangement with host. Beach Stays will be contactable via Phone if t
neighborhood_overview: Palm Beach, affectionately known as 'Palmy', is situated at the end of Barrenjoey Peninsula, less than an hour's drive from Sydney Harbour Bridge, the Opera House and the CBD. Palm Beach is blessed with a unique contrast of lush evergreen bushland and beaches of golden sand, and enveloped by the pristine waters of the Pacific Ocean and the calm sailing paradise of Pittwater. Just a short boat ride and a packed lunch and you're able to enjoy some of the most beautiful and isolated beaches in Sydney.
transit: Palm Beach is accessible by a few different methods, the most interesting of which is by Sea plane, either Sydney Seaplanes or Sydney by Seaplane are able to get you there safely. From Sydney airport you can pre book a shuttle bus, try My Shuttle or ASN or grab a taxi or Uber for the fastest journey door to door. If you have time on your side, there's a train to the city and then the L90 bus to Palm Beach.
access: The guest has the entire apartment to themselves to enjoy. Access to the apartment is via the building front door back gate and roller door. Early check in can be arranged by prior arrangement with host.
interaction: Beach Stays will be contactable via Phone if there is a problem.
house_rules: Noise to be kept to a minimum after 10pm. Strictly no parties or smoking inside the property.

name: Nice and Big Room Next to Trump Towers
summary: My home is quiet big, convenient and really close to all transportations. Trump Towers' back door is just across to my apartment. So you can enter the mall in 1 minute. You can pass the Metrobus or subway through the mall. Mecidiyeköy bus stations are 5 minutes by walk. There always is taxi that passing right in front of the building. The apartment has 3 rooms and a living room. You see only photos of living room and the rental one. It will be a pleasure to host you in my apartment :)
description: My home is quiet big, convenient and really close to all transportations. Trump Towers' back door is just across to my apartment. So you can enter the mall in 1 minute. You can pass the Metrobus or subway through the mall. Mecidiyeköy bus stations are 5 minutes by walk. There always is taxi that passing right in front of the building. The apartment has 3 rooms and a living room. You see only photos of living room and the rental one. It will be a pleasure to host you in my apartment :)

host.host_about: I'm living in Istanbul, I'm a psychological consultant in a high school and I'm also doing cosmic energy thearpy. I love dancing tango.

name: Apartamento no Flamengo para temporadas
summary: Complete kitchen with microwave, stove, coffee maker, large fridge and all new utensils. Laundry room with washing machine and small sink. Near to the Flamengo's Park, public transport (100 m)from the Flamengo subway station and bus stop in front of the building), bars, restaurants, supermarkets and shops. The largest bedroom has a queen bed, wardrob,front view , air conditioning and extra space and the second bedroom,has a double bed and ceiling fan.  24 hour concierge and security. Welcome!
space: Vide fotos
description: Complete kitchen with microwave, stove, coffee maker, large fridge and all new utensils. Laundry room with washing machine and small sink. Near to the Flamengo's Park, public transport (100 m)from the Flamengo subway station and bus stop in front of the building), bars, restaurants, supermarkets and shops. The largest bedroom has a queen bed, wardrob,front view , air conditioning and extra space and the second bedroom,has a double bed and ceiling fan.  24 hour concierge and security. Welcome! Vide fotos Terão toda a assistência da nossa parte e será um prazer recebê-los. O bairro do Flamengo é um lugar amigável,com um Parque imenso, com muitas diversões e próximo aos pontos turísticos do Rio de Janeiro. O carioca é um povo amável e adora receber visitas. A estação do metrô fica a 5 minutos de caminhada do apartamento. Os ônibus circulam para várias localidades do Rio de Janeiro.  Estamos próximos ao aeroporto Santos Dumont, Pão de Açúcar e saída de Vans da Prefeitura diretamente para o
neighborhood_overview: O bairro do Flamengo é um lugar amigável,com um Parque imenso, com muitas diversões e próximo aos pontos turísticos do Rio de Janeiro. O carioca é um povo amável e adora receber visitas.
notes: O local não permite festas no apartamento.
transit: A estação do metrô fica a 5 minutos de caminhada do apartamento. Os ônibus circulam para várias localidades do Rio de Janeiro.  Estamos próximos ao aeroporto Santos Dumont, Pão de Açúcar e saída de Vans da Prefeitura diretamente para o Corcovado ( Cristo Redentor ). .
interaction: Terão toda a assistência da nossa parte e será um prazer recebê-los.
house_rules: - 22:00 - 07:00 h horário silêncio - Listagem das pessoas que estarão acompanhando, para permissão de entrada na portaria do Edifício

host.host_location: Jardim Vila Mariana, São Paulo, Brazil

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments: Ótimo apartamento na zona sul do Rio de Janeiro. Super limpo, espaçoso e bem equipado. Recomendo.

We stayed here for three nights and Paulo and his daughter were in constant contact with us  helping to answer any questions as well as providing useful tourist information. Upon arrival they had printed some suggested restaurants and some local landmarks to help us navigate around easier. They also met us on arrival to walk us through the apartment. The apartment is very clean and comfortable. These are by far the best hosts that I have ever had at an air BNB, can't say enough about how great they both were.

Fui com mais dois amigos e tivemos uma ótima estadia! O Paulo e a Cláudia (esposa) são muito receptivos e dispostos. O apartamento é bem localizado (metrô, restaurantes, supermercado) e muito aconchegante!
Apartamento excelente, limpo e confortável.

Non posso dire altro che grazie, l’appartamento è stato perfetto, la nostra settimana a Rio è stata fantastica perché avevamo questo posto per poterci riposare ogni volta volevamo! Tutti i comfort presenti, per una famiglia è l’ideale. Zona tranquilla, supermercato sotto casa aperto fino alle 10! 
Fantastico, lo consiglio vivamente!
Grazie Laura

Estivemos no Rio no Reveillon de 2018 e adoramos tudo! O apartamento é muito bem localizado, com mercado, padaria e restaurantes na mesma rua, e também fica de fácil à pontos turísticos.
Sobre o apartamento, é muito idêntico às fotos, tudo muito limpo e bem equipado. O apartamento possui portaria 24h, quartos grandes e bem ventilados. Podemos destacar a recepção e hospitalidade do Paulo, que foi muito gentil e nos deu muitas dicas ótimas para aproveitarmos nossa estadia no Rio. 
Sem dúvidas voltaremos em breve! Obrigada por tudo Paulo, foi ótimo estar em seu apartamento!

I often visit RIO but this expérience was the best ever. The flat was so clean. Paulo Cesar is so helpfull an reactive + informations available about restaurants, bars. Supermarket just downstairs. Everything is done to make you Feel at home. Even the doormen smile downstairs  (not so common in rio). I will come back and definitly recommand to friends.  Thks again Paulo Cesar.

Paulo e Claudia foram atenciosos e nos deixaram a vontade. Lugar exatamente como nas fotos. Limpo, bem localizado, todo reformado e com tudo o que precisamos! Metrô pertinho, perto do Aterro! Padaria muito boa a meio quarteirão! Recomendo!

Paulo e sua esposa foram muito simpáticos e atenciosos no que diz respeito à dicas do RJ. Não foi preciso levar nada, o ap tem toalhas e roupas de cama à disposição.
Recomendaria, se fosse possível um ar condicionado na sala (O Rio é muito quente!!!) Mas não é nada que desabone o ap que é muito limpo. A internet também é excelente, assim como o quadro de canais da tv a cabo - Parabéns!!!
Recomendo muito o local e quando retornarmos para o RJ certamente procuraremos ficar no mesmo lugar!

O apartamento e muito confortável, limpíssimo, e muito agradável. O predio tb e muito limpo e agradável, com funcionários simpáticos e prestativos.
O bairro e ótimo com varias facilidades no entorno como supermercado, banco, restaurantes ,bares,  farmácia, etc. Muito próximo das praias de Copacabana, Ipanema e Leblon e aeroporto Santos Dumont.
A única critica e que a rua onde esta o predio e bem movimentada tendo um pouco de barulho na parte da manha,  mas não me incomodou muito, isto por  que moro num bairro muito silencioso e não estou acostumada com barulho.
Mas gostei muito de me hospedar nesse apto e voltarei novamente.

Apartanento maravilhoso, muito bem equipado, limpo, tudo Novo.
Localização excelente, ao lado de supermercado e próximo à restaurantes e farmácia. 
A uma quadra da praia do Flamengo.
Recepção maravilhosa do Paulo e da Claudia, muito atenciosos.
Sem dúvida, a melhor hospedagem airbnb que já fiquei!
Locação excelente, fica perto de Metro, supermercados, farmácias e praia. O paulo e a Claudia são muitos simpáticos, ajudaram-me muito.
Paulo's hospitality is incredible. This place is amazing, cozy and with a good energy. A lot of services at walking distance. This host makes the Airbnb greater.
Lugar ótimo. Localização excelente. Muito bem recebido pelo (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza voltarei.

Great Location, Excellent local tips, Grocery Store on the 1st floor (easy to haul groceries and water just up the elevator), and $R10 uber ride to Copacabana beach.  Best place to stay a bit away from the tourist locations and still be able to have a great time at Copacabana or Ipanema beaches.  Local tips for easy no hassle visits to Christo Redentor and Pao de Azucar.  The space was comfortable, clean, and secure.  Lots of hot water and great water pressure.  All around an excellent stay.  There is only one air conditioner in the apartment, which is in the master bedroom.  Just something to be aware of if you have guests who will be sleeping in the second bedroom.  There is a ceiling fan in the second bedroom but no AC.  I would recommend staying here.

This place is amazing . Great apartment with most of the amenities you need. Washer in the house , great internet, cable, the beds are very comfortable, the area is safe and there is a concierge there 24/7. The host are amazing and always ready to help if you have a problem. They are extremely professional, polite and courteous. I go to Rio every year and I will rent again with them for sure.
The apartment is exactly like the photos and has everything necessary for a great stay in Rio! The hosts are super nice and helpful. Thank you Paulo and Claudia!

O apartamento é incrível. Extremamente limpo, confortável e com uma localização invejável. O Paulo é uma ótima pessoa, foi sempre super atencioso e simpático com a gente. A estadia foi tão agradável, que nos fez sentir-se em casa, sem sombra de dúvidas voltaremos outras vezes.

A Cláudia e o Paulo são anfitriões excelentes e de muito bom gosto. O apartamento é bastante confortável, bem limpo e com tudo funcionando muito bem. A localização do prédio é ótima, e os porteiros são muito simpáticos. Espero que esteja disponível na próxima vez que eu voltar ao Rio.

lugar 100 % recomendado ¡¡¡
zona tranquila, super mercado cerca, cerca a la mayoria de las atracciones turistica , departamento limpio y comodo 
nos sentimos como en casa¡¡¡¡

O apto é exatamente como na foto. Muito bem localizado com um mercado abaixo do prédio. O metrô é muito próximo. De táxi ou outro app de deslocamento as praias aptas para banho ficam muito acessíveis.
A internet da casa é ótima a TV a cabo é bem completa e a casa tem todos utensílios necessários.
O Paulo foi muito comunicativo fazendo tudo ocorrer 100% na nossa estadia.

name: A cute house in 4Levent
summary: A little small (80m2) and an intimate house. Besides all this, I have a great puppy dog (Pug). If you feel bored, you can watch movies on your big Lcd screen or play Ps4. I am sport-savvy and have some weighting devices so you can use them or the park nearby is ideal for running in the morning. It's the easiest place to get to anywhere in the city, so you can go anywhere you want for a maximum of 20 min. Also, the best coffee in the morning is made in this house. :) Love :)
