host.host_about:
Sou host de airbnb, porque adoro conviver com pessoas e a minha cidade, além disso viajar é uma das minhas prioridades. 
Sou mãe de dois rapazes e adoro cães.

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments: Vanessa fue una anfitriona muy amable. Todo fueron facilidades. Además la ubicación es perfecta. Repetiría sin duda.
Situado en una zona perfecta, sin ninguna duda repetiria

El trato ha sido excelente. La casa más grande de lo que esperaba,pues el sofá cama está en una habitación independiente del salón, y está equipada con todo lo necesario. Vino y pastas como detalle de bienvenida y una atención exquisita por parte de Vanessa y su marido. Nos recomendaron restaurantes típicos portugueses, nos señalizaron en el mapa los puntos que queriamos visitar y nos acompañaron a dejar el coche en una zona sin pago!! Además nos dejaron una cuna para nuestro bebé ( las dos mayores durmieron comodisimas en el sofa cama) y estuvieron pendientes en todo momento,cada día de nuestra estancia. Recomendable 100%!!! No busques más!! Y a un paseo del puerto!! Hemos ido andando a todas partes y eso que íbamos con tres niños. Gracias por todo, o brigado!! Volveremos!!!!!
Vanessa was Very Kind.  The apartment cosy, Clean and Close To The Trindade metro station
Vanessa was amazing. She answered every question promptly for us. The location was quiet but close to restaurants and everything else. We had a wonderful time at rosira house. Thanks Vanessa!

The flat is very well located, just near the historic center and 5 minutes walking of the night life. It is very quiet though as the street is a small one. Vanessa was very accomodating as we arrived quite late and we thank her for that. She has been very welcoming and made our stay in Porto much enjoyable.
Close to many sites you want to see.  Easy to walk and see everything.  Great nightlife nearby also.

Vanessa es una persona muy amable,  la atención fue muy buena, su departamento esta muy bien ubicado y equipado con lo necesario, es bastante amplio, la decoración es muy linda, lo cual hace más agradable la estadía, muy recomendable.
Nice apartment at a top location in Porto. Very friendly and helpful host.
Nous avons passés un excellent séjour dans cet appartement qui est très fonctionnel. Vanessa est à l'écoute et se met à notre disposition ! Nous recommandons vivement ce logement.
Curtimos do pouco tempo que passemos na Rosita House. A Vanessa é uma senhora muito simpática e a casa é agradável para um fim de semana no Porto
Obrigada pela hospedagem mas penso que deveria ser melhorado no quesito mofo.
The apartment was really nice, vanessa was a very friendly host. Thank you Vanessa!!

The appartment is very clean, spacious and comfortable (good bed, shower, etc.). Location is very central. Litterally one minute walk to close by bars and restaurants. Vanessa is a great host who will help you with anything you need and she is always available for any questions (very quick response on my messages). Definately recommended!
Had a great stay at Vanessa's place. Very clean and comfortable. She was available and had recommendations for our short stay in Porto.

L appartamento e semplice ma dotato di tutto ciò che serve : cucina con tutti gli accessori e macchinetta del caffè- asciugamani-shampo bagnoschiuma . La posizione è centrale, scendendo una scala ci sono locali ristoranti pub-la metro e a pochi minuti. Tutte le attrazioni principali sono a 10minuti di camminata.

Vanessa's place is very good!! Close to everything, clean and comfortable for 4 people (also for kids). She provided us with a kid-bed and kid-chair! We really enjoy our stay in Porto also thanks to this apartment! We definitely recommend it!

A warm welcome with snacks and drinks. WiFi. Cable TV. Close to every. Centre of food, shopping, dining, tours, close to the river. Best location ever. 100% recommend this place. Vanessa is friendly and professional. Obrigado

Superbe petite maison en plein cœur de porto ! 
La maison est proche des quartiers où il y a de l'animation ! Même pour une nuit c'est super et pas cher !!!

Vanessa es una excelente Hôtesse, nos atendio mas temprano de lo que debia, nos ayudo con la ubicacion de algunos lugares, el apartamento es lindo, limpio, comodo y la ubicacion es excelente.
Gracias!!!

My partner and I felt that we could really relax at Vanessa's house. It is very spacious and has a lovely kitchen and courtyard which made me feel at home. She even left us some port to try! It is a short walk to the tower and trinidade train station. I would recommend this place for anyone travelling to Porto. Thanks for having us Vanessa!

Appartement très bien situé, dans une rue calme du centre historique et proche de la vie nocturne. Vanessa nous a très bien accueilli et conseillé. Le petit extérieur pour boire un café ou un verre de vin est appréciable.

Vanessa est une hôte vraiment super" Son appartement mérite le prix d’excellence. Il y a vraiment tout a disposition. Meme le petit porto a l arrivée. :)

Appartement super grand, avec petite terrasse. Je vous le recommande vivement. Merci Vanessa :)
Très ben situé

La ubicación es estupenda para visitar el corazón histórico de Oporto, la Ribeira e incluso para disfrutar del ambiente nocturno, pues te mueves andando sin problema (está todo muy cerca). Vanesa es muy atenta, detallista y preocupada de que tengamos todo lo necesario. Te ofrece detalles de bienvenida y un plano de Oporto para conocer la ciudad. Ha sido una excelente anfitriona. Si vas a Oporto su vivienda es ideal para vivir la ciudad desde su corazón histórico. Volveré sin duda. Gracias por todo.
Very nice place !
Very nice place and a good location in a Good neighbourhood. The bed was a bit hard, otherwise than that everything was very good. Vanessa is very nice and helpful.
Excellent séjour, l'appartement est fonctionnel dans une rue calme et dans un quartier vivant.Vanessa nous a très bien accueilli et (Website hidden by Airbnb) recommande.

Excelente ubicación. La casa se encuentra cerca de todo y el barrio tiene muchas opciones durante el día y durante la noche. La casa es más grande de lo que parece, perfecta para pasar varios días y sentirse como en casa. Vanessa es super amable y te brinda toda la información necesaria para moverte por la ciudad. Recomendado!
Ottimo ! Consigliato

Logement très bien situé, proche du centre historique et malgré tout très calme. Toutes commodités à proximité, commerces, métro... Très bon accueil de Vanessa qui nous guide et nous conseille dès notre arrivée. Je recommande ce logement.
bien dans l'ensemble

Veracidade 100%
Muito confortável. No centro da cidade 
Atenção muito boa.
Recomendável

I did not get to meet Vanessa, as my friend arrived before I did. But from what she said she gave her great tips where we should go and even managed to let her in before the actual check in time as she arrived earlier. The area is very central. Which sadly also meant Saturday night was quite noisy as its a GF appartment, but Sunday was a nice and quiet night. She also left us some Port Wine, which we absolutely loved!Thank you!
Todo como se ve en el anuncio. Muy cerca del centro.. Vanesa muy amable y servicial. Gracias

Location was great, on a quiet street but in a neighbourhood with many bars and restaurants that the locals go to. 

Vanessa was very helpful, gave us a ton of information when we first met her, and was quick to respond to emails before and during our stay.

L'appartement est très agréable , très propre et idéalement situé .
Très bon accueil de Vanessa avec de très bon conseils.
Nous avons passé un excellent séjour à Porto

Perfectly secluded block in the center of everything!
Lots of room and incredibly inviting.
But the true standout was vanessa for being an amazing host!

L'appartement est bien situé dans Porto, dans une petite rue calme mais proche de toutes les commodités.
L'appartement est au rdc, permet d'accueillir 4 personnes facilement.
Vanessa est sympathique, facilité l'entrée dans les lieux, a de bonnes explications sur Porto et les choses à faire. Elle a été très disponible le tout au long du séjour lorsque nous avions des questions.
Excellent accueil de Vanessa qui parle très bien français et donne de bons conseils. Appartement propre et bien situé !

Vanessa is such a wonderful host! We were traveling to Porto in a rental car. It happened to be a national day of celebration and many businesses were closing early. Our attempts to contact the car rental car office in Porto to confirm their hours were unsuccessful. Out of desperation we contacted Vanessa and asked if she could possibly find out for us. She actually took time out of her day and dropped by their office and very quickly let us know that they would be closing two hours earlier than the hours posted on their website. When we thanked her she said it was no problem as she was in that part of town anyway, but her without her kindness we would have been faced with a late car return the next day. Vanessa's gracious hospitality did not end there as she had lots of insights and suggestions that she shared about restaurants, sights and transportation that made our stay even more enjoyable. The welcoming port wine and cookies was also a nice touch.
Rosita house is on a quiet street within easy walking distance of great restaurants, shopping, sightseeing and public transportation. It is comfortable, clean and the decor is fun. We really enjoyed our stay!

Vanessa's place is very clean and corresponds to its description. We enjoyed its colorful decoration and perfect location. Vanessa is very friendly andavailable for helping her hosts and giving advice.
Muito bem localizada, pode se fazer quase todos passeios caminhando pela região, excelente custo beneficio para quem precisa conhecedor a cidade!
Logement très bien situé proche de toutes commodités, logement atypique où l'on se sent comme chez soi. Merci à vanessa pour son accueil, sa gentillesse et sa disponibilité. Je recommande fortement

Goed verblijf gehad bij Vanesss. Communicatie vooraf was pima, reageerde altijd erg snel. Bij aankomst op locatie stond ze aan het begin van de straate wachten en herkende ze me direct. 

Ze heeft ons veel tips gegeven over wat leuk was om te doen in de stad.

Appartement was prima. Geen overbodige luxe maar gewoo precies wat nodig is. De ligging was perfect. De deur uit en je staat in straatjes met gezellige terrasjes en kroegen.

Echt een aanrader
très bien, emplacement, logement,....

Le logement sent l'humidité et est humide, il est situé dans une impasse où la circulation est inexistante, malheureusement le chien de la voisine s’occupe du bruit et cela à n'importe quelle heure de la nuit.
Vanessa est très disponible et sympathique.

El lugar es tal cual en las fotos, muy céntrico, ideal para conocer la ciudad caminando, recomiendo la casa tanto como su anfitriona, ya que tuvimos algunos problemas en la cuidad no relacionados con el hospedaje y estuvo muy pendiente y como turista se agradece mucho la ayuda.

Vanessa was waiting for us in the neighborhood ans got to us as soon as we arrived.

The flat is quite huge, really dark (a really portuguese habitation), but the kitchen and dinner room are bathed by the sunlight. As well as the room but being at ground floor, the curtains stay closed almost all the time.

Everything was clean, the bed is good, a plus for the really great shower!
You have to know that, again, being at ground floor, there is noise at night. You can get woken up by drunken tourists (mostly) yelling or giggling. As we’re young, we just fell right back to sleep but now you know. 

But the flat is so well situated that can’t miss the opportunity just for the light and noise: we were at 15min tops from anything in Porto! From the bridge, riverside, any attraction you want or restaurant! The other way around is quite longer because of the hard slopes! :-) But it’s Portuguese style! We loved it! The direct street is really calm and silent, just behind a busy neighborhood which you can get in maybe 45sec. A must!

Vanessa is charming and really accommodating! She takes care of everything, even got us a cab for our way back to the airport! :-) She also left us Port and biscuits, an all the necessaries you could imagine: sweet, salt, toilet paper, sponge, etc.

Will recommend greatly! Thank you!

très bien situé, à 500m du métro, on peut faire beaucoup de visite à pied,
merci pour les petits mais vrais restaurants pas chers ou seuls (ou presque) les locaux viennent manger. Merci pour l'hospitalité. Une literie en excellent état. 
bravo

Amazing apartment Vanessa was waiting for us and allowed us early check in also gave us some port end and cookies as a welcome gift which was very nice of her ! Great location , huge place and when we checked out she very kindly kept our luggage for quite some time because we were not in the city! Thanks for the amazing hospitality ! Highly recommend!
Thanks for your hospitality Vanessa !

This location is absolutely fabulous, within walking distance of the river and close to lots of restaurants and nightlife. The space was much bigger and more comfortable than I expected. Vanessa was amazing... She would respond to messages immediately, gladly stored our bags before check-in and after check-out, and gave us some wonderful local tips that made our stay extra special!  I would definitely recommend Vanessa’s place for your stay in Porto!
The place is amazing and perfectly located. Vanessa is a great host and helped us with everything.

Acomodação espaçosa, bem organizada , limpa e equipada. Ótima localização, próximo aos principais pontos turísticos da cidade.
Além disso, encontramos anfitriões, Vanessa e esposo , extremamente competentes, organizados e simpáticos, sempre dispostos a nos ajudar. Um diferencial dessa acomodação é possuir um espaço reservado para bagagens caso check in/check out não coincidam com horário de chagada e partida dos hóspedes.
Très propre, Vanessa est très réactive, emplacement idéal pour visiter

Appartement calme et bien situé. Proche de tout, des commerces, du centre ville, de la Ribeira, c'était parfait !  Merci pour les petites attentions ( un bon petit porto et de bons petits gâteaux) . Un grand merci à Vanessa et à son mari pour nous avoir trouvé un stationnement gratuit et de nous y conduire ! N'hésitez pas, quand nous reviendrons c'est l'adresse que nous choisirons en priorité...
appartement très bien situé pour tout faire à pied. très bon accueil de vanessa qui parle français. il manque juste un peu d'ustensiles de cuisine
I can definitely recommend to stay at Vanessa's apartment. It was an outstanding experience!
Süße Wohnung in idealer Lage, alles zu Fuß erreichbar. Sehr zu empfehlen.

O apartamento está muito bem localizado, em uma rua tranquila e a poucos passos de atrações turísticas e do metrô. Vanessa nos recebeu com muita atenção e gentileza, dando ótimas sugestões e facilitando nossa estadia. O apartamento tem muito bom espaço, contando com tudo o que é necessário. A comunicação com a Vanessa foi excelente.
Recomendamos o apartamento e esperamos voltar em outra oportunidade.
Great apartment, great location and Vanessa was very helpful. Would definitely recommend.

I would highly recommend staying at Vanessa’s place...not only is it spacious and clean, it is also in a great location close to many restaurants, bars and shops! Vanessa was so friendly and helpful with suggestions for must-see places.  The apartment is very nicely decorated and a great place to relax after a long day of seeing the beautiful city of Porto!

Casa Rosita se encuentra en zona céntrica y tranquila. Se puede ir a todas partes andando, pero el metro está muy cerca. El apartamento tiene todo lo necesario yVanessa es una gran anfitriona. Recomendable sin dudar.
accueil et réactivité au top!!logement très fonctionnel très bien situé.possibillité de déposer les bagages particulièrement apprécié!vanessa est une  excellente hote

Vanessa est une hôte disponible et arrageante et agréable. Le logement est idéalement situé, à 6min à pied du métro Trindade (où passe toutes les lignes) et proche du centre ville et commodités (bar, restaurant, supérette). Pour un séjour de quelques jours, le logement convient parfaitement

Appartement idéalement situé pour visiter Porto à pieds ! 
Hôte très réactive et arrangeant !
Petits bémols, une personne est entrée dans l'appartement pour faire le menage sans que l'ont sois au courant... Rien n'avais bougé ni disparu mais juste une sensation désagréable.

Super adresse. Calme et cosy.
Hôte réactive.
Petites attentions à l’arrivée.
Une belle cafetière expresso. Pas de chance pour nous pas de dosettes adaptées.
Très bonne literie.
Awesome. Very good location. My highly recommendations
Très bon rapport qualité prix.  Rue calme et bien placée

Tal como se muestra en la publicación. Muy limpio y con todos los servicios que se necesitan en una estadía corta. Un poco lejos de la ribera, pero no es problema si te gusta caminar. Muy central, cerca del metro al aeropuerto y a la estación de trenes.
el alojamie ti era 100%veraz,parada de metro super cerca y en el centro.lo recomiendo
Very well located and clean apartment
Bon accueil, logement idéalement situé, bon prix... Ràs.
Fantastic location - right in the heart of the city. Apartment was spotless. Vanessa was friendly and quick to respond to messages. Would definitely recommend.
Nous avons été très bien reçu par Vanessa qui nous attendait devant l'appartement .L'appartement est tres bien situe au centre pres des arret des bus touristi
Vanessa was really nice and gave us great tips! :) the location is perfect! And everything was  as described. I recommend it 100%

Vanessa is wonderful host which greets with kindness and provides all information a tourist needs. Her place is cozy, stylish, warm and have everything you might need. If something is missing, Vanessa will bring it as soon as you ask. I would recommend her and her place any time!
Very clean, very good situated!
Adresse à choisir en toute confiance
Vanessa was super nice. The house is well located and is good value for its price. A bit cold though.
Добре місце. Ввічлива хазяйка. Вся техніка працює. Wi-fi - добре. Є свій маленький дворик. Всі туристичні місця поблизу 5-10 хв пішки. Для невибагливих туристів рекомендую.

Vanessa was a truly awesome host! She was very thoughtful and gave us some great advice on what to do etc. The place has everything you might ask for, nothing is missing. Also the location within the city is great. We definitely recommend this place :)

Vanessa was a perfect and very helpful host:even though we arrived very late she came to the apartment to welcome us and explain everything. The area is great and perfect for exploring the historical centre of Porto. thanks for everything !

Appartement très  propres  spacieux  5minutes metro trindat Vanessa nous  a accueilli super  gentillesse a refaire
Marie claire

O apartamento da Vanessa está excecionalmente bem localizado, numa zona muito central mas calma.
Fomos muito bem recebidos, com muita simpatia, boa disposição e dicas.
Recomendo vivamente!

name: Superb apartment on the water at Balmain
summary: My place is close to Balmain East Wharf, The Glenmore Hotel, and The London Hotel. You’ll love my place because of the comfy bed, the neighbourhood, the light, and the kitchen. My place is good for couples, business travellers, and furry friends (pets).

name: 2427 - AB Plaça Catalunya 3-4 - Luxury 2-Bedroom Apartment, Steps from Plaça de Catalunya
summary: This luxurious, two bedroom apartment is perfectly located in the centre of the city, making it the ideal place to stay if you´re looking to make the most of your trip to Barcelona. With Plaça Catalunya and Passeig de Gràcia at your doorstep and the Gothic Quarter at less than 5 minutes walk away, you’ll have everything this city has to offer right at your fingertips, not to mention the hundreds of fantastic restaurants you´ll find in the surrounding areas.The large living room is the perfect place for gathering and relaxing after a long day of sightseeing. This area consists of a comfortable double sofa bed, two cozy armchairs and a flat screen TV.The kitchen is fully equipped, allowing you to create some Mediterranean inspired dishes from produce bought at the nearby Boqueria market. Enjoy your meal at the separate dining area with a glass dining table with matching leather (Website hidden by Airbnb) main bedroom comes with a double bed, while the other bedroom comes with two single

The large living room is the perfect place for gathering and relaxing after a long day of sightseeing. This area consists of a comfortable double sofa bed, two cozy armchairs and a flat screen TV. The kitchen is fully equipped, allowing you to create some Mediterranean inspired dishes from produce bought at the nearby Boqueria market. Enjoy your meal at the separate dining area with a glass dining table with matching leather chairs. The main bedroom comes with a double bed, while the other bedroom comes with two single beds. Both bedrooms are fresh and elegant in style. The bathrooms are very luxurious in look and style, completed in white marble and with fresh towels ready for use upon arrival.  The apartment

house_rules: The check-in will be made at our reception: Gran Via de les Corts Catalanes, 558.  Barcelona’s tourist tax is €2,48 per person and night, for a maximum of 7 nights. It is not included in the price. Anyone under the age of 17 is exempt.  Basic cleaning service every 4 days. Includes: Sweeping of all floor surfaces, cleaning the toilet, shower and sink, and removing the rubbish. Does not include: A change of sheets or towels. If you need a more thorough clean you can hire our cleaning service by contacting our Customer Service.

host.host_about:
Hi everyone!

We are Eva & Jacques and we work in the travel and tourism industry. Our company is AB Apartment Barcelona. What we aim to do is offer each of our guests the best Barcelona experience, from start to finish. So as soon as you begin to book your stay right up until the moment you leave Barcelona, my team and I will be available to help you with any questions you might have, or even just to offer you some friendly advice. 

We have one office open 24 hours a day, 7 days a week, 365 days a year, meaning you can contact us anytime you want, day or night. We speak many languages between us, and we’re all tourism professionals. Plus, we know all the best places to go in Barcelona, from sights and attractions to bars and restaurants (including where the locals go) so we can help you make your time in the city the most memorable with our insider tips ;)

By renting your apartment in Barcelona through me, you’ll be in safe hands.

We looking forward to meeting you soon!

reviews.comments: A refaire
Great apartment right in the middle of the city on the main square. The Aerobus drops off right in front of the apartment. Perfect location for a visit to Barcelona.

We really enjoyed our stay. This apartment was exactly as advertised. It was in a prime location for shopping and tourism located just steps from the main plaza. The bus tour stopped right outside the door and Las Ramblas was only a block away.
Good Appartment!

Location. Location. Location. Great host and staff to work with. Very nice apartment - walk to everything. Public transportation so available.  Great view of the Plaza. Restaurants, shops, more. Would have stayed so much longer if we could. We would go back in a minute.
Location is Great, apartament is very good, but needs some manteinance, simple things, lote cofre machine not Working, showers wet all the floor. Water runs out from Bath tube.

The place as in a great location, immaculately clean, beautiful inside with a lot of space.  It's looks right onto the square, lots happening outside yet no noise inside.  I would highly recommend staying there as it's central to everything and steps away from taxi and main bus stands.  
Our host was quick to respond and helpful.
Bien placé
Muy buen apartamento excelente ubicacion todo barbaro. Gracias. Volveremos

까딸루냐 광장 잉글레스백화점 정문 바로 앞으로 최고의 위치!! 깔끔하고 세련된 인테리어.
정말 좋았어요.
El departamento está en excelente estado. Ubicado en el centro, es la ubicación ideal para las excursiones principales de Barcelona.  No dudaría en alojarme nuevamente...ojalá sea pronto!,
appartamento in ottima posizione su plaza catalonya abbastanza grande con cucina completa (manca solo la moka) molto ben insonorizzato pulizia discreta ,pochi asciugamani in dotazione e piccoli
The apartment was in a great location, tidy and clean. I would recommend to stay in

Die Wohnung ist hochwertig eingerichtet und liegt mit Blick auf den Placa de Catalunya sehr gut. Eigentlich perfekt. 

Leider hat der in der Wohnung zu hörende Lärm den Aufenthalt teilweise zur Qual gemacht, so dass ich diesen vorzeitig abbrechen musste (s. unten). Die noch einige Zeit existierende Großbaustelle im Nebenhaus wurde in der Beschreibung leider verschwiegen. Ab 7:30 Uhr morgens sind Bohren und Hämmern oft durchgehend bis abends in teils unerträglicher Lautstärke zu hören. Aber auch ohne diese Baustelle sind Vibrationen und Rumpeln der Metrolinien bis 1 Uhr nachts und ab ca. 5 Uhr morgens zu hören. Für Personen mit leichtem Schlaf sicher eine Herausforderung.

Der Gastgeber AB Apartments (Eva & Jacques) ist ein gewerblicher Apartmentverwalter von fast 200 Apartments und kennt daher zwangsläufig nicht die tatsächliche Situation jedes einzelnen Apartments. Bereits die Frage, ob das Schlafzimmer zur Straße heraus liegt, konnte nicht beantwortet werden. Nachteilig ist ebenfalls, dass man die Schlüssel zur Unterkunft nur im Büro von AB Apartments abholen kann und nicht direkt am Apartment. 
AB Apartments konnte mir immerhin eine deutlich günstigere Ausweichunterkunft anbieten, verweigerte aber die Erstattung der Differenz. Nur durch die Mediationsstelle von Airbnb konnte eine Erstattung erreicht werden.

Damit überwiegen die negativen Erfahrungen mit Eva & Jacques leider die positiven.


ENGLISH
The apartment is very well furnished and has a good view to the Placa de Catalunya. Nearly perfect. 

Unfortunately, the noise to be heard in the apartment made the stay partly a torture, so that I had to cancel the stay prematurely (see below). The construction site in the adjoining house was unfortunately not mentioned in the description. From 7:30 in the morning, drilling and hammering can often be heard continuously until evening, sometimes at unbearable volume. But even without this construction site, vibrations and rumbling of the metro lines can be heard until 1 o'clock at night and from about 5 o'clock in the morning. A challenge for people with a light night's sleep.

The host AB Apartments (Eva & Jacques) is a commercial apartment manager of almost 200 apartments and therefore inevitably does not know the actual situation of each individual apartments. Already the question whether the bedroom is facing the street could not be answered. Another disadvantage is that the keys to the accommodation can only be picked up in the office of AB Apartments and not directly at the apartment. 
After all, AB Apartments could offer me a notably cheaper alternative accommodation to the noisy apartment, but refused to refund the difference. Only through the mediation center of Airbnb a refund could be achieved.

Thus the negative experiences with Eva & Jacques unfortunately outweigh the positive ones.

We had great communication from the host & the check in (located at an office near by) was really efficient ! The location is fab - right on plaça catalunya close to metro, taxi’s and buses. Unfortunately due to building work next door or above at 7:45 everyday bar Sunday we were woken by drilling and hammering all day with no respite (I accept this is external) but the building work looks on going & the metro line underneath rumbles so the building vibrates every few mins . The air con was a much needed asset & worked great ! A few issues which previous people have mentioned - the shower in the second bathroom leaks badly and floods the floor which makes it really dangerous & slippery. Some items have been damaged / chipped  and probably need throwing out or replacing. Few light bulbs didn’t work & could do with checking / replacing.

The place was very good.Location excelent .Apartment looks bigger in the fotos  but it was enough space for 6 people.Beds in small room and living room were not really comfortable so who cares about good sleep need to sleep in main bedroom .
Good location overlooking Placa de Catalunya - place needs to be maintained properly and kept clean
Lugar impecable. Ubicación de privilegio frente a Plaza Catalunya. gran edificio y el departamento no le falta nada. Repetiría sin dudarlo

O apartamento é grande, bem decorado, limpo e com todas as comodidades funcionando. A localização é perfeita. Perto de mercados, metrô e trem. O check in e check out são fáceis. Passamos varios días hospedados. Há uma obra perto, como há varias na cidade, mas a vedação da acústica do apartamento é boa e não nos atrapalhou em nada.

name: Nice apartment in Plaça Reial for long stay
summary: Cosy apartment fully furnished for long stay, right in the center of the Gothic, in Ramblas and plaça Reial, with great confort, Air Conditioning, visco topping double bed, HDTV, free wifi, equiped kitchen, bed linen, towels. To rent for long stay per month.
description: Cosy apartment fully furnished for long stay, right in the center of the Gothic, in Ramblas and plaça Reial, with great confort, Air Conditioning, visco topping double bed, HDTV, free wifi, equiped kitchen, bed linen, towels. To rent for long stay per month. 1 month minim stay
notes: 1 month minim stay

name: Aluguer Quarto "2" (Casa) Balasar, Póvoa de Varzim
summary: Perto da Rota do Caminho Central Português de Santiago (10 min a pé), Igreja Românica de S. Pedro de Rates. Santuário Santa Alexandrina. "Ecovia" Póvoa /Famalicão, Praia Fluvial. Quarto em casa acolhedora, com boa exposição solar, onde eu também moro. Em lugar calmo, rodeada de campos onde vivem agricultores.  Excelente local para visitar o NORTE de PORTUGAL A 10 km (de praias) Póvoa de Varzim, Vila do Conde A 10 km Barcelos,V. N. Famalicão,Trofa, Porto, Braga, Guimarães A 25 km Aeroporto OPO.
space: Tenho dois quartos com cama de casal. Toalhas e lençóis incluídos e sempre mudados para o novo hospede. - Se o aluguer for superior a uma semana eu ao Sábado tenho sempre uma senhora da limpeza contratada, "Desinfecta o banheiro, o piso, limpa as janelas, a cozinha, muda os lençóis e no final deixa toalhas fresquinhas”.

Quarto em casa acolhedora, com boa exposição solar, onde eu também moro. Em lugar calmo, rodeada de campos onde vivem agricultores. neighborhood_overview: A VISITAR: Muito Perto (5 minutos)  Praias Fluviais (Rio Este) - "Eco-via / Ciclovia" Póvoa/Famalicão - Santuário da Santa Alexandrina - Mosteiro "Igreja Românica de Rates" (reedificada em finais do século XI por iniciativa de D. Henrique e D. Teresa). A atual igreja data de 1100 e está situada nos Caminhos de Santiago. - A +/- 10 km (de praias) Póvoa de Varzim, Esposende e Vila do Conde. - A +/- 10 km Barcelos, V. N. Famalicão, Trofa e Stº Tirso (Feiras Semanais). - A +/- 25 km de Braga, Guimarães, Viana do Castelo e Ponte de Lima.  - A +/- 25 km da Cidade do Porto e do Aeroporto OPO. - Excelente local para conhecer o Norte de Portugal.
transit: Autocarro à porta para a Póvoa de Varzim. Sugiro a utilização de carro para visitarem cidades limítrofes que são muito bonitas e ao mesmo tempo transpiram história e vivências Portuguesas. (ex: a 25 km) Porto, Braga, Guimarães, Barcelos, Viana do Castelo, Ponte de Lima, etc... Onde poderão apreciar paisagens magnificas e degustar a gastronomia regional Portuguesa.  Ficarei ao dispor para qualquer informação adicional.
access: Acesso à casa de banho, cozinha (podem cozinhar), sala de estar, de jantar, Wi Fi e Meo Tv. (em comum)  Pode usar o terraço ou a varanda com mesas e cadeiras ao ar livre para desfrutar do sol. - Garagem para carro e Bicicletas e ainda estacionamento em logradouro particular. PERTO DE: - Vários Trilhos: Percursos para caminhadas a pé, Ciclovias para Bikes, Passadiços, "Ecovia/Ciclovia" Panorâmica.
interaction: Estarei sempre ao dispor para qualquer informação adicional.
house_rules: - Pode usar o terraço ou a varanda para fumar, com mesas e cadeiras ao ar livre para desfrutar do sol.

host.host_location: Povoa de Varzim, Porto District, Portugal
host.host_about: Sou uma pessoa normal. Gosto de viajar, de conhecer outras culturas, pessoas, visitar cidades, ler, conversar, ver filmes, teatro, etc. Normalmente programo as minhas viagens raramente entro em programas de agências.

reviews.comments: Joaquim was a fabulous host. One of the funniest people I think I've met in my life. He's very sweet and took great care of us. In addition, he also picked us up the first day we got there! So considerate of him. We were very thankful.. The house was in a lovely location, yet quiet and peaceful .. he also has a garden and we were able to have some fruit. He has a lot of good recommendations on the area or what ever you want to know. Obrigada Joaquim you're the best!!!! :D if we are back in Porto we know exactly where to stay !!
The best night of my trip to Portugal. The welcome was great and the hospitality second to none. I had so much fun. Thank you

La casa està en una hubicación muy tranquila y con todas las necesidades. Además Joaquim nos ofreció su garaje para guardar las bicicletas. El sitio es ideal para difrutar del MTB pasa la Ciclovía Povoa do Barzim a Famalicão a 20 metros de la casa. Hay muchas rutas que pasan o cruzan esta vía. La estancia se hizo muy agradable con un anfitrión que sabe mantener la discrección y dar toda la información que se solicita de la zona y más. Una gran persona con diferentes aficiones y mucha experiencia.
Quedamos muy agradecidos a la zona y, sobre todo, al gran afitrión.
Gracias por todo.

Encore merci Joaquim ! Nous avons passées 3 jours vraiment très spéciaux. Tu es une belle personne. Je recommande aux voyageurs qui passent dans le coin de faire un détour par chez toi. Je n'ai plus de mots pour décrire ces beaux moments passés avec toi. Merci. 
Tiffany et Angéline.

Une super expérience pour moi. Joaquim saura vous recevoir comme il se doit ! C'est une personne adorable, toujours disponible et près à vous aider. L'endroit est typiquement portugais, très propre et agréable ; c'est la campagne.  J'ai eu droit aux repas locaux et à quelques initiations au ukulélé. Je conseille vivement l'endroit pour ceux qui veulent s'immerger pleinement dans le lifestyle portugais, et moi qui n'ai jamais parlé la langue, ça n'as pas été une barrière! N'hésitez pas à y faire un tour

A melhor pessoa que conhecemos em nossa viagem.
Fomos muito bem recebidos, lugar muito calmo, aconchegante e tem uma linda vista para o campo.
Recomendo muitíssimo!
Was a very nice stay at Joaquim's place
One of the best Airbnb Hosts I met. The room was Really nice and perfect for a stay while walking the Camino. I can really recommend this place.
Joaquim jest wspaniałym gospodarzem, pomocnym I miłym. Żałuję, że pobyt u niego był taki krótki. Gdyby przyszło mi odwiedzić Portugalię raz jeszcze napewno zatrzymałabym się u Joaquima. Polecam :)

If you walk the Camino Portugues and you don’t mind a little detour, you should stay at Joaquim’s place! I had a wonderful time there and enjoyed a lovely conversation as well as amazing food / wine. A very unique and authentic experience!

Geweldig verblijf en bovenal een  zeer vriendelijk en hartelijk onthaal door Joaquim.
Samen gegeten en gesproken, met handen en voeten en geluiden. Gelachen en verwonderd .
Joaquim deelt zoveel van wat hij heeft en wie hij is.
Zeer verheugd dat ik bij hem verbleef.
We were happy to stay with Joachim. The room was basic but good and clean. Above all Joachim is a wonderfull host, sharing a delicious meal and drinks with us.

joaquin ist sehr nett und hilfsbereit. 
alles wae in Ordnung

Obrigada da alma para hospitalidade. Foi a melhor experienca airbnb. Eu recomenda com toda confianca. 
I recommend with all confidence.
accueil et generosité

Die Unterkunft liegt etwas abseits des Jakobsweges. Joaquim ist sehr gastfreundlich und hilfsbereit. Er verwöhnt seine Gäste sobald diese das Haus betreten.
Das Bett ist für große Menschen  (>180 cm) etwas zu klein. Ansonsten ist alles vorhanden was benötigt wird. 
Die Kommunikation und der check-in verliefen problemlos.

Joaquim laisse sa maison comme notre maison, les parties communes sont en libre accès. Notre chambre donnait sur la route et donc un peu bruyante au passage des véhicules. Nous sommes venus en moto et elle a dormi à l abri. Joaquim est une personne très accueillante.

O Joaquim foi super atencioso e acolhedor. A sua casa, apesar de antiga é bastante acolhedora e muito limpa. Os meus pais adoraram a estadia e a minha mãe ficou encantada com o seu quintal! É o sítio ideal para descansar e desligar do mundo. Recomendo vivamente a estadia na casa do Joaquim e espero voltar um dia :D
Totalmente recomendable, estuvimos dos días en su casa y ha sido una experiencia que repetir,  Joaquim es un hombre muy amable que te hace sentir como si estuvieses en tu propia casa

Nous avons passés une merveilleuse semaine chez Joachim. La maison de Joachim se situe dans la campagne, plutôt calme et pittoresque, à seulement quelques kilomètres de plusieurs belles villes accessibles par le bus. Joachim est une personne merveilleuse pleine de joie, une personne chaleureuse qui vous fais vous sentir chez vous dés votre arrivée, très arrangeante et pleine de bons plans. 
Je recommande chaudement cet hôte !

Joaquim est un super hôte, très attentionné avec qui la communication  a été très bonne malgré la différence de langues. En mélangeant français et anglais nous avons réussi à bien nous comprendre.
La maison est située à 20 min en voiture de l’aéroport de Porto, très pratique si comme nous vous souhaitez passer une dernière nuit avant d’attraper un vol en matinée.
Je recommande vivement!

name: Romantic Studio at the Wine Cellars
summary: Did you know that on the Douro lie the famous Port Wine cellars? Surrounded by cellars and the river, Casa Flores is a XIX century comfortable building recently renovated. With a simple romantic setting, this second floor offers a confortable and cozy atmosphere, ideal for couples. We welcome the world at Casa Flores!
space: This studio at Casa Flores is situated in a second floor with no elevador, but this small effort will be rewarded by the confortable and cozy setting it offers. Living and Sleeping area Double bed (140X190) Maple Coffe table Luggage storage Cable TV Free Wi-Fi  Kitchenette Induction cooker Fridge Microwave oven Electric Kettle Toaster Table and seats Tableware, cutlery, pots and pans WC Shower Hair dryer  This is not a suitable studio for people with reduced mobility.
description: Did you know that on the Douro lie the famous Port Wine cellars? Surrounded by cellars and the river, Casa Flores is a XIX century comfortable building recently renovated. With a simple romantic setting, this second floor offers a confortable and cozy atmosphere, ideal for couples. We welcome the world at Casa Flores! This studio at Casa Flores is situated in a second floor with no elevador, but this small effort will be rewarded by the confortable and cozy setting it offers. Around Casa Flores good wine, good food, the most traditional products and all the essentials, the best view, the romantic walks and the main touristic landmarks are guaranteed. Still it is also a quiet resi
neighborhood_overview: Around Casa Flores good wine, good food, the most traditional products and all the essentials, the best view, the romantic walks and the main touristic landmarks are guaranteed. Still it is also a quiet residential area, accessible, in the heart of Old Gaia, 10 minutes walking distance from Porto historical centre and 30 minutes away from the beach by public transport. In the streets that surround Casa Flores you will smell the aroma of the worldwide famous nectar, Port Wine. If your going for a tasting you just need to walk out the front door and go for a few metres to the most renowned cellars: Offley, Sandeman, Calém, Ferreirinha, etc. And if you enjoy good food as much as good wine try the typical restaurants in the neighbouring streets. Or you can always buy some genuine produce in the grocery stores next door, take it home and cook your own portuguese inspired meal.
transit: We suggest that you walk and explore the surroundings, go across the river through the D. Luiz I bridge, get on the old tram to the beach in Porto or get a bus to the beaches in Gaia. You can also enjoy the view over the city by cablecar. Our location is perfect to travel by bus, boat or walking. And if you want to go a little bit further you can also get a train (10 minutes walking distance) and discover other precious gems in the region.
house_rules: - Please note that between 10 pm and 10 am you should avoid loud noises and high heels in the apartment, the common areas and the front of the building in order to respect your neighbours.  - Access to people outside the booked guests are not allowed without previous notification. - Please note that you cannot give your house keys to anyone. - Please leave the kitchen area tiddy. -Lighting of candles is not allowed. - When leaving the apartment please be sure all the electrical equipments are turned off and all the windows closed as well as all the doors.

host.host_about:
Easy going, loves art, theatre and classic movies.
Listens to all kind of music, with a soft spot for jazz.
But travelling is her one true love...

address.street: Vila Nova de Gaia, Porto, Portugal
address.government_area: Santa Marinha e São Pedro da Afurada

reviews.comments:
The apartment that is located on the south bank and very close to the river and the famous bridge but located in some small street so it is quieter.
It was comfortable and clean.
Gisela was kind and gave me some advice about the city.

Gisela has been an amazing host and her flat is incredibly cute. It is in an old building that has belonged to her family for a long time, and it has been renovated very well and with taste. The room is cosy but it has everything you would need for a few days stay. We arrived at 2 am because our flight was late and Gisela waited for us to welcome us.. She has been really professional and extremely kind, making us feel at home and being there for us all the time. The flat is on the south bank of the river, where the port wineries are, but really close to the city centre. Plus it's a very nice walk to do in the morning and it takes about 8-10 mins max. I would definitely come here again and I loved my stay, thanks Gisela!

Gisela's place is wonderful and newly renovated so everything is very clean. Although I didn't meet Gi myself, she was very friendly and helpful in our messages. Her lovely cousin Joana met me at the place and was really kind and helpful. The room itself had almost everything I needed for my stay with lots of additional treats such as sample of local wine! The area is right next to the river front of Vila Nova de Gaia and all the sights but is in a quiet side street so you get the convenience of a quiet nights sleep and easy access to beautiful views. I had no issues and would thoroughly recommend :)
The appartment is located in the great place. It is near the vine cellars on the opposite site of Ribeira. Very comfortable and modern studio!

First of all, Gisela is the loveliest and most interesting person! Checking in was a breeze, the directions given for the trip from the airport were simple to follow and accurate and she was waiting for us when we got there. Gisela gave us the best recommendations for places to eat in Porto!

The studio itself is exactly as shown in the pictures. It was very clean, new and everything was in working order. The bed was very comfortable. We note that our unit was on the 2nd floor and the steps were a bit uneven but manageable. The windows let in alot of light (which I loved). The shower had sufficient volume and power and everything worked and was in good condition. Would highly recommend this place for 2 persons on a short break! The area is very close to the river and but is just off to one side and very quiet!

Bonito apartamento bien situado.  A 5min de la Rivera de oporto por el imponente puente Luis I, Pero muy tranquilo.
Aunque es pequeño, tiene todo lo necesario para una  escapada de varios días. Anfitriona atenta y muy simpática, fue flexible en horarios de  entrada y salida.

Very nice stay. We checked in late without any Problems. Gisela was very kind and helpful. The flat was small but very clean and had everything you need. The flat is near of many wine cellars and near to the river. Nevertheless it was very quiet in the street so we could sleep well. All in all a lovely shelter for two people.

Great place to stay at Porto. Formally, it's not exactly Porto, but that's even better since you'll always have a beautiful view to Porto and be close to portwine cellars! It is really good located too: not so far away from the historical centre of the Porto and pretty quiet and cozy at the same time. Gisela was very helpful and made a great introduction to the city! We'll definitely recommend this place!
Gisela is the greatest host ever! She took her time showing me around and gave me a few very useful tips. Following her advice I saw Porto the way locals do. Highly recommended!

Que dire sur notre expérience chez Gisela si ce n'est que tout était parfait. Elle nous a chaleureusement accueilli le premier jour, avec une multitude de bons plans pour visiter au mieux Porto. Elle est d'une grande gentillesse et toujours là en cas de problème ou si l'on souhaite plus d'informations au cours du séjour. Pour ce qui est de l'appartement, il est parfait pour un weekend prolongé à deux. Très propre et très bien situé, le quartier est très agréable, à deux minutes à peine des rives du Douro et de la vue splendide sur le coeur de Porto. Bref je vous conseille de foncer chez Gisela pour une belle expérience dans cette charmante ville.
This is the perfect spot for a porto vacation. The room is clean, cozy and comfortable.  Gi is truly a superhost, she knows Porto and is so warm and welcoming...we will return. Thanks for everything!

La casa di Gisela è in una posizione fantastica. È curata, pulitissima e profumata. Gisela è stata molto precisa nel darci tutte le informazioni per entrare, dal momento che era fuori città. consiglieremo sicuramente il suo appartamento!!!!

Magnifique appartement, très romantique. Idéal pour un petit séjour en amoureux.
L'appartement est proche de tout, et très bien situé.
L'hôte est accueillante et attentionnée.

Gisela was so helpful, and although I didn't actually get to meet her she was always on hand if we needed anything at all. Her place is in a wonderful setting, within easy walking distance of everything you'd want to see in Porto. Really clean flat, and Gisela was also able to help out with my early check-in and request to leave my bags at hers for the morning we checked out. 
Absolutely perfect place to stay for a weekend in Porto, thanks very much!

Perfect little studio if you want to visit the port wineries. They're all within easy walking distance. The studio is very well taken care of and has a kitchenette if you wanted to stay in and cook. Everything was very clean and adorable. We would definitely stay here again.

Kaunis ja siisti asunto hyvällä sijainnilla kaikkien portviinikellareiden lähellä. Pienestä keittiöstä löytyi kaikki tarpeellinen aamiaisen syömiseen ja Wi-Fi toimi erinomaisesti. Lähellä rannassa paljon ravintoloita ja sillan yli pääsee kätevästi toiselle puolelle Portoa. Suosittelen lämpimästi!
Gisela's place is perfect. Nice, comfortable, clean, well-equipped, we loved it. The location is also good, close to the riverside with lots of restaurants, cafes.
Great location and quiet neighborhood. The studio is ideal for couples who want to visit the city for 2-3 days. Gi was very nice and helpful from the start.

Posto assolutamente raccomandato, una permanenza meravigliosa! L'alloggio è veramente curato in ogni dettaglio e la pulizia è eccellente. È fornito di un angolo cottura per chi volesse prepararsi qualcosa da mangiare a casa. Quando si arriva tutto è preparato per farti sentire a casa, nulla è lasciato al caso! Comodissimo per visitare le cantine, e comunque molto comodo anche per visitare il centro storico. Gisel offre ottimi consigli su cosa visitare e dove andare a mangiare, è la Host ideale!
Perfectly located, the house is great and Gisela a really nice host.
Sitio encantador y perfecto para visitar Oporto. La infitriona un encanto. Nos ha encantado.
Recomended

Gisela was a very good host, always available for every question, the apartment is lovely and in a perfect location (near the wine cellars, which is always good ;)), in a very quite area but still near everything you might need!
Great, quite apt right in cellars. Recommend.
We really enjoyed our stay There. The apartment is bigger and nicer than in the pictures. Close to 2 parkings and tout restaurants as well. 10 minutes walk from Porto center. I recommend to anyone.
Perfect location, cozy apartment, friendly and helpful owner. Superb!

We had a perfect time at Gisela's place.  Apartament is big enough for 2. Very cosy and sweet. We even get a welcome drink;) we recommend this place for couples for a romantic stay. Good location, next to restaurants and wineries but not in the noisy city center.

We had a great stay at Gi's apartment. The building has been recently renovated with modern fittings and appliances. It's just a short walk to the Port wineries and the bridge over to the city, and there are several nice restaurants nearby. Recommended!

A lovely clean and beautifully decorated studio among the port cellars. A couple of minutes walk from all the action in front of Cruz and Sandeman, the cable car and the river taxi, yet nice and quiet at night. Gi made us feel very welcome and catered for our early arrival.

Gisela was very forthcoming and warm-hearted during the whole organization. She has a great repertoire of tips and advices of what to do, and was flexible regarding the check-in. The apartment is comfy and corresponds exactly to the pictures. And its location is perfect! Thank you very much Gisela!

This flat is even more charming than the town of Porto! I went with my husband for a quick weekend visit. We could literally live in history, because the walls of the flat (and the stairs leading to the door) were actually several hundred years old, which were matched with excellent taste for the rest of the décor.  Every detail was stylish and sweet - I loved the way the wifi password was "published" :) The flat is well-equipped, you can really find everything that is needed for a comfortable stay. It's a pity we couldn't meet Gisela in person, but maybe next time! :)

Gi’s place is perfect... location is very special, yet cozy and quiet for a visit to historic Porto. Communication was also piece of cake and very quick response in case of any need... lots of thoughtful touches in the flat to make you feel at home. Thanks again! I highly recommend staying here. Great value on all points.
Apartamento excelente, muito aconchegante, com estilo e muito bem localizado, certamente será a nossa escolha na próxima ida ao Porto.

We loved our stay here! Gisela was the most amazing host, welcoming us in person with great tips and a lovely local gift on arrival. The location was close to the wine cellars and waking distance to the rest of the city. The studio felt brand new, it was warm, and extremely clean and tidy and made us feel at home. We would definitley stay here again, highly recommend!

The studio is perfect, located amongst the famous wine cellars. Everything was super clean, we had everything we needed and we were looking forward to coming back home after the whole day walking around and exploring Porto! :) Absolutely loved it and would recommend!

Just amazing! You’ re comming in strange time or don’t know when exactly want checkin? No problem! You will receive instruction for self- checkin!!! And the apartment... is soooo nice!!! And welcome porto shot. What else do you need? :)
Gorąco polecamy!idealne mieszkanko dla pary na kilkudniowy pobyt w Porto. Idealna lokalizacja, pomocna gospodyni i magiczna atmosfera mieszkanka sprawila, że nasz pobyt był wyjątkowy.
Estaba nuevo, decorado con mucho gusto y muy limpio, nos ha encantado! :)
Todo fue excelente, muy buena limpieza, decoración y atención de Gi, lo único difícil fue el acceso en auto a la zona pero valió la pena y volveríamos a ir.

Apartamento con todas las cosas necesarias para hospedarse, desde pequeños botes de gel, crema corporal, toallas... si vas solo con ropa, ya tienes todo lo necesario! Muy cerca del puente de Luis I y de las bodegas, si  volvemos a Oporto, cogeré ese apartamento en Vila Nova. Gracias Gi!

Lovely, clean studio in a quiet part of town but very close to main Porto area (15 min walk over the bridge). Located around the wine cellars, there are good value restaurants, bars and tapas places nearby
Excellent location, very clean. I will come back again.

Gisela's appartement is clean and warm. It is located in a trendy area where you can find amazing place to brunch like the 7groaster and the mercado. It is 15min walking from the historic centre. Amazing stay !

Gisela’s place is fantastic, right in the middle of Porto. The place was very clean and nice furnitured. The river with amazing restaurants was just 3min by foot. A beautiful comfortable spot to rest with a quality not offten seen. I would highly recomend it!

Appartement ravissant, d'une grande propreté et surtout extrêmement bien situé: proximité de tout sans les inconvénients (rue calme). Bars, commerces, Douro et centre ville sont à 2 pas. La propriétaire est charmante, très accueillante et s'est rendue très disponible. Petit point à améliorer, l'absence de mobilier de rangement dans la chambre (commode et/ou penderie). Par ailleurs, dans ce petit immeuble de 3 niveaux, l'isolation est médiocre: nous entendions les voisins du dessus (pas, voix, aspirateur,...) et ceux du dessous ont dû nous entendre.

Le logement de Gisela était très propre, joliment décoré avec l’essentiel (petite cuisine...etc) et bien placé pour une visite de Porto :proche des caves à visiter et à moins de 10 minutes du quartier de la Ribeira par une balade très agréable (super vue!)
Gisela était disponible par message et très réactive :)

We spend 2 nights in Porto et Gisela's place is just great for a romantic week-end. The flat is really clean and the bed is very confortable. Thank you to Gisela for her good advices. I recommende this place.

The location is absolutely ideal close to the river Doura with Port Cellars and lovely restaurants close by.
We found the studio spotlessly clean and checking in was easy 
Staircase was quite steep and floor noise from above studio quite disturbing.
Other than that quite a lovely cozy place to stay .

Nice little studio apartment right by the river. It was within walking distance to restaurants, cafes and the Wine Cellars. 

Even though the studio is tiny, it’s cozy and clean and equipped with everything you need.

Gisela is a great host. We had the possibility to check in whenever we wanted to. She also responded really quick to any questions we had.

I can warmly recommend this place if you are looking for a romantic little studio in the heart of city.
Perfect place, location and atmosphere. I recommend this apartment 100%
Very beautiful and centric appartment. Easy acced due to self check-in. I enjoyed my stay, thank you very much.

A fantastically located apartment if you want to visit the port cellars. Lots of dining options available,  including establishments right by the water. The apartment and area of Gaia does require some physical self-sufficiency. Stairs can be steep for some and you will need to do some walking to get to the actual town of Porto.  Photos accurately depicted this clean and obviously recently renovated space. Gisela is a super host and responded to questions almost instantaneously. I would highly recommend this space if your goal is to be in the Gaia area and visiting the port houses.

L'appartamento ci è piaciuto tantissimo, arredato con cura e pulito. L'alloggio si trova a due passi dalla riva sud del fiume, dalla quale si gode della bellissima vista della città sull'altra sponda. Si raggiunge comodamente il centro a piedi. A 10 minuti di distanza si parcheggia l'auto comodamente e gratuitamente.
Out of the busy town but close enough to walk in and enjoy all the amenities. Cool at night and convenient for wine tasting.

Bonjour
Nous avons passé un très bon week end chez Gisela. Le studio était très bien placé, calme, très propre. A proximité de Porto centrre, dans un quartier vraiment à découvrir!
A very nice clean apartment on a very good location in Porto.
Very clean studio. Well decorated. Very comfortable. Nice place to visit. We recommand this studio.

A pesar de no haber coincidido con Gisela, su trato a través de la App fue muy bueno. Siempre atenta y muy amable. La casa está localizada casi en pleno centro. Y el interior del apartamento está cuidado al detalle.
No puedo poner ninguna pega.
Todo excepcional.

Le petit studio était idéalement situé pour visiter Porto à pieds. Seulement à 3min du pont Dom Luis. 
Très bien décoré, avec pleins de petites attentions de la part de Gisela, nous vous recommandons ce logement pour un petit séjour à Porto. Le seul défaut est qu’on entend pas mal les voisins du dessus tout comme ceux d’en dessous doivent nous entendre (parquet). 
Merci a Gisela pour sa réactivité
Super séjour dans un joli cocon. Idéalement placé, je recommande!
Perfect base for exploring Porto, Gisela is very accommodating and her flat is lovely. Can recommend to anyone, especially if you want to be close to Port caves. Hope to be back there soon!

Ein kleines aber tolles Zimmer mit allem was man braucht. Zentral gelegen, direkt bei der Brücke Ponte Luis. Wir haben den kurzen Aufenthalt genossen. Gisela antwortet schnell und gibt Tipps und ist sehr hilfsbereit. Alles in allem sehen zu empfehlen.
Perfect location for wine tasting and easy self check-in.

숙소는 아주 깨끗하고, 위치도 너무 좋아 저녁 돌아오는 길 또한 나에게 행복한 시간을 갖게하였다. 
혼자라면 그리 좁지 않지만, 부부 등 2인이 묵기엔 다소 좁은 공간이라고 생각한다. 
우린 부부이므로 가격대비 나쁘지 않았고,
호스트 답변도 즉시즉시 이루어져 큰 애로 사항은 없었다. 
숙소 문 잠금이 안에서도 열쇠를 사용한다는 게 의아했고 , 좀 불편했다. 
윗 층의 소음이 약간 있었으나 감당할 정도여서, 3일 지내는 데 큰 문제없이 지낼 수 있었다.
Clean, perfect position and very comfortable. Highly recommend
Studio tres bien situé ,tout près du fleuve et des caves à vin,quartier très calme ,tres propre et agréable,nous le recommandons!

I would definitely recommend this location, as this side you have an amazing view of Porto over the Douro, and very easy and quick to cross over the bridge anyway.  There are a few cafe's and food shops for small purchases very close, and very near all the Port houses for tours/tasting.  Very clean and comfortable, all you need for a base for a city break, thanks again!

Juste parfait !
Appartement idéalement situé, au calme. Propreté irréprochable, fonctionnel, literie de qualité et très belle décoration . Des petits cadeaux à l'arrivée ! Nous avons passé 5 nuits dans l'appartement de Gisela, et nous y reviendrons avec grand plaisir !
A lovely studio in a great location. Gisela answered all our questions very quickly, and provided all the info we needed for a great stay
Small studio appartment close to the wine cellars and not far from the big bridge. We loved the close distance to everything and walked around the city a lot!
It was our first time in Porto and Gisela made sure we had the best experience. Would highly recommend this Airbnb and would gladly come back :)
We had a great stay! Very cute place and close to all the wineries.
grazie mille per l ospitalità, cortesia e pulizia da consigliare

name: Quiet Bamboo Room next to the beach
summary: My place is close to the beach. You’ll love my place because of the ambiance. My place is good for couples and solo adventurers.
description: My place is close to the beach. You’ll love my place because of the ambiance. My place is good for couples and solo adventurers. I am always available via text or email, I do have a job that keeps me out of the house most afternoons and evenings depending on the restaurant. The place is down a beach access road! There are 8 units so it’s a very small little community. We get a lot of surfers and adventure seekers. Taxi's and cars are the easiest! Parking is on the street and there has been no trouble. We also have uber and lyft available on the island! There is a fee of $50 for early check-ins and late checkouts. Please ask before arriving early or planning to stay late as other guests could have booked the space.
neighborhood_overview: The place is down a beach access road! There are 8 units so it’s a very small little community. We get a lot of surfers and adventure seekers.
notes: There is a fee of $50 for early check-ins and late checkouts. Please ask before arriving early or planning to stay late as other guests could have booked the space.
transit: Taxi's and cars are the easiest! Parking is on the street and there has been no trouble. We also have uber and lyft available on the island!
interaction: I am always available via text or email, I do have a job that keeps me out of the house most afternoons and evenings depending on the restaurant.

reviews.comments: Wonderful place. Kathy really has a beautiful beach front room, hearing the waves at night and very relaxing!
Wonderful place to stay! Very relaxing and beautiful
Great location, clean, & quiet. Definitely recommend.

Great place to stay for a late check in, shower, sleep, hang out by the ocean when the sun came up n grab sum delicious fruit n drive out!! Whoa that view just steps from the front door!! It was a bit hard to find since I arrived well into the night. The bathroom was well equipped my only qualm was the bug situation. Early morning bathroom visit startled me the number of bugs in the bathtub but it is a tropical climate and they thankfully didn't join me in bed!! Great hospitality, nice that it is so close to the ocean, a little difficult to find around a tight cozy corner. Overall I would stay here again.
Good location, clean room, great communication. A little street noise from Ali'i Drive, no view, no AC, and bathroom isn't en suite, but is private. Good experience overall.

What a wonderful experience! The owner was so easy to work with and very accommodating.  We booked with an extremely short notice and everything went so so smoothly.  The room and restroom were very clean and stocked with everything you need.  It was also very quiet and comfortable.  We can't thank the owner enough for a lovely stay.
This is such a hot spot! Perfect location and the presentation is amazing! Very impressed and very comfortable! I will definitely return! Many mahalos for the great experience
This is a clean room with a large and comfortable bed. The living room and kitchen are really cozy full of decorations, family pictures and food.
Dominique is a great host and I recommend this place if you need to stay close to the airport.  Great coffee, very clean kitchen, and a lovely home.
Perfect location! Walk in to beautiful ocean. The location is so peaceful that you can hear the wave sound all day. The house and room are vey clean and comfortable.

Dominique is wonderful, she goes out of her way to make you feel welcome and respected in her home. Location is unbelievable, close to downtown and right by the ocean! Absolutely would recommend to a friend and can't wait to stay here again! :)

Dominique is the hostess for Karhy's place and Dominique is awesome. The amenities and her kindness go a long way in welcoming you and making you feel comfortable. I run a hotel and have sent people to her place when our hotel is booked. Mahalo, Dominque.

Dominique is a sweet person and did everything so I feel comfortable and welcoming.  Shared spaces are accomodable! I was surprised to have my own  bathroom and fresh fruits, cereal and coffee !! Really wel’ Managed !!  I would definitely go back and suggest this perfect place right on the beach :)

Dominique, was an amazing host, she went above and beyond to make it a great experience. Very helpful and  generous.  The home was very cozy and welcoming.  Even her dog was generous and helped me open a coconut! Lol  I would definitely stay here again and tell friends to stay here when in Kona.

Old, dusty, to expensive, bad value.
Would not recommend.

예상보다 더 좋았어요~ 호스트가 따뜻하게 맞아주고 방도 깨끗하고 아침에 먹을것도 준비해놔서 각자 알아서 먹을수 있었고 냉장고 사용도 편리했답니다.
세탁기, 건조기도 있어서 여행중 간단한 빨래도 했어요 ㅎㅎ전반적으로 머무는데 있어 불편함 전혀 없고 다른 게스트들도 다들 친절하고 상냥해서 더 좋았던것 같아요!! 최고에요 정말 !!
This Airbnb is very charming, comfortable bed, and convenient location to town.

The location is simply perfect. Close to Center, market just across the road, little beach right in front. The most comfortable bed of all my stay on Hawai’i, didn’t use all the facilities, but great kitchen, cosy dining table and living room. Would always go there again!

Dominique was a wonderful host.  Very concerned about my comfort during my stay and had many thoughtful touches that I didn’t expect:  Fruit and coffee for breakfast, a beautiful fully equipped kitchen, and lots of good tips about the local beaches.  Her place was oceanfront which was wonderful and the bamboo room was on the ground floor—very convenient.  Really enjoyed my stay!
Bamboo room was huge and very quiet and inviting. Would definitely stay here again.
Great spot!
Great room, great location and very friendly host. We enjoyed the stay very much

We had a great time! Dominique was great and super accomodating. 
We loved being right next to the
ocean and in a great location to get to the shops. The dog at the place is very well behaved and friendly. You don't see or hear her. I enjoyed greeting her a few times.
The hospitality is really good and it’s near the water you see lots of turtles.We are going back

Everything you would ever need for an easily accessible place to stay in Hawaii can be found in Kathleen’s place! Easy access from the main road, easy to get to different landmarks and places of interest, easy access to delicious food across the street, very close access to the ocean, and an amazing view just outside her home we’re the highlights of my stay. I hope to stay there again if I can! Thank you Kathleen!
Bamboo room is quiet and peaceful. Beautiful sunsets every evening! Gracious host. Thanks for everything!

The Bamboo room was very quiet, cozy and the bed was really comfortable! The condo is very well located and Dominique and Linda was so kind and nice with us! We will keep great memories from our stay ! Thank you :)

I really enjoyed my time at Kathleen’s place! The bamboo room was large, clean and very private with lockable door and access to a semi private bathroom. The best part is its location as it’s steps away from a public access beach. I took a cab from the airport as I had a late check in. It was around $40 and a 10-15 mins drive. 
Mahalo!

I was in town for work and decided to extend my stay by 2 days in order to explore on my own. This air bnb was perfect for me as I was mainly there to sleep and shower. Great location close to all the food and shops in Kona. It’s a shared space but besides the morning I checked out I didn’t see anybody. It’s perfect for travelers and those who intend to explore to island all day. Bed was comfortable and bathroom is super close to the room. I had an excellent experience.
very nice room well located close to downtown

Dominique was a great host. We really enjoyed chatting with her and all the suggestions she provided us with of places to visit in and around Kona. Also, we loved playing with her cute and friendly dog. The place is located in a good  spot in Kona that was fairly quiet and close to the beach. We would still recommend having a rental car or using the trolley to get around the rest of Kona. The condo itself is old and there was a few plumbing issues and leaks during our stay which wasn't so fun to deal with while on vacation. Now saying that Dominique was very quick to have the problems resolved and acted professionally. The bed was comfortable and we slept well but the curtains are thin and a lot of light shines through the windows around 6:30am, it didn't really bother us as we are early risers but to others it may be annoying. A lot of guests buy beach chairs, umbrellas, mats etc. during there stay and then have left it at the house which you are able to borrow when going to the beach. This was a nice added touch as it saved us from having to buy or rent.
A wonderful location, great host, and comfortable bed!!

The bamboo room was an unexpected delight. The room being down stairs made it an easy, hassle free access to bathroom laundry kitchen and common spaces. I never had any issues sharing the bathroom with any other guests. Quiet, clean and well organized made everything a breeze. I highly recommend. Thank you Dominique for being a great host.

name: Luminoso y renovado apart. en Arco del Triunfo
summary: Lively and elegant apartment decorated in vivid colors with a beautiful balcony to seat outside. Recently renewed and fully equipped (brand-new furniture and appliances) is the place to stay for a wonderful Barcelona’s time, only a few meters away from the Arc de Triomf, the charming Borne area and the Gaudi’s Sagrada Familia. LONG TERM RENTAL ONLY
space: Lively and elegant apartment decorated in vivid colors with a beautiful balcony to seat outside. Recently renewed and fully equipped (brand-new furniture and appliances) is the place to stay for a wonderful Barcelona’s time, only a few meters away from the Arc de Triomf, the charming Borne area and the Gaudi’s Sagrada Familia.  In the apartment you will find 4 bedrooms, three with a single bed each and one with a double bed. All the rooms are equipped with TV, desk and wardrobe. You will also find 2 complete bathrooms with; a big kitchen fully equipped (washing machine, fridge, microwave, coffee machine, kettle, toaster). This is all you can find in this welcoming apartment. Furthermore it has a living room with sofa, flat TV screen and air conditioning.  A roomy and elegant apartment with comforts and very close to all the things you cannot miss in the Catalan capital.
description: Lively and elegant apartment decorated in vivid colors with a beautiful balcony to seat outside. Recently renewed and fully equipped (brand-new furniture and appliances) is the place to stay for a wonderful Barcelona’s time, only a few meters away from the Arc de Triomf, the charming Borne area and the Gaudi’s Sagrada Familia. LONG TERM RENTAL ONLY Lively and elegant apartment decorated in vivid colors with a beautiful balcony to seat outside. Recently renewed and fully equipped (brand-new furniture and appliances) is the place to stay for a wonderful Barcelona’s time, only a few meters away from the Arc de Triomf, the charming Borne area and the Gaudi’s Sagrada Familia.  In the apartment you will find 4 bedrooms, three with a single bed each and one with a double bed. All the rooms are equipped with TV, desk and wardrobe. You will also find 2 complete bathrooms with; a big kitchen fully equipped (washing machine, fridge, microwave, coffee machine, kettle, toaster). This is all you can
neighborhood_overview: The Arc de Triomf, where the apartment is close to, is the door to get in a very well served and charming area called Borne and the streets around, full of shops and supermarkets, bakeries, bars, coffee bar and restaurants. There, a lot of buses and the metro trains go back and forth and you can easily arrive everywhere in Barcelona and 100 meters away you can also find the Barcelona North Station from where you can take a bus to go everywhere in Spain and arrive from and to Girona’s Airport.  From the apartment, within a few minutes’ walk, you can arrive to the best beaches of Barcelona and the Park de la Ciutadella, to the Gaudi’s Sagrada Familia (10 minutes walking distance) and to the Picasso Museum that is in the heart of Borne (5 minutes walking distance). From there you can also easily arrive to the Barceloneta area and Plaza de Catalunia (10 minutes walking distance) and Las Ramblas that is located right there.  As London has its Portobello, Notting Hill and Camden Town markets

host.host_about: We are a small group of friends passionate about travelling and specially about the city we live in, the beautiful Barcelona! We love sharing this great city with the visitors and helping people discover it! Come and stay with us, we will be happy to welcome you! :)

reviews.comments: Good location near city center in a fairly safe environment

name: 2295 - AB Aragó Apartment2-D - Sleek Apartment with a Communal Terrace in Eixample
summary: This is a fabulous apartment, in a recently renovated building of holiday rental apartments, and is situated in one of the most popular areas of the city, the Eixample district. Its central location makes it ideal for those looking to explore everything that Barcelona has to offer. Some of the best sights and most well-known streets in Barcelona, such as Las Ramblas, Passeig de Gràcia and Plaça Catalunya can be found just 10-15 minutes away on foot. What´s more, Eixample has plenty of great restaurants and bars, and there are conveniently-located supermarkets near to the apartment. You can also reach other areas of the city by public transport, as there are two metro stops and several bus stops nearby, meaning you can easily discover other parts of the Catalan capital and its surrounding towns.This luminous, air-conditioned apartment has 2 bedrooms and 1 bathroom, allowing up to 4 guests to stay here. There is one double bedroom and another with two single beds, while the bathroom has
space: This luminous, air-conditioned apartment has 2 bedrooms and 1 bathroom, allowing up to 4 guests to stay here. There is one double bedroom and another with two single beds, while the bathroom has an adjustable, massaging shower stall.
description: This is a fabulous apartment, in a recently renovated building of holiday rental apartments, and is situated in one of the most popular areas of the city, the Eixample district. Its central location makes it ideal for those looking to explore everything that Barcelona has to offer. Some of the best sights and most well-known streets in Barcelona, such as Las Ramblas, Passeig de Gràcia and Plaça Catalunya can be found just 10-15 minutes away on foot. What´s more, Eixample has plenty of great restaurants and bars, and there are conveniently-located supermarkets near to the apartment.
