There is one double bedroom and another with two single beds, while the bathroom has
neighborhood_overview: El Eixample (Ensanche) es uno de los distritos más populares de Barcelona. Fue diseñado por el urbanista Idelfons Cerdà, quien se basó en el flujo del tráfico y el aprovechamiento de la luz solar para ampliar la ciudad. El Eixample se caracteriza por sus bloques de casas con forma octogonal, sus amplias calles y su carácter residencial y comercial. Está dividido en dos zonas, el Eixample Esquerre (Izquierdo) y el Eixample (Dret) Derecho, en las que encontrará una amplia oferta de tiendas y establecimientos de restauración. El Eixample Esquerre está delimitado por el Passeig de Gràcia y la Plaça d´Espanya, donde se localiza el recinto ferial de Montjuïc y la fuente mágica. También en el Eixample Esquerra está el Parc de Joan Miró, presidido por la escultura "La mujer y el pájaro" de este conocido artista catalán, y el centro comercial de las Arenas, ubicado en una antigua plaza de toros. Un apartamento en el Eixample Esquerre es una excelente elección por sus buenas conexiones de transp
notes: Licence number: HUTB-003730
transit: Metro station: Urgell (L1) or Hospital Clínic (L5)
access: La terraza comunitaria que posee este edificio tiene área de tumbonas, sofás, sillas y mesas para disfrutar aún más de tus días en la ciudad.
house_rules: The check-in will be made at our reception: Gran Via de les Corts Catalanes, 558.  Barcelona’s tourist tax is €2,48 per person and night, for a maximum of 7 nights. It is not included in the price. Anyone under the age of 17 is exempt.  Basic cleaning service every 4 days. Includes: Sweeping of all floor surfaces, cleaning the toilet, shower and sink, and removing the rubbish. Does not include: A change of sheets or towels. If you need a more thorough clean you can hire our cleaning service by contacting our Customer Service.

host.host_about:
Hi everyone!

We are Eva & Jacques and we work in the travel and tourism industry. Our company is AB Apartment Barcelona. What we aim to do is offer each of our guests the best Barcelona experience, from start to finish. So as soon as you begin to book your stay right up until the moment you leave Barcelona, my team and I will be available to help you with any questions you might have, or even just to offer you some friendly advice. 

We have one office open 24 hours a day, 7 days a week, 365 days a year, meaning you can contact us anytime you want, day or night. We speak many languages between us, and we’re all tourism professionals. Plus, we know all the best places to go in Barcelona, from sights and attractions to bars and restaurants (including where the locals go) so we can help you make your time in the city the most memorable with our insider tips ;)

By renting your apartment in Barcelona through me, you’ll be in safe hands.

We looking forward to meeting you soon!

reviews.comments: Habitación grande y cómoda con vista a la calle. Jose vive con dos compañeros de piso súper simpáticos y amables. Hay tele en la habitación e internet funciona perfectamente.
Jacques is a fantastic host. Every little problem I had, he was ready to jump in and solve it. I had the best stay.
Great little apartment, surrounded by good restaurants. Jacques was very responsive to any issues that arose. Secure, clean, well located.

First off, Jacque dispelled all of the negative things and nightmares we have heard about air bnb.  The apartment was very modern and equipped with all the necessities a family of 2, 3, or 4 may need.  It is located in one the most beautiful locations in Barcelona. Every morning we had the options of a cafe right downstairs or fresh fruits or an upscale supermarket 2 blocks away. Our son is very finicky with food so it was cool to have chicken wings and fries as an option at the corner (lol) You are in walking distance of all the local transportation (metro). Taxis are readily available right outside your door which are affordable when going to the city. My husband actually ran 3 miles to the beach took a swim and ran back, that's how convenient this location is. Just wanted to say very special thank you to Jacque For making our first time using air bnb a superb experience. You are what one dreams of when doing business from abroad or locally. You were consistent, punctual, caring, alert to our concerns and most importantly and this where most people doing business fail......you communicated consistently and made us feel like you genuinely cared about our well being. For that my my family and I thank you considerably. We look forward to contacting you in the near future for other trips abroad...btw we will be referring you as we have already begun to do to many of our close friends and associates. Thank you, thank you, thank you.

We had an amazing time in this lovely apt. Jacques was very nice and responsive at all times.
The apt is quiet and in a nice neighbourhood - 15 min walk to the main city centre.
Thank you for everything. Great apt in Barcelona - would consider to come back :)

The place is very well located and was clean and perfect for our family with lots of closet space. Messages to Jacques were answered promptly. Also the cafe downstairs is amazing (and the hairdryer was really nice too).
Jacques and his team will take care of you.  No matter what.  Super fast response.  A really neat place and a super professional staff to handle anything that comes up.  Would stay again.
I’m not great at writing reviews so all I can say is we had an amazing time and we loved staying here.

Overall great experience. The place was very clean, beds were comfortable, great location. Phone calls were always answered and they were helpful on the other line. The shower could use some work - difficult to keep from flooding the bathroom and occasionally we had unexpectedly cold showers. Safe box was broken but in all fairness we were too busy enjoying the awesome location to remember to ask for it to be fixed.
it is about 4 mins from the pick up point and it is located in the City center, so it's very easy to access to different attractions.
Very nice stay, great hosting and communication! The location is nice and quiet :)
Great location and amazing staff!

The apartment's  location was great. We were close to downtown and had easy access to public transportation and supermarkets. I requested some things for my toddler and Jacques provided them very fast. The size of the master bedroom was great. I would like to see more kitchen tools and a different shower, since it is impossible to adjust the water temperature. Overall our experience was very good and we will definitely consider this place for our next trip to Barcelona.
Very helpful host. Cute & fully equipped apartment. Close to many shops & restaurant. Good location.
It is a very clean appartment and we loved staying there

Eva&Jacques (E&J) have a lovely modern apartment here and run a very professional AirBNB. we stayed for 5 nights and explored the city, and each night the apartment was our sanctuary to come home to. E&J are very responsive to any requests, and answered all of our questions very quickly through email or text. A few very minor things were highlighted and E&J sent maintenance people that day to sort it out. very impressive.
Apartment is located in the Eixample District which is positioned between the hubub of the main town, and the Sants and Placa d'Espanya areas, so generally well located for all needs. It is ideal for families as it is a quiet area, although there can be some traffic noise as the apartment is on a busy road (but for children this is better than party people shouting and bottles smashing you would get in the centre of town, and the combination of very good double glazing and air-conditioning was not an issue at all). 
Our kids loved the offset bunkbeds, which meant bed time was a synch.
The area seemed to be in the process of a regeneration, and we even noticed a BrewDog on the corner one block away which could be a good or bad sign! but in general a lovely friendly neighbourhood.
The only minor negatives (as mentioned by others) the shower was rubbish and needs replacing, and the kitchen could do with a few more basic utensils.
But to sum up. we are already planning our next trip to Barcelona, and we plan to stay with E&J. thank you Eva & Jacques for a great introduction to a lovely city.
Mkt bra läge! Tyst i huset. Fungerande planlösning med två sorum. Vi är nöjda och kan rekommendera detta värdpar!

We had a lovely time, the air conditioning was fab (The fact it is in both bedrooms as well as the main room needs sharing). We struggled with working out how some things worked in the apartment.  Some simple instructions would have been useful.  The shower was great but I'm still not sure what all the knobs actually did.  Also a mention that the coffee machine takes pods would have been helpful as we bought ground coffee and then have to buy a cafetiere.  We had to ask a noisy group who were in the communal area outside to move inside as it was gone midnight but they quickly moved off, everyone we met was very friendly.  We needed help with the fridge freezer which was not working and the response was excellent with a brand new one in place in less then 24 hours.
All in we we enjoyed our stay and would consider returning again.
Clean, nice and secure apartment, professional and quick to respond. Saved me after another cancelled booking
It is a 15-minute walk from Plaza Catalunya. The surrounding area has a 24-hour market and a large market. Check-in was guided very kindly.

Cafeteira Nespresso não funciona.
Água não é muito quente e suficiente apenas para dois banhos seguidos.
Toalhas muito pequenas.
Travesseiros muito baixos e de má qualidade.
Os proprietários foram muito atenciosos e resolveram todos os problemas que surgiram.
O apartamento é muito bom e muito bem localizado.

Die Unterkunft ist klein und gemütlich und genau so wie auf den Bildern. Die Lage ist super, die Shoppingmeile “La Rambla” is zu Fuss locker erreichbar. In der näheren Umgebung gibt es auch genügend Restaurants mit köstlichem Essen. 
Abschliessend kann ich nur sagen, dass ich die Unterkunft nur wärmstens weiterempfehlen kann.

Bardzo fajny apartament, przestronny i czysty. Świetna lokalizacja. Dobrze przemyślany układ pomieszczeń. Fajnie urządzony, na miejscu było wszystko czego było nam trzeba. Kontakt z właścicielami super, wszystko mogliśmy ustalić mailowo. Jedyne co było dla nas problematyczne to okresowe problemy z połączeniem z internetem. Ogólnie bardzo polecamy to miejsce! Jesteśmy bardzo zadowoleni z pobytu!
The shower is a little tricky, but everything else is perfect! Eva & Jacques were lovely hosts.

Muy buen alojamiento, es tal cual se lo ve en las fotos. Limpio, cómodo y con todos los amenities. Buena conexión de internet y buena calefacción. La atención fue excelente. Los únicos detalles a mejorar son los colchones (muy blandos) y la ducha (un poco complicada e incómoda; recomendamos usar el bañador movible como ducha). Pero volveríamos a hospedarnos!

Pour notre première fois à Barcelone en famille nous avons passé un excellent séjour dans un appartement conforme à la description et très agréable, et dans un quartier sympathique non loin du centre historique à pieds. Nous y retournerons avec plaisir !

name: Ocean View Hawaiian Bungalow on a private ranch
summary: Miles Away is a plantation era bungalow that we lovingly restored to host visiting guests from all around the world. The ranch has 4 cottages available. Each are very private and separated.
space: Miles Away is a historic plantation era home built in the 1920's.  The detached bath house was the original "furo" (Japanese bath) that the Japanese family who lived in this home built. There is a large swimming pool that all guests of the ranch can enjoy.  The private pool at Miles Away is "dip in" pool.
description: Miles Away is a plantation era bungalow that we lovingly restored to host visiting guests from all around the world. The ranch has 4 cottages available. Each are very private and separated. Miles Away is a historic plantation era home built in the 1920's.  The detached bath house was the original "furo" (Japanese bath) that the Japanese family who lived in this home built. There is a large swimming pool that all guests of the ranch can enjoy.  The private pool at Miles Away is "dip in" pool. There is a garden you can use and a common pool you can use in addition to the dipping pool.  There is also a trail that winds through the tall grass that is great for a jogging or walking. We are available to answer questions and help with the cottage if needed but we leave you alone to enjoy and relax at the ranch.  We are always just a phone call away. Hawi town is a charming planation town with great shops, a fun coffee shop, restaurants, grocery store (Takata Market) There is a farmers market
neighborhood_overview: Hawi town is a charming planation town with great shops, a fun coffee shop, restaurants, grocery store (Takata Market) There is a farmers market every Saturday morning right in town.  Just 2 miles north of the ranch.
notes: Please be aware we are in a tropical, rural, authentic location.  There is no concrete here.  The historic homes are post and pier so they sit directly above the ground/dirt.  We take great care and have professional bug service but bugs are part of everyday life here. If you are afraid bugs, we are not a good fit for you. The cottages are always spotless for your arrival.  The resorts are the only environment where you will see fewer bugs.
transit: You need to rent car.  You have parking just outside your door.
access: There is a garden you can use and a common pool you can use in addition to the dipping pool.  There is also a trail that winds through the tall grass that is great for a jogging or walking.
interaction: We are available to answer questions and help with the cottage if needed but we leave you alone to enjoy and relax at the ranch.  We are always just a phone call away.
house_rules: - Quite hours 9pm-8am - Please remove your shoes. Hawaiian Style

host.host_location: Hawi, HI & Santa Monica Ca United States
host.host_about: I'm the creator of Puakea Ranch in Hawi, HI.  We purchased the ranch in 2006 and restored all the historic homes and brought the property back to life. Now people can enjoy a more authentic and unique Hawaiian vacation. My vision was to create a relaxing, comfortable & eco friendly environment in this rugged Hawaiian landscape.  We are a great fit for adventurous travelers who also appreciate life's little luxires, like pressed sheets, sharp knives and farm fresh eggs.

reviews.comments:
For adventurous spirits.  
Pluses: beautiful cottage and property (thoughtful landscaping and layout, unique design of outdoor bathroom), fruit and veggies from the garden, close to small town gift shops and restaurants, happy animals, quiet/peaceful atmosphere, bigger shared pool is nice. 
Minuses: centipedes, flying roaches indoors, shallow private pool (for wading only) and limited guest services.
Overall: I had a memorable happy birthday at Puakea.

Dear Christie,
Sitting on the bed in the front bedroom at Miles Away with late afternoon light and a breeze I want to tell you how much we’ve loved it here. The pool has been perfect for our grandson who is turning 4- he can go underwater and still stand up! We’ve all taken the kitchen scraps to the pig and watched him dominate, used the swings, clothesline, and have great praise for the outside bathroom. There is a high minded curatorial process going on here. Everything feels as if it were chosen for a use in this dreamy world of a bygone time. Thank you for making it possible for us to be here for 6 nights. I am so appreciative of your vision, this feeling of old Hawaii.
Sincerely and with Aloha,
Anna Marie Hamilton

reviews.comments: Everything was exactly as promised or better. This was a wonderful location in a family friendly setting.  We would stay here again for future visits.

summary: Proximité: Plage, commerces, piscine, sport, bar, restaurants, activité pour les enfants, marché tout les dimanches matin, entre autres...

reviews.comments: Apartamento muy bien situado, y relación calidad precio buena

A acomodação é muito limpa, a localização boa, conforme se apresenta nas fotos. Uma TV antiga, pequena que não funciona.  Como tive o azar de pegar dias ruins com chuva, se tornou um pouco entediante o fato de não ter uma TV para entreter, nem Wifi...
emplacment agreable pret de la plage

Great & quick responses from host. Apartment is as mentioned. Parking was a bit difficult but regardless it was close to many amenities. Lots at the doorstep - bakery, mini grocery store, take-away restaurants and coffee shops. About a 10 minute walk to the centre. Beach is just on the other side of the street, 2 minute walk. Overall it was a good experience.

The apartment is located on the first floor and one can either walk to it or use elevator. This is a one bedroom apartment with three tiny balconies overlooking to a small street perpendicular to the greater street passing along the beaches. The ocean is near and one can see it from the balconies just turning head to the left. And definetely one can hear the ocean from the apartment. There was not much furniture in the apartment, but all the necessary  items (double bed, tables, chairs, sofa, wardrobes, etc.) were there. The apartment was equipped with electric stove with oven, dish washer, microwave oven, coffee machines, washing machine and TV. Although the last one didn't work (I suppose because of unpaid cable subscription) - but who needs a TV when the ocean is nearby!
There was no Wi-Fi, but there was excellent coverage for Vodafone 4G prepaid SIM card in the apartment.
We stayed in the apartment at October and it was quite cold in it. The problem is that the sun never looks at the narrow street and the apartment windows. Although I suppose it may be a good feature during summer hot weather. As for free parking near the beaches - this feature is definetely better during cold seasons - during summer it might be crowded.
For me the bed matress was too hard and be prepared that one night you may be attacked by mosquitos (get ready a fumigator).
When I was booking the apartment via Airbnb I corresponded with Natalia who spoke Portuguese only, but when I arrived I've got a phone call from a man (speaking English and French) who said that he was owner of the apartment. The keys were given to me by the man's sister who provided me very good introduction in plain English (I'd like to thank her again here!). Unfortunately I could not contact the owner directly because the phone number given at the site was unreachable. A day before leave I was visited by a Portuguese only speaking man who said he was another owner of the apartment. In result I little bit puzzled, but anyway I enjoyed the staying there! Thank you very much, the misterious owner!

You’ll love my place because of the cozy, warm hosts, quiet environment and a brilliant way to ease your tiredness and relax your mind. It is excellent for couples, solo adventurers, and business travellers, students, ladies and girls who desire a quiet, independent and private space to enjoy your day and night.

There is side patch way direct to the Guesthouse without enter into main house. Guests can have their own kitchen, bath room, shower and laundry facilities. One Queen Bed fits 2 people or with additional one child. One sofa bed if needed for extra guests (additional charges apply). One dinning/working table with three chairs provided. Guests will enjoy a whole private space and all appliances for cooking, washing, drying during your booking period.

reviews.comments:
Emma's White House was perfect for my husbands long stay for work purposes.
He had everything he needed and Na (the host) was awesome.... extremely pleasant and helpful. She always made sure that his stay was comfortable. Communication was prompt and efficient.
The location was quiet, safe and close to amenities. The unit is away from the house and he wasn't disturbed by noise.
It was fantastic value for money and he would most definitely stay here again. I highly recommend this Airbnb to others. 
Thanks Na for making the time away from home so pleasant.
Definitely Recommend
房东很热情,房子环境比较好,很安静,最吸引我的还是房间的私密性,全力推荐｡

Na is a warm and welcoming host. I will be back next year. The accommodation is very conveniently located for anyone needing somewhere in the Campbelltown area. With your own entrance and security lighting, it was easy to come and go. The water was warm and had excellent pressure for showers. Thanks again
Na looked after us amazingly. Made it so easy to stay here and at the same time completley private. We loved it.

Na's  place was convenient for our visit in Sydney and very comfortable. She was super accommodating and helpful. Parking was no problem.  Communication was absolutely outstanding as Na is a very responsive host.  Plenty of towels are provided, lovely soaps and shampoo.  I would definitely visit again!
Great place to stay,Na is very welcoming
We very much enjoyed our stay. Very comfortable, the host is very accommodating and caring. Peaceful location and very short walk to public transport. Would gladly return again!

It was an amazing experience to stay at Na's place. She is very hospitable and understanding. I booked the place for 15 days but i had to reduce the stay due to some personal emergency and it was very gracious of Na to accent the modification.

The  place was very clean and a must stay if you are around that area.
I would highly recommend Na's place.

Thanks a lot Na.

Emma's White House 
Has everything you need.

Beautiful family, beautiful home xo
Nice friendly hosts. very good hospitality. we will come back again. Highly recommended.
This is a lovely self contained place. It’s quiet, has all the necessary amenities, and is an easy 10-15 min walk to the train station. Na is very well organised, easy to talk to and helpful.

My parents really enjoyed their stay at Na's place. Na is an excellent host; communication was great throughout their stay and Na was always available for any questions. The place is neat, clean and very comfortable.

My parents had a wonderful time at Na's place. They stayed there for about 2 months - Na's place became a home away from home! Lovely house, neat and clean and very peaceful. Na is a wonderful host and an outstanding person. She's very helpful and friendly.  Overall I would recommend this place to all!
Na is very helpful and hospitable! Very clean, and nice touches like flowers on the table. We needed to be in this area and if that comes up again, I wouldn’t hesitate to book in again!
It was pleasure to return to Na’s place again. It’s in every way as advertised, clean, self-contained, near to shops and restaurants.  Easy to get to and near public transport.
Nothing

And Na is a lovely, friendly and very helpful host.

We stayed here for 4 nights to attend a convention near by. 
Is a cute little granny flat. Close to everything. Na was a great host, easy to deal with. For how close it is to the highway, it was really quiet. Would stay here again

name: 2294 - AB Aragó Apartment 2-C - Central Apartment with a Communal Terrace in Eixample
summary: This superb apartment, in a recently renovated building of holiday rental apartments, is situated in the Eixample area of Barcelona, exceptionally located for La Rambla, Passeig de Gràcia and Plaça Catalunya. The neighbourhood has many fantastic restaurants and bars, as well as plenty of supermarkets. What´s more, you can easily reach other parts of the city and the surrounding towns via public transport from the apartment, as there are two metro stops and several bus stops nearby.This air-conditioned, luminous apartment has 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, allowing up to 6 guests in total to stay here. There is one double bedroom and another with two single beds. There is also a double sofa bed in the apartment. One of the modern bathrooms has a shower-bathtub combination, while the other has a massaging shower stall. What´s more, there´s even a communal terrace with tables, chairs and sun loungers for you to enjoy.The fully-equipped kitchen has all the appliances and utensils you´ll need

The kitchen comes fully-equipped with all the appliances and utensils you´ll need to prepare your favourite meals.

neighborhood_overview: Eixample is Catalan for ´extension´, meaning an extension of the old Barcelona city. Eixample was designed by Catalan-born urban planning visionary, Ildefons Cerdà, who took traffic and sunlight (amongst many other things) into consideration when creating the plans for this new district. Eixample is now characterised by its octagonal blocks and its grid-like pattern, with wide streets and both commercial and residential areas. It is split into two parts, Eixample Esquerra (Left, or in Spanish, Izquierdo) and Eixample Dret (Right, or in Spanish, Derecho), both of which are home to some fantastic restaurants and stores. Eixample Izquierdo is delimited by the grand, Passeig de Gràcia, a paradise for shopping and dining, and Plaça d´Espanya, where the Montjuïc Magic Fountain and one of the biggest convention centres in Barcelona can be found. The Parc de Joan Miró, with its iconic ´Woman and Bird´ sculpture created by the Barcelona-born artist, is also situated here, as well as the Arenas
notes: Licence number: HUTB-003729
transit: Metro station: Urgell (L1) or Hospital Clínic (L5)
access: El bloque de apartamentos posee también una terraza comunitaria con área de sillas, mesas, sofás y tumbonas para disfrutar aún más de tus días en la ciudad.
house_rules: The check-in will be made at our reception: Gran Via de les Corts Catalanes, 558.  Barcelona’s tourist tax is €2,48 per person and night, for a maximum of 7 nights. It is not included in the price. Anyone under the age of 17 is exempt.  Basic cleaning service every 4 days. Includes: Sweeping of all floor surfaces, cleaning the toilet, shower and sink, and removing the rubbish. Does not include: A change of sheets or towels. If you need a more thorough clean you can hire our cleaning service by contacting our Customer Service.

host.host_about:
Hi everyone!

We are Eva & Jacques and we work in the travel and tourism industry. Our company is AB Apartment Barcelona. What we aim to do is offer each of our guests the best Barcelona experience, from start to finish. So as soon as you begin to book your stay right up until the moment you leave Barcelona, my team and I will be available to help you with any questions you might have, or even just to offer you some friendly advice. 

We have one office open 24 hours a day, 7 days a week, 365 days a year, meaning you can contact us anytime you want, day or night. We speak many languages between us, and we’re all tourism professionals. Plus, we know all the best places to go in Barcelona, from sights and attractions to bars and restaurants (including where the locals go) so we can help you make your time in the city the most memorable with our insider tips ;)

By renting your apartment in Barcelona through me, you’ll be in safe hands.

We looking forward to meeting you soon!

reviews.comments: very nice place and good location.
A pleasant comfortable place to stay. Well located.

Jacques is very quick in responding all my questions and changes I need on my booking, and is very pleasant to work with. The apartment is conveniently located within walking distance to restaurant and shop and public transport. The apartment is clean and bright. We had some issues with one of the bathroom showers and we called the office to have it fixed, and it was fixed a day after. The sinks in the bathroom are plugged up but we didn’t bother asking on that but maintenance work is needed so it’s something the office will need to look into.

Overall we had a nice stay at this apartment, it’s walkable to all the restaurants and shops, it’s in a quieter neighborhood while being in the central. The people in the office are very nice and helpful and had gave us some good recommendations on our stay in Barcelona.
Bon logement

Tive alguns problemas com o apartamento, como a falta de secador, um chuveiro quebrado e uma péssima comunicação com eles!!! Não recomendo o aluguel desses apartamentos administrados por uma empresa, eles não se preocupam tanto como quando você aluga diretamente com um único dono! Minha experiência foi péssima e não gostei do apartamento e do jeito que fui atendida por eles. Não há um atendimento personalizado e você é apenas mais um. Péssimo!
Appartement bien situé, bien insonorisé.

This apartment is modern and nice.  Comfortable beds and living area.  The shower stall is very small in the second bathroom and the hot water was somewhat erratic when people were getting ready in the morning.  Quiet at night and excellent window blinds to block light.

You will be using Metro a lot as this neighborhood is not itself full of sights or shopping.   Metro stop is about 8-10 minutes walk away.  The Barcelona metro system is excellent and clean.  

This place is managed by a large rental company which does make it seem a bit impersonal.   For checking in, you have to go to the rental office, then it is a long walk with luggage (especially in the heat) to get to the apartment.  The city blocks are really long in Barcelona!  Also, there were a couple strange things like having service personnel enter the apartment without asking or notifying us, and requiring guests to empty all apartment trash at checkout and put it into a dumpster down the street.  They did solicit guest input so I do have hope that these issues are addressed.  

Jacques and Eva, the Airbnb hosts, were outstanding and very quick in responding to our questions and offering assistance.  They checked in with  us via the Airbnb throughout our stay and offered to arrange a taxi if we needed it.

Definitely great value for money. Very nice apartment in a centrally located part of Barcelona. Easy access to all places of interest. 
Very communicable hosts and the checking in & out process couldn't have been any easier and accomadating. 
Thanks for having us.
Great place, better vibes. Highly recommended staying here

The apartment's location was very central and within walking distance to sights as well as two metro lines. It was updated and big enough for a couple and a third traveler. The rooms were not very big but for a city apartment, not too bad. It's probably helpful to know that one of the showers is European size which means if you're over 6 feet with broad shoulders, you probably can't fit in it. The beds were ok but  not super comfortable. We hoped the two single beds could be joined for extra room but they were different heights. Also, we were surprised to see that the courtyard (one of the main reasons we booked this space) was not on the room but in the middle of the apartment complex, on the ground level, and surrounded by other apartments. The only important issue we had during our stay was lack of internet for four out of the five days we were there which affected our ability to research and plan activities. The property management company attributed it to a building-wide issue. Lastly, only one person at a time could shower. There seemed to be very little cold water so one person ended up showering with excruciatingly hot water.  I notified the host for this issue but there was no acknowledgement of the issue or action taken.

Eva and Jacques were very responsive to questions. The apartment manager was very helpful and responsive, and are available 24 hours/day to sort out problems and answer questions. The keys are picked up from an office which is at a different location from the apartment, some renters may need to take a taxi if unable to walk with luggage (although the distance is walkable for some people). The apartment is well-located and easy walk to Placa Catalunya,  there are many restaurants, stores, taxis outside your doorstep. It is quiet at night. Be aware that there is a cat in the lobby and with that comes cat hair, litter box etc, which may not be desirable for everyone. The inside of the apartment was very clean, sparsely decorated with 4 dining chairs and a small couch. It has clean, comfortable beds and bedding/towels. Plan to bring own soaps, laundry, cleaning supplies,  etc as the limited supplies provided will not last for longer than a day or two.
Great location. Walking distance to Plaza Catalunya. Plenty of markets and restaurants within a short walk. Never heard a sound from neighbors, and security is very comfortable.
Отличная квартира для семьи. Все заявленные параметры соответствуют. Тихо, уютно, близко к супермаркетам, метро.  Приятная светлая гостиная с большим окном. Рекомендуем для путешественников с детьми!

Muy limpio y claro , con unas ventanas excelentes, perfecto para cuatro personas, una cocina equipada y funcional. Las fotos son sin duda lo que se van a encontrar. Apartamento muy céntrico , bien comunicado y a10 minutos del Aerobús.
Ottimo appartamento spazioso, luminoso con tutto il necessario per la cucina. Buona posizione, 10 minuti a piedi dalla placa Catalunya e Ramblas. Consigliatissimo.

Есть свои плюсы и минусы, в целом 3+/4-. Хозяин это компания, которая управляет 1000 апартаментов в Барселоне. Плюсы: бесплатно продлили проживание до вечера, русскоговорящие сотрудники в офисе, тепло (хорошо работает кондиционер, в январе это важно) и нет проблем с горячей водой (в Барселоне это проблема), достаточно хорошая шумоизоляция, балкон, достаточно чисто при заезде, хорошее постельное белье, полотенца. Посуда в нормальном состоянии, есть минимальный набор для мытья и уборки. Посудомойка, стиральная машина. Хорошее (но не идеальное) расположение, две станции метро рядом, супермаркет Меркадона, рынок, кафе и рестораны, вокзал Сантс 15-20 минут пешком, центр 15 минут, можно везде дойти, хоть и немного долго. Минусы: у жилья нет хозяина, компания массово сдает апартаменты, это чувствуется, не хватает комфорта, уюта и продуманности некоторых вещей внутри. Отличные фото, яркие и красивые, вживую все несколько хуже, потому что фото сделаны, когда все было новым, постепенно апартаменты устаревают и за ними плохо следят. WiFi работает очень плохо, мы так и не поняли как включить горячую воду в душевой, шкафы и системы хранения отвратительные (нет полок и очень мало вешалок), мы не смогли разложить одежду, все лежало в чемоданах, даже нет вешалки/крючков для одежды на входе. Один матрас из 4 был не очень,  но можно неплохо выспаться, это не проблема. В целом кое-где что-то отваливается из фурнитуры, по мелочи. Мебель в гостиной и кухне в плохом состоянии, стол с повреждениями, диван пора поменять, сильно промят, выглядит плохо, телек показывает не все каналы, достаточно маленький. Кухня заслуживает отдельных слов, изначально сделана очень не продумано и плохо, теперь стала постепенно разваливаться, маленькая узкая посудомойка (в комплекте самые дешевые капсулы, вся посуда в разводах), микроволновка 2 метра от пола, очень неудобно, все полки очень высоко, если рост 170-175 крайне неудобно. В ванной и на кухне есть минимальный приветственный пакет для уборки, готовки, хим средства, салфетки, но это ровно на 1 день. Почему нельзя оставить обычный большой шампунь/гель для душа в ванной, зачем делать как в гостинице маленькие флаконы на 1 раз?! Так же соль, перец, масло на кухне!? Салфетки, губки!? Каждый гость покупает это все в полном объёме, оставляет, а Вы просто выкидываете. Резюмируя: стоимость достаточно адекватная для января (не сезон), но не хватает хозяина, который сделает чтобы гостям было удобно, комфортно и все было продумано. Второй раз я бы не остановилась, постоянно путешествую по Европе, можно найти апартаменты лучше за эти же деньги, но фото и описание сбивают с толку, кажется, что круто, приезжаешь и все немного не так.

L'appartamento si trova in una zona comoda centrale e ben servita da taxi autobus e facile per approvvigionarsi di cibo e cio' che serve per qualche giorno di permanenza. Unica pecca che il lavandino del bagno piu' grande restava con l'acqua stagnante e sotto la lavastoviglie quando si apriva si smontava il pezzo che copre i piedi della cucina.....piccolezze insomma nel complesso l'appartamento era pulito e con ascensore  al piano.....ah dimenticavo le tende nelle stanze da letto  io ce le avrei rimesse ;)

name: Brownstone with farmhouse charm
summary: Relax in our ground floor garden apartment with a backyard, firepit, beautiful plants, and tons of cozy amenities. Or go out to explore our trendy Brooklyn neighborhood restaurants, and bars, with a laundromat, supermarket, hip cafes and bar walking distance. Historic sites such as the Brooklyn Museum, Botanical Gardens, and Prospect Park are a nice 20 min walk down Eastern Parkway. Brooklyn Bridge is a few stops away by train.  Our apartment is a 10 min walk to the 2/3 trains and the c train.
space: The sunny and quiet private apartment w/ private entrance comes with a queen-sized bed and the couch is a day bed so the apartment comfortably sleeps three adults. Please note, we do not have AC, though we have several fans and a ceiling fan in the bedroom. We also have cross-ventalation throught the entire apartment and being on the ground floor, things stay much cooler.
description: Relax in our ground floor garden apartment with a backyard, firepit, beautiful plants, and tons of cozy amenities. Or go out to explore our trendy Brooklyn neighborhood restaurants, and bars, with a laundromat, supermarket, hip cafes and bar walking distance. Historic sites such as the Brooklyn Museum, Botanical Gardens, and Prospect Park are a nice 20 min walk down Eastern Parkway. Brooklyn Bridge is a few stops away by train.  Our apartment is a 10 min walk to the 2/3 trains and the c train. The sunny and quiet private apartment w/ private entrance comes with a queen-sized bed and the couch is a day bed so the apartment comfortably sleeps three adults. Please note, we do not have AC, though we have several fans and a ceiling fan in the bedroom. We also have cross-ventalation throught the entire apartment and being on the ground floor, things stay much cooler. Our backyard has a table and chairs, charcoal grill, and firepit with firewood. Our kitchen is fully equipped whether it be fo
neighborhood_overview: The block is super quiet and tree-lined with friendly neighbors. Local trivia-- our block's street and sidewalk was designed by I.M. Pei (the architect who designed, among many famous projects, the pyramid entrance outside the Louvre). Michael Jackson also filmed a scene from The Wiz on our street, too!
notes: We have a dog (she will be with us and not at the apartment). We keep the apartment impeccably clean but if you have a severe dog allergy and can't be in an apartment that a dog lives in even when it is extremely clean this is something to be aware of. One of our reviews mentions that the heat was loud in the apartment. When these guests had come to stay here the boiler fan broke, causing the noise. It had never happened before, and it was promptly fixed. Our heat is completely quiet and keeps the place toasty warm in the winter time.
transit: We are just a ten-minute walk to the 3 train, the C train, and many buses. We are a short ride to Prospect Park, DUMBO, Williamsburg and many other Brooklyn Destinations and are 35 minutes to most of lower Manhattan.
access: Our backyard has a table and chairs, charcoal grill, and firepit with firewood. Our kitchen is fully equipped whether it be for making coffee/tea and breakfast or making a full-on feast. Our kitchen includes: magic bullet, cuisinart, cast iron skillets, espresso pot, tea kettle, an array of pots, pans and cooking utensils. We have a vacuum tube bluetooth stereo, wifi throughout the apartment, a work desk with printer/scanner.
interaction: We will be available over text or email if you have any questions.
house_rules: - We are a no-shoe house. We kindly ask you take your shoes off when you come in to the house

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States

reviews.comments: I had a geat time at this place in Brooklyn. Loved the backyard area. It was just perfect to chill  and relax every night after coming back from work. Will come back for sure !
A cozy apartment in a great location with a wild and wonderful garden outback. I loved the assortment of teas offered. Everything was clean and as described. Great hosts!

Corinne's place is charming, cozy and in a very nice location on a lovely quiet street. Our only issue was that the heater in the bedroom has a very loud fan that came on frequently during the night and kept us from having a restful sleep at night. A white noise machine was offered, but that in  itself is constant noise. So if you are a light sleeper,it might not be the place for you during heating season. If you do stay, try the arepas or breakfast bowls at nearby Tinto. YUM!

The apt was great and centrally located to our children we were visiting in Crown Heights. The weather outside was crazy cold but the apt was always invitingly warm when we returned.  It was a great size for our needs, and the bed was very comfortable. Very welcoming place and hosts!! Thank you Jason & Corrine.
Good location and a very cute and cosy space. Highly recommend for anyone looking to stay in Brooklyn!
Very homy and cozy. We had a very nice time in Corinne’s and Jason’s apartment. They are great hosts!

Corinne's place is really lovely. It has a little less light than other apartments, but it makes up for it in character, authenticity and charm. Its great value for the area and Jason and Corinne were incredibly accommodating and wonderful to communicate with. I would definitely stay there again in the future and would recommend it to anyone.
Perfect place for my needs. Deep into Brooklyn but manageable.

name: Convenient located one bedroom unit
summary: My comfortable and quiet one bedroom unit with all kitchen amenities, washer, TV, queen-and sofabed, balcony and secure parking is close to CBD and airport with train or bus nearby in a vibrant area with 2 parks that have a tenniscourt and a pool.
space: Comfortable, conveniently located, 42 square meter one bedroom unit including a balcony with a view on the CBD skyline. It is in a vibrant area but quiet and away from traffic.
description: My comfortable and quiet one bedroom unit with all kitchen amenities, washer, TV, queen-and sofabed, balcony and secure parking is close to CBD and airport with train or bus nearby in a vibrant area with 2 parks that have a tenniscourt and a pool. Comfortable, conveniently located, 42 square meter one bedroom unit including a balcony with a view on the CBD skyline. It is in a vibrant area but quiet and away from traffic. The entire unit is to your disposal. Up to 2 guests allowed. My partner will be available after office hours if there are urgent issues. You can contact me at any time by phone. Vibrant area with lots of coffee shops, restaurants, bars and 2 public parks. One of the parks has a swimming pool and tennis court. Supermarket is just around the corner. The train station is a 3-5 minute walk away. It's only one stop from central station/CBD. The bus stop is at your doorstep. The secure parking has camera surveillance.

reviews.comments: Agnes was a great and very friendly host. The apartment was nice and comfortable, and had a perfect location in Redfern.
Good place to stay
Agnes is a very well travelled, polite and informative host. Excellent all round Airbnb expert.
Easy to communicate with and tidy place
Wenige Minuten vom Bahnhof redfern entfernt, dadurch alle Sehenswürdigkeiten leicht erreichbar. Ruhige Umgebung. Geschäfte und Lokale alle zu Fuß erreichbar
Awesome little apartment to yourself. Very kind host, very easy check in, no Wi-Fi but great amenities, everything working well, nice touches and character in the rooms!
The unit is very comfortable. There is a store nearby. And Agnes is a great host!

Well equipped apartment perfectly located. Agnes was reachable very easily and helpful. 
Small but perfect apartment with everything we needed. 5 minute walk from the train station. I highly recommend this place. Thanks again

Wonderful place to stay. Great location with all the things you need prepared in the house. Nice and cozy, and also very clean too. Agnes was very friendly and supportive, making our stay even better. I'd like to thank her for helping us out on our wonderful stay in Sydney.
Great location, clean and great host.

Fabulous host , great place. Brilliant stay.
Definitely stay again, 400 m from Redfern train so convenient.
Super convenient and comfortable place for solo travellers or couples. Easy walking distance to Redfern and Surry Hills.
A lovely place, close to everything in Redfern.

Room is clean and decent though not fancy. Fantastic location. I had to check out in the morning but Agnes kindly accommodated me to leave my luggage in the apartment until the evening as my flight out was late. Great communication.
Staying here was a real pleasure, like a little home away from home.
이곳은 진짜 에어비앤비 입니다. 다른 곳과 달리 실제 호스트가 거주하는 공간을 대여해줍니다. 엘레베이터가 있어서 너무 편했고 대중교통 이용하기에 최적의 장소입니다. Agnes 는 아주 친절하고 꼼꼼하게 숙소 이용에 대한 것을 알려주었고 약간의 늦은 체크인도 배려해주어 고마웠습니다. 실제 시드니에 사는 듯 머무르고 왔습니다. 편안한 장소입니다.
Excellent-value apartment just a few minutes walk from Redfern Station. Has everything needed, including a large kitchen, washing machine + dryer, secure underground parking.
Agnes is a good and friendly host.The place is close to the train station.Though there was no Internet at house,we still had two comfortable nights.Thank you.

reviews.comments: Nilza fue muy amable con nosotras. Su departamento es muy cómodo, amplio y limpio por sobre todo. Es totalmente recomendable
Ótimo apê, perto de tudo que eu precisava para o Carnaval...

Foi um ótima experiência  . Nilza foi muito atenciosa. Nós adoramos este apartamento. excelente localização. Tudo perfeito. 

C'était super ! l'appartement est propre rien a redire. Et le Nilza est super attentive. La localisation est parfaite pour les personnes voulant profitez du centre de rio.

Bom apartamento e boa localização, um pouco quente pela ausencia de ar condicionado. Ponto negativo fica pelo atendimento, anfitriã faz diversas perguntas que chegam a constranger, e fica desconfiando e insinuando que estamos fazendo algo de errado. Tambem fica a todo momento querendo mostrar que está quase fazendo favor em ficarmos em sua residencia, sendo que tudo está sendo pago dentro do acordado pelo airbnb

Lindo apartamento. Acogedor y confortable con todo lo necesario. Barrio con mucha movida nocturna y transporte fluido hacia los principales puntos turísticos de la ciudad. La anfitriona fue muy amable, siempre dispuesta a ayudar. Recomendable.

Recomendo.
Nilza, nos recebeu muito bem. A localização é perfeito, vários pontos turísticos proximo do apartamento, no apartamento não tem garagem (que é uma pena), porém a própria Nilza só indicou um estacionamento 24 h na rua dos inválidos ( diária 25 reias), bem próximo e o mais barato da região. Sem dúvida, vou locar novamente.

name: Cozy & convenient 3 bedroom w/ gym *Crown Heights*
summary: Cozy private apartment conveniently located 1 block from the train, walking distance to Prospect Park & Brooklyn Botanic Garden, and surrounded by grocery stores, bodegas, shops, restaurants, bars, laundry mats & more. Depending on how you want to use the apartment, this is actually a 3-bedroom apartment w/ a Home Office and Gym (both easily convert to bedrooms). Enjoy the well-equipped eat-in kitchen if you like to cook at home. All utilities and WiFi, plus Netflix & Hulu, also included.
space: The apartment layout is set up so that the largest of the 3 bedrooms functions as the master bedroom, and the other 2 bedrooms are convertible from an office and a home gym, which are both equipped with a sleeping space (couch or mattress) and closets to make them bedroom friendly. Details: -Eat-in kitchen with all cooking supplies -Master Bedroom: Sunny, large space w/ queen size bed, couch and TV. -Office: (convertible bedroom #2) The office room has a large desk, printer, shelves, a chaise lounge, and a closet. -Home gym (convertible bedroom #3) The gym room has a TV, spin bike, weights, and other equipment. There is a sturdy, foldable 3-inch thick foam floor mattress, plus a closet for clothing and storage. -Sheets, towels, blankets, & pillows are provided for all guests

neighborhood_overview: The apartment is in a trendy, multi-ethnic safe and friendly neighborhood. Lots of good shops and restaurants and nice local bars. It's also just a 15 minute walk to beautiful Prospect Park and the Brooklyn Museum.
transit: The apartment is just one block away from the 2 and 5 express trains. It's a quick trip to Manhattan on the 2 and 5 express trains, which run all the way through Manhattan on both the east and west sides. It takes just 30 mins to get to Union Square and 40 mins to Times Square. Within Brooklyn, it's just 15 mins to Atlantic terminal in Downtown Brooklyn, or 15 mins by taxi or bus to Williamsburg.
access: Feel free to make yourself at home and use the kitchen to cook, relax on the couch with a good book or netflix, get some work done from the office, or watch TV while you ride the spin bike in the gym room.
interaction: I am available and just a text or email away
house_rules: - No shoes in the house - Please be respectful and just leave everything as you found it

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about:
Adventurous, light-hearted spirit who loves travel, good people, good music, food, and wine - the simple pleasures!  :)

I work remotely and get to travel a lot. I also have the good fortune to spend the rest of my time in NYC, the greatest city in the world...

I speak a little Italian, Portuguese and Spanish and enjoy practicing languages when I host and travel. Hope to meet you here in NYC or somewhere else around the world!

reviews.comments:
Stayed here for 3 months, amazing experience from check-in to check-out! Right next to subway stop, so it was easy for commuting. Also, place is right next to a 24hour laundry and a solid grocery store. Great caribbean food in the area. 

Eileen was an amazing host -- very communicative and kind. I can't recommend this place enough.

It was a long term stay and I can’t be any more satisfied and happy with this place. Everything was just as described and shown in the pictures. Eileen, was the most thoughtful, careful and helpful host of em all. She was very reachable and approachable, a single text message away and she was ready to help with our concerns or doubts. Definitely recommend this place. The neighborhood is quite safe, I used to walk from Prospect Park late at  night and nothing ever happened to me. Many groceries, fast food spots, laundry and other useful places around. Don’t doubt it. It’s really worth it.

name: ATAŞEHİR VARYAP MERİDİAN 50. KAT MANZARALI SUITE
summary: Oturma ve yemek alanlarının yanı sıra bulaşık makinesi ve fırınla donatılmış mutfak bulunmaktadır. Düz ekran uydu TV de vardır.Residence’da spa merkezi mevcuttur. Tesiste masa tenisi oynayabilirsiniz. Araba kiralama hizmeti de verilmektedir. Yenisahra Metro İstasyonu 2,6 km mesafededir.Taksim’e 11 km, Sultanahmet’e ise 10 km uzaklıktadır. En yakın havaalanı olan Sabiha Gökçen Havaalanı 21 km mesafededir.

host.host_about:
Greetings from Istanbul :) This is Emre, born in İstanbul. I have been through many areas of tourism business and currently engaged in both being a travel consultant and a host here at Airbnb. At our various rooms in Asia and Europe area, I'd be delighted to guest you at one of our accommodations. With years of guest satisfaction and understanding of hospitality, I am sure you will be enjoying your stay with us.

I, myself, like to travel single and explore on my own without any hassle, taste different things, travel to quiet locations and get away from the crowds much as possible. In Istanbul, whichever type of traveler you might be, you can always find an aspect suitable for yourselves. Just come over here and discover this beautiful city. If you would need any suggestions, I and my colleagues at the accommodations will be happy to assist you.

reviews.comments: Emre Bey oldukça ilgiliydi ve gayet iyi ağırladı. Lokasyon da oldukça güzel, kesinlikle tavsiye edebilirim.

Really liked the place. It was clean, at central location and roomy.  Car park is also included during your stay That was pretty much all i was expecting. Emre was also great host and very responsive.  I highly recommend it.
İkinci defa kaldım ve yine çok memnun kaldım.  Her şey harikaydı.
Emre Bey karşılamadan çıkışa kadar çok yardımcı oldu. Daireye erişim kolay, içerisi temiz ve güzel bir manzaraya sahip. Her şey için teşekkür ederiz.
It was a great apartment with wonderful city sight. Enjoyed so much.
Daha temiz olmasini beklerdim
Herşey çok güzeldi teşekkür ederim mutlaka tekrar geleceğim.
Temiz, şık ve kaliteli bir mekan.

Evin manzarasi muhtesem,tum istanbul ayaklarinizin altinda. Ozellikle sabah bulutlarin ustunde gibi oluyorsunuz. Oda gayet şık ve tertemiz. İletisimi ve yardimlari icin Emre Bey’e cok tesekkur ederim. Kalmayi dusunen arkadaslara siddetle tavsiye ederim.
Nice view, also location. My choice at next time also.

ev sahibi çok ilgili uçağımızın inişi kalkışı herşeyini yakından takip etti. bilinmesi için yazıyorum evde ekstra tek kişilik bir yatak daha var çocuklu aileler kullanabilir. evdeki mutfak malzemeleri yeterli. evde sadece çamaşır makinesi yok. ev o bölgede kalınabilecek güvenli bir ev

Overall it was a good stay, there was a cleanliness problem when we arrived but the host took care of it quickly.

The view is breathtaking!!!

This place is amazingly clean.host is easily reachable for any kind of problem with the place.
I would recommend everyone to stay at this place.
Sorunsuz çok başarılı

Emer was an amazing host he was their to greet us when we arrived and he responds to question really quick and the location and view of the place is breathtaking. Best place to stay at
Definitely will book again in the future

Emre was accommodating and allowed early check in which was nice.

There were a few small issues in the flat which I’m sure Emre will address for future guests.  

Nice new flat with an amazing view.
İkinci kez konakladim,hersey yine harikaydi. Tesekkurler :)
Çok teşekkürler daire manzara ve görüntüsüyle çok iyiydi emre beyin özel ilgisinden dolayı teşekkür ederim

Evin manzarası harikaydı. Son derece güzel olan hem gece hem gündüz manzarası başta olmak üzere, giriş çıkışlardaki kolaylık ve Emre Bey in ilgisi ile kesinlikle kalmanızı tavsiye ederim. Watergarden daki gece güzelliklerinden ve canlı ortamından fayfalanmak da ekstra güzel.

For the fist night in my Istanbul i choosed a place that can accept a late checkin, Emre was really reactive and accept my checkin in 2am of the morning, a nice man who’s name is johnson welcome us and shows us the place, he were very kind and answer to all my questions.
This place is a luxurious place with a gorgeous view (50th floor).

I will come back for sure ! I highly recommend as being a host myself.
Emre beyin her evi hic düşünülmeden kiralanabilir istanbula sık sık gelirim ve tek tercihim Emre beydir

Хорошая квартира с отличным видом на 50-м этаже. Есть кухня, но абсолютно не приспособленная для готовки. Если готовить не собираетесь, то все ок. Больше подходит для пары без детей: хорошая двуспальная кровать и не очень удобная раскладушка для третьего человека. Про транспорт ничего не скажу, пользовались убером. До улицы Истикляль стоило 55 лир с пробками.
Alles war tip top.Aussicht 5 sterne
fantastic view and comfortable apartment.  50th floor makes your ears pop in the lift.  Emre was very accommodating with check in when my flight was delayed by two hours.
Harika bir manzara...

Потрясающая видовая квартира, очень крутой дом с пропускным режимом и дополнительными сервисами. Жилье именно роскошное и однозначно стоит своих денег. До центра добираться легко, хоть и нужно время. Хозяин отзывчивый, очень гибкий подход к заезду-выезду, делает все возможное для большего комфорта гостей.
The most beautiful view of Istanbul! Friendly host, clean house and we feel great! I recommend this place!
Очень дружелюбное общение . Квартира превзошла все ожидания ! Чисто , удобно. Идеально подойдёт для пары молодых людей .
Very nice, everything was ok. I suggest it to everyone. Nice view and location

I was traveling to Alanya with my wife and son and we used Emre's appartment as a sleepover on our trip from Serbia.
Emre's place is amazing. Luxurious place at a luxurious building that offers a view that is preety special and an experience for itself. App was really tidy and clean.

Eine wunderschöne und saubere Unterkunft mit einer atemberaubenden Aussicht. Sehr zuvorkommend fanden wir die kleinen Detail's wie zum Beispiel das dort mehrere Seifen und sogar Schuhcreme für feine Schuhe zu finden war. Alles in einem war unser Aufenthalt dort zufriedenstellend und angenehm. Gerne sind wir ein zweites mal dort.
Çok güzel manzarası olan bir ev ve ev sahibi çok yardımcı :)
Ev ve manzara mükemmeldi. Emre Bey e ilgisi ve kibarlığı için teşekkürler.  Herşey kusursuzdu
Todo perfecto y según lo esperado. Sin sorpresas.

Cok iyi bir lokasyonda, guvenlikli, adalar manzarali studyo daire.
Tavsiye ediyorum.

Nice studio flat on the 50th floor of a modern high-rise in the up and coming neighbourhood of Batı Ataşehir. Interesting experience if you are not used to high-rise living, not recommended in serious cases of vertigo ;) Shopping mall (Watergarden) with many restaurants and bars is only 5 minutes away (on foot). Public transport is available, but needs some investigation. Taxis are everywhere though. Emre is a friendly host who provides a kind welcome. Responds quickly to messages or questions.
Harika bir konaklamaydı.Daire oldukça temiz manzarası harika ve Emre bey çok ilgiliydi her konuda.

I've found my new favorite place in Istanbul. It's close to two metro lines, there's a giant shopping mall and a fancy supermarket near.
The apartment is clean and cozy. There are all amenities, including towels and sanitary stuff. Emre answers with a lightning speed and will do everything to make your stay memorable. The view from the 50th level is really worth it! Even though it's not a central location, you can use metro (30 minutes) or taxi to reach Taksim and Kadikoy. Thank you once again, and see you soon!!
very well furnitured and very friendly landlord, gladly again
Manzara süperdi
Guzel manzara ve konum. Tavsiye ederim.
Güzel manzara. Şık daire.
Gayet keyifli bir konaklamaydı. Emre Bey gayet ilgili bir ev sahibi, herkese tavsiye ederim..

name: Outstanding Glebe Apartment
summary: Glebe, Sydney, positioned by St Johns Road and Darghan Street. Excellent range of options for exploring the city. 5min walk to bustling Glebe Point Road for shops and frequent 10min bus ride into the city.  Enjoy the comfortable studio living area, kitchen, washer dryer laundry and granite bathroom, well equipped for. Your stay. Walk into the city in 30mins, passing Sydney Fish Markets, Star City Casino, over The Darling Harbour foot bridge and then up to Town Hall CBD.
space: The unit is situated ground floor on the corner of the street with an airy outlook of the street. TELEVISION  * Lounge room has free to air television  * Bedroom television has Dvd only (there is a selection of 15-20 dvds in the loungeroom cupboard. KITCHEN SUPPLIED WITH: * 1 x tea towel * double hotplates for cooking * kettle * toaster * microwave * bar fridge * cutlery, utensils, cooking pots&pans and cups, plates&bowls for the amount of guests booked LAUNDRY: * There is a washing machine in the cupboard space  * Clothes can be hung on the drying rack,  found inside cupboard BATHROOM * 1 x towel per guest * 1 x hand towel  * 1 x bathmat * shampoo & conditioner * hand soap & body soap * 2 x toilet paper rolls BEDS: Main Queen sized bed * 2 x pillows per headspace (for main queen bed only) * 2 x sheets * 1 x quilt * Large storage cupboard space * Television uses DVD player only Fold Out Bed *Bookings using the  foldout bed are charged a one-off $35 preparation laundry charge. *Foldout

KITCHEN SUPPLIED WITH: * 1 x tea towel * double hotplates for cooking * kettle * toaster * microwave * bar fridge * cutlery, utensils, cooking pots&pans and cups, plates&bowls for the amount of guests booked LAUNDRY: * There is a washing machine in the cupboard space  * Clot
neighborhood_overview: LOCAL FAVOURITES * Foodstore - closest grocery store - Glebe Point Road * Broadway Shopping Centre - closest large scale supermarket centre - Broadway * The Sydney Fish Markets - A walk down St Johns Road, through Wentworth Park takes you to Bank St & Pyrmont Bridge Road * Darling Harbour, via Macquarie Park * Large weekend marketplace [Saturdays] - great food and shops * The Glebe Foreshore Walk  - beautiful harbourside outlook  * Walk intoCity - Pass Sydnye Fish Markets, pass Star City Casino, walk over Pyrmont Bridge/Darling Harbour, walk up to QVB building into Sydney’s CBD ------------ EAT OUT *Friend in Hand Hotel  – Cowper Street – very unique Australiana setting. Poetry night every Tuesday *Different Drummer Bar – Glebe Point Road – Cocktails, Happy Hour  *Sappho Books Cafe & Wine Bar  – Glebe Point Road – bookshop, cafe and bar (food closes at 6pm) *Sonoma Bakery Cafe – Glebe Point Road – cool place to by bread or have a coffee *Madame Frou Frou – Glebe Point Road - best coffe
notes: COMMUTING FROM AIRPORT  *[Recommended] Taxi/uber to the door, approx cost $45 (25mins)  *Airport train to Central station, 431/433 bus to Glebe, adult 21.50 child $16.50 (45mins) PARKING There is abundant street parking however it has a free 2 hour limit from 8am to 6pm. This means parking between 10am to 4pm you need to relocate your car.  The free unlimited street parking is not always available and we suggest to guests who cannot find a park straight away to store their vehicle at  Broadway Shopping Centre, 1 Bay Street, Broadway. A 10 minute walk from the property. Rates as follows: * $62 over night * 2-3hr $6.50 * 3-4hr $13 * 4-5hr $23 * 5-6hr $32.50 $ 6-7hr $42 * 7-8hr $52 * 8hr to overngiht/unlimited $62 The facility is open 24 hours (exit by Bay St only between 2-5am) PAY-AS-YOU-GO CAR-SHARE HIRE *Go-Get has an available car parked on every corner of every street in Sydney. Car rates range from $6per hour to $75per day. It is convenient, cost effective and low maintenance optio
transit: CITYMAPPER BEST WEBSITE FOR SYDNEY TRANSPORT. Citymapper is a public transit app and mapping service. It integrates data for all urban modes of transport, from walking and cycling to driving, with an emphasis on public transport. LIGHT RAIL (The light rail will take you through Pyrmont to Darling Harbour, ICC, Haymarket, Central) *Glebe (Corner of Palmerston Avenue & Lombard Street) (Corner of Bridge Road & Burton Street) *Wentworth Park (Wattle Street & Pyrmont Bay Road, Pyrmont, Near Fish Markets) BUS STOP (Glebe Point Road) *(431) Glebe Point to CBD, Martin Place *(433) Balmain / Central Train Station *(370) Leichhardt / Newtown/ Coogee TRAIN STATION (catch bus 431 or 433) *Central Station (catch all trains from here) FERRY (Picturesque ride past Luna Park, to Circular Quay and on to Watsons Bay) *Start at Pyrmont Bay ferry wharf (Pirrama Road, Darling Harbour) *Ferry stops: Barangaroo Reserve, Balmain, McMahons Point, Milsons Point/ Luna Park, Circular Quay, Rose Bay, Watsons Bay)
access: The bins are located at the back lane area at the back of the building. These bins are are shared with the other 2 units in the building. If a two guest only booking requires use of the fold-out bed, there is a $25 charge for the bedding provided. This extra bedding must be requested ahead of arrival to ensure it is provided.
interaction: It is our priority to ensure that you have a wonderful experience. We are always available to attend to your needs by phone or internet.
house_rules: Standard Terms and Conditions of Temporary Holiday Accommodation Note: Please write to me if you would like something different and I will see what I can do. GUESTS PROVIDED WITH: Kitchen * 1 x teatowel Bathroom * 1 x hand towel * 1 x bathmat * shampoo & conditioner  * body soap & hand soap * 2 x toilet paper rolls * 1 x towel per guest Beds * 2 x pillows per headspace * 2 x sheets * 1 quilt If you require to use second set of linen and towels without booking extra guests, the charge for replenishing without notice is up to $75. If you would like to use extra linen without booking please enquire beforehand. GUEST CHECKOUT OBLIGATIONS * Leave property how it was found.  * Take rubbish with you by disposing in allocated garbage bins * Move furniture to original positions, wash dishes. * Leave keys in required place * Failure to follow these obligations may incur a penalty fee. Disqualification fees may be applied for using bond monies. ALL BOOKINGS MADE ACCEPT THESE TERMS Owners will do

host.host_about:
I have a dwelling in Bondi Beach and live with my partner. I am often out trying new cafes, restaurants and bars throughout the city. In summer I love swimming at Ice Bergs pool or in one of the  many amazing beach and harbours in Sydney. I am passionate about local and handmade clothing and homeware products. I  frequent local organic farmers markets mostly Bondi beach and Double Bay, but also like The Carriage Works markets. When I am not attending to guests, I enjoy hand making my own clothing and tending to my honey bee hive. 

I am available to guests within 20 minutes from their property. I provide a 24 hour point of contact for guests. I do my best to keep the place perfectly maintained and hire professional cleaners  to make sure the place is in impeccable condition for incoming guests.

reviews.comments: Underwhelmed is a word that comes to mind to describe my stay.  While the location is good being close to the main hub of Glebe, the general condition of the premises is poor.  Several parts of the apartment are in a state of disrepair including the blind in the main bedroom which is hanging by a cable tie and  is completely dysfunctional.  The TV is also not working and has been out of action for some time which is not clearly stated in ad.

Elises’s place is in a handy location just off Glebe Point Road. It is close to the city, to public transport, to beautiful old St. John's Church and to the interesting array of shops and places to eat in Glebe.
It was clean, and the small, walled garden courtyard provided a pleasant place to sit and enjoy a glass of wine in the sun! An affordable option in a great location.
Nice location, lovely home and a great stay, we enjoyed our time here ☺️

Glebe is a great neighbourhood, Elise's place is in a great spot, walking distance to cafes & restaurants on Glebe Point road and the Glebe market (Saturdays). 20 minute walk to Darling Harbour. Newtown and Chippendale areas are also near by.
Check in and check out was easy and communication was good.
The apartment caters for your basic needs and has a nice little courtyard, and is clean.
A couple of things to note: there is no iron available (as per Elise's advertisement - but I forgot to check this when making the booking). There is a bit of noise from the upstairs tenants and from the street as the apartment/bedroom is located along the street path. We were out of the apartment most of the time anyway but just something we noticed.
Overall, affordable, clean and in a a great location.
Well equipped apartment, good communication from our host, well managed property in a truly convenient location

Our stay was comfortable during this time, however we could tenants above us walking around. 
Though there was a great kitchen space no microwave or TV available.

The location is lovely with markets and cafes 5mins walk up the street and though communication was great during our stay we did not confirm entry to the room until midday of check in day.
Lovely place in an really good location
Small, basic apartment in a great location. OK for short stays.

My friend and I originally booked the courtyard unit to stay in for a week while visiting Sydney, but on the day of our check in Elise informed us she had moved us to a newly renovated unit in the same building. At first we were a little bummed to not get a courtyard, but the new unit was very spacious and well decorated with brand new appliances and features so we were ultimately fine with the switch. The location of the place is fantastic with restaurants, shops, and transportation just a couple of blocks away. However, the street its located on is fairly busy so if you're a light sleeper bring some ear plugs with you as cars and people pass by at all hours of the day and night. Also while the bathroom in the unit was nice and new, the floor does tend to get wet from the shower so bring some flip-flops to use in there! But overall we had a nice stay!
적당히 좋은 위치 조용함

Glebe is a cool area to stay in. Close to Cebtral Sydney, either walking, light rail or bus. 
I would suggest that the apartment is better for one person or a couple as the fold put couch isn't too comfy.
Great place to stay in Sydney. Great price and host was contactable for any issues. Would recommend this apartment for a couple
Overall it's a good place to stay for two.
A great apartment ! Confortable with good location !

Great place and very close to the harbour.
Great location
Loved this modern accomodation! Open space great for weekend getaway. Close to shops and cute cafes. Very easy to communicate with owner. Was given a detailed document upon arrival and great tips!
Although have some episodes, finally solved through smooth communication with the host, low price and good location!
This listing is very spacious and a walkable distance from Broadway Shopping centre. Communication with Elise was fantastic and she was fast to respond. Overall this listing setved its purpose well.

Elise's apartment is located in the very central yet quiet neighbourhood of glebe close to the CBD. The area itself offers some interesting things a short walk away but getting to the CBD or livelier Newtown is very easy also.
The apartament is located in a quiet neighbourhood next to the city center and Elise take care of her guest perfectly.
The apartment has easy access to public transport and the Darling Harbour is only walking distance away.

Elise's nifty little apartment packs a lot into a small space. A perfect place to use as a base just a bus ride from the CBD and a 5 minute stroll to some of the funkiest bars, restaurants, cafés and markets Sydney has to offer. The place was clean and well supplied with linens, cook ware, a compact but perfectly functional little kitchen and bathroom and an oh so comfy bed! There are a few furnishings yet to be assembled and a few pictures yet to be hung but a brilliant apartment in a very cool location nonetheless.
Would absolutely stay again :)
Great place
Good location and neighbors are all very quiet. Love the style of decoration. Elise is very friendly. It's a good journey.

This was a perfect spot for me. Although not much insulation, which made for a bit of a draft throughout the house and bathroom. But this was still a great little apartment, the bed was very comfortable and a very clean little place. Thanks again!
Elise的公寓在Glebe,离市中心比较近,交通很方便｡房屋宽敞,设施齐全,房东人也很好!性价比很高哦,推荐｡
Hi

I highly recommend this studio apartment, because of its prime location and lovely neighbourhood. We enjoyed every moment of Sydney and to top it off, we had a great place to stay. Elise was very fast to reply and accomodating. Thanks!
Perfect place for group tour. Very clean and tidy studio. Nice owner respond fast.
Great space
The host canceled this reservation 85 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Great location, close to cool old pubs and bars and you can walk to Darling harbour, etc. 
Nice and new and clean inside, perhaps a bit dark though. 
Comfy bed, we slept well. 
Not much privacy when you open the door/ window for fresh air as you are right on the street, people can see straight in.
You are told to take all your rubbish with you on departure, which is a little inconvenient.
Absolutely love this place ! Highly recommended
Okey. Average. Standard

Everything is well prepared, comfortable beds, functional kitchen, tiny bathroom, air-conditioner and TV provided. Just a little noisy when cars pass. Checking in is easy. Good location for walking to fish market and Chinatown.
good
Very well located and in a nice neighborhood. The apartment is comfortable, although it has its quirks.

We enjoyed our stay :) the airbnb was very spacious and beds were comfy with plenty of amenities. It is a close walk to Broadway shopping centre. Host responds very fast to messages. Very good value for money.
Nice quiet location and clean apartment.
Brilliant place, very good host.

Funky place within 15 minutes walk to the city.  Has everything needed for your stay.

Only real downside was local parking was a bit painful
Great stay, handy spot! Nice space and everything you need. Super close to bus stops and restaurants/cafes.

We really love this department in Glebe. Quite and convenient. Elise is very helpful and quick to response. 6-min walk to bus station, 10-min walk to fish market, 15-min to Coles supermarket (Broadway Sydney), 20-min walk to Darling Habour. Airport transfer by Uber is around $45-50.
Spacious, value for money. Beautiful area. If you're looking for somewhere modern, beautiful and well maintained, then I highly recommend. Exactly what we were looking for.
房东姑娘回复很快,性格很好｡房子空间设计很合理,周围很安静,走路去海鲜市场和悉尼大学都挺方便的｡
Cool place and awesome location, will use again and would recommend to others.
Sweet little place, good location, within walking distance to great bars, coffee and restaurants. Definitely recommend!!!

A nice and cosy place, well located near the Main Street of Glebe with a short walk to great restaurants and shops. Upon arrival, the place was clean, and we felt very welcomed and safe. The bed was super comfortable and cosy, with a bedroom television and some good DVDs supplied. There was an aircon above the bed which kept the place cool the whole time. There was also a lot of closet space. Overall a great spot, would definitely stay again!!!

Elise’s apartment was central and spacious and in combination with her prompt response, my family’s time in Sydney was wonderful. There was a slight hiccup with the cleaning when first checking in but Elise arranged for cleaning staff to come immediately and that matter was rectified. Would highly recommend her place!
A fantastic apartment that was exactly as described. Great amenities. We had no issues during our 3 day stay.
地理位置非常好,可以走路去中国城吃饭,也可以走路去歌剧院区域(大约3公里)｡从机场出来如果超过2人可以直接打车到这个小房子,澳币40-50刀｡因为房子是木质结构且有点年头了,隔音真的不算太好,楼上邻居的每个脚步都可以听到更不用说他邀请朋友以及放歌唱歌｡房子临街在一条还算车多的主道旁边｡Elisa回应问题非常迅速,是个蛮好的房东｡

Elise was prompt with communication and the apartment was as described and spotless! The location is super convenient. The street it’s on is pretty busy, but that was easily accounted for with earplugs!
Really nice place and location!
Good location, room, and good communication.

Elise is a very profesional person who provide all information for a great stay at Glebe.
The place is small, modern and cozy apartment with excellent location, also you can always find a free car park for two hours on the street.
I highly recommend it.
Thanks Elise for your lovely hospitality.

Kind regards,

Arminda
Great location. Glebe is lovely.
Very nice. Comfortable. Close to the light rail.
Great accommodation that is 5mins drive from the city. Perfectly clean, stylish and comfortable. Would definitely recommend and would love to stay again!

Such a nice experience! The house is clean and the beds are comfortable. Good location if you enjoy a small walk to the city and darling harbor (not super close). It is close to China Town and Fish market as well. Elisa is a great host. Very professional and always available.
This place is super modern and has a great bathroom. And the location is great as well!
Lovely place. Very cool space. Everything you need to be comfortable. Very handy location for eating, shops and transport
Very easy to communicate, a good location, all amenities, fully equipped kitchen. It might be a bit noisy but it is a good place overall.
This is a great place to stay. Very clean and tidy and in a good location I would defiantly stay here again.

This place had so much potential but sadly didn’t quite deliver. It is certainly a trendy apartment but the place was incredibly noisy, both from the street & the upstairs tenants. The bed was the most uncomfortable bed I’ve ever slept in & really is ready for the tip as it has lost all springs through the middle section. I was disappointed that there was not even coffee or tea supplied & the bathroom soaks through after 1 shower (the bath mat easily become saturated). I was also disappointed that you had to pay up to an extra $75 to have the spare bed made up when requiring 2 beds for 2 guest, so we just bunked in together.
On a positive, after requesting an iron she did eventually deliver, unfortunately it was on our last day of our stay.

Very convenient checkin and friendly host. Tsk for response my question in late night. 
Great location. Really clean place. Very suitable for 3-4pp stay for days.

My two roommates and I were lucky to find a 5 night rental upon our arrival in Sydney. What initially started as a bad experience because of the overwhelming cigarette smell was improved when our host Elise came to freshen up the place that same night. Overall, an okay experience until the last day when it ended up being awful because of Elise’s passive aggressive and rude attitude. We asked Elise if we could leave our luggage after we checked out because we were gonna be in town all day and didn’t want to keep our luggages with us. In my messages I repeated multiple times that I would pick up my luggage in the evening. Elise agreed and in my thank you message I said we would swing by at night, she said have a good evening. Her instructions included washing the dishes and taking out the trash (which to my fault I didn’t see but we only left two dishes and left the trash in the basket). She stated we should be out by 10, we left the Airbnb at 9 and left our bags packed. I received an incredibly passive aggressive call at 3 asking why we hadn’t picked up the luggages and saying the place looked like a pig-stye (actual wording she used). The message had never stated a time to pick up the luggage and I had said evening/night at least three times in my request. She was extremely passive aggressive and disrespectful on the call. She asked when we would pick up the luggage because she had a dinner party that she would have to leave early from if we came in the evening. After stating that it would be incredibly inconvenient for her to leave her dinner party early multiple times, she then said she would have to charge us for keeping our luggage there. I firmly disagreed because it was not something she had mentioned before or something we had agreed to. I simply stated that if she had wanted to charge a fee she should’ve stated that before. She then began to ask if we were gonna leave a bad review, which genuinely came out of nowhere.
