I said no and she said that if we were gonna leave a bad review we were to come and pick up our bags immediately, but if we were gonna leave a good review we should chill where we were and we could come at night to pick up our bags. I thought this caveat was unprofessional, especially considering no time was set for us earlier. We were unhappy with this caveat so we said we would come pick up our bags immediately. She said that meant we were gonna leave a bad review and so she was gonna leave the Airbnb because she felt “threatened” (actual words again). The phone call was an awful 9 minutes that I would never repeat again. The phone call sourly ended with Elise saying she couldn’t wait...
Great place! Would be even better if there’s more lighting in the living room
Fantastic location, easy to get to the city. The unit is clean, well furnished and perfect for a long weekend couples stay in Sydney
very good location! would recommend
Elise is quick to respond to inquiries and the place and its amenities meet our needs.

Elise's place is in a fantastic neighborhood and just a short and easy walk to public transit to the center of town. There are lots of cool bars and restaurants in the immediate area. The only real down side is that if guests are not used to city noise, they might find it a bit loud.  (I also live in a city, and didn't find it problematic at all.) I recommend this for a couple or a single guest who wants a cool Urban neighborhood close to the center

What a cleverly designed apartment! They've made such great use of the space, everything you could possibly need is ticked into clever cupboards - it's as if Tony Stark designed a studio apartment. Great location a few blocks from all the fun of Glebe's main drag, and we walked into the city most days. Great value, easy check in, would 100% stay here again.
Elise has a lovely place to stay.  Great communication and great location.  Lovely and clean.

Nice apartment obviously purpose built for Airbnb.  Looks good and is clean but it’s insulated with paper.  You can hear conversations, every footstep from above and road noise.  The neighbours above were up late which meant didn’t sleep until they stopped moving...
Great place in a good location. Host very helpful. Would stay again!
It’s a nice place. Everything is good.

Great location, easy to find, nice neighborhood, self check in super convenient and efficient, place is clean and nicely decorated with everything you need, except coffee. Walls are thin so you can hear people talk or walk by but not a big issue for me as at night when you sleep it is quiet. What bothers me is the second night it was very windy after the thunderstorm, something kept banging  on the window periodically and woke me up at 5am. Unsure how often it gets windy or is it just me who’s unlucky.
Clean Convenient and Central
A great space in the inner city at a reasonable price. Highly recommend.
Elise’s place is great! Easily accessible by public transport, with plenty of room, natural light and comfy beds.
整套房间设计的简直太棒了!洗漱用品和厨房用品非常齐全.太喜欢了
Great stay, close to many shops. Clean and as expected.
Great location, close to cbd. The whole process was easy and hassle free. Had a great stay. Thanks again Elise.

Elise’s apartment is lovely, clean and as pictured. It’s a great space to stay and the location is handy. The bathroom was nice however the water in the shower could have been hotter. The bed is really comfy. Check in is super easy with the code lock however you need to make sure you close the door properly otherwise this creates a security issue. There was a mix up with our bag drop prior to check in which was disappointing and inconvenient. Elise is a good communicator.

Glebe was a quaint artsy neighbourhood. Place was easy to locate. Great design, cosy and clean place with lovely amenities well provided. However, bed mattress lacks spring support. Surrounding road and residents' noises were heard clearly due to the hollow walls.
Good location in nice area. Quite noisy upstairs neighbours though (you might need ear plugs). Nice studio apartment. Responsive host.
Elise’s home is very close to the cutest eateries and not far from the main city at all. Couldn’t have chosen a better place to stay for New Years!

This apartment was a good choice for the provided amenities and convenient location. The walking distance to shops and cafes in Glebe was awesome for a visitor from out of town.

The fact that this apartment is on the first floor made air movement and noise in the evenings a little bit of an issue, but for the value that is just something to consider.

Overall this was a good experience!

This is an amazing modern creatively designed studio! We absolutely loved the interiors and thought put into making this space work. All the small bonus touches really made it feel like an hotel experience. The location is close enough to shops and cafes yet is still nestled amongst a quiet residential area.  Elise was great to deal with during the entire process, and communication was prompt friendly and honest. Would definitely stay again if we're in the area.  This is an absolute gem of a place if you're looking for a creative and stylish home at an affordable price point compared to your standard boxed apartment!

Great apartment in the city; we loved the location. The space was clean  and neatly furnished. Parking was better than anticipated as we found a parking spot close by each time. Elise was very friendly and helpful.
Elise was quick to reply and helpful with any questions we had! Beautiful and clean place, short walk to shops and take away places. Very kid friendly and fitted all our needs as a family of 5 :)
Great!
Great place & good hospitality
Great apartment! It was large, spacious, well equipped, and clean. Check-in and check-out was very easy/quick!
pretty good
地理位置十分好,旺中带静很有历史感,房东准备很充足,十分棒,下次来会再次入住
Great location, clean, modern and fully equipped

Elise responded very quickly and was a great host. The place was clean and provided all standard amenities. 
Walls must be thin as we could hear everything from the streets to next door neighbours. Other than that, convenient location and great accommodation. Would recommend. Thanks again Elise.

name: Free Parking! North Star Flats@Ribeira & Cellars 1
summary: Moderno apartamento com pequeno pátio junto às caves do Vinho do Porto, pertíssimo da avenida Diogo Leite, sendo esta o melhor local para fotografar e admirar a Ribeira do Porto – Património Mundial da UNESCO. Está apenas a escassos metros da famosíssima Ponte D. Luís I, do centro do Porto e dos principais monumentos de interesse. Apartamento confortável com decoração moderna e vistas laterais de rio. É o local perfeito para descansar após deambular pela cidade. O Porto espera a sua visita!
space: O apartamento possui todas as comodidades de que necessita para a sua estadia no Porto (se achar que falta algum utensílio, não hesite em contactar-me e farei todos os possíveis para disponibilizá-lo). Cozinha totalmente equipada com: Máquinas de café (para café de saco e expresso) Placa de fogão Forno Utensílios de cozinha Cafeteira elétrica  Torradeira Máquina de lavar louça Micro-ondas Frigorífico Estão, também, à sua disposição algumas especiarias, sal, azeite e vinagre, caso pretenda preparar uma saborosa refeição no apartamento. A sala de estar é composta por uma mesa de refeições e 4 cadeiras, um sofá confortável e uma televisão de ecrã plano com canais por cabo. A internet está disponível gratuitamente em todas as áreas do apartamento. O quarto de banho possui um bidé e uma moderna cabina de duche. Disponibilizarei um conjunto de toalhas para cada hóspede, um secador de cabelo, gel de banho, champô, amaciador do cabelo e papel higiénico. O quarto está elegantemente decorado e p
description: Moderno apartamento com pequeno pátio junto às caves do Vinho do Porto, pertíssimo da avenida Diogo Leite, sendo esta o melhor local para fotografar e admirar a Ribeira do Porto – Património Mundial da UNESCO. Está apenas a escassos metros da famosíssima Ponte D. Luís I, do centro do Porto e dos principais monumentos de interesse. Apartamento confortável com decoração moderna e vistas laterais de rio. É o local perfeito para descansar após deambular pela cidade. O Porto espera a sua visita! O apartamento possui todas as comodidades de que necessita para a sua estadia no Porto (se achar que falta algum utensílio, não hesite em contactar-me e farei todos os possíveis para disponibilizá-lo). Cozinha totalmente equipada com: Máquinas de café (para café de saco e expresso) Placa de fogão Forno Utensílios de cozinha Cafeteira elétrica  Torradeira Máquina de lavar louça Micro-ondas Frigorífico Estão, também, à sua disposição algumas especiarias, sal, azeite e vinagre, caso pretenda preparar u
neighborhood_overview: As zonas circundantes do apartamento (Ribeira do Porto e Caves do Vinho do Porto) atraem milhares de turistas todos os anos. Ao hospedar-se no meu apartamento estará pertíssimo da zona ribeirinha com o seu casario colorido e ruelas antigas. Nesse local, existem imensos cafés e restaurantes simpáticos, onde poderá desfrutar da cozinha portuguesa tradicional, apreciar os maravilhosos vinhos portugueses e maravilhar-se com a vista fantástica do rio Douro e da Ribeira do Porto. A rua do apartamento, apesar de estar pertíssimo desses locais interessantes e animados, é bastante sossegada durante a noite, pois é uma rua de trânsito condicionado, o que lhe oferece o melhor de dois mundos.
transit: Os autocarros "Hop on/Hop off" param a poucos metros do apartamento na Avenida Diogo Leite (a avenida ribeirinha), onde existe também uma praça de táxis. A poucos metros de distância, poderá embarcar num cruzeiro pelo rio Douro. Junto ao cais de embarque, poderá também utilizar o teleférico até ao Mosteiro da Serra do Pilar e desfrutar da sua vista magnífica ou caminhar no tabuleiro superior da famosa ponte D. Luís I. Há uma estação de metro (estação de General Torres) a 600 metros do apartamento.
access: Terá acesso ao pátio, onde poderá saborear uma bebida ou uma refeição enquanto desfruta da brisa refrescante num dia quente de verão.
interaction: Estarei à sua espera durante o check-in, mostrar-lhe-ei o apartamento e os aparelhos/utensílios.  Como presente de boas-vindas, irei oferecer-lhe: 1 garrafa de água  1 pacote de sumo ou ice tea Bolachas “crackers” Café moído Cápsulas de café expresso Saquetas de chá  Açúcar Dar-lhe-ei dicas sobre os locais mais importantes a visitar no Porto. Poderei também recomendar alguns restaurantes para as suas refeições, onde vou habitualmente com a família e amigos, tudo para que possa ter a melhor experiência de viagem durante a sua estadia no Porto.
house_rules: - I aim to offer you the best experience during your visit to Porto. Enjoy this apartment as if it were yours. Please, keep it clean and tidy. - You may smoke on the patio. - Noise is not allowed from 10 pm until 9 am. - While the parking is free of charge at a local parking facility (always based on availability, which must be requested and confirmed at the time of the reservation), the guests will be fully responsible for any damage caused by them/their cars during their stay. In case of any damage, the guests must pay the total amount of damages caused.

host.host_about: I have always worked on multicultural environments. At first, as representative in Europe of portuguese textile companies; then, as owner of a textile decoration company where I had the opportunity to meet pleople from every part of the globe, as Fabric Purchasing Manager of a US-based company, and presently as owner of a translation & webdesign company which clients are located worldwide. I love to meet culturally different people and learn a bit more about their countries and their travel experiences.

address.street: Vila Nova de Gaia, Porto, Portugal
address.government_area: Santa Marinha e São Pedro da Afurada

reviews.comments: Clean, bright, airy, and incredibly comfortable! Located one block from the river and a short walk to great restaurants, wine tasting, and the historic center of the city. We LOVED Porto and look forward to staying here again next time. Couldn't have asked for a better situation.

We had a great time in Porto thanks to Maria and her apartment! Maria was a great host and helped as soon as we had any questions. And the apartment was very well situated, 2 steps away from the river with a great view on Porto! Thank you Maria for this wonderful experience!

La estancia fue una maravilla gracias a María. La casa estaba muy limpia y el recibimiento también. Nos ofreció para los primeros días café y té para desayunar. Teníamos también agua y zumo. Repetiría sin lugar a duda y lo recomiendo 100%. Muchas gracias María!

This is a great little apartment for a couple - brand new, super clean, well appointed and so conveniently located - quick walk across the bridge (or by the water taxi) to Rebeira, and I think actually better to be a bit away from the other side. You will feel less like you are in a tourist ghetto at Maria's place. Maria is lovely, btw and extremely helpful!

What a find this apartment is! It was tastefully decorated with a comfortable bed and good soundproofing from the street. We were next door to a great shop selling handmade cork products, a couple of small local supermarkets and a great restaurant on the street. We were a stones throw from the river front and in the heart of Porto wine caves area. Marie was a good host, waited to greet us upon arrival and left us some welcome goodies. I recommend Porto to anyone as it won't disappoint.

The apartment is located perfectly steps from the Douro river and port tasting rooms.  A quick and beautiful 10 minute walk over the bridge.

The check in was seamless, we arrived earlier than planned and Maria was there to meet us and show us into the parking garage.  The garage is a bit tight getting in and out so if you're renting a car go for a compact.  

Once inside the apartment was lovely, clean and well decorated. Maria offered a choice of one full size bed or two twins which was perfect since we were friends traveling. 

Maria was a terrific host and available to help with questions and suggestions. Would definitely stay again if I returned to Porto.

A réserver les yeux fermer
L appartement est tout rénové
Maria est tres disponible et arrangeante
L appartement est situé a 50 metres du douro côté sud (cave)
Il est mieux de réserver de ce côté pour eviter la foule
Encore merci
Wonderful location, helpful host, adventurous parking (for uninitiated, but manageable). Apartment is spacious and comfortable.

Maria's apartment is in a perfect location. It was impeccably clean and had everything we needed and more.  The welcome gift was a nice touch. Maria is a wonderful host. As the apartment hadn't been occupied the night before, she let us park the car early and drop off our bags before check-in as we had booked a tour for the day. Would definitely stay at her place again if I'm ever back in Porto.

Maria is a very nice person and it was a pleasure to meet her. She was helpful and easy to reach, especially since she lives in the same building. The appartment is beautiful, clean and comfortable. It must have been renovated very recently, as everything looks brand new. It is located close to the river, the restaurants, bridge, etc. The location is ideal but it is also on a commercial street so bear in mind that it gets active pretty early in the morning as shop owners prepare for the day. The seagulls and other animals also get going early so you may have to get up and close the windows if you want to sleep in.  The area is quite peaceful at night, though. We loved staying there and would definitely do so again in the future. Highly recommended!

Maria is lovely. She is friendly and made check in very easy. The flat is in a great location. Close to everything but not in the center. There was a little construction noise during the day. The night was quiet and the bed comfortable. A lovely flat... I would stay again.

We enjoyed our stay at the apartment very much. The size of the apartment ist perfect for a couple. It was very clean and we liked the location, too. And: Maria is a great host and answers messages quickly.

Location molto curata a due passi dalle aziende produttrici di porto, il valore aggiunto è dato dalla disponibilità e cortesia della locatrice.
Consiglio il pernottamento!
Stay at Maria's place was short - and with nothing to complain! Clean, quiet, comfortable, garage across the street, superb location.

The flat was great! So beautiful and Clean. An awesome place totally worth, Close to the Most beautiful Porto spots!
One of the best Airbnb experiences!

Maria's place was incredible. The unit itself was so close to everything and within walking distance. Maria really made us feel welcome from the minute we met her and made sure we had everything we needed. She even went out of her way to grab us some milk for our 1.5 year old son. She is a wonderful host and we would love to recommend her!

Nice flat veru well equipped closed to the Douro river, Sandeman cellar and Porto Cruz trendy café. Ideal starting point to visit Porto and its cellars.
Maria has been very helpful.
Mind the birds :-)

Maria was a wonderful host and helped us personally upon arrival to Porto. Her apartment is close to all of the Port wine houses and a great to spot from which to explore Porto. I recommend her apartment whole heartedly.
Excellent apartment - great location, well appointed, with a very comfortable bed. Maria was extremely helpful and quick to respond. I would definitely recommend staying here.

Maria is a wonderful person, extremely  attentive and available all the time... The appartement is perfectly situated to see everything in Gaia and Porto.  The apartment is very large, confortable and immaculately clean. Her home is like our home! So if you visit the city of Porto, I strongly recommend that you stay on the side of Gaia and in Maria's (Website hidden by Airbnb) will always stay in my heart ❤️ thanks again 
Renée & Martin

Maria's apartment is beautiful and in a prime location. It was a quick 2 minute walk to the river and there are plenty of cafes right outside the apartment. She was a terrific hostess and provided us with lots of helpful information about the area.

La casa de Maria Fernando es maravillosa, tan bonita como bien cuidada y llena de detalles tales como la botella de vino de Oporto y el desayuno con los que te obsequia a la llegada. 
Está muy bien ubicada, a escasos 5 minutos del puente de Luis I y además dispone de un parking privado muy cerquita de la casa y sin coste adicional, cortesía de la anfitriona. 
Nos hizo la estancia en Oporto realmente agradable.
Great place. Well located. Modern, clean and neat. Wi-fi and parking included.

Excellent space so near to everything
We were traveling with our 3mo daughter and it was very easy to use the space and walk from there to anywhere
Would return and definitively recommend the apartment
Where else you can hear the 'varinas' in the street announcing their fresh fish? Precious

We called Maria about an hour before arrival and she met us to access the private garage and check into the apartment. It is the most ideal location since you do not need a car in Porto and know it is secure. In my research, many hotels did not have on site parking or the cost would vary.
All of the port houses are there and the neighbourhood felt safe. There is a spectacular view of the city, and the train station is about 10-15m away. It was convenient for the boat cruise as well. 
The apartment is spotless and well-appointed and comfortable. Great to have so much extra space. I would highly recommend staying here!

Maria has been a brilliant host! I booked her place for my parents and they absolutely loved it! They still haven't stopped talking about their brilliant stay at Maria's even though they're already back since two weeks. I can definitely recommend staying with Maria. She is very kind, easy to communicate with and a great host!

Maria est une personne accueillante, gentille et disponible qui nous a fait nous sentir très à l'aise tout de suite. L'appartement est très bien situé, bien équipé et très propre. Lit très confortable. Nous avons pu laisser l'auto au garage et nous promener à pied dans Vila Gaia et dans Porto étant à proximité du Pnte Luis. Nous avons beaucoup apprécié notre séjour.
Ótima estadia! Muito bem localizado, apto. super bem decorado, funcional, aconchegante, com cortesias da anfitriã! Excelente, recomendamos para casais que querem desfrutar do Porto!
와이너리 근처에 위치한 이 집에선 조금만 나와도 건너편 아름다운 풍경을 볼 수 있었습니다. 물론 역사적 명소들이 강 건너에 있지만, 다리를 건너기에 어렵지 않았습니다. 호스트였던 마리아는 굉장히 친절했습니다. 추천하고 싶은 집입니다.

We spent 6 nights at Maria’s place and  we were really comfortable !  The bed is so comfortable and even for the baby :) the shade cut all the light in the room ror a better sleep. Its a small appartment but perfect for a couple with a baby. The location is amazing ! Close to everything , walkable so easily around the city of porto. Maria was a great host , really comprehensive! My boyfriend was sick for the check out and she manage with other guests to let us stay for 1 more night to let him recovered. She let us know that if we were in need for anything she could take care of it for us. She is always available . The hardest part when your not use to it is to park the car in the garage ! Wow it was the first time we took an elevetor with a car ! Such a great experience when you are not afraid to drive in porto.  Thanks again for everything
Fantastisch appartement op een unieke locatie. Paul en Boudien

Wow! Probably the best Airbnb experience I have had! Maria and her brother are incredibly friendly and helpful and provide you with everything you need and more to have a great stay. The apartment is gorgeous, even nicer Than the photos. You can tell they really take care of it. It’s also in an amazing location just steps from the nicest views, port cellars and other attractions of Porto/Gaia. I only wish we could have stayed longer!

We had a great stay in Maria’s comfortable apartment and any minor issues we had were dealt with quickly.  The location is great for bars and restaurants. Being able to park safely was a bonus . Paulo greeted us and provided us with all the information we needed. Very good location and views from river a short walk away. 
We would recommend Maria’s apartment for a great city break in a safe area.
We spent 3 nights here. Absolutely Gorgeous Prime Location. Maria You are the great host prepare everything even the umbrella.
Amazing location - close to city center but not crowded, flat is in perfect condition, also very stylish and cosy, hospitality is beyond any expectations. Was a pleasure to stay!

L'alloggio è ben posizionato a Vila Nova, oltre ad essere molto ben arredato e confortevole. La velocità di risposta ai messaggi è ineccepibile, così come la mia esperienza qui. Lo consiglio vivamente!

Un apartamento muy bonito, moderno y limpio en una zona preciosa y con ambiente (es donde están todas las bodegas) a un paso del centro de Oporto. La ubicación es desde luego inmejorable y la atención que recibimos de 10. El parking está justo frente al apartamento. Para repetir y recomendar!

Perfect location near Douro River and Port Caves.   High quality furnishings.   We were provided with a thoughtful welcome pack and a long list of dining recommendations which we made the most of during our 5 night stay.  Oh.  And the beds. So comfortable!  Definitely recommend.  Thank you.
Came for a long weekend away and loved every second of it
Lovely place. Very spacious and clean. Just a few minutes away from many wine cellars. Quick response by hosts.

We loved Maria's place! She was sick when we got there, but her brother met us, helped us find the place, and helped us with the parking. The Airbnb is in a great location (right next to all the port cellars!) and really really cute inside. We would definitely stay here again!
The apartment was incredibly well presented and maintained and in a brilliant location. Would absolutely recommend and when I visit again it will be my top choice if it's available.

Paulo waited for us upon arrival, gave us excellent driving directions to the apartment.
The apartment was very clean, the location is excellent, walking distance to main city sites.
Recommended immensly

Appartement tres bien situé, tout proche du Duro avec une magnifique vue sur la rive coté sud, les bateaux et le pont !
La traversée se fait en 10 minute à pieds, agréable.

L'appartement est tres propre, agreable, fonctionnel et équipé !!!! 
PARFAIT !!!!

Maria war eine sehr tolle und freundliche Gastgeberin. Genaue Angaben zur Anreise, dirigierte uns persönlich zur Parkgarage, versorgte uns mit guten Tipps zu Lokalen, Besichtigungen, usw. Wohnung war sauber, geräumig, schick und in guter Zentrumslage. Absolute Empfehlung!
Maria was great, she helped us with the tricky parking and the apartment was cozy and clean. We wanted to make dinner and she had all the basic cooking ingredients.

Maria's apartment is perfect for visiting the port houses and popping across the bridge to central Porto. You stay at stone's throw away from numerous bars, restaurants, port houses and the river. Even though our flight was delayed and we arrived close to midnight, Maria and Paulo met us and made check in really easy. When we checked out they were kind enough to let us leave our car in the free space for the afternoon. We couldn't fault our stay!

Perfect location, wonderful home. Quiet location in the evenings, but very conveniently located near Port tasting rooms and some good restaurants. Walked basically everywhere. Very close to riverfront and short walk over the bridge to the other Porto attractions.

Die Wohnung ist ideal gelegen, nah am Zentrum, aber in einer weniger hektischen, malerischen Gegend, die sich nicht von Touristen überlaufen anfühlt. Die Wohnung selbst ist sauber und gut ausgestattet. Die Möglichkeit, das Parkhaus für unseren Mietwagen zu nutzen, war super komfortabel. Und nicht zu vergessen, Maria ist eine fantastische Gastgeberin, sie gibt eine Menge Tipps und ist schnell erreichbar. Sie hat mich sogar vom Flughafen abgeholt, als sich unsere Pläne änderten und ich alleine nachts in Porto ankam. Wir wären gerne länger geblieben!

We loved the location of the apartment. We were able to walk everywhere. There were great restaurants and bars . The port tasting was nearby . We received great suggestions. We would definitely suggest Maria’s apartment for any holiday travellers.

Nice place, perfect for solo travelers or a couple. Location is amazing and María was always reachable and available for questions etc. It was exactly as announced.

Thank you María!

Great location, at the other side of the river but best place to stay. Feels like a hotel room, very clean and modern furtniture. We liked the free coffee and tea! Great to have a parking place in the centre of the city.

There were so many great things about this apartment so I am going to try to narrow it down.  Paulo was in constant communication with us prior to our arrival and was very accommodating despite us not having an exact time until a few hours before our arrival in Porto.  He met us and directed us where to park.  The parking garage is just across the street from the apartment.  We then all walked over to the apartment where he showed us to our home for the next 3 days. The first thing I noticed was how amazing the apartment smelled.  Everything was spotless and even better than the pictures described.  The bed was extremely comfortable and the black out shades allowed us to sleep in which we hadn't done on our vacation until then. The location of the apartment was perfect and quiet although close to everything.  In the morning we would heard fado music as we walked down the street.  Such a quaint area of the city. We cannot wait to stay here next year when we visit Porto again!!

Ein sehr tolles Apartment in exzellenter Lage in Vila Nova de Gaia (auf der anderen Flußseite von Porto) in einer ruhigen Seitenstraße zur Promenade. 

Die Portweinkeller und die Promenade liegen nur 1 Minute zu Fuß entfernt. 

In die Altstadt nach Porto sind es 10-15 Minuten zu Fuß oder mit dem Rivertaxi in ca. 3 Minuten für 3 € pro Person.

Minimarkt und Restaurant in direkter Umgebung.

Maria und Paulo waren sehr fürsorglich und haben für unser 11 Monate altes Baby ein Babybett, ein Babyhochstuhl und Spielzeug zur Verfügung gestellt.

Wir können dieses Apartment nur wärmstens weiterempfehlen!
Helpful kind hosts and a very clean place!

Ma fille et moi-même avons passé un excellent séjour chez Maria, disponible dès notre arrivée tardive en soirée à l'aéroport pour nous amener jusqu'à son appartement. Réactive à chaque fois que nous avons eu quelques questions à lui poser. L'appartement est très proche des caves et du quai, à proximité des restaurants et des bars. En 10mn on peut rejoindre à pied le centre de Porto en traversant le Pont Dom Luis. Aucune nuisance nocturne... Café, tisane, petits gâteaux pour la première matinée... Logement décoré avec goût et extrêmement propre. On peut le choisir les "yeux fermés"...

Maria’s place is very central and less than 2-2.5 km from most places of interest. Gave great recommendations on where to eat drink etc. Very clean with good amenities. Would recommend without hesitation 
Vishnu
Excellent place in the heart of Porto! Hosts were very friendly and even went out of their way to help me with parking and driving directions. Very helpful and would definitely recommend.
Great location, was exactly like it was in the pictures. Communication was fast and attentive. Definitely would recommend this place!

For say up to 4 days stay in Porto this place is great, first class apartment (although a balcony/view would be the cherry on the cake). We preferred the south bank of the river for evening strolls and aperitif, not hectic like Porto itself, the street is very authentic with the locals going about their daily routines and using the cafes and restaurants. The only negative is you are probably going to be walking back and forth across the bridge a lot and the volume of pedestrians can be a pain, after 4 days I never wanted to see that bridge again! Super smart and clean apartment, really comfy bed, slept well.

very nice apartment 
well equiped and close to the port Wine area place to be in the evening but the room was very quiet
5mn walk to the luis 1 bridge for a direct access to downtown porto 
maria gave us good adresses 
I highly recommend this apartment
Paolo and Maria are very kind and helpful. the place looks very nice and clean, and Porto is a beautiful city.

Piso fantastico, tal y como se presenta en las fotos. La zona donde está situado es perfecto ya que rápidamente llegas al paseo marítimo y tienes unas de las vistas más bonitas de Oporto. Aunque, es un primero, las ventanas aíslan el ruido de la calle, por lo que es un piso muy tranquilo. Además, cuenta con parking un punto a favor si vas hasta allí en coche, donde buscar aparcamiento puede ser un problema, este se localiza en frente de la casa. La verdad, es que no tenemos ninguna queja, hemos quedado encantados y si volvemos alguna vez a Oporto, volveríamos a hospedarnos aquí si ninguna duda.
Amazing place with free parking in a close by garage. Drip coffee and Espresso machine! Great place to stay!
Maria was absolutely wonderful! She was communicative and gave us amazing tips. The place was super duper clean and accessible and in a perfect location. Would definitely stay here again.

Appartement idéalement situé sur Gaia a 10 mn à pied du pont rejoignant le centre de porto.
Seul bémol... appartement au premier étage sur une rue très passante.... vis à vis très dérangent ....
la chambre est heureusement  sur le patio qui est très calme !
Maria et Paulo sont des ôtes adorables ! Hyper disponibles et bienveillants !!!
Ubicación, limpieza y trato muy buenos
Great location and great host! Maria had so many good suggestions of things to experience in Porto. Our only regret was we couldn’t try them all out.
Un bel endroit tel que presenté, bien situé, accueil avec beaucoup d'informations nécessaires. Nous avons aimé et y retournerions.

El apartamento es tal cual se ve en las fotos. La localización es excelente, en una zona muy tranquila, a 2 minutos caminando del puente Luis I por lo que desde aquí se puede visitar tanto la zona de bodegas de Gaia como Oporto. Cerca de bares y restaurantes para poder comer.  Otro punto a favor es la plaza de parking situada justo en frente del apartamento. Todo lo que se puede pedir para una estancia de unos días.

Sehr günstig gelegen in Vila Nova de Gaia, 50m zum Douro, schöner, ruhiger als im Stadtzentrum, ganz nah an der Luis I. Brücke und vor allem von Ufer das schönste Panorama auf Fluss und Häuser-Skyline ... von da aus kann man alles in kürzester Zeit erreichen, flanieren/ wunderschöne Uferpromenade, die einzigartige Brücke, die spektakuläre Seilbahn hoch, zum bunten Mercado mit den vielen Spezialitäten am Ufer, rüber mit dem Boat-Taxi zum belebten Ribeira Viertel und 3 Stationen mit dem Bus zum Bahnhof, weiter zu allen top Sehenswürdigkeiten der Stadt - ein Highlight nach dem anderen !! Unbezahlbare einheimische Tips von Paulo :-) erhalten, gefrühstückt haben wir am Ufer in der pasteleria Soares, gegessen in den tollen kleinen Restaurants in der Nähe, und Porto bei Taylor’s genossen (informativ, professionell und chic!). Die Wohnung ist neu, modern und mit allem eingerichtet, im EG/Zwischengeschoss mit einigen Stufen und gut abgesichert (Eingangstür). Die Garage ist für kleine bis kompakte Autos mit etwas Geschick (Lift) gut anzusteuern. Summa summarum, absolut gelungen! jederzeit wieder in Porto und nur bei Maria und Paulo!!

The place is quite nice, well located and contains all the basic ammenities for your stay. It's very close to the Douro River (on the Gaia side) and you just need to walk like 100m to be by the river.

If you come by car a parking spot in a nearby garage is included. It was quite the experience which included driving the car into an elevator to go to the upper floor.

The host Maria was very nice and helpful. Overall I recommend the place.
Apartamento de excelente ubicación,impecable tal cual se muestra. Paulo esta pendiente de todo
Great location, great apartment, wonderful hosts!

Maria has been a great hostess from the moment I made the booking until our departure today. I chose her rental because of all the wonderful comments from other guests.....and they were right; she is so kind and attentive to your needs. She is great host! We loved staying in her rental. We had everything we needed and the location was amazing! Tasting rooms just a few feet from our door - as well as cafes and restaurants everywhere! You could not find a better location in all of Vila de Gaia!

Maria and Paolo's place is wonderful. We stayed 2 nights on the Gaia side (at their apartment) and one night up in the city of Porto. Originally we'd hoped to stay entirely in Porto but due to high demands and a need for a parking spot - we'd settled on this apartment. After experiencing both we'd wished we could have stayed at Maria and Paolo's apartment the entire time! Its location is perfect for going to the port cellars, beautiful views of the river and wonderful restaurants. The street it's located on is just picturesque and it has incredible views looking onto Porto. Paolo sent us some wonderful recommendations for restaurants nearby and each one we tried was exceptional. The apartment itself was very clean, comfortable, stylish and had great amenities (especially the free parking spot - so so convenient and though it would have been hard to find on our own - Paolo did a great job describing where to meet him and helped us get into the garage upon our arrival!) We'd highly recommend this spot!

We stayed at this apartment when we were in Porto in May and it was so perfect we had to come back when we were in Porto in October.  The location is perfect as it's only a block away from the river on a very quiet street.  The bed is beyond comfortable and we never ran out of hot water. The black out shades were a great touch as it allowed us to sleep in. We will definitely be staying in this apartment next time we travel to Porto.
Maria is great. She is warm and very helpful. The accommodation is so convenient and truly beautiful as it is shown on the photos.
Great location and beautiful apartment!
강에서 아주 가깝고 위치도 좋아요. 아파트 내부도 깨끗합니다 와인 투어 하면서 여유롭게 여행할 분들에게 추천합니다

Cosy and comfortable apartment in a beautiful area of Porto. Paulo was very helpful when we arrived showing us the parking space and giving us recommendations. Will definitely recommend this apartment. Very clean, quiet and within walking distance to the old part of Porto.

This area - on the Southern bank of the Douro is a perfect location for visiting Porto and the area around. Just a few minutes walk to the old town, but also its own scene going on - with the port wine lodges and lovely restaurants, and magnificent views across to Porto.
The apartment is very clean & comfortable and Paulo is really helpful with suggestions to make your stay really interesting and enjoyable.

We had a great week - many thanks.

Maria's apartment in Porto was great!
Super clean and great location. And the parking was awesome! Would definitely recommend!
Increíble! La ubicacion es perfecta y se puede llegar andando a todos los lados, un apartamento precioso con todo lo necesario, muy bien equipado. Recomendable 100%

Maria foi sempre comunicativa, o apartamento é espaçoso, limpo e bem localizado! O fato de ter estacionamento foi a cereja do bolo, pois dificilmente encontramos vagas no centro de Vila Nova de Gaia. Voltarei a Vila Nova de Gaia e com certeza ficarei neste sítio. Tudo perfeito!

Maria and Paulo did an excellent job for our stay in Porto!  Maria went above and beyond the call of duty to get our futbol tickets from the post office because the CTT [mail] lost the envelope!  It really helped out because I didn't know where I would've started trying to find the envelope...new country, no cell service.  It could've caused a lot of unneeded stress on our holiday.  The place was located perfectly - close to everything but not close enough to hear the noises from the bar/restaurants.  Highly recommended.  
-Danny & Emily

El apartamento está muy nuevo y limpio,  en una calle tranquila,  a 5 minutos del puente de Luis I.  El parking del que dispone es un plus en una ciudad con mucho tráfico donde es casi imposible aparcar.  La comunicación con Paulo y Maria ha sido fluida,  con buenos consejos sobre lugares donde comer.  Lo recomiendo
Un muy buen alojamiento con unos host inmejorables. Muy atentos y siempre dispuestos a ayudar.

We appreciated timely responses, very clean and thoughtfully appointed modern apartment, and collection of information about things to do in Porto. The port companies are all just a few minutes walk, making it an excellent location for anyone wanting to do wine tours and samplings. Being January, we were grateful for electric space heaters.
will visit again..

The location was good. It was nice to be close to the Dough River in an alley next to Sandman Weinery.

위치가 강변이라 좋았다. 샌드맨 와이너리 옆 골목을 따라가면 나온다. 인근에 빨래방도 가깝다. 지비 으둡고 내엠세
Very nice appartment, cant expect anything more.Very near to all the local attraction plus lovely host.

name: Bright and quiet bedroom - heart of Mile End
summary: Enjoy Montreal in the heart of beautiful Mile End district ! A few steps away from of famous bagel shop, Kem Coba ice cream & sorbet and many good brunch/cafes spots. It's a short walking distance from Laurier metro station, Mont-Royal mountain, many parks and a 20 min. walk to downtown and Old Port. Buses and Bixi right at the corner.
space: Visitors enjoyed their privacy (room is in the back of the apartment, right beside the kitchen and a huge patio that you can use).  Live in the most popular district in Montreal and close to everything.  Authentic Montreal apartment.
description: Enjoy Montreal in the heart of beautiful Mile End district ! A few steps away from of famous bagel shop, Kem Coba ice cream & sorbet and many good brunch/cafes spots. It's a short walking distance from Laurier metro station, Mont-Royal mountain, many parks and a 20 min. walk to downtown and Old Port. Buses and Bixi right at the corner. Visitors enjoyed their privacy (room is in the back of the apartment, right beside the kitchen and a huge patio that you can use).  Live in the most popular district in Montreal and close to everything.  Authentic Montreal apartment. Guests have access to the terrasse during the day or happy hour, but not at night since the neighbors bedroom is right under it. If you are a coffee drinker like me, you can choose your preferred coffee machine : italian, bodum or espresso and have a little cup to start your day ! (Although I recommend trying some of the delicious coffee shops around). It will be my pleasure to help out with any transportation issues, planni
neighborhood_overview: Enjoy the hype Mile End district, with Bagel Shops, Coffee Shops, Thrift Shops, and more ! Everything close-by: Restaurants, grocery stores, bars, next to Mont-Royal park, St-Laurent Boulevard and Mont-Royal avenue.  A bus in front of my place will bring you straight to Old Montreal and the festival district within 15 minutes.
notes: Apartment is located on the second floor with a private entrance. To reach the second floor you have to walk up stairs. (No elevator)
transit: Best choice is walking, bicycling and public transports. You can park your car in the streets near the apartment.
access: Guests have access to the terrasse during the day or happy hour, but not at night since the neighbors bedroom is right under it. If you are a coffee drinker like me, you can choose your preferred coffee machine : italian, bodum or espresso and have a little cup to start your day ! (Although I recommend trying some of the delicious coffee shops around).
interaction: It will be my pleasure to help out with any transportation issues, planning, and more. Looking for festivals, shows, partying, or just visiting? I will be glad to share my knowledge as I grew up in Montreal. I speak french and english and I’m learning a little spanish too.
house_rules: Merci de ne pas aller sur la terrasse après 20h. Merci d'enlever vos chaussures avant d'entrer.

host.host_about:
Bonjour!  J'ai grandit à Montréal et j'adore faire découvrir ma ville et rencontrer de nouvelles cultures. Je m’intéresse à l'entrepreneuriat, à l'enseignement du yoga, aux dynamiques de groupe et au bonheur en entreprise. 

En général j'aime parler de tout, et particulièrement de questions fondamentales concernant la société, l'innovation, le développement personnel, la philosophie et les arts.
--

Hi! I grew up in Montreal and I like to help visitors discover my city, and to meet different cultures. I'm interested in entrepreneurship, yoga teachings, group dynamics and happiness in the workplace. 

I like to talk about everything, and especially fundamental questions about society, innovation, personnal development, philosophy and arts.

reviews.comments:
Very nice appartement. Fany helped us by so many ways :)
I recommend to stay there

Séjour très agréable dans un appartement spacieux et propre. L'accueil et la communication avec Fanny se sont très bien passés. L'emplacement est le gros plus de ce logement, la quartier est très pittoresque et proche des transports.
Seul bémol pour le lit qui n'est pas très confortable.

Staying at Fanny's place made our trip to Montréal even more enjoyable. Her apartment is perfectly located in one of the most exciting parts of the city which makes it great for a short weekend visit. The place is very nice and clean, and we could count on Fanny's advice on local restaurants and bars. Highly recommended!
Fanny was very helpful and kind. The apartment's location is great, the room is lovely with lots of light.

Beautiful room, very comfortable bed, cozy apartment, and great location to explore Mile End and the Plateau. The terrace is amazing but unfortunately we didn't have the time or weather to enjoy it. Fanny was very helpful and everything went absolutely smoothly. Highly recommendable!

Fanny's apartment had a great location in Mile End close to Mont Royal and a ton of good restaurants/bars. She was a wonderful host and person to get to know and provided great recommendations for things to d. I would definitely come back to Montreal and stay with her in the future
Fanny is a thoughtful and friendly host, anticipating our needs and making our stay comfortable. Her place has a nice terrace and the location is very beautiful and central.
Great place, great location. Fanny is very accommodating and easy going.

Fanny is a great Airbnb host. A friend and I stayed with her for several nights and couldn't have been happy with the accommodations. Fanny is super kind and really fun. She definitely helped take our trip to the next level. The room was excellent, and Fanny's attention to keeping things clean is noticeable. Wonderful stay.

Very clean, cute apartment in Mile End. The host was super helpful in giving us information about what was happening in the neighbourhood during the weekend, and the apartment is close enough to walk to all the sites we wanted to see. 5 stars!
Very nice and price worthy stay. Very clean. Fanny was a great host!

I had a very pleasant stay at Fanny's place.  She responded quickly, was there to greet me upon arrival and provided a spotless room in her flat.
The area is packed with interesting places and everything is walkable. 
There is a steep flight of stairs out front- need to exercise caution.  In summertime, look for a brand new deck in the back that is very peaceful and quiet for relaxing moments. And Fanny is a good host. 
I would not hesitate recommending Fanny's place to anyone looking for a pleasant Airbnb experience!
Emplacement, maison et hôte merveilleux.  Best AirBnB experience!
Fanny was a great and kind host. She gave us tips to enjoy Montreal. Her place is very welcoming and the room is spacious. We would definitely come back at Fanny's place.
Appartement fonctionnel, bien situé, très bien entretenu et calme. Je le recommande fortement.
Parfait! La terasse est extra. Tout est devant la porte.

Fanny’s apartment was great—lots of light, very clean and bright, with a really gorgeous deck. Located in a very cool part of town, filled with lots of great bars and restaurants, with easy access to buses and trains going to other parts of the city. Fanny was a lovely host, giving us tips for what to do nearby and over our weekend stay, and even helping us very promptly when we stupidly got ourselves locked out of the apartment.

Staying with Fanny was one of the best AirBnB experiences we had in a long time. We stayed with her for 5 nights and wished that we could stay even longer! The whole apartement was very authentic, cozy and clean with a nice big patio. We loved the neighbourhood Mile End, it's close to the Park Mont-Royal and Metro Laurier, nice cafés, restaurants and Bagel shops :)  Fanny was a very nice and helpful and friendly host. She gave us very good recommendations and we felt very welcomed from the first minute! We definitely recommend staying with her! Merci beaucoup! :)  Sara & Max
The apartment is super clean and beautiful, also it's in very good location. Fanny is a very friendly, kind and nice person! I wish I could stay there longer. Merci beaucoup Fanny!
Très calme, Fanny est une très gentille hôte !!
Fanny's apartment was lovely and located in the best spot in Montreal.
Super cute apartment in a great location! Although I didn't have the chance to meet Fanny she was very friendly, left behind great recommendations, and replied quickly to all my questions/concerns.

Fanny was a really friendly, open person and it was great having her as a host. I felt comfortable immediately in her place. The location is perfect. Very close to everything without being noisy. The bed was comfy,  and everything very clean. I had a great time and would definitely stay again.

Fanny is great with communication and very helpful with everything- she goes the extra mile. Her place is awesome (backyard was really nice for a drink too!) And it's in a cool, hipster part of Montreal. Only thing I found tricky was the key and getting into the apartment but fortunately her friend let us in so there were no issues. I'd stay here again!
Fanny's apartment was wonderful! The place is clean and bright, and has everything you need. The location is ideal, and Fanny is a lovely host.

Fanny is terrific. Her place is in a great location. She had terrific knowledge about places to go and things to do. We enjoyed spending time sharing travel experiences. She is great and an awesome host. Couldn’t ask for more.

Fanny’s Place was excellent. It was in a very walkable and fun part of town and I had everything I needed for my stay. More importantly, Fanny is a wonderful person; she had a list of recommendations waiting for me when I got to her place, and she was engaging conversationalist. I highly recommend Fanny’s place for your visit to Montreal!
Wonderful place to stay, very nice host.

Fanny’s apartment was just as she had described it - quiet, clean and in a very good location. She was very friendly and accommodating, and it was nice to spend a few minutes chatting with her. The bedroom was cozy and comfortable, just what we needed after a long day driving and exploring the city. We would love to go back some time :)
Great and quite room, very good facilities, lovely host very attent. The place is clean, and nearby bus, bixie's metro shops mountain. So perfect.
Fanny’s place is ideal, and a great deal! Great location in a great neighbourhood, very clean, minimalist and stylishly decorated, great amenities, and very easy to talk to.

Fanny is such a friendly and helpful host. We had some good conversation and she had great recommendations for food. Her place is very clean and is very close to several bus stops that will take you close to all the major spots.  Many cafes and restaurants nearby. The neighborhood and her flat are very cute! A great experience ☺

Très bonne adresse pour séjourner à Montréal. Fanny est accueillante, sympathique et discrète. Elle a tout une liste de bonnes adresses dans le quartier, et fait tout pour que votre séjour soit agréable. La petite terrasse pour un café est un plus, même en hiver !

I came to Montréal for a conference at L'Université de Montréal in November 2017. Fanny is the consummate host and her place is very comfortable, clean, and in the best location in Montreal! Definitely stay here if you are looking for a place that is quiet, clean, and close to the best bars and restaurants in Montreal (Dieu du Ciel!, Aux Vivres, Gus, among others). The neighbourhood is fantastic, full of nice restaurants and little boutiques, and when I was there (late Fall) the streets were lit at night with fairy lights in the trees--quite magical! Transit is also easily accessible (buses and subways are close by), and downtown Montréal is not far. Fanny is extremely welcoming and immediately made me feel comfortable in her home, which is beautiful (with a STUNNING back deck). I loved staying here and would come back!

Fanny is the sweetest. Timely communication, friendly, and provided lots of tips on what to see and do. Her place is great - very clean, quiet, and in a hip neighborhood full of restaurants and vintage shops (my favorite). Would stay here again in a heartbeat!
I really enjoyed my stay at Fanny’s apartment. Conveniently located, spacious and clean as well as the great hospitality and kindness of Fanny. Thank you

Fanny was a great host and she made me feel very welcome. Communication and check-in could not have been any smoother. The room was quiet and nice with a comfy bed. The apartment is just a short walk from every good spot in Mile End, and the nearby subway and bus stops make it very easy to reach the rest of Montreal.

My stay at Fanny's place couldn't have been better, not only she is a great host she is an amazingly inspiring human being. Her hospitality is a joy and her local recommendations amazing. Her flat is super well located at one of the coolest neighborhoods in Montreal. I would DEFINITELY love to come back!

It was a lovely stay! I chose "much better than I expected" not because I didn't expect much, but because I want to express how much I loved it. Fanny is a wonderful hostess who goes with the flow while at the same time being super reliable and accurate in terms of description of the place. The room is sweet and quiet, and the entire apartment has a very warm feel and ambiance. Despite it being arctic cold in the city, the place was well heated and I wasn't cold at all. The neighborhood offers great cafes, restaurants and easy access to other parts of Montreal. I can highly recommend!

Fanny's place was great! We were there on a very cold weekend, but there were lots of great bars and restaurants still in walking distance to enjoy. I'm sure it would be even more amazing in the summer, especially with her cute back porch. The room was excellent, exactly as pictured. It also felt like we had a lot of privacy, even though we just rented the room.

Fanny's place was just fantastic. Spacious room, great flat, great kitchen with everything you could ever need and amazing host. I stayed there for one week, and couldn't have asked for a better place. It's located in the heart of the hippest place in Montreal and perhaps one of the hippest places on earth, still the surroundings was very quiet. I had allot of good conversations with fanny and felt really like home. Thank you for amazing hosting.

J'ai passé un excellent séjour dans l'appartement de Fanny. Tout est parfait, l'emplacement, le calme, la chambre, la propreté. Fanny a été une hôte très accueillante qui nous fait très vite se sentir comme chez soi. 
De plus nous avons eu de super discussions aussi diversifiées qu'intéressantes. C'est avec joie que je recommande vivement cette place :-)
Trés bel appartement au cœur du Mile end. Tout est trés propre et bien entretenu. Je recommande !

Fanny was a great host and made me feel welcome within her space! The place itself was fantastic... spacious and exactly as pictured. Conveniently located near a bus stop and metro station, Fanny's place is in the perfect location in Montreal!
Our stay at Fanny's place was exceptional! Fanny is a welcoming and open host, the place was spotless, the room was very cozy and the rooftop terrace was perfect on a warm Montreal spring day!
Fanny is a charming friendly girl with good energy and her place is comfortable and very well located! Fully recommended!
Great place, great location and a great host! Well recommended.
Fanny is one of the kindest host I've met. Gave me warm welcome, great local tips and made me feel at home. Will definitely recommend and would def go back.

It was a perfect stay at Funnys apartment! The room was cozy, lightly and quiet, the location was awesome! Many cafés, bars and restaurants close by and everything is walkable even Mont royal. Downtown or old montreal is walkable but it takes arround 30-40 mins, but for me it was good to see as much as I could from montreal through walking instead of taking the public transportation! So I would definitely recommend funnys place to discover the city, even for a short trip which I did (2 days)! 
Funny is also a very nice, lovely and open person, we had a nice talk!

A lovely room in a peaceful and bright apartment with a wonderful host. I slept so well here and loved my time sitting on the deck eating croissants and bagels. Fanny is a great host:  kind, interesting and welcoming.
Wonderful host, great location and awesome room/patio! 100% would stay again.

Awesome Airbnb experience! 
Fanny is a very welcoming, open and friendly host. She also gave me great local tips. The room was indeed very cozy and quiet, I slept well and felt like home. The location is just perfect! The next metro is within 10 minutes walking distance and the next bus to the old port is even in 1 minute walking distance. There are plenty of unique restaurants and bars nearby, the well-known Mont Royal is also not far away.
I would definitively stay at Fannys place again if I come to Montréal again!
Merci beaucoup!

I stayed at Fanny’s place for a week. It looks exactly as described. Very clean and quiet.  It is located in a very nice area with fresh air, 10 min walk to Laurier metro station, bus stop right near the house. There are numerous cafes and restaurants around,  2 small parks. Fanny was very helpful  and friendly. I really enjoyed my visit.
Good location and nice spot!

Fanny’s place was awesome and the location was perfect. The apartment was right in Mile’s End, and was walkable to Saint lawerence st, st. Viater and fairmont bagels, and much more. Her apartment was clean and the outdoor deck was the cutest. Fanny was amazing, making check in super easy and would let us know whenever there was an event going on in town. I would definitely stay here again!

L'accueil de Fanny est parfait la chambre et l'appartement sont très agréables et la terrasse un vrai bonheur.
Merci à Fanny pour ses bon conseils pendant notre séjour

Fanny's place is right in the middle of a really cool neighborhood. Bars and cafes and restaurants are all around her.  I wasn't sure if it might be off the beaten path, but it was very close to nightlife. The Plateau/Mile End neighborhoods are the cool neighborhoods to check out if you want fine dining and a hip scene.  

My wife and I spent a weekend at Fanny's apartment and she gave us some great local tips on our arrival. The two-bedroom apartment is stylish and clean and her large back porch is nice for a quiet break from the busy neighborhood. She even let us borrow her clothes steamer when my shirt was too wrinkled from the suitcase!

Fanny is a lovely, welcoming and easy-going host. Staying at her place gave us, although it is a shared one, enough privacy as a couple. It is located in the heart of Mile-end, lots of nice places in walkable distance. Overall we had a wonderful stay at Fanny's, definitely can recommend hers!

This is the second time I stayed at Fanny's, and I was very happy to come back. Her place location is fantastic, in a very exciting neighborhood and easy to reach downtown. She is very welcoming and fun to be around. I greatly recommend asking her for her list of nearby restaurants and bars, she has the best selection!

Fanny was an excellent host and very responsive. She was very helpful in the public transportation/getting around piece since I didn't have a car. Her place is in a perfect location that is walking distance to a lot of the cool restaurants, bars, and coffee shops. There is one particular coffee shop literally across the street that was amazing. I would definitely stay there again.
Great location and good communication, would definitely stay here again.

I am sure the hostess is a kind and generous person with many insights to Montreal. Because of omissions in the listing and events that occurred after my arrival, I chose not to stay.

Fanny offered to email a list of places to eat. I left the US on the 19th. The email was received on the 20th. Because of limited internet access and Data Roaming Charges, I was not checking my email after I left home.

I left my bag at the room while I was searching for parking. The room is off the kitchen. It was 83 degrees outside that evening and the room was even warmer. The bed and a fan were next to the window. I could see the patio table and chairs from my pillow. Fanny apologized, saying the comforter was in the dryer. We laughed thinking it was not needed. 

As I have done many times before, I prefer to park my car and walk a city. Parking here is limited to parking meters or Resident Permit parking. There are no parking garages. There is no off street parking. Construction on side streets further reduced available parking. While walking I was bumped by a motorist coming out of an alley and hit a second time by a bicyclist traveling in the wrong direction. I spent 20 minutes circling the neighborhood looking for parking. Meanwhile, the police, a tow truck, and an ambulance were collecting a motorcyclist at the corner of Av Laurier and Saint Urbain in front of Lio Fratelli. 

I invested a considerable amount of time planning my trip to Montreal. It was not my plan to spend a beautiful summer evening driving in traffic translating No Parking signs. Had I known in advance that there was no parking, I would have spent the $200 for air conditioning, room service,  and parking elsewhere. It was not worth the risk to stay. I was looking forward to seeing this great city. After driving seventeen hours, I drove another five and I arrived at home in the the US at 12:30 AM

Fanny's place is very cute, clean, and homey. I didn't stay for long, so I wasn't able to take full advantage, but the terrace is great. Overall it is well maintained and comfoetable, and Fanny is very sweet. The area is very cool, just about 10 minutes from the Subway and with lots of restaurants and shops. I look forward to staying here again.

Fanny's place is great. The place is located in a great neighborhood with walking distance to the metro (about 10-12 mins) and there are many great breakfast/restaurants/bars around. 
The place is stylish and comfortable as described. The patio is particularly great.  Even though I need to share bathroom with Fanny, but she is very accommodating to the guests, I feel like I have the bathroom to myself through out my stay. 

Fanny is a great host who is communicative and easy to talk to. And she keeps a low profile to give the guests enough privacy which I really appreciate. I also got a lot of local tips for good places to eat and visit fro her.

Overall great experience, highly recommend

Very nice, clean, peacfull and well located appartment. close to everything, parc, coffee shop, bakery, metro, pub, restaurant... we enjoyed the breakfast and the nice terrace too! Fanny also very nice. I’ll definitly recommanded and will come back if need to stay again in Montreal!
Felt at home right away! Very clean and tidy! Beautiful space and friendly host! Highly recommended!!

Stop searching. This is the place you want to be in Montréal. Logistically the neighborhood is amazing. Cafes on every corner it seems. The best food I’ve had in my life. Incredibly friendly people, despite my awful attempts at their beautiful language. Then there’s the space.. relaxing, comforting, beautiful! And then there is the super host... this is why air bnb is amazing.. people like Fanny. This is what travel to a new city should be like.. if you want a true experience of the city and it’s incredible culture!

Perfect apartment in a great Mile End location! Fanny was an awesome host and  provided helpful information on the best local restaurants and sights to see. The location is very walkable and also close to bus lines and metro. The space is just as described, spacious comfortable and clean. Highly recommended!!

Fanny's apartment is a perfect place to call home while you get to know Montreal. Positioned in a hip and trendy part of the city, there are amazing bars, restaurants, and cafes within just a few blocks. The rest of the sights to see in the city are either a manageable walk or quick uber or bus ride away. The room is clean and relaxing, the back terrace is beautiful and even thought you're in the bustle of the city, the apartment is quiet and tranquil. Fanny is so sweet, friendly, and helpful. You'll love staying with Fanny, I can't recommend it enough!

Fanny is a great host, good communication and very friendly.  The apartment is a nice little place with beautiful a patio.  It is  well situated and very quiet even though it's in the heart of the Plateau / Mile-End.  Definietly recommend.

Chère Fanny, être chez toi était comme être chez moi - j’ai beaucoup apprécié mon séjour au Mile End dans ton appart charmant et bien placé. Il y avait tous qu’il me faillait et je conseillerai ton logement 100% :)

Perfect location in Montreal. Fanny is a great host and will provide you with a lot of advice to discover the Mile End and the city. The room is huge and very bright and you will feel both welcomed and independent.

Fanny's place was perfect - amazing location in a great neighborhood, easily accessible to and from other parts of Montreal, but still a peaceful place to rest while you're travelling. The space was immaculate, bright, and well-appointed, and Fanny was an excellent host. I can't recommend highly enough!

Nous avons vraiment adoré séjourner chez Fanny. Son appartement est très bien situé, le quartier est génial, avec beaucoup de charme et de très bonnes adresses pour dîner ou prendre un verre. La chambre est grande, très propre, très cosy, et très calme (la fenêtre donne sur l’arrière). La literie est très confortable. On s’y est senti vraiment très bien! Et nous avons adoré Fanny ! Elle est vraiment très sympathique, très accueillante et ouverte à la discussion. Nous recommandons très fortement ce logement. Réservez sans hésiter !

Fanny a hébergé ma mère pendant son séjour à Montréal. Logement très sympa et bien situé à deux pas du mile-end!
Nous le recommandons!

I loved my stay at Fanny's place, it was just perfect. The location is great, right in the middle of Mile End and yet the apartment is very quiet. The room itself is lovely and bright. And Fanny is a super host, very kind and helpful! Thanks again for everything! I'll definitely come back.
Fanny’s place is the ideal choice to experience one of the best neighbourhoods of MTL - greats bars and restaurants all within walking distance.
Excellent location, great host! I was able to relax and enjoy Montreal for it’s great neighbourhood feel. Highly recommended

The space was very clean, comfortable, and stylish. The accommodations were exceptional and you can't beat both the location and the price. Fanny is a wonderful host with great knowledge regarding the local events, restaurants, and attractions. She made check-in very simple, responded to messages rapidly, and made me feel welcome in the environment. I would certainly stay here again.
Great location, clean and an amazing  hostess!
Fanny is a fabulous host and her home is very clean, beautiful and comfortable!

Fanny's place is fantastic, extremely well situated, on Laurier west in the Mile End area. The room is very quiet, large and comfortable, the space is very clean. Fanny is very nice, we shared some great conversations, she will make you feel right at home. Highly recommended, the location is unbeatable.

Fanny and her Airbnb are absolutely perfect. I couldn’t have asked for a better experience. It was my first time visiting Montreal and Fanny’s place isn’t only sparkling clean and cozy but also located in the best neighborhood. Fanny was incredibly friendly and I felt very comfortable, safe, and welcomed. I could go on and on...but most importantly if you’re looking for a place to stay in Montreal book Fanny’s place because it’s 5 stars all around!
Very comfy room and great hospitality. The area is super nice, well-connected and with a lot of shops and restaurants around. I would definitely book this place again!
Une chambre super mignonne et confortable, un appartement impeccable et très bien situé et surtout une hôte très agréable ! Recommandé à 100% !
The place is great, and Fanny is an extremely gracious host.
Great hostess. Convenient location. Tidy.

Fanny’s place is exceptional. It was as described and more. I mean you can tell how much she cares about the place and her guests in all the little details. I found the bed very comfortable, the space clean (trust), and the location unmatched. It made my Montreal experience for work/fun really smooth. I would definitely recommend her place.
Fantastic hostess, very lovely space, excellent location.
This is an ideal spot! - Fanny is a super gracious host, it’s comfortable and clean, and in an awesome location. Will definitely stay again  my next trip to Montreal.
A wonderful host, a wonderful rom in a wonderful apartment. Will stay there again!

L’appartement de Fanny est dans un emplacement idéal, proche de toute commodité, très propre et équipé de tout le nécessaire. 

Fanny a été une hôte très agréable et chaleureuse, je la remercie de sa gentillesse. Je recommanderais la chambre dans son appartement pour n’importe quel voyageur souhaitant rester dans un quartier animé pour un prix raisonnable.

name: Copacabana Dream - A Tropical Vacation
summary: ATENÇÃO: SE VOCÊ ESTÁ VIAJANDO SOZINHO MANDE-NOS UMA MENSAGEM E PAGUE COM ATÉ 50% DE DESCONTO! Os anfitriões estão acostumados a receber pessoas de todas as idades, cores, orientações sexuais. Venha viver o sonho!
space: Renovated in 2017 this apartment is cozy and comfortable with 24h security guards and cameras. Guests will have acess to the bathroom, full kitchen and living room with HD TV and Wi-fi. The rooms are very comfortable and spacious with large closets/wardrobes, 100 % cotton linens and towels as well as cozy and comfortable beds. The apartment is two blocks away from the most famous beach in the world Copacabana Beach, two blocks from various bus stations as well as five blocks away from the subway station. The apartment is also within walking distance (less than 5 minutes) of many supermarkets, mini-marts and pharmacies. Also there are various world-class bars and nightclubs within walking distance of the apartment(URL HIDDEN)

Also there are various world-class bars and nightclubs within walking distance of the apartment(URL HIDDEN) Guests will have access to the bathroom, full kitch
neighborhood_overview: Copacabana, need I say more? In the heart of Rio de Janeiro, close to the city's major tourist attractions, Copacabana Beach attracts tourists from all over the world year-round. The neighborhood is one of the most traditional of Rio de Janeiro and has a cosmopolitan population that mixes and matches, creating the culture of Rio. The neighborhood has several supermarkets, pharmacies, souvenir shops and several authentic bars and restaurants.
notes: We only rent one of the two rooms available. Both rooms are listed in the pictures (Rooms 1 and 2). Let us know which room you prefer and it's yours!
transit: Information will be given to visitors regarding the attractions and dangers of Rio de Janeiro. The apartment is 30 minutes by bus from Sugar Loaf and close to several bus stops and 5 blocks from the subway. In addition, the apartment is less than a 5 minute walk from several supermarkets, pharmacies and convenience stores.
access: Guests will have access to the bathroom, full kitchen and living room with TV HD and Wi-fi. In addition, guests may use the washing machine and dryer and the laundry area.
interaction: Guests are welcome to feel at ease and welcome in the apartment, I will always be available to provide the best possible stay. I can provide information about the main tours of Rio de Janeiro as well as offer tips on alternative tours to get to know the hidden wonders of Rio de Janeiro. All relevant information on public transport and safety will be provided.

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.host_about:
Sou psicóloga, tenho três filhos adultos. adoro viajar e trocar experiências sobre viagens e estilos de vida. Morei muitos anos fora do Brasil e sei como é importante ser bem acolhido quando estamos longe de casa (mesmo em uma cidade linda como o Rio de Janeiro). Dizem que minha principal característica é estar sempre pronta para ajudar.  Sempre gostei de ter a casa cheia de familiares e amigos meus e dos meus filhos.
Então, 
Sejam bem-vindos!!

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments: Nossa estadia foi ótima! A Sonia e os filhos dela, Nilo e Alan nos receberam muito bem e nos ajudaram em tudo que precisamos. O quarto é muito bom, espaço ótimo e cama confortável. Além disso, o café da manhã é muito (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza ficaríamos novamente!

Sonia e seus filhos, foram super atenciosos, prestativos e educados.
O apartamento tem uma excelente localização, bem pertinho da praia de Copacabana. O quarto é agradável e muito confortável. 
Adoramos nossa estadia e pretendemos voltar mais vezes. Super recomendo!

Agrademos a Dona Sônia e seus filhos Nilo e Alan pelo acolhimento e simpatia! Nos sentimos totalmente em casa e a vontade! Ótimo local para hospedagem, tranquilo, seguro, próximo de tudo e o café maravilhoso! Voltaremos mais vezes e indicamos para todos que procuram um segundo lar para temporada de férias! Parabéns pelo apartamento, muito limpo, organizado,como digo! parece uma casa de boneca! ;) e sem contar com a anfitriã e seus filhos,pessoas bastante preocupada com o bem estar de seus hóspedes! Estamos muito agradecido! Até breve!

Nossa primeira hospedagem nesta modalidade. Eu e minha esposa gostamos muito. A Sra. Sonia e seus filhos nos deixaram a vontade. Pessoas prestativas, simpáticas, educadas. Quarto exelente, cama ótima, armário amplo e várias gavetas para guardar seus pertences. Mesa para Notebook e Apto. limpo e aconchegante.

O local é perto de tudo e portanto de fácial locomoção para visitar a cidade facilmente e há 100 Mts da praia.

Resumindo: Voltaríamos a nos hospedar no aconchegante AP da Sra. Sonia, sem sombra de dúvidas.
A estadia foi muito agradável! A anfitriã foi muito receptiva, prestativa e simpática! Além de tudo, a localização é ótima! Super indico!

Sonia is a very nice host, she helped us through during our stay and was available at any time. Great location, 5 minutes walk from Copacabana and a few meters away from supermarkets, banks and restaurants. 
Don't hesitate, it's perfect to discover Rio !

Es un apartamento muy confortable, con habitación con muy buena comodidad. 
Tiene una excelente ubicación, a una cuadra de la rambla de Copacabana en una zona muy segura, a pocas cuadras de la estación de metro y avenidas de buses que te comunican con toda la ciudad. 
También destacamos la hospitalidad,  disponibilidad y amabilidad de Sonia y su hijo.

Nossa estadia no apartamento da Sonia foi maravilhosa, eu e meu filho nos hospedamos pela primeira vez através do AIRBNB e posso dizer que foi a melhor escolha. A acomodação e a hospitalidade da Sonia fez a diferença em nossas férias. Super indico, apartamento aconchegante, boa localização e ótima anfitriã.
A hospedam foi perfeita. O apartamento é muito bem localizado, muito perto da praia, com vários restaurantes e mercados próximos, super limpo e aconchegante. Nota dez!

Fomos muito bem recebidos pela Sonia e seus filhos. Adoramos o local. Próximo a praia, metrô, mercados... voltaremos com certeza!!
Super recomendo!

O apartamento da Sonia é ótimo, muito bem localizado, perto de bares, restaurantes, mercados, estação de metro e a menos de 2 quadras da praia. 
A Sonia nos recebeu muito bem. O quarto que ficamos é maravilhoso, a cama enorme, confortável, tudo muito limpo e cheiroso. 
Recomendo! 
Obrigada pela hospitalidade e recepção. 
Daniele
Sônia e sua família são pessoas educadas e atenciosas. Eu e meu irmão tivemos uma ótima hospedagem. Quarto maravilhoso. Casa limpa e bem localizada. Voltaremos mais vezes. Recomendo!

Foi totalmente  excelente! Me hospedei em marco/2018
Local: apartamento exatamente como o das fotos. Quarto com ar condicionado (totalmente necessário devido ao calor da Cidade, foi otimo!), limpeza excelente do quarto. Bem tranquilo utilizar as outras areas. A Familia nos deixou totalmente à vontade, utlizamos os utencilios de cozinha, a tv tranquilamente.  Portaria 24h, bem seguro. 
Localizacao: maravilhosa!  Perto de exatamente tudo: ao lado de mercado,metro, proximo a farmacias, BK, MC, variados restaurantes, na rua de tras da praia (extremamente perto) Tudo muito perto.
Decepção: Maravilhosa! Sonia super receptiva, simpatica, nos indicou varios lugares para irmos, nos deu varias orientações alem de seus filhos super simpaticos que tambem nos ajudarão.  Familia (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza voltarei!

É a segunda vez que fico na casa da Sonia. É a melhor hospedagem de Copacabana. Sonia e sua família são pessoas maravilhosas. O apartamento é muito bem localizado e limpíssimo. Voltarei mais vezes. Recomendo
Todo excelente.!!! Sonia una genia y el departamento hermoso. Muy limpio y cómodo y te bien ubicado
Sonia e sua família são pessoas maravilhosas. Eu e meu irmão tivemos uma excelente hospedagem. A casa é muito limpa, cheirosa, bem localizada. Sonia é um amor de pessoa, esperamos voltar em breve ❤️
Anfitriã de alta qualidade e hospitalidade, apto maravilhoso, ótima localização. Super indico.

Dá pra dar 1000 estrelas? Foram 11 dias maravilhosos nesse RJ. A Sônia um amor de pessoa e deixou a gente bem em casa mesmo. Sua família nos recebeu muito bem, seu filho deu muitas dicas. O quarto ótimo a cama muito boa e grande. O local é perfeito, seguro e fica perto de tudo que você possa imaginar que Copacabana tem (metrô, bares, restaurantes, farmácias, fast foods, supermercado 24horas...) tudo bem próximo. Obrigada...

tudo conforme o anuncio, bom local, limpo e proximo, mas o anfitrião tem que melhorar o aparelho de ar condicionado, pois não está funcionando a contento, quando fizer mais calor, ficará bem dificil dormir no imovel.
tudo normal nada de mas  localiçao e otima

This room is ideal for a traveler or someone who needs somewhere to stay while looking for a long term apartment. It is only 5 minutes away from the A/C Utica subway stop. Clean, safe, and fun with tons of coffee shops, restaurants, and bars all within walking distance!
