name: Affordable Guest Room
summary: This listing is for our Bedroom with Shared kitchen, bathrooms, lanai, and other common areas. The room offers one king-size bed. It is a bit more spacious than our other private rooms. Therefore, if you need a little extra space, this may suit you best! With beautiful peach walls; hints of blue; and windows that look out on our beautiful Hawaiian gardens, this nautical room delights everyone from all ages and backgrounds. We do have AC.
space: Kalani Hawaii is not your typical "place to stay." As a fusion of all accommodation styles, we are a unique, boutique Private Lodging offering our guests the finest accommodations on the North Shore. Our rooms are rented out individually or joined in privacy for families or groups of travelers. What you will experience at Kalani Hawaii is an escape from the everyday rush, a peek through the palm trees to see how life exists when you're on island time. We offer once in a lifetime memory, beautiful vistas, breathtaking sunsets, and short strolls to famous beaches, snorkeling, world class surfing, and much, much more. Your personal day begins when you want it to and only requires you to share the sand and warm Pacific with sleepy turtles, tropical fish, jumping porpoise - and surfers during our winter big wave season. Oh yes, and you'll find many others just like you, in awe of our sunsets that truly have no rival on either side of the equator, so enjoy every second of your stay!
description: This listing is for our Bedroom with Shared kitchen, bathrooms, lanai, and other common areas. The room offers one king-size bed. It is a bit more spacious than our other private rooms. Therefore, if you need a little extra space, this may suit you best! Kalani Hawaii is not your typical "place to stay." As a fusion of all accommodation styles, we are a unique, boutique Private Lodging offering our guests the finest accommodations on the North Shore. Our rooms are rented out individually or joined in privacy for families or groups of travelers. What you will experience at Kalani Hawaii is an escape from the everyday rush, a peek through the palm trees to see how life exists when you're on island time. We offer once in a lifetime memory, beautiful vistas, breathtaking sunsets, and short strolls to famou
neighborhood_overview: We love that we live in one of the most beautiful places on Earth. Known as the "7 Mile Miracle," the North Shore of Oahu is one of the most sought after places for vacationers. We're lucky enough not only to live steps away from world class beaches, surf breaks, and historic Haleiwa town, but we are a serene getaway amongst all of it.
notes: As we are a fusion of all accommodation styles we want to clear up any confusion with regards to what we offer as a private lodging. We offer private rooms and studios as well as shared dorm style rooms, and everyone has access to shared common areas. We serve breakfast upon request only at an additional charge. Parking is private and secure at no additional charge. Security cameras around property and hallways. Complimentary phone for all USA calls is available.
transit: The buses in Hawaii are some of the most efficient around and we have a bus stop just a short walk up the road. If you'd like to be more mobile we suggest renting a bike or car. Otherwise, we're only a few steps away from many of the world's most famous beaches.
access: Guests will have access to all shared common areas at our lodging which includes a large kitchen, lounge area, our expansive outdoor gardens, a shared patio seating area with BBQ & TV as well as bathrooms, laundry and surfboard/bike storage. Please see our website for photos of all the wonderful areas you can access.
interaction: We are available for any questions you may have but our goal is to allow you to relax in peace - when you need us, we're there, otherwise enjoy your escape on the North Shore of Oahu.

host.host_location: On the "7 miles miracle" known as the North Shore of Oah'u, Hawaii.
host.host_about: Aloha! I am the proprietor of a private lodging on the North Shore of Oah'u, a place where you will find an escape from the everyday, relaxation, and some of the most beautiful beaches in the world. Here we enjoy the beautiful weather, lush jungle surroundings, and the way the sunlight glistens off the Pacific. If you'd like to join us at Kalani Hawaii Private Lodging you can find more info about us on our website at (Website hidden by Airbnb)

reviews.comments: Very well received and very clean room.  Great help from the owners.  Good facilities.

access: Cuisine complète, salle de bain, grande terrasse pour manger a l'exterieur, laveuse, sécheuse, lave-vaisselle, télévision, internet TGV WiFi All areas except our personal room!
interaction: Nos guest font parties de notre coloc Guest are more than just guests! Nous somme tous les 2 des voyageurs avec pleins d'histoire a raconter et partager. Nous connaissons très bien notre ville, alors si vous cherchez a decouvrir Montreal, C'est l'endroit parfait!  We are in love with this city! Ask us questions..we are not Siri but we will find the answer. Don't be shy
house_rules: On ne fume pas dans la maison/No smoking in the house...that's the only rule ;) We have a beautiful balcony for that Yes..please do your dishes

host.host_about: Bonjour!! Très sociable et ouvert d'esprit. :)

reviews.comments: Une adresse à retenir pour un excellent accueil dans un quartier peut etre un peu loin  de berri uqam mais tres bien desservi par les transports en commun. J ai passé un super sejour chez Dominic qui est chaleureux,  prevenant et attentif. La chambre est super agréable et le lit de très bonne qualité.  Franchement  je vous conseille cette adresse!! Merci encore Dominic!
Super week end passé avec Dom et Phil, deux colloc très accueillants, chaleureux, et prêts à vous donner les bons plans dans Montréal. Merci à vous deux !!

It's my first trip to Montreal and I'm glad that Dominic and his roommate Philip hosted me! I have to thank Philip in particular for helping me check in their apartment when Dominic was away.  Having taken a greyhound bus departing quite late from NYC and arrived just too early in Montreal, I was just dying for an early check-in to lay my head down. Philip made my bed and gave me many suggestions about the city as he could, sorry Philip, I know I let you get tongue-tied many times;) Dominic was also very nice and responsive. He handed me complementary blankets just in case I might catch a cold at night. As to public transportation, it was  only 2 minutes walk to bus station 94/197, the former takes you to Station Frontenac on Green Line and the latter to Station Rosement on Orange (Website hidden by Airbnb) could always rely on STM to go to all the tourist sites, like the old port and Mont-Royal etc.There were also several grocery stores like IGA and restaurants and bars nearly. My room was spacious with a comfy bed! I should never forget to mention their lovely patio at the back, a nice spot to chill in summer! I highly recommend Dominic's place to you all!

La chambre est spacieuse et l'appartement bien équipé, je me suis sentie comme à la maison !
Dominic et Philippe sont adorables et m'ont accueilli et intégrée de suite comme leur colocataire. Cela restera un très beau souvenir pour moi, merci à vous deux !
Good place. Friendly host, willing to explain, the place is quiet even though there are a few rooms for visitors.

My husband and I spent three nights at Dominic's apartment and it worked out beautifully.  The apartment is well laid out and the room is both clean and comfortable.  There is a good amount of space and a desk for your belongings. The bed is of very good quality.  There are bus stops near to the apartment but, we prefer to walk a lot and see the city and people so we spent almost the entire time on foot.   Dominic and his roommate Philip are warm and gracious hosts who are most helpful. I would not hesitate in the least to return to this apartment on another trip back to Montreal. You will be pleased with this choice. Thank you!

Parfait airbnb !
Dom est super sympa, très sociable, en 5 minutes vous vous sentirez chez vous.
Le lieue est facilement accessible (métro à 10 min à pied, ou le bus juste en bas), un supermarché est situé en face de l'immeuble.

Si vous êtes fan de hockey, c'est l'endroit pour vous !

We had a wonderful stay with Dominic. We found him warm and engaging, and very helpful regarding information about getting around the city. His space was clean and comfortable. The area has cute restaurants lots of greenery. We rented the bixi bikes which were a short walk from Dominic's and had a great time getting to know the city that way. Highly recommend and hope to return.

Très bon accueil de Dominic. L'appartement est grand et agréable ( une belle terrasse pour déjeuner sous le soleil !). Tout a été fait pour rendre mon séjour agréable. Cela m'a permis aussi de découvrir un quartier que je ne connaissais pas !
Best of the best !

Totalmente recomendable, súper mercado y estación de bus que lleva directo al metro todo a una cuadra a la redonda. El lugar es seguro, el apartamento limpio y agradable. Dom y Phil son súper buena onda, muy amables, relajados, dispuestos a resolverte cualquier duda.

Staying at Dominic's place was great! The place is super clean and the room awesome. Right enough space for everything and really cozy. Especially the big window is a big plus! Sometimes it could be very busy in the apartment as Dominic and Phil like to invite friends. But if you are looking for a nice talk or want to get to know new people, then you shouldn't have a problem. However, if you need to go to bed early or want to work it might be a bit too busy sometimes. Dominic is a great communicator and much fun. You will feel welcome in the apt as it's cozy and everything is there (big kitchen, shampoo etc.). The best access to public transit is the 197 to Station Rosemont or the 94 to Station Frontenac. I'd definitely stay again at the place!
Dominic is a really nice host! I had a great time there. Location is perfect. Next time I would book this room again!

This place is convenience to go anywhere and Dominic is very kind and friendly. My English is poor but he spoke to me. The room that I stayed was big and cozy room. I spend a time comfortably:)
Dominic and his roommate live here and he has more 2rooms for guest. So you might meet unknown people in the morning.
Ótima estadia.

Parfait séjour d'un mois et demi ! L'appartement est cosy, la terrasse très très agréable. Le quartier est mignon, résidentiel, 2 bus amènent au métro. J'ai très bien été accueillie par Dominic et Phil. Je les recommande chaleureusement, ils sont à l'écoute, sympathiques et très drôles. C'est en partie grâce à eux que j'ai pu me sentir chez moi à Montreal à peine arrivée ! Merci !

I had such a nice stay! Everyone was lovely and Dominic had great hospitality and really helped me out with a few things. The room was a really good size and the bed was comfy. Could not recommend enough loved every second of staying here... didn’t want to leave!

Dominic's place is a very nice, clean, and affordable space to stay in Montreal. The apartment is located in a very nice, tree-lined neighborhood with supermarkets, restaurants, a park, and other amenities nearby. The bus stop to connect you to the metro is only half a block away and the metro station is only about a ten-minute bus ride away. Once you hop onto the metro, the center of the city of Montreal is only about five stops away.
The apartment is very clean and simply decorated (if you are the "Bells and Whistles" type of person, you won't like it as much as I did). The room is a very nice sizable room with a big window. The only drawback is that the window opens to a Boulevard and there is no escaping the outside noise whether from street traffic passing through or otherwise (if you are a light sleeper, beware of that fact and be prepared to get awakened by noise in the early hours of the morning). 
The host Dominic is very nice, very welcoming, easy going, hospitable beyond delight, and, above all, super accomodating. He gave me access  to everything in the kitchen, the livingroom, the back patio, and the bathroom. I really enjoyed my stay at Dominic's apartment and I highly recommend it to any travelers passing through Montreal (whether it's for a short stay  or a long haul)  DOMINIC  WAS  A  FANTASTIC  HOST..........!!!

dominicains nous a très bien accueilli, on se sent très vite à l'aise comme a la maison.une adresse que je recommande. Une belle rencontre même si un peu bref...... ( nous ne sommes restés que deux nuits)
Dominic a été très sympathique. On se sent comme chez soi. Merci pour le séjour chez vous!

Dominic et son colloc sont très accueillants et très disponibles que ce soit en chair et en os ou par téléphone.
L'appart est grand et la terrasse super agréable.
Le quartier est certes un peu excentré mais très agréable avec tout à proximité et calme.
Mon séjour chez Dom a été très bon, Dom et Phil ont étés très accueillants et m'ont aidés dans mes différentes démarches lors de mon arrivée à Montréal, je recommande ce logement !
Very welcoming to newcomers, spending a month in their home was better than I expected having just moved to the city. Right next to multiple bus stops and grocery stores/restaurants

I stayed with Dominic and Phil for 3months and 15 days. Dominic and Phil and Phil’s girlfriend were really easy going and easy to get a long with. I’m a bartender so I would sleep awkward times of the day and everyone respected my sleep hours and were quiet. The place was always kept clean. The room was a comfortable size and I spent a lot of time there but always felt welcome to sit and watch tv as a group or alone. They gave me my own dry space and fridge space to keep my food and had all the Necessary utensils and pots to use for cooking. Also you don’t hear any neighbors upstairs or downstairs so I always slept comfortably and well.

name: Gorgeous Boutique Hotel Room in Taksim #8
summary: This double room with a private bathroom is a great option for travelers who look for a central and comfortable stay. Based in a building which is restorated in January 2017, this room is designed for your comfort.
space: We considered an aesthetic understanding which combines classical Turkish art and modern design as well as your comfort while we were restorating and refubrishing the house. Our main goal is to provide you both visually and comfortably pleasing experience.
description: This double room with a private bathroom is a great option for travelers who look for a central and comfortable stay. Based in a building which is restorated in January 2017, this room is designed for your comfort. We considered an aesthetic understanding which combines classical Turkish art and modern design as well as your comfort while we were restorating and refubrishing the house. Our main goal is to provide you both visually and comfortably pleasing experience. Guests will access to the room with private bathroom, central heating, air condition and Led Tv with satellite channels. Also there's a dining and lounge area for the common use of our guests, where you can enjoy a morning coffee or sit and relax after a long day in the city. This room has a balcony which offers a nice city view too. We personally take care of each and every guest, who choose to stay in our apartments. You will be greeted on your arrival, helped with your questions and provided with useful information of t
neighborhood_overview: Just steps away  from Taksim Square, this apartment is great to experience the life in Istanbul but still it is on a nice and quiet street where you can have a good night sleep after a long day.
transit: Taksim Square metro station and bus stops are 5 minutes walking distance from apartment. You can reach the old city by metro within 15 minutes.
access: Guests will access to the room with private bathroom, central heating, air condition and Led Tv with satellite channels. Also there's a dining and lounge area for the common use of our guests, where you can enjoy a morning coffee or sit and relax after a long day in the city. This room has a balcony which offers a nice city view too.
interaction: We personally take care of each and every guest, who choose to stay in our apartments. You will be greeted on your arrival, helped with your questions and provided with useful information of the neighbourhood and the city. Most of the daytime, we will be available in the house and if you need further assistance you can reach us by phone 7/24.

host.host_about: We love travelling and we take the best ideas from each apartment  we stay at when we are furnishing our own houses.  We want to offer fellow travellers a similiar experience to the best apartments we have been to in years.  We hope you enjoy Istanbul during your visit.  Send us a message and let us know if we can help you in any way!!

reviews.comments: The place is really good! nice location and very pleasant host) highly recommend!

name: Elegant quiet luxury home at Bondi
summary: 10 minutes walk to 3 world class beaches.  Recently renovated 4 bedroom luxury home with yoga studio.
space: Our home appears from the street as a pristine 1910 federation cottage, and opens out to a recently renovated 4 bedroom, 3 bathroom luxury home. Each room is a delight, from luxurious bedrooms and ultra modern bathrooms to our huge living area.  Downstairs there's the master bedroom with en suite, a double and a single bedroom and an extra brand new bathroom. The living area and kitchen easily accommodates eight for sit down dinner informal gathering around the lounge and TV.  Upstairs has a cozy "3D" TV and games room, new bathroom and fully equipped ten person yoga studio (converts to 2nd double bedroom). All original artwork with most furniture custom made from antique Australian Kauri Pine.  Mature private garden with outside fresco dining, fountain and barbeque. Our road is a quiet leafy cul de sac, just a minute's stroll to local shops cafes and restaurants. 10 minutes walk to your choice of three beautiful surf beaches, Bondi, Tamarama or Bronte. 10 minute's drive to central Syd
description: 10 minutes walk to 3 world class beaches.  Recently renovated 4 bedroom luxury home with yoga studio. Our home appears from the street as a pristine 1910 federation cottage, and opens out to a recently renovated 4 bedroom, 3 bathroom luxury home. Each room is a delight, from luxurious bedrooms and ultra modern bathrooms to our huge living area.  Downstairs there's the master bedroom with en suite, a double and a single bedroom and an extra brand new bathroom. The living area and kitchen easily accommodates eight for sit down dinner informal gathering around the lounge and TV. All original artwork with most furniture custom made from antique Australian Kauri Pine.  Mature private garden with outside fresco dining, fountain and barbeque. Our road is a quiet leafy cul de sac, just a minute's stroll to local shops cafes and restaurants. 10 minutes walk to yo
house_rules: No parties, maximum 7 guests - this is a quiet street with minimal outside noise after 9pm. As a condition of booking for all guest staying we require a photo/copy of international passport or Australian drivers licence. For your added security will provide copy of ours to you.

host.host_about:
Jessica is a yoga teacher, author and mum to two senior school age boys.  
Steve runs an investment business in Sydney.
We will make your stay here enjoyable and easy with help available when needed.

reviews.comments:
Nous avons passé un séjour familial à Sydney magique. La maison de Steve et Jessica est idéalement située entre Bondi beach et toutes les autres plages , non loin du centre dans un quartier calme.
Steve et jessica se sont montrés très prévenants , nous laissant à disposition une maison confortable et sereine . La maison est grande , joliment décorée et moderne dans ses infrastructures .
Nous recommandons vivement ce logement pour une famille .

Steve and Jessie's beautiful Bondi home is emblematic of what Airbnb is all about: experiencing a location through the lens and comfort of a local. Clean, spacious, and comfortable, their house felt like home within minutes of arriving. They even left us a Sydney guidebook and a fridge with all the essentials! The location is excellent - near lots of shops and restaurants, and just a 10-minute walk from the beach. Even their neighbors were friendly, popping by to make sure we had everything we needed. We had a truly magical time in Sydney, much of which we attribute to our amazing accommodations. Thank you Jessie and Steve!

Jesse and Steve's home is located on a quiet cul-de-sac in a vibrant and convenient neighborhood. Good food, coffee, workout opportunities, the beach - all within walking distance. Loved that. The house was spotless and very comfortable. Great living/entertainment area. Jesse and Steve were exceptionally welcoming: we were greeted with flowers, and they called to see we were comfortably settled. Overall, a very positive experience.
Jessica's house is large and airy, very well appointed, located on a quiet street but minutes away from everything. I would have no hesitation recommending to friends and family.

Great home! Jessica and Steven were very nice and helpful prior to arrival and in the small time we met them when checking in.
The place felt like home for the time we were there which was exactly what we were looking for thank you!

name: Newtown: comfort, character and charm
summary: Whether you're looking for a cosy hideaway or want to be close to the action, this charming Newtown terrace home offers the best of both worlds. It's close to the cafes, bars, restaurants and attractions of King Street, but tucked away on a quiet, leafy residential street. Great for couples and singles.
space: Lovely home with everything you need for a short break or longer stay: cosy bedroom, spacious living areas, workspace, bathroom, laundry facilities, a well-equipped kitchen, and large, private courtyard with separate back lane entry.  -The bedroom has plenty of storage with a large fitted wardrobe. The living room is great for lounging, with a comfortable 6-seater couch and a 60-inch LCD TV.  - The kitchen has a family size fridge, microwave, toaster, kettle and Nespresso coffee machine.  With the exception of the cooker/oven, all equipment and appliances and are brand new. - Laundry facilities include a new washer/dryer as well as a clothesline outside. The bathroom is a little rustic but has all the essentials.  -  Outside is a lovely courtyard/entertaining area with a 6-seater table and barbecue. Great for a few drinks or a dinner party (with due consideration of our neighbours!) -  The neighbourhood is very family-friendly.  There is a playground very conveniently located two doors
description: Whether you're looking for a cosy hideaway or want to be close to the action, this charming Newtown terrace home offers the best of both worlds. It's close to the cafes, bars, restaurants and attractions of King Street, but tucked away on a quiet, leafy residential street. Great for couples and singles. Lovely home with everything you need for a short break or longer stay: cosy bedroom, spacious living areas, workspace, bathroom, laundry facilities, a well-equipped kitchen, and large, private courtyard with separate back lane entry.  -The bedroom has plenty of storage with a large fitted wardrobe. The living room is great for lounging, with a comfortable 6-seater couch and a 60-inch LCD TV.  - The kitchen has a family size fridge, microwave, toaster, kettle and Nespresso coffee machine.  With the exception of the cooker/oven, all equipment and appliances and are brand new. - Laundry facilities include a new washer/dryer as well as a clothesline outside. The bathroom is a little rustic
neighborhood_overview: Wander up and down King Street. There are many bars, cafe's and shops for you to lose yourself in. Check out the Union Hotel, DoyTao Thai and Pastizzi Cafe - they're great. Sydney park is nearbySt Peters train station is a quick 7 minute walk away. Simply head up to King Street and take a right.. It's just across the road from the train station.
transit: St Peters train station is a quick 7 minute walk away. Simply head up to King Street and take a right.
access: Outside is a lovely courtyard/entertaining area with a 6-seater table and barbecue. Great for a few drinks or a dinner party (with due consideration of our neighbours!)

reviews.comments: Was a pleasure to stay at Matt's house! Really close to the quiet side of King St and the room was everything you could want. Not only that, Matt is a super nice guy and was an excellent host. Matt's dog is beautiful and amazingly cute. Really had a great time and the place comes strongly recommended! For value for money, this is one of best listings in Newtown. Thanks so much for having me! Next time I'm back I would definitely rebook. Stellar!

The room at Matt's place was gorgeous, the bed was really comfy and the place was  really nice, clean and walkable to public transport and Newtown. Matt was really friendly and great to chat to and Nina the dog was so cute. Loved staying here - thanks again Matt for an awesome stay :)
Matt is a really easy going dude, he has an awesome doggy called "Nina", if you like it close to shops and eating hot spots stay with Matt!

name: Friendly & Conveniently Home at Bondi Junction
summary: Fully furnished room (Website hidden by Airbnb) with built in wardrobe  in very clean quiet House, c/w kitchen & laundry equipment There is an open plan with  lounge  and kitchen  plus a small back garden for relaxation Normally this is the host room  and hence some of his belongings  will be in the room while he is away. The house got 3 rooms, & The host's  room  is the room  let to guest.   The host  a freelance  engineer away and he does travelling most of the time   Allen & Jenna 2nd  December 2018
space: ABOUT US : I am an engineer from  Sydney and my partner  is a massage therapist. We are quiet but friendly persons, and enjoy travelling to places of  diverse cultures, spending time with family, and re-discovering Sydney during weekend and would love to home sharing  with guests of different cultures and interests  We are rated by Airbnb as 4 Star Plus host  Love to hear from you when you do booking with us Regards Allen & Jenna
description: Fully furnished room (Website hidden by Airbnb) with built in wardrobe  in very clean quiet House, c/w kitchen & laundry equipment There is an open plan with  lounge  and kitchen  plus a small back garden for relaxation Normally this is the host room  and hence some of his belongings  will be in the room while he is away. The house got 3 rooms, & The host's  room  is the room  let to guest. neighborhood_overview: A famous Bondi Beach and Westfield Shopping Mall &  Centennial Park are  just a stone throw away  for your enjoyment
notes: Please be advised the photos might not be the same with the actual conditions in the house as they might be obsolete photos Thank you for your understanding, But the difference is minimum. It is usually the host room which is rent out  for the guest.
transit: Transportation My place is close to Westfield Bondi Junction, Train Station. Bus Station, Centennial Park. Bus Dep. 333 express stop to/from Bondi Beach/City/Circular Quay, 380 to Bondi Beach/City/Circular Quay, 440 to/from Bronte Beach/Pyrmont, 352 to Newtown
access: Inside the house , guest has access to Lounge, Kitchen , Bathroom & Garden Outside the house,  guest can walk to the famous Centennial Park nearby  and to Bondi Beach by bus . Of course  you can walk to Bondi Junction Westfield Shopping Centre or Bondi Beach or Sydney CBD areas  by bus or Train
interaction: Yes generally at  times   I am available or my representative for interaction with you  and help  you  as visitors to Sydney
house_rules: - 10.00 pm Quiet Environment  - Quiet and Clean Lifestyle as per Airbnb Terms and Conditions - No shoe in house

host.host_about:
Dear friends,
I am an  Australian Chinese ,  working as professional mechanical engineer part time,   is interested to be a host as well as guest in  exchange homely accommodation during  your visit to Bondi Junction, Australia or  my short stay or sightseeing holiday’s tour.  I hope to make a lot of friends too during our exchange of accommodation  To date, I  had traveled to Europe , USA, Malaysia, Thailand, China & Taiwan and Australia to expand our cross cultural experiences
 I prefer to stay in clean and quiet environment and interact with host or other guests for cultural enrichment.

Look forward to meeting you soon

Best regards, 
Allen Ong

reviews.comments:
Staying with Allen was very comfortable. Centurian park next to the corner, Bondi Junction 7 min walk with shopping mall and plenty of cafes.
House was very clean and brand new. Large and modern kitchen with dining area (you can use it for laptop working as well). Room is small but tidy and contains everything you need.
Allen was very kind and help whith everithing I ask him.
Highly recommended as for people who arrived at first time to Sydney as for inveterate traveller.

The flat was very clean and I appreciated the tea and breakfast materials Allen left for me. The bedroom was nice and clean and the bed was very comfortable, plus there was a heater as it was quite cold in Sydney! The flat is about a 12 minute walk from Bondi Junction, which is great for shopping and transport connections. It's a nice quiet home in a safe neighbourhood.

Although comfortable for my stay, the room pictured isn't entirely accurate - there was natural light from the skylight but the window itself actually looks out onto a grey brick wall about 6 inches away - not the pretty view pictured. 

The flat has a well equipped kitchen and amenities you'd need for a leisure or business stay (ironing, wifi, table).
Super clean and close to the train station. Even though, Allen was overseas for the duration of the stay, there wasn't a single problem with check-in or communication. Highly recommend.
It is a very clean house. The other occupants are helpful. There are skylights in all the rooms which make the rooms light and bright
A great location and a clean place to stay
Clean. Has 2 housemates I was unaware of.
Awesome place. Definitely recommended.
The place is clean and the location is great. Unfortunately, Allen has an extremely disturbing flatmate. I felt so uncomfortable that I left the house two hours after arrival.

Allen’s place was very clean and quiet but easily accessible. Although the window in the room looks out on a wall, there is natural light in the bedroom from a skylight. No problems with the housemates and Allen gave me everything I needed to know
The host canceled this reservation 27 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Great house and great host!
I recently travelled to Sydney for work and enjoyed a pleasant stay at Allen’s.

The place is clean and in a good location for seeing both the city and Bondi Beach. Allen’s housemates are very nice and very helpful, giving lots of useful advice. There was confusion about check-in, however. I asked for an early check in but when I arrived, I wasn’t able to get in. Took about 20 mins of knocking and calling one of the other tenants before I was able to get in (luckily I was with a friend who had a phone!). The guest wasn’t supposed to be checking out until that afternoon, so the host had got the dates mixed up. Was resolved in the end but an inconvenient start to the stay. Otherwise, this is a great place to stay and I would recommend it to others.

Allen's home was clean and our room was spacious. It's not too far from the beaches ans parks. 
We enjoyed our stay there and definitely recommend it!

The room was very comfortable and the house was super cozy and clean. Allen always shared recommendations for Sydney and was a very nice host! I would definitely stay here again the next time I visit Sydney :)

Nice place, near to Bondi Junction station. 
Nice house/bedroom. 
Worth it!
Allen's place is nice, a bit far from the train station but very close to the park. The room has a heater which is nice. The kitchen and bathroom are ok.
great location and clean
I had a great stay. Everything was good, friendly atmosphere and nice location. Highly recommended!
It was nice, you have everything very close to the home, librery , the cheapest supermarkts, shops and the communication with the beach.
It’s a lovely place to stay in a perfect located environment. Allen is a really sympathetic and friendly host as well!

Thanks Allen for the stay! That was really nice from the host that he provided a lot info in advance and local hints as well. Breakfast is not provided, just some cereals and milk (and leftovers from previous guests) and the room is really tiny, already full with the host’s stuffs. Hard to find place for your own baggage. The location is okay, few minutes walk from stations, beach is cca 20 minutes by bus.
Allen is a perfect host. Really enjoyed my stay there.
Very quite area but close to public transport and easy to get beach also the city.  Allen response very quick and organized very well. I recommended this place!

name: Apartment next to Las Ramblas and Paral·lel
summary: Apartment in Barcelona with prime location, apartment near to Las Ramblas and Paral·lel. 60 m2 apartment located on the first floor of an elevator-equipped building.
space: Living/dining-room     1 bedroom with double bed     1 bedroom with 2 single beds     1 bedroom with bunk beds     Kitchen fully equipped for 6 persons     1 Bathrooms with shower
description: Apartment in Barcelona with prime location, apartment near to Las Ramblas and Paral·lel. 60 m2 apartment located on the first floor of an elevator-equipped building. Living/dining-room     1 bedroom with double bed     1 bedroom with 2 single beds     1 bedroom with bunk beds     Kitchen fully equipped for 6 persons     1 Bathrooms with shower Free Wifi - air conditioning. We will provide basic amenities like shower gel, shampoo,and hand soap. Also, 1 set of bed linen and towels per person will be included. We can provide you all kind of entrance and tickets for monuments and shows in Barcelona in order you avoid queues and plan your trip in advance. Also we can organize shuttle from/to airport. All that you need for get a perfect stay in our nice city you only have to ask us. Apartment in Barcelona with ideal situation to discover everything in this nice city. Close to the Ramblas.
