notes: Ponemos a vuestra disposición los productos de higiene básicos como son el gel el champú y jabón de manos. 1 juego de Sábanas y toallas por persona está incluido.
transit: Public transport is nearby, 5 minutes walking to the following metro stations:     Sant Antoni (L2/purple line)     Paralel (L3/green line and L2/purple line)     Different bus options to get to all corners of the city
access: Free Wifi - air conditioning. We will provide basic amenities like shower gel, shampoo,and hand soap. Also, 1 set of bed linen and towels per person will be included.
interaction: We can provide you all kind of entrance and tickets for monuments and shows in Barcelona in order you avoid queues and plan your trip in advance. Also we can organize shuttle from/to airport. All that you need for get a perfect stay in our nice city you only have to ask us.
house_rules: Está prohibido acomodar menores de edad sin la presencia de sus padres durante la estancia. Tasa turística a pagar a la llegada: 2.48 euros/noche/persona Llegada y salida: Check-in: 3 pm a 9 pm. Check-out: Antes de las 11 horas. El check-in y el check out puede ser flexible y se puede arreglar siempre que no haya otras reservas hechas antes o después de la suya. El cliente siempre debe informar de la hora aproximada de llegada. Si el cliente llega entre las 9 pm y 12 am, él / ella deberá pagar un cargo de 30 euros adicionales. Las llegadas después de las 12 am y hasta las 2 am tendrá un cargo adicional extra de 50 euros. Tourismussteuer: 2.48 €/Persone/Nacht (zu zahlen bei Ankunft) Ankunfts-und Abfahrtszeiten: Check-in: 15.00 Uhr bis 21.00 Uhr. Check-out: Vor 11 Uhr. Bei Ankunft nach 21 Uhr wird ein Aufpreis von 30 € erhoben. Bei Ankunft zwischen 0:00 und 02:00 Uhrwird ein Aufpreis von 50 € berechnet. Tassa di soggiorno: 2.48 €/notte/persona (pagamento al arrivo) Arrivo e di partenza:

host.host_about:
We are Mireia (39) & Maria (41), two multilingual entrepreneurs loving Barcelona and having big experience in the touristic market.
In our apartments you are going feel youself like at home. The location of our flats perfectly suites for travelling and sightseeing.

We are looking forward to sincerely host you in our apartments.
host.host_neighbourhood: El Camp de l'Arpa del Clot

name: St Hubert street luxury 2 bedroom dream Loft
summary: Our place is amazing. Completely renovated, professionally designed and furnished, it has everything you will need during your Montreal stay. With fully equipped and furnished two bedrooms and a luxurious living space, it offers comfort and accessibility to all our guests.
description: Our place is amazing. Completely renovated, professionally designed and furnished, it has everything you will need during your Montreal stay. With fully equipped and furnished two bedrooms and a luxurious living space, it offers comfort and accessibility to all our guests. Montreal visitors love this charming area of town with a growing rooster of cool cafés, restaurants and shops, it will make you Montreal stay memorable. You are at a 3 minute walk to the closet metro and bus line and you have a private parking spot at your disposal, making all your getting around convenient and easy.
neighborhood_overview: Montreal visitors love this charming area of town with a growing rooster of cool cafés, restaurants and shops, it will make you Montreal stay memorable.
transit: You are at a 3 minute walk to the closet metro and bus line and you have a private parking spot at your disposal, making all your getting around convenient and easy.

host.host_about: Working Mom of 3!

reviews.comments: Cool place to spend a weekend!

Doris was extremely attentive and responded to our questions and needs quickly. Doris' home is extremely comfortable and beautifully decorated. It is in the lively Rue St. Hubert area with its great local restaurants and bars and is near the metro. We felt like we were living in Montreal style!

I would highly recommend a stay here if you are visiting Montreal.
Really Nice loft. Exactly like the photos, plus Doris was fast replying.
Ideal for family stays and Doris Mel's give quick response for any needs.

Had a great time in this appartment, everything was clean and beautiful. The hosts have great taste! Its very close to the Beaubien station so its very practical to go around town.
I definatelly recommend it!

We really enjoyed Doris's place!  The space is clean and bright.  The location is near shops and restaurants.  It was easy to get around here.  Doris was helpful and responsive.  We needed a few extra supplies and she was very quick to get them for us.  Parking was easy.  Checking in and out was no problem.  The space worked well for us.  We will look to stay here again.

The loft is perfect for a couple or two couples to spend a night or a week, or even longer.  The kitchen is equipped well enough to cook if necessary, and the washer/dryer in the unit was the perfect thing for us halfway through our trip to do a couple loads of laundry.  The bathroom is large and has a pleasant rain shower stall with a skylight in it.  Beds were comfy and clean, although it is a loft so be aware that there are no doors to the bedrooms, but they are large enough and located so that there is privacy.  The neighborhood is a mix of shops and some restaurants and bars, but was never loud at night.  The subway is a short two block covered walk away and gives you access to downtown in 10-15 minutes.  Overall, it is a great place for a couple to explore Montreal.
Very nice experience in this beautiful 2bed apartment. :)
good location, good facility, good for parking.
Overall, the loft was true to its description and photos.  We enjoyed our stay and would definitely book again next time we visit Montreal.
This is my dream house!l like it s (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) much~~near metro ~l hope next could stay one week ~

Lovely spacious loft, nice location - walking distance to Little Italy. To get downtown or Old Montreal you need to take a metro though or drive. It is listed as having parking, however, parking is in the back alley on the parking lot of a store above which the loft is located. To get to the car you have to go around the block. Upon our arrival we were greeted by the maid who was  unsure about the parking situation. It did get sorted out quickly enough. The loft has a nice rooftop patio but we weren't able to use it since there is a constant noise from the store's big AC units located right next to the patio. Also, in the bathroom we had 4 little bottles of body lotion and 5 little bottles of conditioner, but no shampoo or body wash - we had to get our own. The host was a bit slow to respond, I was using SMS so maybe it's a problem with the app. Overall, we had a pleasant stay (3 nights).
The apartment was clean, accurate pics and a cute part of town.  Close to little Italy and near great restaurants and bars.  Doris Mel was easy to communicate with and responded promptly.
Great location with cool rooftop area. Lots of bars and restaurants in the area to enjoy :) round the corner to the metro which is very easy to use - 10mins to Montreal centre

Doris was very efficient and nice. She was very communicative, willing to help and answer any questions. The place was well provided, from kitchen utensils to laundry detergent. There are restaurants and shops right below the apartment. Most importantly, her furniture shop (which is very nice) is right under it. I recommend this place, it was a great stay.
Nice, very modeern place, very nice decoration, located in the middle of little Italy.
Bel appartement, correspondant aux photos. Lumineux, spacieux, facile d'accès, agréable.
The stairs to the apartment might be a problem for elderly people

First time going to Montreal And glad we found Doris's airbnb. It was clean and comfortable staying. Also, it came with free overnight parking too! I would definitely stay at Doris's again if I go Montreal. Thanks!
Great place to stay. The ladders to get in to the apartment are long. Be prepared if you bring overweight baggage. Everything else is lovely
Tout était très bien ! L'appartement est conforme aux photos et bien équipé. C'était très propre. L'emplacement pour la voiture est pratique ! Je recommande vivement ce Airbnb :)
A great place to stay, Very clean and in perfect conditions. Lovely apartment

This is a very nice apartment in a fantastic location. The photos are accurate. It is quite clean and well appointed. There are not doors on bedrooms as it is a more modern layout, but this was no problem for us. It is maybe a minute walk to the subway. Petite Patrie might be the best neighborhood in all of Montreal.

Exactly as pictured with lots of natural light. The rain shower was really nice. The metro stop is right around the corner, but it's also walkable to mile end and the plateau. There are some nice restaurants and stores in plaza St. Hubert too. We loved staying here.

Apartment was quaint with easy access to food, Bixi bikes, and shopping. Bonus parking spot in the back of the building, but  be cautious on the steep stairs in the front entrance. Doris Mel was super helpful especially when we had some hiccups in our check-in. Overall would recommend this spot if you're looking to stay in Little Italy.

This was a great spot! True to the pictures with a nice, private deck off the back. Very close to the metro, but could also be walkable for those up for a bigger city trek (Mont Royal, old town, Olympic stadium - It takes some time, but it was a great way to see the city).
Lots of great restaurants in the neighbourhood as well.
FYI - there aren't currently curtains on the back windows, taking away from complete privacy, but there are spaces that provide that if needed (ex bathroom).
Doris was quick to respond and was flexible and understanding with arrival time - a great host!
Accommodation in the suite was very luxury and comfortable
We had a great stay. Check in was easy. Good for 2 couples. Great neighborhood with lots of restaurants and a short walk to the metro. Would stay again!

Nous avons passé un excellent séjour dans ce logement idéalement situé, lumineux et vaste.
Une petite remarque : des rideaux occultants seraient les bienvenus devant chaque fenêtre. Idem pour séparer la chambre du reste du couloir menant au séjour.
A noter l'accueil très chaleureux à notre arrivée comme à notre départ.

My friend and I really enjoyed staying at this AirBnB.  We rented the 2 bed unit. 
This was a very nice area to walk around, close to a fair amount of restaurants and public transportation.  Spacious unit itself, and nicely decorated.  Would recommend!  A note that those with mobility issues or heavy baggage may have problems with the stairs, as they are quite steep.  Otherwise, great spot!
The apartment has just everything ! it's well located (nice surrounding, close to the metro, variety of dining options and bar) and is well equipped. Definitely a good choice!
Images très réalistes du loft. Propre, hôte très à l'écoute avant le séjour & même pendant!
We loved our stay in Montreal. Great property in a convenient location!

The apartment is beautiful and just as pictured. The parking spot in the back is very convenient. The street is full of restaurants and a great coffee shop. I would definitely book this place again on my next trip to Montreal!
Lovely, clean and modern appartement. Nice patio in the back. Folks should know there are no doors on the 2 bedrooms....
Clean and comfortable.  Host very responsive.

The apartment was in a nice, lively location with lots of good bars and restaurants within walking distance. It was also very clean and in good order. I would recommend that she puts cover plates around all electrical outlets, both on the walls and ceilings (for obvious safety concerns). Also, it would have been nice to have doors on both of the bedrooms for privacy.  The location by far is the best part about this place. Doris was slow to communicate and disorganized in regards to pickup of the keys and parking location. An email or text would of been nice to have received a couple days prior to our stay in regards to instructions on where to pickup our keys and the free parking locations,  along with any relevant suggestions about the area. If she approves upon my noted concerns, I would highly recommend this apartment/condo.

Doris flat is cute , comfortable, with an amazing  wooden terrasse !!
2mn from orange subWay to downtown !!
Air conditionned in the flat : great !!
The street of the flat is well known with a lot of shops and cafes
Doris was not here but answers very fast to the mail 
We recommand heavily for a family stay
The place is great, it is clean, as pictured and the location is close to everything.

Nos gustó mucho el departamento de Doris: amplio, limpio, muy cómodo y con mucha luz. Perfectamente situado en Montreal y cerca de transporte público. No tuvimos problema para llegar en automóvil.
Sin duda regresaremos!

Awesome place! Really clean and full of wonderful furniture and decor. 

The street is also pretty quiet. Slept really comfortably and well! Really neat furniture store downstairs. Just our style. 

Easy to check in and out, no hassle.

The apartment is elegantly decorated and comfortable. It absolutely lives up to the pictures and description. A pleasant surprise for me was the surrounding neighborhood--plenty of charming shops and restaurants (some not so charming ones too of course) are steps away. It's a 5 minute walk to the subway stop which was so convenient for everything we wanted to do. Highly, highly recommend.
This place is worth. It has all the amenities as described. Additionally, it is close to downtown and most restaurants. The host needs to make it clear on where clean towels are located.

Great condo and we enjoyed our stay. The check in/out was easy as we picked up and dropped off keys to the store below. The condo did look like the pics but not exactly as lux and spacious as pictured. Also, be aware that there are no black out blinds (for people who like to sleep in complete darkness like me :( and the stairs are pretty steep and difficult to maneuver. We rented the condo for a girls getaway weekend and had a pretty rough time trying to get the luggage up and down the stairs! There is a TV, but no cable, so if you want to watch TV at all or play music, you will need to use your own Netflix account ( as we did). Overall, a pretty good value.

True to the pictures, the loft was spacious and clean with beautiful comfortable modern decor.  The outside area was a welcome bonus.  Check in and out was very simple via the staff in the furniture store below.  There is parking in the back of the store which was free, convenient and safe.  The neighborhood was active yet quiet, with many shops and restaurants lining the street. The host was friendly and responsive to any questions we had.  There are a few maintenance issues that need to be addressed (various outlet and electrical covers & a broken handle on the freezer) however, none of them interfered with our visit.  I would highly recommend this loft for your visit to Montreal.

The area is amazing, you are steps from everything you need. We ended up staying local on each of the nights there. Great Thai place across the street and lots of South American, French and Italian places around to choose from. Cool beer store down the street and a micro brewery you should definitely check out. The apartment is clean, well stocked and really nicely decorated. There is a cool terrace out the back and a really nice shower with a skylight. It is a bring your own bedroom door duration so just remember that if you want privacy. All in all a fantastic place, we would move there!

Nice place in a centrally located location. Be mindful if you have heavy bags or a stoller that the apartment has a steep staircase. Otherwise, a good place to stay when you're in Montreal and a 10--15 minute walk from Mile End.

Great location, lots of good restaurants/cafes within walking distance, as well as the Jean Talon Market. Apartment is clean and comfortable...and surprisingly quiet, considering the street below. I slept so well!
Wow, ce logement est impeccable!
Great location

We had a wonderful stay at Doris Mel's apartment! The location was on a very cute street with lots of stores and restaurants nearby and the metro (orange line) was right around the corner, which leads you straight downtown to Old Montreal! The apartment was clean with plenty of natural light. It was a great fit for a girls weekend away!
房子的位置很好,在一条商业街上的楼上,周围就有餐厅､面包房､小超市等等｡找门牌和钥匙的时候花了一些时间,之前一直没有找到位于门侧面墙上的密码箱｡房子的装修比较别致,但是有遗留的电线接头没有处理好｡总体比较干净,但是我们入住时发现卫生间垃圾桶里有遗留的垃圾没有倒掉｡有洗衣机,需要自备洗衣粉｡楼梯特别陡和窄小,有重件行李比较吃力｡车子可以免费停在后面｡总之,优缺点各备｡

Doris Mel's place is amazing, very clean, beautiful decor, large space as well. We enjoyed the back terrace, and it was surprisingly quiet inside eventhough the bedrooms are located adjacent to the main street. The location was perfect, lots of shops and restaurants nearby, including a grocery store and pharmacy. The stairs are a bit tight, its ok with small luggage, but it might be difficult with large suitcases,  otherwise the place was great, we enjoyed our stay and would go back for sure! Thanks!!

Let me first of all start by saying we would definitely stay here again.  It was clean, great location, FREE parking in the back (though the back is not easily accessible), the owner was very responsive, and the location was great.    A few things to mention would be that the bedrooms do not have doors so if you are needing privacy, you would have to be mindful of this.  Also,  the listing doesn't show the stairs leading from the main entrance.  What you see in the photos are the stairs in the rear that lead to the roof down below.  If you have difficulty climbing very steep stairs as we did (grandmother) then it's quite an inconvenience.  Though it would be fine otherwise.  

I did like the fact that it's close to a "Jean Cotou" store so you can get all your toiletries there.  It's 1 min walking distance along with other little stores and restaurants.  If your a coffee drinker,  "Caffelinni" is 3 mins away walking which we enjoyed.  Free parking (in the back) was a huge plus since parking in Montreal can get pricy.    That alone adds a lot of value to the overall cost of the place.  We were able to Uber when needed and drive to other places if we wanted without having to worry about garage fees.  

So overall, we were more than satisfied with the place and thankful to the owners for letting us stay there.

This was my first Airbnb experience and it was great. Doris Mel responded quickly and made our experience smooth and easy. Although the stairs were a bit steep… her space is beautiful, spacious, and decorated as pictured… the washer/dryer and parking area were a plus! She’s a great host!
Super easy to communicate with host, good location - very walkable and close to subway, and nice, functional space.
Appartement spacieux et très bien situé. Tous peux ce  faire à pied, restaurants, bar, SAQ et shopping. Stationnement aussi disponible. Je vais revenir à mon prochain voyage à Montréal.
Great place to stay!

Initially I was really pleased how responsive Doris Mel was when we booked the flat. She was very pleasant and she said she would be in touch closer to check in. I didn't hear from her so I followed up two days before and she told me that she would share the key code with me the day before. I didn't hear from her with the code. I sent her a message early the morning of check in and did not hear back, then I continued to message as we got closer, but still nothing. I read in reviews that she had a furniture shop as shown in the pictures so when we arrived I went into the store but she wasn't there. Someone at the shop knew the code for the key so we were able to self check in. I sent Doris Mel another message to ask where to park and she replied and apologized for a problem with the Airbnb app. I never received any information from her about the apartment, the key code, wifi password, check out, so we guessed our way through. The apartment is very spacious and nice but it had some quirks. The street the flat is located on is a hodge podge mix of shops and feels more urban than the rest of the area. I love Jean Talon and Little Italy so I was happy to be so close and the parking was a bonus but that was a little bit awkward too.

This is a modern luxurious flat just like the review claims. The location is on a vibrant and fun retail street (although the apartment is high up and completely quiet. ). There is a steep walk up the the apartment so if you have a disability this would be difficult.  The host like I think all Canadians was pleasant, patient, and nice.

We had a great time at the loft and truly wish we had another night there!! The space is modern, open, clean, with an exposed wooden wall on the back side. Very neat. There are no doors so it is a great place to hang out and float around with friends. It was close to good dinner options and also 5 minutes to the Beaubien stop on the orange line of the metro. The neighborhood is quirky and cute and definitely worth staying here! Thanks for the great stay!!

J'ai bien aimé le logement ainsi que son emplacement près de tous les services. Toutefois, on sent bien que personne n'habite ce logement et on a comme l'impression de se retrouver dans un appartement hôtel. Ce n'est pas très grave, mais, personnellement,  je suis moins fan. Les accessoires de cuisine ne sont pas de bonne qualité et on y trouve que l'essentiel. Sinon, le logement est bien décoré et le stationnement derrière est vraiment très pratique.

The place is really pretty and looks exactly like the picture. The only problem is the communication with the host. Better talk to the host before you arrive. The stairs to the top condo are a little hard for heavy cases. The location is good and the rooms are clean and comfortable to stay. In summary, it is a pretty good experience for me and my friends and we will recommend this place to other friends.

Very nice place as described on the pictures.  Could use a bit more kitchen utensils and basics like salt, pepper, sugar etc and some bed side lamps. 
We did miss having a little guide as we used to in our previous rentals for best places to go in the area for food, visits etc to get more of a local feel. 
Nonetheless we’ve had a lovely stay and although we didn’t meet Doris, she was very responsive at all times. We definitely recommend this place for its central location

What an amazing place and amazing location!

Photos are totally accurate, place is just awesome for the price. very spacious and my girlfriend and I had a wonderful time here while we stayed in Montreal for New Years.

Totally walking distance to everything and Right in the middle of the two best neighborhoods in Montreal!

Thank you guys!

-Mark
Très bel appartement et super propre! Rien à dire de négatif!
Doris is super responsive, and her place was very nice and in a great location.

Exactly as shown. Very clean. Spectacular neighbourhood, the strip was as if it was Christmas again. It was a bit difficult to find because the number isn’t visible on the front. Free parking but was hella hard to find it. The parking is located on the street prior to the actual street address.  Drove around atleast 3 times before we figured it out. At least 15-20 minutes away from downtown. If you have heavy suitcase or luggage, the stairs won’t be your best friend . You cannot, I repeat cannot enter from the back, so you have to park and walk around to the front. I would only suggest a mat at the front door for our shoes especially because it being winter, hand soap and hand towel to dry our hands would be nice. Overall my friends and I had a greet stay and would revisit. Montreal it was great, I shall return in warmer weather cause there’s so much I didn’t get to do.
Bien situé, décoré. Tout est à air ouverte par contre. Doris a été une très bonne hôte! :)

It looks exactly like the pictures, very artistic  and rustic with a hint of industrial decorations. The aesthetics of this place is just perfect. Doris was very nice and patient with me since it was my first time renting an apartment and I had lots of questions lol. I'm glad with my experience with her.

Thanks for hosting us! We had such a beautiful visit to Montreal!! The apartment was safe, clean and quiet. It was easy to pick up & drop off keys. The area was cute. Lots of little shops around. It's above a store front and very close to grocery stores, restaurants & the metro. We bought a 3 day metro pass and found it very easy to jump on the subway to get downtown, to old Montreal and to Mont Royal. Our host was extremely quick at responding to any questions. The bedrooms have no doors. This was not a big issue for us in the end, but was a bit surprising. Can't wait to come back and visit again!!
Loft moderne, bien équipé et bien situé, tout à fait comme decrit.
Had great time! Mel was very responsive and helpful.

The apartment is very clean - I've stayed in 20+ Airbnbs and this was probably the cleanest. It is spacious without clutter. Although it would sleep and provide plenty of space for two couples, I found the single couch to be a limiting factor for comfort seating. We visited in March with temps in the 30's with our two year old - the apartment was plenty warm and very quiet. It's a short walk to the metro and bus - there is a great little grocer a couple doors down and an excellent bodega selling regional craft beer. Plentiful restaurants a short walk or metro ride away. It was a great "neighborhood" experience in Montreal.
Beautiful condo located on a busy shopping street, lots of great food options close by, the metro station is 3 minutes away.

Good place. Looks exactly like the pictures...just be advised, there aren’t any doors on the rooms except the bathroom.  So, if you want to be romantic with your spouse and you have company in the other room it’s a bit risky. Hahah

Aside from that, the touch of wood made it feel like home. Shops are just down the street and there is decent night life. A few bars good drinks and surprisingly not over priced.  Over all experience was good. She responds fast like she’s attached to the phone and is very helpful. Couldn’t ask for a better host.

Doris Mel’s place was perfect for our stay! It was clean, stylish, and comfortable. Doris Mel was quick to respond to questions about check in and check out which made the process super easy! The location was also ideal and there was so much to do right in the neighborhood. Would definitely recommend and stay again!
Exactement comme sur les photos
Really enjoyed our stay at this bright and cheery place. Beds were so comfy and lovely small restaurants very near by. So many to choose from!

Rien de négatif ! L’hôte répond très vite aux messages la place est exactement comme sur les photos. Manque de rien draps et oreillers en extra dans le condo même. Lits confortables et a quelques minutes du métro et du centre-ville. Vraiment génial !

Doris’ place is very clean, nicely appointed, has air conditioning (very important in the summer months) and a free parking spot.  Unfortunately when I was looking at the map, I didn’t notice how far away the condo is from downtown so we spent a lot more time on the metro than we’re used to.  We like to walk everywhere, but it wasn’t possible to walk to where we were spending our days (Old Port and downtown).  If you’re planning to spend more time by Jean Talon Marketplace and in Old Italy, this is a great place to stay.  Overall, we loved the condo and the fact that we didn’t have to worry about our car the whole time we were there, but the location was just to far away for us.

Overall, this is a good place and we had a nice stay. The space looks exactly like the photos, and it’s a perfectly sized apartment in my opinion. There are a few great bars and restaurants within blocks. Bed was comfortable. 

The main thing lacking was communication. The hosts never responded to my messages on Airbnb asking about check-in, all the way till the morning of our arrival. I texted both numbers listed in the House Manual and one of them finally answered hours before we got there. Doris was helpful and friendly over text but I wish there would’ve been better communication from the beginning and throughout our stay. On our last day, I asked about the details of checking out (wanting to know if we had to do anything specific before we left), but I never got an answer, so we just kind of guessed.

Other things to note: This is definitely more of a businesslike Airbnb, rather than someone’s actual home. I think they could use a fan in the bedroom. We weren’t sure if the towels or linens were 100% clean. The TV doesn’t have cable and you’d need to bring your own HDMI cord if you want to connect your computer to it. WiFi was good. Neighborhood is kind of a funny mish-mash of shops, but it has its charms. Parking spot was ideal.

If host communication improves, I would recommend this place!
Nice location, and easy access to downtown with the Metro nearby. Nice home.

The apartment is stylish and clean. The staff in the furniture store, which belongs to the same owner of the apartment, was very helpful in guiding us for the check-in.

We enjoyed very much our stay in the apartment.

Doris Mel's place was great, just as in the pictures. Very stylish and clean. I can't say enough good things about the neighborhood, we had so much fun exploring the area. It's also a quick walk to the metro station to get access to the other parts of the city. The parking behind the unit was a huge plus. We just parked the car and left it there for the duration of our stay (we were on a road trip.) Also the in-unit washer and dryer were huge for us because it allowed us to pack light. There's a full-sized supermarket a couple of blocks away where you can stock up on supplies. Thanks Doris Mel!
Beautiful loft, great location. Easy access to shopping, close parking space. Mel responded quickly to any question that I had. My family really enjoyed staying here.
Doris' place is in a wonderful neighborhood. It is a roomy loft and it is steps away from some great restaurants and a few blocks away from the Metro.
Doris's place was extremely clean, nice and looked just like the pictures. Was in a good location and helped make our visit even more special. Thanks!
Fine place. Location is fun and you can walk to a bunch of other cool neighborhoods. Layout of the bedrooms without doors is very weird when staying there with 4 people.
Logement épuré et propre, très confortable et bien situé!

Mel's place was fabulous ! Super nicely decorated and confortable. It's in a vibrant street with lots of bar and dining options. Our family of 4 enjoyed it to the fullest. The parking spot was a plus for us!
Perfect location and truly beautiful home
Great place to stay!

The space is beautiful and comfortable and in the most fantastic neighborhood.  Would definitely stay again!
The space is lacking in some kitchen basics (salt, pepper, oil etc), but all can be accessed at nearby shops.
The A/C and parking was SO appreciated for our August stay.
Nice place Not so easy to find the entrance

You can't go wrong with Doris' place.  The neighborhood is fantastic, you're a short walk to the metro, and the apartment is very comfortable.  The air conditioning was a lifesaver, and since there are no doors on the bedrooms the air circulates well to cool the entire apartment.  For coffee drinkers, there's a Keurig coffeemaker but the closest stores don't carry the pods.  We found the pods at Marché Station 54 near the Rosemont metro.

Perfect location , nice appartment  well equipped  and easy to live in with an outdoor patio.
No doors inside make intimacy a little difficult .
Host very responsive  eventhough  not present .
Steep steps to access to the condo .
Definitively to be recommended
Doris's place is as it advertised. Very clean and walking distance to many shops and restaurants within couple of blocks. Highly recommended!

The apartment was very nice and clean. The unit itself was surprisingly quiet given how lively the area was. The location was great, and would definitely recommend this place for other travelers.

However, communication could've been better. We were not made aware that there were 2 lockboxes (1 for us, the other for the unit next door also rented out by the same host). We spent a lot of time trying to open up the wrong lockbox, as the other one was on a side wall which wasn't very noticeable (especially at night). Our calls/texts/messages to the host were not getting a response. The neighbors also came out to try and help us, and it took all 5 of us another 10 minutes of trying to reach the host before the neighbors noticed another lockbox on the side wall. This was the only time I've ever been frustrated with an Airbnb check in process.

I'd still recommend this place, as it was very nice and reasonably priced. However, I'd suggest that you get all of the detailed instructions from the host before the check-in date to avoid any issues.

Beautiful apartment in a very nice part of the city; great vibes from the neighbourhood! Tons of food places right in the market area hard to beat the location. The place was nice and clean and well stocked with extra pillows and blankets and towels. The shower was very nice and modern with a skylight which was nice. There is a very nice seating area out back that didn’t sound too great in the reviews but it’s actually a great space my friends and I enjoyed relaxing out back there
Great place. highly recommended.
Fantastic place. beautiful apartment. Just outside the centre (taxi to central) spacious. Really enjoyed our stay.
Beautiful apartment in a great location near everything. I would definitely recommend this place to my friends and family.

Had a great stay at Doris’s place 
Not too far away from tourist area 
Would come again!
Doris was a great host and was very responsive, very cool area of Montreal!
Great location and space
非常好的房子
great location!
The loft is bright and airy. The furnishings are stylish and comfortable. Recomended.

This is a pretty cool place to stay but there are a few things that could be improved on and a few that should be mentioned. 

Some of the windows don’t have curtains and it’s a bit awkward after dark. There was no hand soap or hand towel in the bathroom, and there was only 3 towels for the 4 of us. There are also 35 narrow steps to haul your suitcases up, not a problem if you’re young and strong. This rental is a very open concept, with no doors on the bedrooms, and one open to the living room. 

On the plus side, it was super clean, the bed linens were crisp and clean, and the furniture was in excellent condition. Very stylish place!
Cute place!
Excellent rapport qualité prix. Logement tranquille.

L’appartement est très propre, les explications très clairs, quartier très calme, à 5minutes à peine de la station Papineau ! La décoration est magnifique ! Rien à dire
Très bonnes adresses à quelques rues de pizzeria ou brunch ( chez Régine  ) 
Merci à Doris Mel qui ont rendu ces quelques jours parfait

Stylish and accurately described. Our family stayed here for a one night visit. Great trendy neighbourhood with plenty of great restaurants and coffee shops. 
Thanks!

A cute and very, very clean little apartment a short walk from the Beaubien metro. Very clean and a great base for walks to Jean-Talon, Mile End, Plateau, Little Italy and other great areas. Would recommend! It may not work for those with accessibility requirements as the access is up a narrow stairway. Also, if you are planning to cook for yourself (we didn't) you should bring some basics with you. All in all, a lovely place for a short jaunt to Montreal!
Au coeur de la plaza Saint-Hubert un beau logement propre et bien décoré. Bon rapport qualité prix je recommande.
You will not regret staying at her place!  It’s well located and is beautiful!
Doris' place was beautifully furniture, close to the metro station and grocery store. Highly recommend Z Biztro (across the street) for great food and live music.
Bel appart! Très bien situé et très design, adorée mon séjour!
Doris' home is well located and convenient to public transportation. Her beautiful kitchen helped us feel like we were at a home away from home being able to have breakfast together.

Great location. We were able to Uber everywhere. Also the metro station is very close.  Everything was as described. The apartment is open, very nicely decorated. Bathroom is big, and the convenience of having a washer and drier. Parking is a plus.

Very clean and up to date. It was a pretty good stay because of that, but it was difficult to find the place and the parking in the back alley. It was also difficult to decipher what the host expected the place to look like or anything. There was no reassurance from the host whether or not everything was going ok. If you’re looking to have the least amount of communication and just a clean place to stay for the night, this is it for you. Unfortunately, it made our experience less of an experience because it was a trip for a group of us and we didn’t get any recommendations or anything from the host.
One of best place to stay in Montreal as everything is close by. All kind of shops and restaurants are close to the place. My recommendation to go for it.

The apartment is extremely clean, well designed, warm, and well maintained.  Additionally, communication with Doris was immaculate and I had no problems checking in or out.  I didn't give it a five stars because basics like soap or coffee that I generally have expected in many Airbnbs were missing for me.  Additionally, the extremely steep and narrow staircase was a little concerning, especially when walking in the dark.  Otherwise, highly recommended.
Lovely location and a stylish, roomy, sleek apartment. Terrific host!
Très propre et très jolie, bien situé j’ai adoré

Decently located (not necessarily within walking distance) near mile end and other great parts of Montreal. It is super close to the metro which is very easy to navigate and really convenient for exploring the city. The apartment is really cool and well decorated, and the two queen size beds that  are really comfortable. There was no soap in the entire apartment, and also no hand towels, which was a minor inconvenience
But otherwise it’s a great spot, and I would recommend!

Had a wonderful stay in this conveniently located and well-decorated unit. The host was very quick to respond to all of our questions and needs, and the ability to have parking and being very close to key attractions (walking distance to the market and cute stores, as well as a quick Uber ride to downtown) made the stay extra enjoyable.

This place was great for my family of 4 people as it was cozy, comfortable, and clean! The entire suite is roomy and there are two separate rooms with two large beds (although there are no doors separating the spaces, so if you have snorers, you'll still hear it) and a nice living room area with a TV. Doris was very responsive to my texts whenever I had any questions and was wonderful to speak with! Just note that parking is just street parking, so you will have to pay out of pocket.
Great space and location.

Clean and stylish place that is open concept. Good place for a group of friends travelling. There is a nice coffee and dessert place across the street, a costume store (Dracolite) on the street and all the general amnesties you would need. The subway station is around the corner. The beds were comfortable! I enjoyed staying there!
Great location! Cozy stylish place with basic amenities.

Overall I enjoyed my stay, the only problem I had was with the front glass door being broken (you can reach the lock from outside because the glass is all broken which also means anyone can come in) and  glass was all over the front entrance. A big piece of glass was leaning against the lock which lead to me cutting my finger...besides that it was a nice place to stay in.
L'appartement était propre et agréable.

Great stay. Overall a great value. Only reasons for 4 stars instead of 5: the parking was very far from entrance, we had to walk down a back alley at night with the road completely iced over with our luggage and there were no doors on the two rooms so do not expect great privacy. But a great launching pad in Montreal and beautiful decor!
all good

When we arrived at the apartment we discovered that there was no key in the lock box. Multiple calls, texts, and messages to the host were not answered. After an hour of attempting to contact the host, who had left the key in the wrong lock box, we finally left and got a hotel. If the host had answered the phone and given us the code to the lock box containing the key everything would have been fine. When I attempted to call the host the next morning she hung up on me and all subsequent calls went directly to voice mail. RENT AT YOUR OWN RISK!!!
Beautiful home and everything was absolutely perfect! Thanks for the great hospitality! :)
Le logement est magnifique, très chaleureusement meuble, On se sent comme à la (Website hidden by Airbnb) rue Saint Hubert est animée et très bien située. On recommande cette adresse.

name: Manhattan Cozy Room by Columbia Uni
summary: This place is all that you need, beautiful, peaceful and what New York is really all about.  It is in a great New York City location and only few minutes from Time Square and yet it is located in great neighborhood. This furnished accommodation is located in Upper Manhattan,  only 4 blocks north of the famous Central Park.   Columbia University is just over 4 blocks west of this rental.  There is a pharmacy and GYM around the corner of the building and an Associated Supermarket is 1 block away.
space: PLEASE COMPLETE YOUR PROFILE BEFORE BOOKING & INCLUDE YOUR PICTURE My neat Cozy room  is located between Central Park (4 blocks away) 5th ave) in upper Manhattan (also called 'SoHa') .  Subway is two minutes walk from the West 116th station 2/3 Express Train), half a block from the apartment. it is the best location in NYC.  Only few minutes to the City center and yet it is located in a colorful neighborhood in the upper west side so you can enjoy good food and music.  - Great place for couples or individuals  - Furnished large bedroom and shared bathroom  - Shared kitchen, coffee maker, dishes and fridge  - Unlimited wireless internet access  - Large closet, high table and chairs. - Smoke free and pets free apartment  Security Deposit of $300 (per stay) is required at check-in for incidentals. All guests are expected to treat my home like a reasonable person treats their own.  **If you are looking for X-Large double rooms visit my double room listing on 116 Street:  http://www.airbnb.
description: This place is all that you need, beautiful, peaceful and what New York is really all about.  It is in a great New York City location and only few minutes from Time Square and yet it is located in great neighborhood. This furnished accommodation is located in Upper Manhattan,  only 4 blocks north of the famous Central Park.   Columbia University is just over 4 blocks west of this rental.  There is a pharmacy and GYM around the corner of the building and an Associated Supermarket is 1 block away. PLEASE COMPLETE YOUR PROFILE BEFORE BOOKING & INCLUDE YOUR PICTURE My neat Cozy room  is located between Central Park (4 blocks away) 5th ave) in upper Manhattan (also called 'SoHa') .  Subway is two minutes walk from the West 116th station 2/3 Express Train), half a block from the apartment. it is the best location in NYC.  Only few minutes to the City center and yet it is located in a colorful neighborhood in the upper west side so you can enjoy good food and music.  - Great place for couples
access: The room is furnished with a queen bed,  with mirror, with big table and small high table with chairs.  We want to make sure you feel at home. High speed  Wifi is available and free.
interaction: Security Deposit of $300(per stay) is required at check-in for incidentals. For more then one month stay you required to pay $ 50 cleaning fee per month. During the summer (June- October) there will be charge $20 per 10 days.
house_rules: All guests are expected to treat my home like a reasonable person treats their own. No loud noises before 9AM and after 9PM. The apartment is a NONSMOKING place, meaning you cannot smoke in the apartment, your room or even in the building. You are more than welcome to use the fridge and keep fruits, vegetables breads, cheese and of course chocolate Cleaning  fees $ 10 in every other 2 weeks for long term stay( more then 2 weeks stay). . Kindly be considerate with noise late at night and also keeping the shared kitchen and bathroom cleaned.  . Failure to honor these rules will result in a $50 per day penalty fee, for the first episode. . If you do lose or do not return house keys, you pay $50.00.  Also, it is your Guest must be mindful of the other person staying in the apt keeping it neat all the time and also making as little noise as possible when coming in or out the apt after silent hour.  Organic trash must be taken out every day to avoid proliferation of bugs and insects.   Guest

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about:
I am a professional female.
 I want you to feel and be assured that we are your New York's home. 

I greet you with open arms to the Big Apple.

Please visit us at AirBnb through the following links for all our listings:

http://www.airbnb.com/rooms/197903

http://www.airbnb.com/rooms/179428



I look forward to meet with you !

reviews.comments:
My stay in Marina's apartment was a great experience. She is a nice, considerate and knowledgeable lady. I enjoyed talking with her. Plus, her daughter Anoki is a sweet and pretty girl, i wondered how could she not become a model instead of a accountant in the near future:).
Overall, i am very happy with my choice at Cohen's. I highly recommned other young folks chose the same place. The location is convenient, you can reach any attractions by subway and bus. And there are several grocery stores, which provide almost every basic needs. I definately will book Cohen's next time when I go to NYC!

Marinas place was a great place to get the head down for a few nights, great price and perfect area right beside subways which brings yu right down the west side of the city, would suggest this to any people traveling for few days as the price is great and room was comfortable and air con was great :) marina and daughter and friends are very nice love a good chat so use will enjoy your stay,

Marina and Anuki are the best hosts ever!! My experience at their home was totally perfect. 
The apartment: very cozy, nice, colorful, comfortable, clean and quiet
The building: safe, huge, with elevator, with nice people
The room: very clean, beautiful!
Anuki and Marina have been like a family to me, even if for a few days, helping me with any problem I could have. They are sweet and always available, even by phone or mail.
The internet is really fast, and the location is perfect, just beside the subway!
I surely recommend their room to anyone, and I'd surely come back here!

We've spent a wonderful time at Marina's appartment! The place was clean, the bed was comfortable even though the street was a bit noisy. Marina and her lovely daughter Anuki have been very helpful to my boyfriend and I during our stay in New York. It was our very first time in NYC. Marina's flat place was ideally located, in beautiful Harlem, above Central Park. Tne underground station is very closed, at the corner of the street. Thank you Marina and Anuki, we loved staying at your place and we love New York!

The room and the apartment was exactly same as listed. Very clean and convenient. There are lots of fast food joints, super markets just around the corner and that was really convenient. Next time if i go to NY, would definitely go again :)

Staying with Marina was great. The room was bigger than many hotel rooms I've had in Manhattan, the bed was comfy, and the location was great. Marina and her daughter were extremely helpful, but not at all invasive. The whole apartment was very clean and comfortable and I'm really glad I stayed there. I'd definitely stay again.

It was our first time using Airbnb and we couldn't have asked for a better experience. The room was exactly as pictured, the apartment was super-clean and the building was well located -- half a block from the subway (and close to some great places to eat including soul food joints, value-for-money Senegalese restaurants and -- our favourite -- the fantastic Taco Mix at 234 East 116th St). 

Perhaps most importantly, though, Marina and her daughter were really friendly and helpful. They weren't always around, so we had plenty of privacy, but when we did see Marina she was full of ideas about how to make the most of our time in New York City. We probably wouldn't have made it to Zabar's deli without her encouragement, for example.

All-in-all we'd recommend this room to anyone looking for an affordable and friendly place to stay in NYC. Being there felt more like staying with a family member than paying for a room. The only problem for us is wondering whether our next Airbnb experience will live up to the standards of the first one!
Very nice and comfy room, in a quiet location just a 5 min walk from the 2 and 3 subway station. The hosts were really friendly and helpful, and made our stay really enjoyable.

Marina and Anuki were really friendly and warmly welcomed us in their apartment. We did not get to see them a lot since we were there for only two days, but the times we saw them, they were always trying to make our stay the best possible. Also the bed was very comfortable, and the room was just like the pictures. We recommend anyone who wants to enjoy their stay in NY. Thank you Marina and Anuki. Best wishes.

We had an amazing experience in Marina's apartment. Very clean room and restroom, confortable bed. Near to the subway. Marina is very friendly and she doesn't mind to help us with everything we need. We hope to come back soon. Thank you Marina and Anuki :-)

Marina and Anuki were very gracious hosts. They made themselves available for any questions or help getting around the city. They ensured I had everything I needed during my stay with them. The room was immaculate and the restroom was always spotless. The nearest subway stop was a 2 minute walk away. If theyd have me, I would definitely stay there again. A great bargain in a great city!

The place is secure and nicely located 3-4 blocks north of Central Park which only took 15min to walk to. Being so close to Harlem you get some 'characters' around the neighborhood but we didn't feel threatened in anyway walking to & from the metro. The flat itself is nice and modern and all you need if you are planning on being in the city most of the time as we were. There is no communal area as such other than a kitchen in the flat but there is a large complex room on the bottom floor if you wanted a bit more space. Great having high-speed internet and maps & guides provided by Marina. We would be back to stay again.
Excellent location (15 min from Time Square with express subway). Thanks to the welcome and to the kindness of Marina and her daughter. Very nice place for a trip in NYC.

We have been to NYC for the first time and also thanks to Marina´s Blue Cosy Private, we really enjoyed our time. The environment was nice, the place is situated really good, near to the subway and close to the Central Park. We were really happy there.

Although I didn't meet Marina personally, I had a wonderful experience as her guest. The room was exactly as it looks and the neighborhood easy to access and convenient to the subway. I had a snafu that forced me to check in later than I had expected but Marina was patient and flexible. I would highly recommend her to any prospective guests.

Great place, very clean and comfy. Marina is really friendly. =)
recommand this place to anyone who is gonna travel to NYC.

Marina is the best. Anuki and Marina are so helpful and friendly. I ended up going day early due to time difference confusion and my other host couldn't accommodate me late in the evening. Marina responded so quickly and kindly she managed everything in 20minute and she also came with me to takeaway dinner late at night. Anuki is also very nice person and she was very helpful. Place is closely, clean and very good.Thank you for everything.
Um bom lugar. Vizinhança não tao boa, mas e perto da estacão de metro.
I only stayed 4 days but I luved it @ Marina's ...I hardly saw her as she was very busy but she made me feel welcome right from the start ..she's a lovely host ..
Marina made us feel welcome and was very helpful. The room was nice and clean and the AC was great. The subway is only 2 minutes away. I recommend this place!

Mariana was very pleasant, though we only saw her briefly when we arrived, she was sure to let us know where things were and point out some brochures and maps she had for the city which was very nice. The room was clean and the AC was great. Parking in the area was a bit challenging if you want to try and save money and park on the street to avoid paying high parking garage fees, we ended up not being able to find a place on the street and had to use the parking garage in the neighbourhood. Close to transit which is great as well!
Everything worked perfectly. The place was just perfect for my about four weeks stay. Location and room and whole place.  Thank you so much for this!

The apartment location is very convenient, only one block away from the metro (2 and 3) making it very fast and easy to get to downtown. Marina and Anuki were also very helpful for us to check in and out, and we were able to leave our luggage until late in the afternoon on our last. 
However, I cannot rate this place more than 2 stars, and here is why. When we got to the apartment, Anuki welcomed us and told us that she opened the window in the room because the heater was broken and we would be too warm to sleep. But when we went to bed, the noise from the street was too loud and we couldn't sleep, so we tried to close the window, and it turns out the window was broken too and could not be closed. So we basically slept in a hot and noisy room for 3 nights... Also, the oven isn't working in the kitchen and there is no microwave, which would have been nice to have instead of using the stove to warm our food up.
Hopefully, these will be fixed for the next people staying there...
Thank you both anyway, we still got to enjoy the Big Apple!

I stayed in the apartment for almost five weeks while visiting a university in NYC. Anuki and Marina are both very nice and sweet persons. They carefully listened to my needs and brought a big desk into the room, so I could work, although I guess this is not a typical wish of their guests. The apartment is nice and tidy. I felt comfortable there. The neighborhood is safe, the Central park is very close. There are two subway stations nearby, so going downtown is not a problem at all. I am glad I can fully recommend staying with these two kind persons. I am grateful for their hospitality and I wish I could stay with them again when visiting NYC next time.

Marina and her daughter Anuki are excellent hosts. They provide everything I needed. The room was big and everything was clean and neat. The building is so close (only 1 block away) to the subway 2 and 3 lines. I recommend this place to everyone.
The Room is very nice and cozy, I really enjoyed living there for few days. The house is small but clean and comfortable.  Privacy guaranteed.
She is a really long person and help me a lot when I was living there. Room is clean and environment is quite.

This was my first airbnb experience and it was great. 
The apartment was very welcoming and I had a great time with staying at Anuki's and Marina's home. Very nice apartment, very clean,comfortable and sunny during the day.
The apartment is very well located, just 3-5 min away from the subway. 
I highly recommend this place for people willing to discover New York.

I had a very good experience. The apartment was very clean. The location is very close to a subway station. The host was helpful in providing info for reaching the place from the airport. Towels, bedsheets and hairdryer were provided. I recommend this host.

I had a very nice stay in Anuki's apartment, it was easy to find, nice building, nice area, practical in many ways and it felt warm and welcoming.
I was actually greeted by Anuki's mother Marina, who takes over when Anuki is busy. Both of them are very nice and thoughtful. They care about the place being clean, about being hospitable and making everything very clear and easy for you.
I didn't see much of Anuki as she gets up early for work and I often got back late... as a tourist in Manhattan you definitely don't stay in all that much, but if you do, you're sure to feel at ease here.
The bathroom is absolutely fine, the kitchen too, everything is clean, and practical. The bedroom was a nice size and had storage to put your things away, a desk to sit at, a very comfortable bed, and in the daytime it gets the sun and you have a nice view over the street and a church.
I got a little cold one evening when the temperature went down, but there were plenty of duvets and quilts to be cosy under.
Another minor glitch, I did have some work to do one evening and the wifi was not all that reactive. I actually had to abandon trying to send some files, the signal was just not strong enough.
However if anything had been a real problem I'm 100% sure that Marina or Anuki would have found a solution, but I didn't actually get the chance to talk about it! Too busy running around New York and trying desperately to get as much input as possible :)

I was visiting for just under a week and found Anuki's place to be practical for all the things I wanted to do and see. Very easy access to subway and possible to get down to Times Square in 20 minutes on lines 2/3. And when you've had too much of the action down in the south, it's nice to come back "home" and grab a bite at the Red Rooster or Amy Ruth's. I also tried and loved BLVD Bistro, not far at all. 
If you're into gospel, this place is great for getting up on a Sunday morning and going to church, loads of choice.
Also a short walk to Central Park which I actually walked all the way through, down to the bottom, it was such a beautiful day.
Thank you Anuki and Marina for your welcome and for opening your home to us visitors :)
I had a wonderful stay in Anuki and Marina's apartment, can highly recommend it!

Highly recommend the hosts Marina and Anuki who were 100% accommodating for arriving guests.  The location is extremely convenient for anywhere - the 2/3 is at the end of the block, and the 4/5/6 or Harlem-125th Station within short walks, plus kitchen facilities, and a laundry room in the building. The neighbourhood has everything needed, including a decent café across the street at Harlem Mist.  My thanks to the hosts for an excellent stay.

When I arrived, the room pictured was no longer available and I was put in another room which I was told was "better" but it was cluttered and dirty and I felt like I was  living in a storage bin. The was a camera mounted in the ceiling directly across from my door which filmed me every time I went to the bathroom. Also, the bathroom was dirty when I arrived and never cleaned while I was there. The garbage was overflowing. The photos show the shared areas (kitchen, bathroom) as uncluttered but there were mops, bags, and cleaning supplies around.  Sorry but I can't recommend this place.

The flat has a good location which is close to subway station and the room is clean and warm. The host is nice and prepared several quilts for me and told me if one quilt was not enough, then I could use others as well. The bed is comfortable and I really enjoyed this trip and the experience in this room.
房东非常和善,耐心｡东西很齐全,走时候还有小礼物

The listing was as advertised.
Marina was flexible and I had a pleasant stay at their place.
Just what I needed

The Manhattan Cozy Room was a terrific place for my six week-working stay in NYC.  The apartment is convenient - one block from the 2 & 3 subway, and four blocks from the 6. As a solo female I always felt safe in this lively East Harlem neighborhood. I often was coming home late - after 10 PM - and always felt safe walking from the train to the apartment. There was usually an open restaurant or food truck available for a late night meal. There's a very nice neighborhood coffee shop & restaurant across the street. The apartment is cozy; and as Marina stated. It faces the main street, which can get a little noisy, but wasn't that bothersome for me; If you're a very light sleeper, earplugs were provided. Whenever I asked for something - an extension cord, a lamp... Marina supplied it quickly. 

Since I stayed for 6 weeks, I took yoga classes one block away. I walked to the Apollo Theatre on a Saturday night; had dinner as a local restaurant, and did all my grocery shopping in the area.  It was great to have a laundry room in the building! There's no 'commom area,' in the apartment. There is a building yard, but I didn't have time to use it. Having a kitchen was a major pluse for me. Coffee in the AM, and the microwave for heating up food came in super handy.  A shared bathroom for three roomies, wasn't inconvenient, since I was on an early schedule. Bottom Line - Manhattan Cozy Room worked well for me! I'd recommend it!
Good experience, safe building! They were easy to get ahold of when I needed to drop my luggage off earlier than check in time!

Great place! Marina and George (her brother who lived in the apartment) were both very friendly, and I had good experiences with the neighbors. I stayed here for a little over ten weeks, and this location was not only convenient (2/3 and 4/5/6 trains, not to mention lots of bus lines), but also safe for when I returned late at night. The wireless access was reliable, and Marina responded quickly whenever I had questions. Would definitely recommend staying at this place!

If you value privacy and cleanliness do not stay here. This was a very disappointing stay.

Privacy: the host asked me for a photocopy if my ID, my personal email address, films all the comings and goings with a camera in the flats hallway.

Cleanliness: imagine what you see on the pictures, only the run down unkempt version of that. Everything is kind of cluttered, the place is not especially clean and I also did not notice substantial cleaning while I was there.

Other than that the place kind of offers what's in the add.

Marina is a really nice host. The building is located in a safe area in Harlem neighbourhood. You can find a good supermarket and a CVS pharmacy just around the corner, what is pretty useful for daily life. Also, subway is 2 minutes walking from the building and you can get to Times Square in 20 minutes, maybe a little far away for some other central places (30 minutes) because of the train changes needed.

In the flat, you can find basic stuff in the kitchen and in the bathroom. The room has a large wardrobe and storage stuff which helped me to keep all in order.

The main point I think it could be better was the cleaning. The flat wasn’t particularly clean a couple of weeks but Marina explained me the cleaning service had a problem and it couldn’t work, so she came and tidied up the common areas.

Apart from that, everything was OK.

Thank you!

Marina's place is near to the train station and bus station. Easy to get around. There's a CVS store 2 mins away so you can get your grocery done easily. The bedroom is similar to the pictures on Airbnb. Overall, would recommend this place if you are in newyork.

Good place to stay if you want to be down and out in Harlem. Easy enough to park and just two minutes away from the world famous Apollo Theater. Nice restaurants and bars close enough to make the hectic NY life, slow down a bit and enjoyable.
Good place to spend some days in NYC
Good location, you get what you see. Late check in might was a bit challenging, otherwise free of hassles. Thanks to Marina

Great place to stay, great location, very safe. Only 2 minutes from the metro, 14 minutes ride from times square on metro. 
Marina was very nice. She did  everything she can to make sure i can check in early and put my bags in the apartment, even though no body was home. Marina was always available for any question. I will defently stay here again next time im in ny.

This was a great place. The room(and apartment) was comfortable and suitable for long term stays(I stayed here for almost 4 months). It is very close to subway and groceries. The building is very safe. Marina is always helpful and showed great effort to make me feel comfortable. Her brother George who was staying in the apartment was also very friendly. I found bathroom and kitchen pretty clean. The neighborhood is quite interesting as well.  I found it a little noisy at the beginning but got used to it. It took me about 20-25 min by walk to reach to other side of Columbia campus(Mathematics hall), this is probably a reasonable time for NYC.

Whether you're looking for a short term or long term stay in New York, this is the place for you. Marina is an incredible host and was very responsive. The spot couldn't be more convenient with the 2&3 subway right on the block. I would 10/10 recommend this spot!!

The room was cozy with a comfortable bed. Location is excellent... just half a block from the subway. Marina was very responsive to my questions/messages and she made check-in and check-out very simple and convenient.

O imóvel é muito bem localizado, próximo da entrada norte do Central Park, do metrô e de lojas e mercados, em rua muito tranquila. A cama é bastante confortável e a host disponibilizou lençol, cobertor e toalhas. Não está exatamente como nas fotos, mas as alterações não são significaticas. A limpeza do quarto e da cozinha e a organização da cozinha deixam a desejar se o hóspede estiver acostumado com ambientes limpos, organizados e arejados, mas não é algo que inviabiliza o uso dos espaços e a estada.
vety nice room and service. only problem is the noise outside.

It was a great place to stay. Really comfortable and close to the subway. 
Marina gave us clear instructions and recommend us some things as well. 
I would definitely repeat this booking.

Marina’s room is a great value for anyone wanting to visit NYC. The room is less than a block from the subway, so getting anywhere throughout the city is extremely easy. It’s also less than a 10 minute walk from Central Park. The area around the room is incredibly diverse and cool to visit. So many cultures in one area. I never felt unsafe, even walking back several blocks after midnight. Marina allows you to use the fridge and any eating utensils you need. There is street parking near the apartment, but it might be difficult to find a spot depending on what time you arrive and you might have to move your car on certain days for street cleaning in order to avoid tickets. There is a parking garage behind the apartment that charges about $20 per day if you use SpotHero. Marina is incredibly friendly and she was very flexible with us for our check in. She is knowledgeable about the area if you need suggestions. I would highly recommend this apartment.

Marina is a great host and the apartment is in a safe area. The 2/3 trains stop at the corner of the block and you can walk a couple of blocks in either direction for other lines. There is a gym right next to the apartment which was extremely convenient. Marina gets back to you quickly and addresses your concerns. Overall a wonderful experience.

The room was exactly as shown, very comfortable for a single person or a couple. The location is as good as you can get for the price, the subway is very close (3mins walk) and you can take the express trains 2 and 3, so you can get to Lower Manhattan in 30mins or less.

name: Luxurious Granny Flat. Bella Vista
summary: A luxurious space including two bedrooms, kitchen, bathrooom/shower and balcony with its own entry. Lots of great natural lighting and a convenient location for Hillsong Church, Norwest Marketown and buses 613x express to Sydney CBD.
space: Relaxing architecturally designed house with quiet suburban location.
description: A luxurious space including two bedrooms, kitchen, bathrooom/shower and balcony with its own entry. Lots of great natural lighting and a convenient location for Hillsong Church, Norwest Marketown and buses 613x express to Sydney CBD. Relaxing architecturally designed house with quiet suburban location. Full sized kitchen, Refrigerator, Washing machine/dryer. Shower/bathroom, Air Conditioning, fast cable Wifi, Television and Balcony with a view. We are a family of six and are willing to help with any enquiries or help you may need while you stay with us. Quiet, relaxed neighbourhood that's really green with a park down the street. There is a 613x bus 5 mins away which is express to the city. Norwest Marketown and Hillsong Church are a 5 minute drive. Please note there is an extra guest fee for each guest after 1 and maximum number of guests allowed is 6. Also the flat is situated on the second floor of our house, and there are a couple of steps to climb to access to it.
neighborhood_overview: Quiet, relaxed neighbourhood that's really green with a park down the street.
notes: Please note there is an extra guest fee for each guest after 1 and maximum number of guests allowed is 6. Also the flat is situated on the second floor of our house, and there are a couple of steps to climb to access to it.
transit: There is a 613x bus 5 mins away which is express to the city. Norwest Marketown and Hillsong Church are a 5 minute drive.
access: Full sized kitchen, Refrigerator, Washing machine/dryer. Shower/bathroom, Air Conditioning, fast cable Wifi, Television and Balcony with a view.
interaction: We are a family of six and are willing to help with any enquiries or help you may need while you stay with us.
house_rules: Some additional rules are: * Please make sure to check out at 10am, so we can ensure the room is clean and tidy for the next guests.  * Keeping Air conditioning use to a minimum. The house is insulated quite well so if possible please keep air conditioning use to a minimal. If absolutely necessary please ensure to close all windows and remember to switch off when leaving the house. Environment comes first!  * No shoes in the house, however upon entry is fine.  *Smoking in the house is not allowed, however if you need to smoke feel free to use the outdoor balcony, please ensure that the sliding doors are closed whilst doing so. *Please wash dishes after use and ensure that house is tidy before checkout. * No parking on the driveway, there is plenty of free street parking available in front of the house. * Please note there is an extra guest fee for each guest after 1 and maximum number of guests allowed is 6. *Please don’t move or change the furniture layout of the room.

Since we have this registry, we are obligated to require to anyone who we are providing paidholiday accommodation, to record the entry, exit, and identification details of all non-Portuguese guests.

We had a lovely time at Diogo's apartment. The apartment is just as the pics posted. 

Great views of the riviera. The wine cellars were a 2 minute walk. The Ribiera was a 5 min walk away. 

Diogo was an excellent host. He and his dad helped with getting our bags to the apartment (it's on the 3rd floor). They had a baby chair, tub and crib ready for my little one. 

Thanks for all the help Diogo!

Una estancia muy confortable. La casa está totalmente acondicionada, recién reformada, bien situada, con unas vistas espectaculares, muy cuidada y con detalles que hacen muy agradable la estancia. 
Las imágenes que se muestran del apartamento corresponde con la realidad. Nos sorprendió positivamente que hubieran dos baños completos.

Diogo, es una persona muy atenta, responde con agilidad y en todo momento nos facilitó la gestión tanto en la llegada como en la salida. Si volviéramos a Oporto, sin duda, contactaríamos con Diogo.

Our stay in this apartment was just great! I think this is one of the best accommodations for that price in whole Porto. I can´t describe that view with words. Amazing! Householder is also very kind and helpfull.

Diogo's place is great.  Very clean and comfortable.  It's walkable to everything and not too far up the hill.  The view alone is worth it.  The value is amazing.  Communication was prompt.  A bottle of Port and Pastel de nata to top it off.

My family stayed eight days from June 5 to 13, 2017.

Advantage
1. The house is very clean.
2. View from bed is perfect
3. Good access to wineries

Disadvantage
No special points

The best experience we've ever had with airbnb. Diogo and his father are really welcoming and great hosts. The flat is way more better than it appears on the pictures. Modern, spacious, fully equipped, with breathtaking view over Porto and Douro. On arrival we got a bottle of porto and pasteis as a welcome gift. I just can't imagine better experience since everything was just perfect. We hope to come back one day. Muito obrigada!

We loved Diogo's apartment! Exceeded our expectations! The view out of the bedroom window is outstanding! Also very close to the main attractions! Having a second bathroom was a big plus with 4 people. Diogo and José were very nice, gave us suggestions and itinerary and answered all our questions! They also left us a Porto wine and Pastéis de Nata, which was really nice! We highly recommend staying at Diogo's apartment!
Excellent view for the Sao Joao fireworks display. Great weekend
Beautiful apparent in the best Porto location with gorgeous view. Highly recommended! Enjoyed our stay a lot!

Nous avons passé un merveilleux séjour à Porto. L'appartement est très bien équipé, propre, proche du centre ville à pieds. 
Un cadeau de bienvenue qui nous a fait bien plaisir...
Communication très facile et rapide avec Diogo. 
Les parents de Diogo sont très accueillants, toujours prêts à rendre service. 
C'est une très bonne adresse. Allez y les yeux fermés

Logement super bien situé à Vila Nova de Gaia, à quelques minutes à pied seulement du centre de Porto (quel plaisir de traverser ce beau pont tous les matins et tous les soirs!), et bénéficiant ainsi des plus belles vues qui soient sur la ville de Porto. La vue depuis les chambres est simplement.... sensationnelle!!
Très propre et très fonctionnel, vraiment idéal pour les familles (nous y étions avec 2 enfants de 7 et 8 ans, avec leur chambre, et surtout chacun leur lit), avec qui plus est avec 2 toilettes et 2 salles de douche. Attention toutefois au fait que la rue sur laquelle donnent les chambres est un peu passante (voitures).
Accueil très apprécié avec bouteille de Porto et pasteis de nata.. encore un énorme merci!
Un adresse que je conseille vraiment sans aucune hésitation!

the bnb was a great location only 5 min walk from all the restaurants and cellars. the view from the balcony is beautiful. José, Diogos father met us at the bnb on time and was a wonderful man. thank you we loved our stay and had everything we needed
Mooi schoon en ruim appartement op een prachtige plek! Heel gastvrij onthaal. zeer goede communicatie mogelijk.

Diogo's place is stylish and cozy and it has absolutely amazing view on the river and Porto. There are many restaurants and wineyards in a walking distance, but far enough so that the flat does not suffer from the nightlife sounds ;) Two separate bathrooms are very convenient for four people. In addition, Diogo is a super helpful and friendly host.
Great apartment close to the bridge with views on the river. Great place to explore Porto from. Diogo is a perfect host.

The apartment is displayed very accurately in the pictures. The location is excellent and is walking distance to most things you would want to see in downtown Porto. In addition, there is a great riverfront path that allows you to go on great runs, The views are amazing. The accommodations are very comfortable and Diogo and his family are outstanding hosts. The only negative of the apartment is that the two bedrooms face a busy street that gets loud. Otherwise, everything is perfect.

Nous avons passé  un super beau moment dans l'appartement de Diogo. L'appartement était idéal pour deux couples avec un bébé. Tout le matériel nécessaire était présent et l'appartement très propre. Le coucher de soleil avec vue sur la ville de Porto était magnifique. Nous y retournerions sans hésiter!

We loved the place very much. The scenic view from the bedrooms over Porto and the bridge are breathtaking. The free parking was important to us. The Air Conditioner helps if you prefer to sleep with windows closed. I am a light sleeper in need the silence of closed windows. Diogo and the rest of family members who welcomed us are very friendly, helpful and patient. The wine cellars are next street. The bridge to cross to Porto downtown is 3 minutes away. we feel lucky to choose this house and benefit all the advantages.

L'appartement est  Impecable! Bien situé. LA vue sur Porto! Diogo est attentionné: répond rapidement aux messages, porto et nata à l'arrivée, équipement pour le bébé; lit, chaise haute, bain. Stationnement à 20 mètres. Je le recommande à tous!
Prima plek om porto te bezoeken.

Mooi appartement met alle voorzieningen. Prachtig uitzicht op Porto en alles is op loopafstand. Hele fijne gastheer( vader van Diogo). Hij stond ons op te wachten en konden onze auto gratis parkeren om de hoek. Toen we weggingen stond hij bij de parkeerplaats ons op te wachten om afscheid te nemen. Geweldige man.
Appartamento molto carino e pulito con una splendida vista su Porto , posizione comoda vicino alle cantine. Vicino ha anche il parcheggio disponibile. Consigliatissimo

Apartamento com vista lindíssima 
Muito arejado é muita luz 
Local de facílimo acesso perto do que há de melhor na região 
Anfitriao muito gentil 
Tudo muito bom

L'appartement du 3ème étage est impeccable et très bien équipé: wifi cafetière Dolce Gusto , tout est fourni, la literie est de qualité. La vue est incroyable. Et en plus une place de parking comprise dans le prix . Diogo et José sont des hôtes très disponibles, ils répondent très vite à nos questions par sms où mail. Un regret , notre séjour était trop court.

Great place to stay, awesome views of Porto and very comfortable rooms. The host had arranged parking space very near to the apt at to extra cost to the client, the only downside is there is no elevators but they'll help you get the luggage to your room. (3 apts they rent)

Esperienza estremamente positiva, appartamento molto bello, spazioso e ristrutturato recentemente, pulizia impeccabile, posizione centrale molto comoda per la visita dalla città, proprietario gentilissimo.
Wie hatten eine sehr schöne Zeit in Porto und das lag auch besonders an der  wirklich guten Unterkunft in einer tollen Lage. Sauber, gut ausgestattet und ein fantastischer Blick auf Porto! :)
Superbe appartement, très bien situé, vue imprenable sur Porto, très propre, parking gratuit très appréciable. Accueil très chaleureux.
