Con Sonia, mi novia, volvimos contentos, no solo porque estuvimos en Río, ciudad maravillosa, sino también porque tuvimos la suerte de conocer a una muy buena persona, ahora un amigo y nos sentimos tan a gusto, que a la hora de partir, nos despedimos como tales, que se conocen desde hace tiempo, esperando a que  Sergio en algún momento nos visite en nuestro país, en nuestra casa. De nuevo, gracias por todo Sergio!!!

The studio of Sergio was just fantastic! It was spacious, cozy and nicely decorated. Besides the bedroom with terrace, there were small salon, private bath room and kitchen. The building is located near Copacabana posto 5 which is very close to Ipanema (only 10minutes of walking distance). The access to metro station is only 3minutes walk and to Copacabana beach is 5 minutes walk. The street of Sa Ferreira is beautiful with greens and it is a safe area. Sergio is very friendly, warm and he takes care of the guest as much as he can.  He always prepares nice flowers, delicious fruits and some drinks for the guest. I enjoyed my stay in this lovely studio and I can not wait to go back.

Fiquei muito feliz com a escolha, tanto do apartamento, que correspondeu ao nosso desejo, quanto do nosso anfitrião, que soube compartilhar mais que sua moradia, como também seu tempo, sua atenção, sua generosidade e acima disto, sua experiência. O espaço é limpo, arejado, muito agradável e entre o metro e a praia! Além disso, tivemos uma ótima recepção e muita atenção. Recomendamos e voltaremos em breve!!!!

Estar alojados en  el departamento de Sergio fue una experiencia increíble. En primer lugar, la ubicación es perfecta, a 5 minutos de la playa Copacabana, a 10 de la playa  de Ipanema y a media cuadra de la estación del Metro General Osorio. En segundo lugar, el departamento cuenta con todo lo necesario para tener una estancia tranquila, confortable y ademas de un gran espacio. En tercer lugar y mas importante, la atención de Sergio fue extraordinaria, desde antes que hiciéramos la reserva nos aclaraba todas nuestras dudas e incluso nos daba datos del lugar donde íbamos a estar una semana antes (Buzios). En el departamento nos hizo sentir como estar en un hotel con todas las comodidades que eso conlleva; siempre nos mantuvo frutas, agua, toallas a nuestra disposición todos los días y ademas nos ayudaba con las indicaciones  y mapas para llegar a los distintos lugares turísticos de la ciudad. Una vez mas le agradecemos a Sergio por su disposición, ayuda y preocupación por hacer nuestras vacaciones las mejores.

Excelente todo desde el primer dia hasta el ultimo! Don Sergio es increíble la verdad nos sentimos como en nuestra casa! Hermoso el lugar y muy completo! La verdad que nos encanto!!! Ojala podamos volver pronto son duda al mismo lugar!!!
We had a very pleasent time with Sergio! He's a great host, allways helpfull and he gave us usefull tips to explore Rio de Janeiro. The appartment is very clean and the location is very good as well.

Adoramos o apartamento muito limpo e confortavel....muito bem localizado  entre as praias de ipanema e copacabana com uma estação de metro no final da rua.nossa estadia foi bem tranquila,o anfitrião e muito simpatico e prorcurou sempre tirar as nossas duvidas,ajudando para que nossa estadia no rio fosse a mais tranquila possivel,esperamos voltar em breve e concerteza iremos procurar nos hospedar no apartamento do senhor sergio...

My husband and I stayed at Sergio's and it was a very pleasant experience!
The studio is well situated in Copacabana and of easy access to metro, buses, beach, shops and church. The area is beautiful and safe.
The studio is well-designed and equipped. You actually have a whole appartment for a very reasonable price!

Sergio is exceptional! 
He took care of all the details to satisfy our wishes, even before we expressed them. Every day he filled our fridge with goodies... even chocolate! On top of all  that he gave us free  access to his own kitchen.
Sergio gave us very good advice and tips to make our first  visit in the beautiful city successful. 
 On weekend nights there is some rather loud noise coming from the street at the back  of the building. This, however, as far as sleeping is concerned, can be easily neutralised with the humming ofthe bedroom air conditioner. 

 We wholeheartedly recommend the place to everybody. 
Sergio is now our friend and his is the place for us in Rio!
I almost forgot to mention that Sergio speaks also English and French. 
Fonso and Tami

Oh my...what can I say about Sergio? Because It wasn't only a great apartment that made my boyfriend and I have a great time in Rio but Sergio as a host certainly made the difference. What a sweet, smart and friendly guy. Sergio is a retired doctor that opens his house for the pleasure and fun of having nice people around to share experiences. He's a very wise man and we felt like visiting family. Sergio' studio was just great! Very spacious, nicely decorated and cozy. A fantastic bedroom with terrace, a small salon with couch, dinning table, TV, private bathroom and kitchen. The whole studio is very bright and we heard birds singing every single day. The view to the Pavao Pavaozinho Favela is also very pretty and interesting specially If you have never had a contact or seen a Favela before. During the night with all the lights is just gorgeous. The studio was always tidy and clean. Bed sheets and towels were often changed by his staff. Sergio always put some nice and fresh fruits on the table, some goodies in the fridge, chocolates, the cabinets have more than just necessary things. Everything we needed for coffee and thee and even some cookies we found there  as a courtesy, just for Sergio's pleasure of making our stay the best experience possible. We stayed for 2 weeks and he helped us from our laundry till the best tips on where to eat or have fun for a good price. The building is very well located near Posto 5 in Copacabana and Its a short walking distance to Ipanema (only 10 minutes).Taxi cabs are very cheap as well compared to European cabs so we easily took a cab at the building's entrance to Gavea, Lagoa, Favala do Vidigal for 10-20 reais only (5 euros). The access to metro station is even a better and a cheap way to go places, only 3 minutes walk from the building, tickets cost 3,60 reais (1,20 euros) per trip and we visited Botafogo, Flamengo, Lapa, City Center and Maracana Stadium taking the metro. Much easier, faster and cheaper. We took buses as well to a few places such as Barra da Tijuca, Sugar Loaf and city center and It's only 3 reais (1euro) per trip. Public transportation in Rio is extremely cheap and take you everywhere. Copacabana beach is 5 minutes walk. Sa Ferreira street is beautiful with  lots of green and it is a safe area. Sergio is extremelly friendly, warm and he really puts some effort to take care of the guests as much as he can. He was always there for a nice conversation but at the same time respecting our privacy. There were always a nice flower in the bedroom, delicious fruits and some drinks. My boyfriend and I enjoyed our stay in this lovely and cute studio a lot and we just can't wait to go back to see Sergio again and have a great time in Rio!

Sergio is the perfect host for his guests: very friendly and hospitable. He even got us fruit and breakfast as if his place were a hotel. He was always in for a talk, while giving us our privacy as well. I arrived early in the morning, nevertheless he offered me another room to rest a bit before "my" room was available. Sergio goes out of his way to make his guests feel comfortable. The apartment is very clean and located near copacabana beach. Ipanema beach is a bit farther, but also within walking distance. There are several nice places to eat within walking distance as well. The room is spacious and clean with a fan and ac. The private bathroom is opposite to the room. I would definitely recommend this place.

El habernos hospedado en la casa de Sergio fue la mejor experiencia que pudimos tener en Rio, en su casa NO sentíamos estar en otro país, era como estar en nuestra propia casa. Sergio nos trató como si fuéramos sus hijos, siempre atento y bien predispuesto, disfrutando de su compañía con largas charlas.  El Studio es muy lindo, luminoso, limpio y cómodo. Se encuentra en una zona privilegiada y estratégica desde donde se puede ir a cualquier lugar sin problemas.
Sin dudas volveremos a Rio y elegiremos este lugar. 
Gracias Sergio por tanto afecto.

A hospedagem foi maravilhosa. Ficamos confortavelmente instalados. O jardim de inverno dá um charme todo especial para o ambiente. A hospitalidade do Sérgio é impar, realmente um amor de pessoa. Teve até a delicadeza de colocar uma linda rosa para nos recepcionar; entre outros mimos. Adoramos e com certeza retornaremos. Nos encontramos em São Paulo para tomarmos um choppinho, não esqueça. Abração: Janaína e Daney

We had a fantastic stay at Sergio's appartment! Everything was very convenient and well organized, the appartment is also very clean.
The location in Rio is just perfect, 100m away from the metro, 2 min by foot from Copacabana beach and 5 min from Ipanema beach! You also have everything you need near the appartment as supermarkets, restaurants, money change...
Sergio gives you also very good advice and is very helpful. He also speaks english and french. It is like having your own appartment as it is upstairs and you can enjoy the sun while having breakfast or any meal!
We can only recommand and if we have to comeback in Rio we now know where to stay!

Sergio es un excelente host, siempre estuvo  atento y pendiente de que estuviera cómodo. Me esperó  con agua, frutas y ricos chocolates en la mesa de luz :). Me dio algunas recomendaciones muy valiosas. Tuvo gestos que lo hacen único, hasta me ayudó cuando tuve inconvenientes con mi tarjeta. GRACIAS!

El depto estaba en perfecto estado de limpieza y orden, cerca de la playa copacabana y a media cuadra del metro.

En fin si tengo que ponerle un puntaje a mi experiencia, le doy un 10 y espero volver pronto.


Sergio is an excellent host, i highly recommend him to everybody in the airbnb community. He made the difference for better, as person and for some details, water, fruits, chocolate and yogurts waiting for me.

The apt is great, clean and have everything you need to enjoy it, just as the photos and better.

Location: perfect,  the beach is around 3 blocks from the apt and the Subway station Osorio at the corner. Experience with Sergio 10!! Thank for everything.

Great simply the best location to see and enjoy Rio de Janeiro....Sergio will be you friend for life he really goes above your expectations... you have the privacy you need and you feel safe in this magnificent place in the heart of Copacabana.

Sergio es una persona muy servicial y amigable, la suite ala que llegamos estaba muy bien situada, cómoda y limpia. Sergio nos ayudó a comprar unos tickets, nos dió información turística e incluso tuvo el detalle de tenerle leche de chocolate a mi hijo que le encanta. Teníamos siempre fruta fresca y pasamos unos días muy agradables en su casa que es muy acogedora.

Nuestra estadia en Rio en la casa de Sergio fue excelente y única!!!. El apartamento en un zona segura y muy cerca de todo. Respecto al Studio es muy amplio y bonito, el baño y las habitaciones siempre muy limpias y con frutas frescas a disposición. Lo más especial fue nuestro anfitrión Sergio. Desde nuestra llegada nos hizo sentir como en casa, incluso como si fueramos sus hijos. Siempre tuvimos toda su disposición para todas las preguntas que tuvimos acerca de RIO y sus consejos personales fueron muy valiosos. Muchas Gracias Sergio eres una gran persona y espero poder volver a RIO pronto. Un abrazo. Muito Obrigado. Cuenta con nosotros cuanto quieras visitar Colombia.

Out stay at Sergio's studio was absolutely amazing!  I've stayed in few AirBnBs now and this place is amongst the best!  Sergio is a trustworthy and very caring man who will not only give you some pointers but also can help you with what you want to do while in Rio.  He appreciates conversations and is always willing to talk, in Portuguese, English, or even French.  

The place is awesome as well, you pretty much get a whole floor to yourself with bathroom, outside balcony, kitchenette, and living room.  The view of the favela from the living room is beautiful especially at night.  Location is perfect!  Literally 1 min walk to the metro station, two blocks from Copacabana beach and just a few minutes to Ipanema.  Close to banks, grocery stores, drug stores, and bus stops.  We were careful but felt very safe coming home late at night.    

The service is also great!  He welcomed us with fruits (which he kept refilling), snacks, coffee, etc.  His nephew helps with cleaning up and even accompanies you to go out to Lapa if you want (we recommend at least for your first time to Lapa).

I highly recommend this place and the host, Sergio.

Estar no Rio é sempre uma satisfação para mim. É um lugar onde me sinto em casa. Tranquila e feliz.

O studio do Sérgio é simplesmente fantástico. Limpo, organizado e seguro. Tem tudo o que se precisa para uma boa estadia, desde toalhas até frutas e utensilios domésticos. A localização é perfeita.

Enfim, super recomendo e já é meu lugar favorito para ficar no Rio.

Sergio  est un excellent hôte! Très gentil, donnant avec plaisir de nombreux conseils quant aux sorties, orientations etc.
Toujours à nos petits soins, avec des fruits frais tous les jours, Sergio à été comme un grand père pour nous, je recommande vivement de séjourner chez lui!
L'appartement correspond parfaitement aux descriptions, très propre, idéalement situé et dans un quartier sécurisé, vraiment parfait!

If you are planning a trip to Rio for the first, second, or third time, you want to book Sergio's place.  You literally get an entire floor up top to yourself.  Sergio lives in what is likely the penthouse suite.  It has a beautiful indoor, outdoor space all connected.  On a warm night, just leave the doors and windows all open for a cool breeze.

Convenience is key when traveling and it was so convenient and SAFE to stay at Sergio's home that I couldn't have picked and lucked out on a better place.

Sergio is so kind and sweet and speaks enough English to help you find some things you need and are looking for.

1 block from the Metro
2 blocks from the beach
1 block from a grocery store
1 block from restaurants, pharmacies, and pretty much anything you need!

Look no further!!

Sergio is very nice and kind person. Every day he recommend us new things to visit in Rio (new tips). We have a one floor only for us. All apartment was very clean. Every day Sergio bring us fruits and yogurts. The location  is great, 5 min to copacabana beach and around 10 to Ipanema. This is the best place to stay in Rio. Fully recommend

Je suis resté dans l'appartement de Sergio trois jours. Son appartement est magnifique et très bien situé. La chambre se situe à l'étage avec un salon et une sdb, du coup c'est presque comme un appartement privé. Sergio a été très attentif pendant toute la durée du séjour, me donnant constamment des conseils sur où aller, où manger, etc. A recommander, surtout si vous avez besoin d'idées pour sortir à Rio!

Local perfeito para quem procura segurança e facilidades em acessibilidade. Estação de metrô  junto estação de bicicletas ( bikes) do  Itaú, a qual usamos bastante fazendo em dois dias uma média de  35 km, conhecendo Copacabana, Ipanema, Leblon, Lagoa Rodrigo de Freitas, Jardim Botânico e Parque Lage!
A vizinha é bem  tranquila . Por perto tudo que precisa: supermercado,   "  Pão de Açúcar" , farmácias, lojas, petshop, lanchonetes, padarias . 
O Sérgio é bastante atencioso. Ele se preocupa em indicar bons lugares para  conhecer e comer bem. Pessoa tranquila  e educada. 
A única coisa que estranhei, não me lembro se consta no anúncio,   é que o  acesso ao Studio não ter entrada privativa. Isto é; a entrada acontece pelo apartamento através de uma escada para o andar superior, uma cobertura. No demais só maravilha.
Obrigada Sérgio pelas frutas e mimos deixados na despensa. 
--------
Perfect for those seeking safety and accessibility facilities in place. Metro station with bicycles (bikes) Itaú, which we use quite doing two days in an average of 35 km, knowing Copacabana, Ipanema, Leblon, Lagoa Rodrigo de Freitas, Botanical Garden and Parque Lage season!
The neighbor is very quiet. Nearby everything you need: supermarket, pharmacies, shops, petshop, cafeterias, bakeries.
Sergio is very attentive. He cares to indicate good places to meet and eat well. Quiet and polite person.
The only thing I found odd, I can not remember if stated in the ad, is that access to the Studio does not have private entrance. This is; input happens through the apartment via a staircase to the upper floor, a cover. In the only remaining wonder.
Thanks Sergio for fruits and treats left in the pantry.

Sergio is a great host - helpful, informative, laid-back, and flexible to help with cabs, transport and accommodation, easy check-in/check-out. 
The room with its little terrace and view was wonderful - perfect location, 5 min from the beach, 1min from the metro, close to busses, Ipanema. The room was a great place to stay and starting point to explore the city. I definitely recommend the room, and Sergio as a host, to anyone wishing to visit the city!

We had a great time in Rio at Sergio's place! Ofcourse the location is perfect to explore Rio's hotspots. But the best part is Sergio! He is a very welcoming host who helps you find your way in Rio and Brazilian life and is good company! Highly recommend this place.

We really enjoyed our stay at Sergio. He is a fantastic host. We obtained clear information before and during our stay on where to go, what to see...the appartment was perfectly located in the Quite neighbourhood of ipanema and not far from copacabana. At 2 steps from the Subway and very close to the beach.we had a terrace which was ideal for a breakfast in the sun. The bed was super comfortable and everything was clean. We definetely recommend the place! Thanks a lot Sergio for making our stay in rio enjoyable!

We had a great time in Brazil made even better by our stay with Sergio. From our day of arrival until the day we left, he made us feel welcome and at home.  He was willing to help out with so many stressful things from lost luggage to needing to stay an extra night. I would absolutely recommend staying with Sergio to anyone who is planning a trip to Rio. The apartment was beautiful, very spacious and felt like a home away from home. This was my first B&B experience and I will definitely be using the site for my future trips. Hopefully all hosts will be as awesome as Sergio.

O melhor anfitrião que poderíamos ter encontrado na cidade Maravilhosa, seus cuidados ja se iniciaram antes mesmo de termos chegado ao Rio, sempre preocupado e atencioso, nos indicou o melhor caminho para chegarmos la, já que estávamos indo de carro, ao chegar fomos recebidos com os mimos do Sergio, frutas frescas, chocolatinho e rosas em nosso quarto, o apartamento e maravilhoso, bem espaçoso, super limpo, internet ótima, vários canais a cabo, localização perfeita, metro do lado, estação de bicicletas também, a duas quadras da praia de Copacabana, e muito próximo da praia de Ipanema, apesar de termos ido de carro, não usamos ele praticamente pra nada. Sem falar de todas as ótimas dicas do Sergio, visitamos lugares  especiais que nem imaginávamos que iríamos conhecer no Rio de Janeiro, passamos uma semana nos sentindo praticamente em nossa casa, adoramos cada minuto que passamos la e saímos com a certeza que fizemos a melhor escolha ao ficar na casa do Sergio, pois com certeza retornaremos em breve!!!
Ótimo anfitrião! Recebeu-nos muito bem, de uma forma extremamente atenciosa e carinhosa. Apartamento extremamente agradável e bem localizado. Não só recomendo, como pretendo voltar.

This is a beautiful airbnb home. My partner and I stayed with Sergio for four nights and we had the best time possible. Sergio does everything possible to make one feel at home and spoils his guests a lot. He was very informative and helped us getting to and around in Rio. He had very good advise on where to eat, what to do and how to make the most of our time in Rio. The studio itself is a little paradise in the heart of busy Copacabana. It is located around five minutes walk from Copacabana beach and ten minutes to Ipanema. There are lots of shops, restaurants, juice bars around - you will find everything you need within just a couple of minutes. The studio itself is spacious and simply stunning. There is a terrace attached to it and the bedroom has aircon and a private bathroom. It is very clean, safe and homy. Sergio spoiled us by providing fresh fruit, yoghurt and coffee each day and he gave us chocolate treats each night too - pure bliss. There is no better place I could imagine to stay at in Rio and if we come back (which we will for sure) we will definitely stay with Sergio again. Don't look any further if you are planning to visit Rio and its stunning beaches!

The best Airbnb home for us. The studio is very clean, spacious and beautyful. Sergio does everything to make you feel at home. He was informative about the things to do in Rio. He spoiled us a lot with fresh fruit, yogurt, chocolate ....
The location is nearby the beaches Copacabana and Ipanema, the metro, restaurants and shops.
And very important - Sergio made us feel at home.
We had a great time in Rio

Sergio fue muy amable con nosotros y estuvo pendiente de nuestra comodidad y que estuvieramos a gusto. El departamento es como se muestra en las fotos, muy luminoso, fresco y sobre todo limpio. Tiene una ducha extra en el patio que es excelente para refescarse, es la mejor picina vertical!!!!
Estamos muy contentos de haber estado hospedados ahi, 100% recomendable.
O Sérgio é um anfitrião muito agradável,  atencioso e prestativo.  Ambiente agradável,  limpo,  seguro.  Ganhamos um amigo, voltaremos em breve!

El studio de Sergio en Copacabana superó todas nuestras expectativas. Privado, cómodo y limpio. Es como un depto entero. A tres cuadras de la playa de Copa, cerquita de Ipanema. Segio se portó genial con nosotros. Gracias por todo! 100% recomendable.

O lugar é excelente. Tem uma ótima localização, você tem privacidade com quarto, sala e uma area aberta no andar de cima, com churrasqueira. Tudo limpinho e aconchegante, vale muito a pena. O Sérgio é um anfitrião exemplar e ótimo papo. Facilitou em muito os nossos passeios com dicas valiosas e nos ajudou em tudo o que precisamos na casa.

Sergio ha sido un excelente anfitrión, muy servicial y atento. Siempre tuvo muy buena predisposición para ofrecer su ayuda en cuanto a lo que necesitáramos, consejos sobre lugares para visitar, medios de transporte, horarios, etc. El departamento está muy bien ubicado, cerca del metro, a pocas cuadras de la playa de Copabana y muy cerca de Ipanema. Nos sorprendió que fuese un lugar muy amplio y cómodo. La comodidad que ofrece el lugar más la atención de Sergio, que nos hizo sentir como en casa, hicieron que nuestra estadía en Río sea más placentera de lo que imaginamos. Muchas gracias Sergio!!

Sergio est un hôte charmant et toujours aux petits soins. Emprunt de bons conseils, nous avons grâce à lui, découvert des restaurants, quartiers animés... Toujours souriant et très discret, de quoi se sentir comme à la maison!!! Uma grande obrigado, Sergio,  para Acolhimento de tom excelente!
Beijos, Estelle & Aurélie.

sergio ha sido un gran anfitrion, la verdad fue muy atento y amable.  con respecto al anuncio fue mucho mas de lo que esperamos, mucho mas espacioso de lo que muestran las fotos. la ubicacion y la comodidad de su casa fueron un gran condimento para muestra estadia en rio de janeiro. super recomendable!!

Sergio est très accueillant et discret  à la fois. Tout est prêt pour se sentir chez soi. L'appartement est tel qu'il est décrit et d'une propreté impeccable. Une très bonne adresse à recommander sans hésitation. Comme on dit au brésil nota 10!!

Excelente experiência. O local possui prima localização - 3 quadras vc está em Copacabana e 06 quadras na direção contrária vc está em Ipanema. O studio é exatamente como nas fotos, limpo, aconchegante e mto confortável, um delícia de lugar.
Além do Sérgio ser um anfitrião exemplar, mto educado e ótimo papo, sinto q ganhamos um amigo e pretendo voltar mais vezes. Recomendo a todos.

Prenotate senza indugio!Una vacanza perfetta sicuramente anche grazie alla scelta fatta prenotando l' appartamento di Sergio.
Sergio è pazzesco,educato,disponibile e simpatico,una persona deliziosa che si è rivelato un fondamentale punto di riferimento per qualsiasi cosa  sempre pronto a dispensare consigli e ad aiutarci,Sergio è Rio.La casa è pulitissima,i letti super comodi,tutto il piano di sopra è a completa disposizione con tutto il necessario,wifii efficiente,privacy (Website hidden by Airbnb) posizione è perfetta siamo a 100 metri dalla metro e dalla banca,a 300 dalla spiaggia di Copacabana e a poco più di 5 minuti a piedi da quella di Ipanema.Cosa volete di più?La zona è sicura,ci siamo mossi tranquillamente a piedi anche di notte non incombendo in alcun episodio sgradevole anzi..Una scelta migliore non potevamo farla,torneremo sicuramente a trovarti,anche perché abbiamo trovato non un semplice host ma un amico,prenotate ad occhi chiusi,super consigliato!Grande Serginho
Muy acogedor lugar, muy bonito, buen barrio y buena ubicación. Sergio nos recibió muy bien y nos orientó para conocer Río.

Nos quedamos en casa de Sergio cinco noches y la pasamos súper bien. Muy bien ubicada, muy segura la zona, a apenas dos cuadras de la playa de Copacabana. Todo era como decía en el anuncio, el departamento muy amplio, con cocina, patio, habitación, baño y un living comedor con tele.

Sergio como anfitrión es muy, muy amable, siempre nos dio muy buenos consejos de qué ver y qué hacer y cómo llegar, y nos ayudó mucho en planear y organizar los pocos días que tuvimos en Río. Cuando llegamos nos esperaron un plato de frutas, yogur, café, chocolates, ...

La verdad que no podía ser mejor y cuando vuelva a Río me quedaría otra vez en su casa.
Muchas gracias, Sergio!

Great time in sergio's place!
The apartement was very practical with everything we needed and very clean (a cleaning woman came many times in 2 weeks).
Sergio was a great host, very friendly, helpful and very thoughtful (he offered us many fruits and a family lunch on sunday!, gave us new towel when our were wet with the rain..).
I would definitely come back to sergio's place if i come back in Rio and i highly recommend this airbnb!

Lorsqu'on réserve une chambre, un appartement sur internet dans une ville qu'on ne connait pas, malgré les photos, on a parfois du mal à imaginer l'environnement. Dans le cas du studio de Sergio, nous avons constaté sur place qu'il était très bien situé, à proximité immédiate du métro, des rues commerçantes mais dans une rue tranquille, à 5 minutes de la plage de Copacabana et à 10 minutes de celle d'Ipanema.  Le studio lui-même était exactement conforme aux photos, très bien aménagé, clair, fonctionnel, très propre. L'accès au studio se fait par l'accès principal de l'appartement de Sergio, ce qui ne nous a pas gênés, les espaces étant bien séparés, en l'occurrence il s'agit d'un duplex. J'ai apprécié avant même l'arrivée à Rio, de pouvoir échanger avec Sergio et qu'il réponde rapidement. Il a gentiment accepté de nous recevoir avant l'heure d'arrivée habituelle compte tenu de notre vol d'arrivée très matinal. Durant tout notre séjour, il a été d'une aide précieuse pour nous conseiller sur les visites, sur les modes de transport, pour  réserver et imprimer les billets pour accéder au Christo de Corcovado, réserver le taxi, ou encore faire une lessive. Sergio est un hôte discret mais charmant, s'intéressant  le matin à ce que nous allions faire et  le soir de ce que nous avons fait. Nous avons eu la belle surprise de découvrir tous les jours à notre table des délicieux fruits frais (mangues, bananes, papayes). C'est un excellent hôte et une excellente adresse!
O apartamento é bem aconchegante e limpo, fica numa localização ótima em Copacabana e muito perto de Ipanema. Fui super bem recebida pelo Sr Sérgio, que me fez sentir em casa.

Ficamos muito satisfeitas com a hospedagem proporcionada pelo Sérgio em sua residência.
O apartamento localizado em andar superior ao do proprietário tem um espaço excelente com quarto, sala, cozinha, banheiro e varanda aberta.
Fica como destaque a limpeza do ambiente que pareceu uma preocupação permanente do anfitrião.
A localização é excelente, ficando próximo das principais praias da Zona Sul, com metrô e táxi muito próximos. Além disso, possui uma estação de bicicletas para locação na mesma rua.
O destaque fica para o anfitrião, uma pessoa muito simpática e muito disposto a orientar-nos na visita à cidade maravilhosa.
Voltaremos com certeza!

O studio fica muito bem localizado. Copacabana, Ipanema, Arpoador e metro estão todos a menos de 10 minutos de caminhada. O studio é como esta nas fotos, muito confortável e limpo. Pode ser meio barulhento nos finais de semana, mas nada que atrapalhe sua viagem.
O Sérgio é um anfitrião de primeira. Deu várias dicas, nos deixou muito à vontade e sabe muito bem como agradar seus hóspedes. Quando eu for ao Rio novamente, certamente voltarei. Nota 10!!

Voltamos pra casa com a plena certeza que escolhemos a melhor opção. Quando estávamos lendo os comentários sobre o studio e a pessoa maravilhosa que é o Sergio, minha namorada e eu ficamos super curiosos para conhece-lo. E não poderia ter sido melhor, sem dúvida alguma a melhor escolha que fizemos, o Sergio é show de bola, o studio também, muito limpo, cheiroso, tudo arrumadinho, roupa de cama e toalhas impecáveis, os comentários realmente são verídicos, não há como não sair satisfeito, a localização é perfeita, perto de tudo tudo, a rua possui uma estação de bikes do itau, supermercados, restaurantes, bancos, farmácias, e o melhor a 50 mts da praia de copacabana, ipanema tb, muito perto, nada a reclamar! Iremos voltar em breve concerteza...

Sergio was an amazing host. He was very sincere, and his hospitality really made us feel very welcomed. The apartment was clean and very huge. We had the entire second floor to ourselves, which was more of a "entire apartment" instead of private room. Thank you so much again Sergio!

Gostamos muito de estar em casa do Sr. Sérgio, foi muito simpático e deu-nos muitas indicações úteis para conhecer melhor a cidade, como verdadeiros cariocas. A casa era óptima e era limpa com muita regularidade, com bastante espaço e privacidade.

This was my first Airbnb experience and i would give it a 9,5 out of 10 because of Sergio's efforts to make you feel at home. The room is nice and furthermore you have all the privacy you can get with an upper floor to yourself and details nicely covered by lovely Sergio. Location is also spot on right in between Copacabana and Ipanema and with metro station only 50m away. Thx Sergio for making a really nice first impression and with your help finding the attractions in Rio!

Sergio es una persona amable, con mucha predisposición a ayudarte para lo que necesites, un buen consejero y si te comenta cual es la mejor opción es porque la es. 
El Studio muchísimo más amplio que lo que podes ver en fotos. Una zona totalmente segura para caminar. El metro a 1 cuadra. Buses a 1. Playa de Copacabana a 2. Ipanema a 5. Supermercado, resto/bar todo muy a mano. 
Sergio pasamos 10 días muy lindos, gracias por tus buenos consejos. 
Hasta pronto.
Marcos & Matías.

Sergio was the perfect host, courteous and helpful, his advice enriched our stay in Rio.  The accommodation is excellent value for money - although listed as a private room it is effectively a private apartment accessed by staircase via the host's home.  Clean, bright and spacious with kitchen and outside terrace it is exactly as the photos if not better.  Refreshments, coffee and fruits were provided as were fresh towels and good bed linen. Situated minutes from Copacabana and Ipanema beaches.   Osario metro (2 mins walk) provides access to the rest of the city.
Comfortable and welcoming, we would not hesitate to recommend.

Experiencia 10 PUNTOS. La habitación era super confortable, Sergio limpiaba diariamente, era muy amable, nos recomendó muchos lugares para recorrer y ahorrar con las excursiones. El barrio era tranquilo. Nos espero con frutas a nuestra llegada y siempre tuvo buena predisposición a nuestros pedidos y consultas.

Sergio has been an absolutely amazing host! 

From the moment we arrived in Rio, Sergio was welcoming and helpful. He helped us to find restaurants, attractions, buses, and how to navigate the metro. He definitely made us feel at home in his lovely apartment, and we are very thankful to Sergio, for making our time in Rio so lovely and easy! 

The apartment itself also could not have been more perfect! The location is excellent. It is safe, very close to the metro, very close to both Copacabana and Ipanema beaches, as well as close to many lovely restaurants. 

The apartment is great because you have your own space- a nice bedroom, a bathroom, a separate lounge and kitchen/dining area, and a lovely courtyard. It is an excellent space for relaxing. 

I definitely will be recommending Sergio's apartment to anyone I know who is heading to Rio de Janeiro. Definitely a 10/10 experience! 

Many thanks Sergio!!!

Sergio was a gracious host.  From the minute we booked the reservation, he responded promptly and accepted our request.  He provided very detailed information and directions to his apartment in Copacabana.  We found the apartment without any problem. Upon arrival, he accommodated us with an early check in.  He stocked the fridge with beer, soda, water and several fresh fruits and snacks.  He placed chocolates near our bed! I cannot say enough about how kind and considerate he is.  He thought of everything.  He even gave us a farewell gift!

The location is very centrally located.  The metro is only a block away with quick access to other parts of the city.  The metro is really the way to go to venture to different neighborhoods in Rio and is very safe and efficient to use.  You will save a ton of money on cab fare!  If you feel like walking, Copacabana beach is about 3 blocks away and Ipanema is about 8-10 minutes walk.  There are fabulous restaurants within walking distance from his apartment.  It is also located near a grocery store if you need to get some provisions.  

The room feels like its own apartment.  You enter the apartment through a common area, but you have the upstairs all to your self.  There is a living room, bedroom, bathroom, kitchenette, and terrace all just for you!  It is very relaxing just to sit on the rooftop and drink a beer or glass of wine.  The bedroom has a ceiling fan and air conditioner just in case it gets too warm.  The apartment is extremely clean.  

The neighborhood is lively.  Music can heard until the early morning sometimes and there is a lot of construction going on in Rio at this time.  That can be a drawback if you are looking for peace and quiet.  After all, this is a very bustling city!  

Sergio called us a cab to the airport which was much cheaper than what we would have paid if we called one ourselves.  

Sergio, thank you so much for a memorable stay in Rio.  Thank you for all the helpful information you provided.  We were able to navigate the city quite well with your help.  I hope we meet again someday.  Please call us if you every find yourself in California!

Most Sincerely, Grace.

A melhor opção que poderíamos ter escolhido para nossa hospedagem no Rio de Janeiro! Nossa estadia foi show, fomos recebidos no apartamento bem limpinho e cheiroso com frutas frescas, iogurte, chocolate e bolachinhas. 
O prédio fica muito bem localizado, próximo ao metrô, a praia de Copacabana e Ipanema. Pudemos conhecer vários pontos turísticos da cidade graças as dicas do Sergio, que sem dúvidas, é um ótimo anfitrião. Sempre atencioso, nos deu dicas da melhor maneira para chegarmos aos pontos turísticos da cidade e sugestões de restaurantes. 
Viemos embora com vontade de voltar em breve! Recomendo a todos!

I enjoyed the time in Rio 
Sergio's apartment has two levels and I stayed at the 1 bedroom studio on the top floor. The location is great, the metro station is close by and there are many buses that will take you to the best attractions that Rio has to offer. You can hear the music from the local bar in the evening so if you are a light sleeper it may bother you. having said that, it's Rio and it's part of the experience. 
Sergio provided insightful recommendations which made my visit quite enjoyable.

La pasamos súper bien, el apartamento es muy confortable, y la atención de Sergio de lo mejor. Muy buena ubicación, todo cerca, las playas, Ipanema, lebron, Copacabana, supermercado, centro comercial... Sergio todos los días nos daba frutas, muy amable, sus recomendaciones super buenas y fáciles de seguir... Recomendable 100%...

Sergio was an incredible host to my parents; they could not have had a better experience with him! He was extremely gracious, kind and generous. He had fruit laying out for them every day, my Mum got a bit of a flu and since Sergio is a doctor he made her soup and gave her medicine to cure her. 

The apartment was lovely, they had the privacy they wanted but if they needed to ask Sergio anything he was always on hand to help. 
It's literally a 10 minute walk from the beach and the metro in Copacabana so the location is perfect. 

Thank you Sergio for receiving my parents so well, they were very satisfied with their stay!

Foi a primeira hospedagem atraves do AIRBNB e nao poderia ser melhor, Sr. Sergio muito solicito e preocupado com os minimos detalhes, nos ligou um dia antes e proximo ao horario da chegada para orientacoes sobre deslocamentos, quando chegamos deixou a nossa disposicao, frutas, iogurtes e ate cerveja. Alem disso nos explicou locais para alimentação, taxi, onibus e metrô. O apartamento é muito limpo, organizado e aconchegante alem de ser muito bem localizado. Ficamos encantados, com certeza quando voltarmos ao Rio ficaremos no Sr. Sergio.

Wij hebben het heel goed gehad tijdens ons verblijf in Rio de Janeiro. Sergio was een zeer goede gastheer. Elke dag was er nieuw vers fruit op onze kamer. Als we iets wilden weten of nodig hadden was dat nooit enig probleem en daarbij gaf Sergio ons goede tips over allerlei dingen (restaurantjes, vervoer etc.) Het appartement was heel fijn en ruim, licht, schoon en van alle gemakken voorzien, zelfs met een kleine binnentuin en een prachtig uitzicht op de favela erachter wat zorgt voor veel sfeer. De buurt was super, op nog geen 10 minuten lopen van Copacabana en Ipanema strand. Wij zouden dit appartement iedereen aanraden voor een verblijf in Rio!

Schon vor der Reise war der Informationsfluss sehr gut, Sergio hat uns ausreichend informiert, besonders darüber, wie man vom Flughafen zur Wohnung kommt. Nach unserem Eintreffen waren wir sehr überrascht, wie gut wir umsorgt wurden - so gab es zum Beispiel jeden Tag frisches Obst, Kekse, Müsliriegel am Tisch, auch im Kühlschrank war schon einiges für uns vorhanden. Die Wohnung ist sehr sauber, sogar mit täglichem Zimmerservice!
Sergio versorgt uns mit allen gewünschten Infos und Tipps.

Sergio es una excelente persona. Siempre dispuesto a ayudarte, a darte lo que necesites. El lugar es muy bueno, amplio y super limpio. Incluso tiene servicio de cama y limpieza y Sergio diariamente te deja frutas, biscochos y refrigerantes. Asi que no te falta nada. El apartamento tiene un lindo patio incluso con una parrilla que me arrepiento de no haberla usado.
La ubicación es excelente, cerca de la playa de copacabana e ipanema.
En sintesis, 10 puntos.
No puedo decir que le falte nada importante.
Saludos! Juan y Maria.

Sergio had gone above and beyond the care I have ever received from an Airbnb host and not only has a lovely home, but a kind personality that made it easy to be comfortable getting tips and help from him about seeing Rio.  
The studio was even better than expected as Sergio provided little touches such as fresh fruits, drinks and chocolates along with a view of Favela Cantagalo that I found be unique and interesting.  Nice people watching to see both locals and tourist walking or riding up the hill.
Otherwise, apartment's location is great to connect with all of Rio with the metro stop and being between Copa and Ipanema. You get the benefits of a private area with the comfort of daily cleaning and Sergio to ask questions. Sergio is happy to give tips about the neighborhoods and you will leave wishing you only had more time! He was helpful from beginning till the end as he let us arrive early and stay late to accommodate our flight times and helped arrange for a taxi upon our departure.
I would gladly return!

A experiência que tivemos com o Sergio foi excelente! Ele foi o melhor host que já tivemos no AirBnB: sempre solícito e atencioso, antes mesmo de chegarmos ao Rio. Sempre cuidadoso com todos os detalhes que tornaram nossa estadia um momento incrível. A localização do apartamento é excelente, perto de supermercados, farmácias, metrô, ponto de ônibus. A vista para a comunidade do pavão é interessantíssima. Adoramos tudo e ficamos hiper felizes com nossa viagem ao Rio, mesmo com o tempo chuvoso que pegamos :)
Sergio was extremely welcoming an we loved saying at his house in Rio. He was very helpful with local restaurant recommendations and maps/booking taxis! The perfect host

We had an amazing time in Rio and Sergio's flat was great. Very clean, spacious and in a great location. It is near the metro station and walking distance to Copacabana, Ipanema and Leblon beaches. Sergio gave us some very good suggestions on what to do in Rio, and left fresh fruit for us every day. It can get noisy in the evening due to the bars around, but we had ear plugs and it was not a problem for us. In the morning you wake up to the sound of birds ;)
Muito bem!! Excelentes recomendaciones de lugares a visitar, como llegar, y hasta donde comer. Gracias Sergio

Sergio was a great host during a New Years stay at Copacabana. The studio apartment was exactly as described and quite spacious and the air conditioning is excellent (great after those long days at the beach). The location is very close to Copacabana beach, and several great restaurants are nearby. But Sergio himself is the best part of staying here. He was very nice and informative, and even went out to buy us a cooler to take to the beach for NYE. He is fluent in 5 languages, so it was very easy to converse with him. Sergio even allowed us to stay an extra day when our flight got moved back for a nominal fee. If your staying in the Copa area definitely consider staying here!

Sergio fue un excelente anfitrion!! Muy agradable y siempre dispuesto a ayudar en lo que necesitamos, nos dio mucha informacion de que lugares conocer y cual era la mejor manera de llegar. El studio es muy lindo, espacioso y limpio como se ve en las fotos. El barrio es seguro y esta muy cerca del metro y calles principales donde se toma el bus, tambien a algunas cuadras de la playa. 100% recomendable!!

We loved our stay at Sergio's house. His place is very cozy, comfortable, clean, and next to main touristic areas and to the subway. 
Sergio is a great host. He is always ready to give you very useful advice.
His place was the best place that I have been using Airbnb.

Sérgio fue muy agradable y atento con nosotros. En todo momento nos ayudo con el viaje, nos dijo como recorrer el centro con muy Buenos consejos. El departamento interno dentro del de Sérgio nos resulto muy comodo y amplio! Excelente ubicación, muy segura! Un poco ruidoso por la favela que está cerca pero tiene su encanto!

Sergio es un gran anfitrión. Es muy cordial y con la gran ventaja, para un hispanoparlante, de que habla un español fluido. Nos explicó cómo llegar hasta el estudio y estuvo presente para recibirnos. Siempre estaba ahí para aconsejarnos sobre lugares de interés y modos de acceso. 
Con respecto al alojamiento, el estudio es tal como lo muestran las fotos. Estaba muy limpio y bien iluminado, y cuando llegamos y en el tiempo que permanecimos en el lugar, Sergio se acupaba de mantenerlo así. Está bien ubicado, a media cuadra de la estación de subte, que te comunica muy rápidamente con todos los puntos de interés de Río, y a pocas cuadras de las playas de Copacabana e Ipanema. La zona es linda y más o menos tranquila, y con amplia oferta grastronómica y de bares.

La casa de sergio es realmente hermosa. La habitación es muy cómoda, el estudio completo es grande, bien iluminado y con una excepcional vista hacia la favela. No queremos seguir nuestro viaje, deseamos vivir en la casa de sergio!! Volveremos en otra ocasión. Sergio es muy amable y muy respetuoso, siempre se preocupó por ayudarnos a conocer lugares, dando los consejos indicados para una mejor experiencia. En nuestra estadia conocimos a rodrigo,  nieto de sergio; el se convirtió en un gran amigo, es una gran persona. Gracias por todo amigos!! Haberlos conocido es una de las razones por las cuales rio de janeiro es la cidade maravilhosa.

Sergio fue muy amable con nosotras desde el momento que llegamos a Rio de Janeiro, siempre nos guiaba e indicaba las mejores formas de llegar a todo lado.  El studio es muy cómodo para dos personas y la ubicación es céntrica, definitivamente volveríamos a Rio de Janeiro a quedarnos en el mismo studio. :)

A casa de Sergio é incrível! A localização é muito boa, em frente à estação de metro e a duas quadras da praia de Copacabana. O ponto de onibus também está em frente de sua casa, por isso não há problemas em se locomover para qualquer ponto turistico do Rio . O quarto é muito bom, com uma cozinha, um banheiro e sala de estar apenas para si mesmo -  tenho certeza que é o melhor que você pode encontrar no Airbnb. Da janela voce tem uma vista magnifica da favela, que é pacificada e sem nenhum problema. O Sergio tambem é o melhor anfitriao que ja conheci. Ele é gentil , paciente, atento e irá ajudá-lo com tudo. Ele nos desenhou mapas, escreveu pequenos roteiros e nos deu dicas sobre a cidade tais como os melhores restaurantes , passeios a pé e destaques da cidade . Eu definitivamente voltaria (ou voltarei) a ficar la!

Sergio was great! From the moment we stepped into the house he welcomed us and showed us around the lovely place. We had anaamazing view of the favela right behind us and the location was very close to Copacabana/Ipanema and the metro as well. Sergio had prepared fruits, water, biscuits, beer and drinks for us, and he even got us ponchos when it was pouring one night. Sergio was very helpful with suggestions on our itinerary and we highly recommend this place! Thanks Sergio!
Super appartement, propre ,bien situé(métro,bus et plage à côté ) .Sergio est un hôte très gentil et accueillant !Je vous recommande vivement son appartement .
C'est notre deuxième séjour chez Sergio.Toujours aussi gentil et serviable!!Un vrai bonheur

Exelente estadia! Sergio y su nieto Rodrigo soy muy buenoas anfitriones.  El barrio es muy seguro y con bus y metro muy cercanos. Sergio nos hizo sentir como en casa. Siempre atento y pendiente de nuestras necesidades. El cuarto es exelente,  con todo lo necesario para una hermosa estadía en Rio.  Volveremos a visitarlo!!

O imóvel é exatamente como está na descrição e nas fotos. Vai ser difícil alguém encontrar um anfitrião melhor que o Sérgio neste site. Sérgio dá dicas do que fazer na cidade e faz o hóspede parecer que está na própria casa. O apartamento é exatamente bem localizado, a poucos passos da estação de metrô, menos de cinco minutos da praia de Copacabana e a uma caminhada curta de Ipanema. A vista também é incrível. Todos os dias, Sérgio deixou iogurte, refrigerante, cerveja e água no nosso frigobar como cortesia, além de frutas e biscoito. Os cômodos são extremamente limpos e arejados. Sérgio também nos ajudou em relação aos táxis. Todas as vezes que eu voltar ao Rio de Janeiro, pretendo ficar na casa do Sérgio. Recomendo 100%.

Sérgio foi um excelente anfitrião. De fato o anúncio correspondeu e até superou minhas expectativas. O apartamento é próximo ao metro e a supermercado e fica bem na divida Copabacana/Ipanema.  Cama adequada e bastante espaço reservado (já que fica no 2o andar do apartamento).

It was my first time to visit rio, and me and my girlfriend enjoyed it a lot. In Sergio's place we felt really comfortable. The stay was amazing, it gives you much space to breathe and especially we enjoyed a lot the open terrace for our breakfast. Sergio himself is a really nice host, who cares about your questions and really wants you to feel "home". If one day i come back to rio, I definitely want to stay there again. Thanks a lot Sergio and all the best to you! Bia and Benny

Sergio i jego rodzina są wspaniałymi gospodarzami !

Sergio pomagał nam w znalezieniu miejsc turystycznych
oraz jak do nich dojechać.
Radził z wyborem restauracji.

Gdy przyjechaliśmy ugościł nas świeżymi owocami.
W lodówce były zimne soki, woda i piwo.
Oprócz tego różnego rodzaju ciastka.
I tak było każdego dnia !

Wynajmowany apartament położony jest w 
strzeżonym bloku bardzo blisko metra i blisko zarówno
do Copacabana jak i Ipanema.
Bardzo blisko są bary z jedzeniem i sokami
oraz sklep spożywczy.
Mieszkanie jest czyste i wygodne.

Dziękujemy bardzo za możliwość zamieszkania !

Pozdrawiamy

Piotr i Tymoteusz

Fomos a um congresso no Hotel Sofitel e nos hospedamos na casa de Sérgio. Foi nossa primeira experiência e foi muito boa. Sergio é um senhor educado, gentil, prestativo e tornou nossa estada muito agradável. Seu sobrinho também.  O banho é muito bom, as camas são confortáveis e o ap tem tudo o que é preciso. Tem facilidades como ser próximo a mercados, restaurantes, farmácia. Recomendo.

Ao me hospedar na casa do Sérgio, tenho apenas um sentimento: Gratidão! 

O Sérgio é incrivelmente alegre, gente boa, e muito querido. Nos ajudou em tudo o que precisamos, nos deu dicas que valeram muito a pena. 
Mora um sobrinho dele, que é como o Sérgio. 
Não tenho dúvidas que voltaremos ao  Rio (Uma cidade maravilhosa), e quando voltarmos ficaremos novamente na casa do Sérgio. 

Foi a nossa Primeira experiência, e adoramos. Confesso que estou com saudades. 
O apartamento é melhor do que demostrado nas fotos. Diariamente limpo, arrumado, não cheira mofo, e é super arejado! 

Valeu a pena todos os minutos. 

Obrigada Sérgio e Obrigada Rodrigo, vocês tornaram a nossa viagem especial. 

Espero ver vocês em breve.

Um excelente anfitrião. Muito simpático,carinhoso e respeitoso.Nos recepcionou com frutas,água,refrigerante e (Website hidden by Airbnb) espaço havia toalhas e roupas de cama,além de tudo bem limpo e organizado.
Além disso,o senhor Sérgio fez um cronograma perfeito com todos os pontos turísticos para visitarmos.
Amei a localização. Ônibus e metrô muito próximos.
Senhor Sérgio,obrigada por tudo!

A hospedagem foi ótima, o local muito bom próximo de todos recursos do bairro, junto a estação do metrô e também próximo da praia. O Sr. Sérgio e seu neto Rodrigo foram muito atenciosos e hospitaleiros. Chegamos no apto e  tinha frutas, cerveja, biscoitos, água e refrigerantes a nossa disposição. O studio fica na cobertura, com todo o conforto, claro e ventilado, oferecendo aos hospedes, ventilador de teto, frigobar, microondas e ar condicionado.

Considero muito boa a hospedagem na casa de Sérgio. Foi a segunda experiência com Airbnb e primeira em casa compartilhada. O espaço é limpo, adequado e gracioso, a área ao ar livre é um luxo, um prazer, muito bem cuidada e com jardinagem agradável. O anfitrião é muito zeloso e simpático. Super recomendo e já tenho amigos querendo alugar. Parabéns Sérgio.

A estadia em casa do Sérgio foi espetacular. Ele é de uma simpatia e amabilidade extrema, bem como a restante família que tivemos oportunidade de conhecer, e ajudou-nos a explorar a cidade fazendo roteiros para cada dia e dando conselhos. Quando voltarmos ao Rio, sabemos onde queremos ficar!

It has been a pleasure to be hosted by Sergio.

We felt like at home even so far away from it!!

Hope to come back again in the near future...

Thanks Sergio for all your kindness.

Recien llegados de nuestro viaje a Rio de Janeiro, muy agradecidos por la atencion y hospitalidad de Sergio y su nieto Rodrigo. El estudio es muy luminoso y cómodo, disfrutamos mucho los desayunos en la terraza. Esta muy bien hubicado lo cual te facilita ir caminado a muchos lados. El metro a menos de una cuadra, y con todo lo necesario a mano. Muy recomedable por la hospitalidad  de Sergio y la comodidad del estudio.

A estada na casa do seu Sérgio foi maravilhosa!!!! O Rio de Janeiro é uma cidade linda e ficou bem mais fácil de conhecê-lo com as dicas do Sérgio! O espaço é todo limpinho e sua localização é excelente, perto de tudo !!!! Uma pena termos ficado só 6 dias... Agradeço a hospitalidade do Sérgio e do Rodrigo, seu neto! Com certeza, quando voltarmos a cidade, ficaremos no studio dele!

My experience at Sergio's was wonderful! He was extremely accommodating, communicative, and helpful throughout the visit.

The apartment itself is great, with lots of natural light and a lovely rooftop patio for breakfast / relaxation. A perfect location for exploring Zona Sul!

My other half and I stayed at Sergio's for 5 nights during the Olympics and had a fantastic time.  Sergio could not be more helpful and friendly.  He was very welcoming and was always there to give us recommendations on things to do, how to get to places, etc.  Sergio was very well prepared with all the Olympics materials and we also got a present from him on arrival - an Olympics magnet :).  He left us some Brazilian beers and drinks in the fridge and selection of fruit was often refreshed by him. One Sunday we were at the apartment and Sergio invited us to join him and his family for Sunday lunch, which was very nice of him. 

The apartment is spacious and clean and it is very well located.  General Osorio metro station is at the end of the street only couple of minutes walk away.  The beaches of Copacaban and Ipanema is also only a short walk away.

We highly recommend Sergio's apartment and we'll definitely stay there if we visit Rio again.  A big thank you to you Sergio for letting us stay with you!

Came to Rio for the Olympics not knowing what to expect or how to navigate the city.  Sergio came through like a blessing.  Immediately he made me and my parents feel at home.  He provided medicine for me because he heard me coughing in my sleep (this medicine is another blessing, btw.  I must buy some!).

Sergio kept our studio clean and stocked with light refreshments and beverages.  He even had a welcome souvenir for me upon my arrival.  His knowledge of Rio is extensive and he was instrumental in us finding great places to eat, and fully understanding the easiest ways to navigate to and from  our venues and excursions.

Sergio even stayed up until 2 am with us to ensure we had a taxi ready for pickup.  Wow.  

I cannot speak highly enough of Sergio's hospitality to my family.  When I come back to Rio, I know where I'm staying!!!  God Bless!

During Rio 2016 we have stayed at Sergio's twice for 5 nights and in between we visited other parts of Brazil.  The second part of our stay was even better than the first one as we came back to Sergio's feeling  that we were friends.  He's very welcoming and also very helpful and offered to wash our laundry while we were away.  That was fantastic and made life very easy.  We had an amazing time and the location could not be any better (please see my first review).  Thank you Sergio.

Esta é a segunda vez que vou ao apartamento do Sérgio, e tive uma experiência igualmente satisfatória. O espaço é ótimo, a localização muito boa e o Sérgio é o melhor anfitrião com quem já ficamos no AirBnB. Recomendo muitíssimo.

Sergio es un señor muy amable, nos permitió hacer un check in temprano ya que nuestros vuelos llegaron temprano y la habitación estaba disponible, el lugar limpio y nos cambió los blancos como toallas y sábanas, la limpieza se hacía constantemente, nos permitió usar su estufa y accesorios de cocina como licuadora y hasta los ajos, hay detalles muy lindos como poner unos chocolates en la habitación y surtir nuestro plato de fruta fresca, nos ayudó a lavar la ropa, imprimir nuestros boletos para los juegos paralimpicos y nos recomendó dónde comprar nuestras sandalias Havaianas, dónde rentar bicicletas, cómo llegar a puntos de ls ciudad, había simples amenidades como jabón de baño y champú, MUITO OBRIGADO Sergio por permitirnos estar en tu acogedor departamento

Minha experiência no Studio do Sérgio foi fantástica, o anfitrião é extremamente educado e prestativo. Encontramos o espaço exatamente como descrito no anuncio, com seu ponto forte na localização e praticidade, certamente voltarei! Obrigado por tudo Sr. Sérgio.

This was my third stay at Sergio's house and I spent10 days this time. 
Sérgio, amazing host took care of me nicely to make me feel at home. Sergio's studio was confortable and clean with everything you need. When I come back, I'm sure I will stay here again.

La casa di Sergio è ben ubicata, pulitissima e sempre in ordine, lui e i suoi nipoti non ti fanno mancare nulla, sono molto attenti e premurosi. Sergio è puntuale e conosce benissimo le attività e le attrazioni di Rio! Grazie di tutto..
Gostamos tanto que pretendemos voltar. Muito legal o espaço.
Excelente lugar!!! Sérgio é maravilhoso!!! Preocupado e solícito!! Indico com louvor

Fico sem palavras para agradecer ao Sergio pela hospitalidade e gentilezas que teve conosco esses dias. Sergio foi de longe o melhor anfitrião que já nos recebeu. Extremamente gentil, solicito, respeitador e muito (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza o procuraremos quando voltarmos ao Rio. 

Grande abraço!

Me and my girlfriend had a great time. Unfortunately Sergio was not present for are stay however he had organised for his grandson to cover in his place. The flat is beautiful and really close to the beach. We had a great time.

Sergio, só tenho de agradecê-lo pela ótima recepção que recebemos ao ficar em seu apartamento. 
Toda a atenção que você nos deu, certamente fizeram da nossa estadia algo único. 
Agradeço pelas dicas dos passeios e lugares, e pelo ótimo asseio de todo o ambiente. 
Adorei nossas conversas, e já coloquei os livros que me indicou na lista de itens a ler. 
Sua preocupação em nos disponibilizar bebidas, frutas e petiscos sem dúvidas fez com que nossa experiência fosse UAU. 
Muito obrigado!

Me hospede con mi novia y la verdad que fue una experiencia increible.. sergio es muy amable, servicial, atento, te indica a donde queda cada lugar y todos los dias nos regalaba frutas y bebidas.. la zona muy linda dos cuadras de la playa, el departamento extremadamente limpio, amplio, muy buen aire acondicionado, baño perfecto,cama perfecta.. SI VUELVO A RIO DE JANEIRO sin dudas alquilo nuevamente aca.

I had a very pleasant stay in Sergio’s well-kept duplex apartment where he lets the upper floor which consists of a living room, a bedroom with ensuite bathroom, a small kitchen and a terrace. His flat is centrally and conveniently located in Copacabana on the border of Ipanema with most things within walking distance and easy access to public transport. Sergio was a generous and thoughtful host, providing good advice on things to do and how, keeping me stocked up on water and fruits, allowing me to check in early on my day of arrival and even arranging laundry. Thank you Sergio!

Nous avons vécu un beau séjour chez Sergio. 
L'appartement est vraiment bien situé; métro, plage, commerces sont tous d'eux situés à proximité. La chambre se compose du deuxième étage du duplex, ce qui donne donc l'impression d'un appartement individuel. La petite terrasse compte des espèces de fleurs et de fruits brésiliens.
D'une grande justesse, Sergio nous a accueilli d'une façon très efficace et amicale. Panier de fruits, bouteille d'eau fraîche et petits chocolats, il a toujours une petite attention afin de rendre le séjour le plus agréable possible. 
Une vraie expérience carioca !

Fue una estadía increíble, queda a más o menos 3 cuadras del sector 5 de copacabana, hay locales comerciales, supermercados, farmacias, tiendas de souvenir a 2 cuadras. se ven policías muy cerca. al llegar a la casa Sergio muy amablemente nos tenía fruta, bebidas, cervezas, agua mineral, shampoo y bálsamo, toallas y sábanas limpias. siempre preocupado de nuestra seguridad, podiamos compartir la cocina y preparar nuestros propios alimentos. absolutamente recomendable y si vuelvo por tercera vez a río no dudare en volver al Studio de Sergio. muy agradecida
Estadia excepcional, recomendo muito!
The host canceled this reservation 42 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Sergio foi bastante atencioso.
The host canceled this reservation 63 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The host canceled this reservation 93 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Alojarnos en casa de Sergio fue la mejor decisión que pudimos tomar para nuestra estancia de diez días en Río de Janeiro. El espacio, la segunda planta de un dúplex (Sergio vive en la primera), es amplio y confortable. Un pequeño apartamento con mucha privacidad, muy luminoso, con una kitchenete y hasta con una terraza interior con plantas. Diría que es mejor de lo que parece en el anuncio. Y si el espacio es bueno, el tratamiento amistosísimo y más allá de la debida amabilidad con que Sergio nos obsequió fue inmejorable. Nos sentimos en todo momento libres, como en nuestra propia casa y tratados como familia. Además, las atenciones de Sergio fueron constantes. Los pequeños detalles que nos ofrecía diariamente nos parecían un lujo tan lejos de casa. Sergio, además, fue en todo momento el mejor guía que podríamos haber encontrado. Sus consejos sobre las visitas turísticas de diversa índole fueron de grandísima utilidad durante nuestra estancia. Sin duda, un lugar que recomendar sin reservas a la comunidad de airbnb y al que nosotros mismos volveríamos encantados. Muchas gracias por todo, Sergio. Ha sido un placer.

The best place to be in Rio!!! El mejor lugar para estar en Río! Il miglior posto per soggiornare a Rio!

Sergio’s place is where you want to be. He is a great host, always available, always kind. Basically you have a whole roof for yourself upstairs. A beautiful living room with a comfortable sofa, fast WiFi, satellite TV, a kitchen stock with beverages and daily provided  fruits , a great bathroom with a spacious shower, a comfortable bed and a beautiful terrace all for yourself. Sergio will give you tips for activities, restaurants and places to go. We couldn’t have asked for more. Thank you Sergio! 

Un lugar ecepcional. Van a tener un departamento arriba para ustedes con todas las comodidades: un baño hermoso, una cama confortable, un living con tv satelital, Wi-Fi,una cocina con heladera y una terraza para ustedes solo. Sergio los va a ayudar con consejos para lugares adonde ir, restaurantes o lo que necesiten. La verdad es el mejor lugar en Río. Nos gustó muchísimo!

La casa di Sergio è il miglior posto di Rio. Io e il mio ragazzo siamo stati benissimo. Praticamente avrete un piano solo per voi con soggiorno con divano e tv satellitare, una cucina, un bagno con una doccia grandissima, un letto comodissimo, Wi-Fi veloce, e una terrazza luminosa tutta per voi. Sergio si preoccupa anche di fornirvi con bibite e frutta e darvi consigli quando ne avete bisogno. Non avremo potuto chiedere di più. Felicissimi di aver scelto questo posto.

Everything is just perfect about this place and the host, Sergio! It was much more then we expected. The location is very close to metro station, and is in the heart of Copacabana, five minutes walk from the beach. We felt really privately in our room. It’s a separate floor with a terrace and a barbecue! And Sergio was very kind and helpful to us. We hope to one day come here again.
Sergio es un excelente anfitrión y su casa es perfecta, todo salió perfecto. Muy agradecida por su hospitalidad y amabilidad,  gracias!!  Mas que recomendado!!
Muy buena predisposicion y  buena onda! Todo excelente y cerca de la playa

Tivemos uma recepção maravilhosa do Sérgio, ele foi muito amigavel e atencioso do primeiro dia de hospedagem ao último. Deu muitas dicas para onde ir. Tudo maravilhoso, casa linda, limpa e com ótima localidade. Nos sentimos acolhidos e  em casa. Se eu tiver que voltar ao Rio, com certeza irei procura-lo.

Sergio a été merveilleux avec nous . Il nous a accueilli Avec toute sa gentillesse . Il était toujours présent pour nous aider , nous donner les meilleurs conseils. L'appartement est très clair , très propre et idéalement situé. Pour moi , le meilleur Airbnb que j'ai fait !

Sergio loue le premier étage de son appartement, et vit au rez-de-chaussée. Il était donc toujours disponible pour donner des conseils ou nous aider à nous orienter. 

L'appartement est très bien situé, entre Copacabana et Ipanema, à 10 minutes à pied de la plage. L'immeuble est très sécurisé (un gardien est présent 7/7jours, 24/24h).

De plus, Sergio est d'une gentillesse exceptionnelle. Mon amie et moi avons séjourné chez lui 10 jours. En plus des fruits et biscuits qu'il nous offrait presque quotidiennement, une personne est venue régulièrement faire le ménage et nous donner des serviettes propres. Encore mieux qu'à l'hôtel !

Je recommande l'appartement de Sergio à 100 %.

Increíble, esa es la palabra que describe nuestra experiencia en casa de Sergio! Atento desde el primer día, nos ayudó en todo , nos sentimos como en casa , el departamento hermoso y cerca de todo . Sergio sin dudas el mejor anfitrión , vayan que no se van a arrepentir. Gracias Sergio volveremos a vernos algún dia

EXCELENTE!!!! Esa es la palabra justa... el lugar es impecable, a 2 calles de la playa, super seguro para entrar y salir a cualquier hora caminando. La habitacion amplia, luminosa, con jardin, heladera, patio, baño privado... todo hermoso! Lo mejor de todo, los anfitriones... SERGIO Y TEKA son personas increibles, me dejaban frutas para probar todos los dias, compartimos charlas impresionantes tomando mate... gente culta, amable, respetuosa...  Un placer haberlos conocido... se los SUPER RECOMIENDO A TODOS!!!! Y mi gracias eterno x una estadia hermosa!!!!!!

Sergio, you are the most amazing host we could have wished for and made our stay in Rio feeling like home. We felt very comfortable throughout our stay and are very thankful for the nice talks we shared and all the great recommendations you gave us where to go and what to see in Rio. The appartment is very well located (2minutes walking to Copacobana beach), very clean and tidy and even has a little patio inside and we had the whole upper floor for ourselves. The appartment is located on the 10th floor, very quite and has an amazing view. We will come again for sure and are very thankful for all your care and kindness.
はじめてAirbnbを利用しましたが､最高のﾎｽﾄでした!またﾘｵに来るならぜひ利用したいです｡

Thank you for your big hospitality from heart!!!
It was really great to spend at your place. 
Location is also so good that I and my friend could really enjoy look around in Cocapabana, and many places in Rio.
I will always remember for sure, talking with you and your family, and the beautifulness of the Southern Cross in the sky seen from the patio.

Increíble experiencia. Excelente anfitrión, muy atento. Sergio es una gran persona y siempre estuvo disponible cada vez que necesitamos consultar algo sobre la ciudad y sus atracciones. Nos ayudó mucho a que nuestra primera visita a Río de Janeiro sea inolvidable y a poder exprimir al máximo cada día. El espacio es muy bonito y está en una muy buena ubicación. Muchas gracias por todo!

Look no further – this accommodation hosted by Sergio and his family is the perfect choice! We loved the kind and (typical Brazilian) warm hospitality, which made our one-week stay even more enjoyable. We had the upper floor to ourselves, including kitchen and a cute little outside area. The area in general is very safe and convenient, as you're close by Ipanema beach, as well as nice restaurants and bars. If you're looking for a local experience with wonderful people, go for this one!

El espacio es excelente y muy cómodo, casi como un apartamento aparte es la habitación estudio con un hermoso patio. La ubicación es muy buena, a dos cuadras de playa Copacabana y a una del metro de rio. Sergio es un maravilloso host, ofreciendo muy buenas recomendaciones de paseos y restaurantes y facilitando en todo lo que necesitan los huéspedes. 100 % recomendable. Ha superado nuestras expectativas.
No bad words to say about Sergio and his place. Clean, comfortable and perfect location. If you’re thinking of staying anywhere in Rio, this is the place to stay!

Excelente departamento,luminoso,impecable,bien ubicado, a dos cuadras y media de la playa y media cuadra del metro.Para destacar la atencion de Sergio y su hermana, dos personas muy calidas que nos sorprendieron dia a dia con exquisitas frutas ,cafe .El lugar super luminoso,el patio con hermosas plantas que lo disfrutamos desayunando y cenando bajo las (Website hidden by Airbnb) cama y almohadas perfectas,comodas, la ducha del baño ideal. Volvere siempre que este disponible ,altamente recomendado (Website hidden by Airbnb)
Excelente ubicación u muy confortable

EXCELENTE!!!! Esa es la palabra. El lugar es impecable, a 2 calles de la playa, muy seguro en cualquier hora. La habitación amplia, luminosa, con jardín, heladera, patio, baño privado... todo hermoso.
Lo mejor de todo, los anfitriones... SERGIO Y TEKA son personas increíbles, los regalitos, las múltiples atenciones, sus recomendaciones personalizadas de acuerdo a nuestros gustos, nos sentimos en familia. Un placer haberlos conocido... Los SUPER RECOMIENDO A TODOS!!!!

O studio além de lindo e muito aconchegante,é extremamente limpo. Fácil acesso para as melhores praias do Rio, mercados,bancos,metrô. O Sr Sérgio e sua irmã são uns amores,além de serem super solícitos nos deixaram muito à vontade,muito atentos a ajudar quem se hospeda. Super recomendo e com toda certeza voltaremos!

Ficar na casa de Sergio foi sem dúvidas a melhor escolha que fizemos, tornou nossa experiência no Rio ainda melhor. O apartamento é uma graça, muito limpo, arejado e luminoso, dispõe de uma sala com TV, cozinha, churrasqueira e uma parte externa muito agradável. A localização é ótima, dois minutos do metrô e 5 minutos de Copacabana. 
Sergio foi muito atencioso, chegamos mal de saúde e ele nos ajudou muito. Ele é muito simpático e prestativo, se atenta aos detalhes e conhece muito bem o Rio, nos deu várias dicas do que fazer e como nos mover. Se voltarmos ao Rio com certeza ficaremos na sua casa. Recomendo sem dúvidas.

Je ne peux que recommander l'appartement de Sergio : très bien situé, une terrasse, un logement très propre et surtout un hôte extrêmement gentil (qui parle français) qui fut toujours aux petits soins avec nous.

Don sergio es una gran persona, con una disponibilidad de oro para orientarte, darte ayuda con paseos, averiguar por pasajes por si tienes que moverte a otro lado, etc. De detalles pequeños como tenernos fruta,  algo para tomar y una bolsa para la playa. Sin duda 100% recomendable. La ubicación es perfecta, estas al lado de la playa, un sector tranquilo, departamento amplio y rico para pasar los días de la mejor manera.
Muchas gracias Sergio por todo!

name: 地鉄上的3房2廳2卫浴住9人可月租2萬9千起
summary: 靓裝修,在油麻地地鉄上蓋3房2廳2卫可住9人,去旺角,尖沙咀,朗豪坊十分方便,安全步行2分鐘到西洋菜街,女人亍+分方便
description: 靓裝修,在油麻地地鉄上蓋3房2廳2卫可住9人,去旺角,尖沙咀,朗豪坊十分方便,安全步行2分鐘到西洋菜街,女人亍+分方便

host.host_about: 本人在油尖旺收租多年

reviews.comments: The reservation was canceled 69 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Great apartment and host, enjoy the time chatting with her.

Apartment was great overall. Location is superb at near the center of Mongkok, where MTR exit is right next to the apartment. Not forgetting to mention the awesome curry fish balls next to Circle K.

Air conditioners are working good (which is essential in hot May's weather). 2 bath rooms are a plus, where shower was no problem. Living room is spacious for big group of people, where the convertible sofa/bed is a great addition.

Basic toiletries are provided which is nice. Microwave was in working condition, so did the refrigerator.

A big thank to the host, where we were allowed to leave luggage behind (albeit in one room) for one night, when we were out of HK for a day. As a famous rocker said, Hong Kong resident has the greatest tolerance and always a great host to people from around the world.

Thank you.
早上11點就有人自己打開門叫起床,這點不好｡
Such a amazing location for our team who really requires a great MRT transportation.Really decent price for us.Everything is cool and available!環境都很好,一切都很讚!
The most i like is very very convenient.  Mrt is just beside the building and restaurant also nearby. Comfortable. Washing machine,water, hanger, towel, tv , wifi all provided. Nice to stay there.
Location that give you very convenient to access Mrt that is just beside the building and you have convenient store and restaurant just right opposite. Clean and comfortable and Wifi is provided.
清潔舒適,交通便利
The apartment is in a very good location with clean spacious area inside.

Location: 
Excellent - Just outside the exit of YMT MTR. Can't ask for more.

Apartment:
Good - Within expectation. Considering that scarce-space in HK, this apartment space is quite decent. 2 bathrooms are fine (just the lighting in the main bathroom is abit dim).

Host:
Never met the host, but met her employee. No much problem taking over and handing over the apartment. The only downside might be that the host & her employee might not be well-versed in english, so for non-mandarin or non-cantonese speaker, there might be some communication problem. However, this is small issue in my opinion.

The host also allowed us to deposit the luggage at a reception of a hotel (2 levels below), which is good. Appreciate it.

Others:
Really appreciate the water dispensing machine. This makes life easy, I don't need to get water from the convenient stores (which is very near also).

Overall, I had a good experience with this apartment.
when we arrived at A2 exit of Yamei tei staion I called and he came and greeted us.

交通非常方便,就在油麻地地铁站A2口出来便看到,楼下就是佐敦道｡
吃东西也很方便,房间干净整洁,这次是带家里人过来的,家里人全部都很喜欢｡
離地鐵站超近 ,非常方便的住所｡
Apartment location is great for shopping and food. Transport is convenient to go many places.

The apartment is a very decent sized apartment considering how small apartments can be in Hong Kong.  There were too bathrooms, but we did not know one was inside the bedroom with the bunk beds.  It worked out fine for our group of 6, but might not have worked out as well if everyone was going to share the bathroom.  We needed a second set of keys and she was able to arrange for someone to drop them off. Although we never got to meet 文文, she was always within reach via (Hidden by Airbnb) . Every time I had a question/concern whether before or during the trip, I was able to get a response soon.  The apartment looks just as it does in the pictures.  The air conditioner in one of the bedrooms can be a bit loud, but being we were exhausted from our days out, it was not a problem.  The kitchen light was dim and a little dirty but there was no need for us to cook since we ate out every meal. Very central apartment, without being on a loud and crowded street.  A couple minutes walk to Temple St, Ladies Market, convenience stores, etc. The plus being right across the street from the Yau Ma Tei station exit B.  We enjoyed our stay overall, and would definitely rent again and recommend to those wanting the real Hong Kong experience!
交通位置真的很方便,地铁口上来就是｡唯一问题就是我们人稍多 住着真的有点挤｡
지하철 입구 바로 앞이라서 교통이 무척 편리합니다~
位置非常的方便,楼下就是油麻地地铁口,几个人一起住还是挺不错的｡大环镜来说不错的,小细节呢就｡｡厕所有味道,房间用的枕头及被套质量比较差｡卫生还是差了点｡

Good location, really convenient, the apartment is quite big comparing with the others in hk the host is nice and always pending on our needs, the apartment is quite clean in all aspects perfect place for a big group to stay.

Nice place and very strategic if you plan to go shopping. Just a couple of minutes walk to Mongkok Ladies' Market. It's also very easy to find: Look left when you emerge from the YauMaTei A2 exit. Owner was very considerate and allowed us to leave our stuffs until late in the afternoon of our departure date. This place is big by Hong Kong standards. Just perfect for a big family or group. 

Highly Recommended! Two thumbs up!
It was pretty great house for a big family to stay for a couple days. A gas stove not working and a small toilet was a bit uncomfortable but overall there was no problem.
房間跟照片上的一模一樣,住的很舒適,日用品很齊全;交通非常方便,一走出去就是地鐵站,附近的生活機能很好,感謝房東的招待!!

The location was convenient. But the house was not clean. The air conditioners were very noisy. At night, we can clearly hear the noises from outside. The bathroom at living hall was very smelly. The house also dusty. No place to hang the wet clothes. All the corners area does not clean properly.
The house was ok. Same as listed. Conveniently located near shopping ares. The host was attentive to our needs. Just left the keyd and did not bother us anymore..

- 9 night stay, family of 8, ages 12+

PROS: 
- extremely convenient location to the MTR (1min) and the area is great! We walked to Mong Kok area, and to TST.
- Comfortably fit 8 
- 2 showers 
- person took out trash everyday, and changed the sheets the day before checkout. 
- photos accurate. Large space for hk standards, and wasn't too rundown 
- cheaper to taxi from the airport with a large party ($300HKD/taxi)
- A/C sound not an issue 
- safe area, secure building 

CONS: 
- only English via airbnb website. 
- Door lock was broken (now fixed), but wasted afternoon waiting for person to fix it
- WIFI didn't work for many days (messaged to fix, but it took 4 days)
- asked to open water valve for toilet, but the toilet still took time to refill before we could flush (not convenient when you have lots of people)
-  found a couple of cockroaches
- futon isn't the comfiest, but for kids it is fine
- first bathroom door does not close
- first bathroom had a foul odour, which gave a funky smell in the first bedroom. 

Overall, we lasted the 9 days.
Cozy room for friends or family with essential amenities and very close to MRT Yau Ma Tei.

Pros:
Super professional, responsive, friendly, accommodating and impressive host - got a replacement fridge and induction oven only a couple hours after the old ones broken.
Exceptional location, close to most places we need to go. On top of MTR station.
Availability of good quality bathroom amenities including towels, shampoo and shower gel and Comfortable beds.

Cons:
1962 Building and it shows: electric circuits not in the prime condition, public area of the building is not clean. Elevator failed at least once during our stay.
Circuit breaker tripped multiple times daily until the second last day of our stay when it is finally fixed.
There was once water heater circuit breaker tripped during shower.
