Water heater run out of hot water in 3 minutes when weather is cold.
Flip side of convenience is excessive noise, but still within acceptable limits

name: New Furnishings! Very Private! Great Deal! GC 137
summary: Fabulous value in Wailea resort! If you want the perfect and spacious 2 bed/2 bath condo that is tastefully decorated, complete privacy and serenity and a lanai surrounded with lush shrubbery, THIS IS IT! Bright and airy, this unit is located in a quiet, ground floor, private location on the cul de sac. Tile throughout the dining to living areas and carpeting in the bedroom. Check out the recent pictures of the slide show listed on this AirBnb. Hawaii Tax ID #: (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)
space: The lanai overlooks beautiful garden & mountain views, Peek-a- boo Ocean and partial Fairway views. The ground floor makes this unit an easy access to the parking area. This spacious ground floor unit has all the amenities you will need for your vacation. It provides an easy access to any of beautiful Grand Champions Pool, JACUZZI, and popular barbecue area. Great for families and couples too. PLEASE NOTE: AirBnB is unable to charge the required Hawaii State Tax, so please be aware that there is a tax of 14.42% on the nightly rate. This will be due prior to arrival and you will receive a separate invoice from our company with all taxes included.
description: Fabulous value in Wailea resort! If you want the perfect and spacious 2 bed/2 bath condo that is tastefully decorated, complete privacy and serenity and a lanai surrounded with lush shrubbery, THIS IS IT! Bright and airy, this unit is located in a quiet, ground floor, private location on the cul de sac. Tile throughout the dining to living areas and carpeting in the bedroom. Check out the recent pictures of the slide show listed on this AirBnb. Hawaii Tax ID #: (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) The lanai overlooks beautiful garden & mountain views, Peek-a- boo Ocean and partial Fairway views. The ground floor makes this unit an easy access to the parking area. This spacious ground floor unit has all the amenities you will need for your vacation. It provides an easy access to any of beautiful Grand Champions Pool, JACUZZI, and popular barbecue area. Great for families and couples too. notes: PLEASE NOTE: AirBnB is unable to charge the required Hawaii State Tax, so please be aware that there is a tax of 14.42% on the nightly rate. This will be due prior to arrival and you will receive a separate invoice from our company with all taxes included.
transit: We recommend getting a rental car during your stay.
access: Two property pools to choose from, Wailea Blue Golf Course in your back yard, Wailea Tennis Club next door, snorkeling, fishing, biking, zip-lining, whale watching, hiking and horseback riding are just a few of the many adventures you will find nearby. Walk to the nearby Shops at Wailea for great shopping (Louis Vuitton, Gucci, Tiffany & Co., Prada, Gap, Billabong, BCBG, Banana Republic, Tori Richard, Tommy Bahama, and more). Enjoy casual and fine dining restaurants close by. Some of our favorites: Spago, Tommy Bahama's Restaurant and Bar, Pint & Cork, Ko, Matteo's Osteria, Fabiani's.
interaction: We are available 24/7 during your stay for any questions, concerns, or emergency issues. We are also happy to help you plan some fun activities during your stay!
house_rules: *PLEASE NOTE: AirBnB is unable to charge the required Hawaii State Tax, so please be aware that there is a tax of 14.42% on the nightly rate. This will be due prior to arrival and you will receive a separate invoice from our company with all taxes included.

reviews.comments: Best AirBnb experience so far! No issues at all. Everything was fine.

We had a fabulous and comfortable stay at Grand Champions! The unit was accurately depicted (actually looked even better in person) with beautiful furnishings and equipped with all the essentials for added comfort and convenience! It is private and in an excellent location within the GC community. A beautiful gift basket was awaiting our arrival. Check-in is a breeze. The lanai faces an amazing garden with views of the mountain and a peek-a-boo view of the ocean. Kitchen is well stocked for cooking if you so choose. The master bath has an amazing walk-in shower. The pools are beautiful and the grilling areas are kept clean. Some very nice beaches nearby and a great central location to get around the entire island by car. Host Amanda represents the best of hospitality; friendly, responsive, and professional! Will definitely recommend and come back again.
Amanda was great! We loved the grand champions villas and was surprised by how close it was to everything.
Very nice condo with 2 full baths and walk in shower!  Gift basket on arrival was an unexpected nice touch.   The wall mirror makes the mail room look really big.   We will be back soon!
The hosts were very responsive.  Unit was very quiet.

Beautiful place very clean and more that we expect very convenient with beach chair umbrella and beach towels. 
We will comeback and stay in the unit #137 . Very close to everything and Amanda is a very nice host ! My friends really love it !
Overall a great place
G

Excellent location, close to shops and great beaches.  We had a minor cleaning issue when we arrived, but CBI was very responsive and addressed it promptly.  The unit was well equipped with furnishings that met our needs.  The pool access, parking, and check-in was seemless.  We enjoyed our stay.

Thank you to a wonderful host! The place was immaculate and beautiful decor nice island touches. The master shower is so spacious. Location was ideal close to shopping and beaches and easy to explore the island. Looking forward to our next vacation!! Mahalo!

This unit is at the ground floor and there is another unit above it. The area is very quiet. Very short drive to the shopping resort area and the beaches. Rental car is highly recommended.
The unit comes with a dishwasher, washer and dryer, and even a juice blender. There are two bedrooms and two shower rooms. The main walk-in shower room is very pleasant to use, especially with young kids. 
The management company is professional, always fast to respond and very supportive during our few weeks stay. 
We would definitely come back again!

This place was beautiful and so centrally located. We loved that everything was either a quick drive or in some cases walkable. If we ever get a chance to get back to Maui, we would want to stay here.

name: Quaint Polynesian Style Cabin on a Working Farm
summary: This adorable cabin includes a cute bathroom complete with shower/toilet/vanity.  The walk-in closet is a nice touch to store away personals. There is a sitting area, the sleeping area, the outdoor kitchen and a shaded patio that serves as an outdoor living room.  Views of the ocean, the Hawi windfarm, Maui all set on a working farm just a short walk from downtown Hawi!  The décor is set in a Polynesian style, bright, cheerful, and peace filled.  Wifi enabled.  Created with Pure Aloha!
space: This cabin is designed with the invitation to enjoy the outdoors more.  The outdoor patio has complete living room style Hawaiian lifestyle furnishings so sprawling out in leisure is just waiting out the front door.  There is a table and chairs on the lawn, or sit and dine at the nook on the lanai.  The kitchen is fully functional and provides for easy preparation of meals. Everything needed to prepare fine cuisine is present short of a full sized oven. Designed for one person or a couple, this space is relatively private from the other dwellings and provides for a real Hawaii-feel stay.  It is constructed in the single wall style relative to the Big Island, and provides for excellent ventilation inside.  The Living Room is under the shade canopy which functions as a weather barrier so that even in the worst of weather, a meal can still be prepared and enjoyed outside.  Due to the nature of wildlife and pest intrusion, we ask those staying with us not to bring the food inside the cabin
description: This adorable cabin includes a cute bathroom complete with shower/toilet/vanity.  The walk-in closet is a nice touch to store away personals. There is a sitting area, the sleeping area, the outdoor kitchen and a shaded patio that serves as an outdoor living room.  Views of the ocean, the Hawi windfarm, Maui all set on a working farm just a short walk from downtown Hawi!  The décor is set in a Polynesian style, bright, cheerful, and peace filled.  Wifi enabled.  Created with Pure Aloha! This cabin is designed with the invitation to enjoy the outdoors more.  The outdoor patio has complete living room style Hawaiian lifestyle furnishings so sprawling out in leisure is just waiting out the front door.  There is a table and chairs on the lawn, or sit and dine at the nook on the lanai.  The kitchen is fully functional and provides for easy preparation of meals. Everything needed to prepare fine cuisine is present short of a full sized oven. Designed for one person or a couple, this space is
neighborhood_overview: This is the best way I can describe to you what we have here! (URL HIDDEN) Copy and paste this URL into your browser and enjoy the short video.
notes: There is no housekeeping service; however, we ask our guests to leave their rubbish outside daily for us to pick up. Extra sheets, blankets, and pillows are available upon request.  Standard bathroom amenities with shower and tub. Because this is rural Hawaii, the internet as well as television may become intermittent or not functional at all.  The Utility companies work quickly to restore services so these outages generally are short.
transit: There is a bus service that runs Monday through Saturday with two pick up and delivery times right up at the end of the street on the Highway.  Other than that, there is no place to rent vehicles, motorbikes, mopeds, or bicycles here in Hawi.  All this is best done in at your point of arrival.  We suggest that your most affordable purchases would be in Kona so should you choose to stay with us, it is recommended that you do your shopping in town, purchase a bag of ice to keep things fresh while you travel in, and enjoy the scenery and the ride as you make your way towards the Golden Kohala Coast!
access: Guests have access to the unit reserved for their stay.  Visitors are welcome to walk around the farm and to relax beside a coconut tree, to come and to go as necessary.  The Main House is not open to travelers.  The barns, and out buildings are for staff only.  All farm equipment is off-limits.
interaction: We are knowledgeable about things to do, and places to visit.  We have provided a full array of literature depicting the best of adventures and wildlife interests.  Where to go and how to enjoy our island is totally left up to the imagination of our guests.   We stay out of your business unless help or assistance becomes necessary.  Staff is available from 7 am to 9 pm daily.
house_rules: - Medical Cannibas Compliant - No wheelchair access - No Housekeeping Services under 7 day stay - Kona Blend Coffee and Coffee Maker provided - Please leave unit in the condition found, including furniture placement. Sweep and mop floors with the supplies provided to aid us in keeping our costs and fees down for everyone. Wash all dishes, pots, pans, and serving utensils, strip the beds and place linens and used towels on the bathroom floor.  - No visitors without prior approval from management. - This is a working farm.  Farm machinery may begin at 8:00 am and ends by 6:30 PM daily (should complete quiet become an issue please note that this farm is surrounded by farms on all sides and we have no control over the hours of their machinery use.  No local codes require such.  Farming can be a 24hr affair!  YIKES!) - No covered parking - Quiet time after 10pm.

reviews.comments: A very clean cottage in a secluded farm. We got fresh eggs and muffins from the owner. If you're not afraid of 'water beattles', it's perfect ;)

Stay here if you want a relaxing, beautiful, and unique Hawaiian escape. Wonderful quant town with plenty of nearby beaches and great sight seeing. The farm is lush and absolutely beautiful and everyone is wonderfully hospitable. it made seriously consider moving here.

I had a wonderful peaceful stay, Loved the cute little town about a mile away. Everything was great. I will definitely go back there on future visits and highly recommend this as an alternative to an expensive resort stay.

Great place! As someone who has backpacked Europe and traveled all over the US, I can say this place is outstanding. Affordable price and it still feels like a hotel. You get your own cabin, so nice privacy. Everything feels like brand new, very clean. Les worked hard to attend my necessities and communication was never an issue. Beware that it's a very rainy place, so I'd recommend bringing your umbrella. Location is not prime, so you will need a car... But I kinda enjoyed being away from all the madness. Overall, you will get your money worth it.

L'emplacement était parfait, un petit chez soi sur une ferme. Rev. Lev. nous a très bien accuilli avec des fruits frais et des oeufs. Le village de Hawi est a quelques minutes à pieds et on peut y trouver des belles petites boutiques et de très bons restaurents.

The place is really lovely. The sleeping area is clean and comfortable and the outdoor kitchen and lounging area made it possible to spend much of the time enjoying the fresh air and beautiful landscape. It's a little ways to town but a nice walk. I forgot an item there and they were very helpful in arranging to get it back.
beauiful setting,outside kitchen,lover our stay there

What a treat to have found Rev. Les' cabin... arriving there after a long day of solo travel in planes and cars I felt like I found a sanctuary. 
The cabin is very tidy, and everything is new and well maintained. The bed firm and very comfortable, I slept very well the three nights I was there. 
Although Rev Les informed me of possible daytime farm equipment noises, I never heard them as I was gone most of the days. The nights were quiet except for occasional rains when windows must be closed, there is a fan that keeps things cool and air circulating. This area of the Big Island is lush and tropical and with that beauty comes an abundance of life, so attention must be taken when preparing or storing any kind of food, as the ants will be quick to make an appearance. Sweet Hawi town is nearby with all its charms, and has a lovely Saturday farmer's market under the shade of a massive banyon tree. The fresh organic farm eggs Rev Les left for me were so appreciated, and the kitchen did provide for all I needed to fry them up for a delicious (Website hidden by Airbnb) were the kind and helpful communications I received from Rev Les. Mahalo for a delightful first stay on the Big Island! c:

Situated on a small farm, it is very convenient to Hawi.  Only about a mile, so you can walk to town if you like.  There are a few roosters in the area but otherwise was quiet and peaceful.  I'd never used an outdoor kitchen before but it worked great.  Patio furniture and table on the lawn in front of the cottage provides lots of outdoor living. The bathroom is small but clean and like new.  We'll be back.
Great place to stay, enjoyed the view from our room.

I highly recommend staying here if you want a peaceful and tranquil stay.  The farm Les lives on is full of fresh fruit and the sound of the trees moving in the fast wind is therapeutic. I will definitely be back for some more paradise.
Great place on a working farm, nice & peaceful, with a nice outdoor kitchen area with all the utensils & cookware you'll need. But bring your own food.  Would definitely stay again.  :-)
Highly recommend. Very private and comfortable

Rev. Les''s place is super, its a working farm and you have plenty of privacy at your own little cabin, there are a few on the property.  Everyone is so nice and its a great starting point to explore Hawi and Pololu valley.

The cottage is very neat and clean, like new actually.  It is quiet and yet close to Hawi town.  Nice yard with comfy outdoor furniture and shade awning.  This was our 2nd stay with Rev. Les.  Great communication and he is very quick to respond to any need.
This little cabin was perfect. It was super clean, the bed was great, and the bathroom was nicely renovated.
Rent this place!  If you are looking to explore the North Kohala coast there is so much to do, or not.  And Rev's cottage is perfect for both.

Rev. Les was a great host, greeting us upon arrival and available when needed. Communication throughout was great. The place was super clean and cozy. We would always come back and explore more of the northern part of the island.
Nice spot, beautiful birds and quiet. In a lovely town with lots to do.

My fiancee and I visited Hawi and staying at Rev. Les's gave us a great home base for exploring the surrounding area. The property is nice and felt secure with the gated entrance. The cabin was super cozy and felt like home while we were there with plenty of space and a very comfy bed. 
Rev. Les was responsive and a pleasure to talk to when we met him. We will look back fondly on our stay in Hawi and would love to come back!

Rev Les’ place is simple but super clean and cute. I enjoyed sitting outside to read. The property is gated and he area is very quiet and safe. The nice breeze at night helped me to fall asleep easily. I enjoyed relaxing in Hawaiian lifestyle there.

What a beautiful place for a relaxing time.  Rev Les was a sweetheart from start to finish and his furry hosts as well as the people working on the farm were very kind and fun to chat with as well.  Honey Girl (the golden) was a sweet greeter, but also so well trained that she wouldn't come inside.  So you can have all the pup you want.

For the price, you kind of wonder what you're getting.  The place was immaculate, tastefully decorated and made it easy to relax and enjoy the place.  Its an amazing value and more that I could have expected.  

There is construction and farming going on so its not like the Disneylandia properties of some resorts.  Its got natural beauty of a farm with ocean views, big sky & bright stars and really quiet at night.  

Les's place a good home base for exploring northern and mid island.  We only stayed two nights as we stayed at several places around the island.  Wish we had stayed another night.

The host was also very generous with products grown on the farm.  Mahalo nui loa Rev Les!  We'll be back and be sure to recommend.  Your place was a great place to relax and recharge.  Our hearts are happier having stayed with you.  Thanks for the good company.
Very comfortable place to stay on the North end of Big Island. Cooler nights may for comfortable sleeping yet only a 20 min drive to sunny beaches. We will be back.
Quiet room as described and good location.

Rev. Les is a very warm and friendly host, the bed is very comfortable, and the 1/2 dozen fresh eggs were most welcome — but because access is a bit difficult you should definitely get there before nightfall. I made the mistake of arriving too late, and ended up running over a few of the Rev.’s orchids and knocking my car’s side mirror out of joint on a hibiscus bush.  Everything was fine the next day however, after we met Dr.Les and got to know and love Hawi. P.S. thanks for the duct tape!
Beautiful combination of indoor and outdoor spaces. All the comforts of home with breezes, fresh air, birds singing, and blue ocean in distance. A special place.
Very cozy, typical, cute place. Would definitely go back!

Wir haben unseren Aufenthalt sehr genossen und können die Cabin empfehlen. Sie ist sehr gemütlich und schön eingerichtet mit kleinem Abstellraum und separatem sauberem Badezimmer. Die Küche befindet sich auf der Veranda. Die Wiese mit teils überdachtem Sonnensegel vor der Cabin war nur für uns zugänglich. Rev Les hat immer prompt und freundlich geantwortet. Wir haben ihn in 14 Tagen nie gesehen. Vor der Buchung sollte man die Lage und das damit verbundene Wetter bedenken. Danke. Mahalo.

The bungalow is small but provided ample space for the 2 of us.  Everything seems very new and well maintained.  The outdoor kitchen is small but very well stocked with pots and pans and did not need more space to prepare a meal.  Great place to listen to nature and enjoy lots of peace and quiet.  Note that Rev. Les asks that you clean the bathroom, sweep the floor, strip the bed  and leave the kitchen area cleaned up before you leave.  Takes about 20 mins.  Enjoyed our time here and got to explore the area.

Rev. Les's place was in a perfect location for me as I was there as a teaching artist to work with students at a local elementary school.  The cabin is basic and rustic.  Spacious enough for 1-2 people.  As the description says, it is located in a working farm so it's natural to see insects, roosters going off in the early hours, breeze of fresh manure here and there.  Cooking/"kitchen" setup is outside the cabin on the porch so it feels like luxury camping too.  Very quiet and green all around.  Very close to charming Hawi town and Kappau town.

I highly recommend this lovely cabin. It is comfortable and easy to live in, and feels very private. The outdoor kitchen on the balcony is great for morning coffee! Rev. Les is very responsive with communication.
We were about a mile from restaurants... an easy walk into a charming little town. This is a place I would love to visit again.
The place is simply amazing, very quiet an the cabin is very well equipped! I would definetely stay here again.
This is a lovely getaway for anyone so you can peace and comfort.

This cabin is so quaint and perfect! Although the other houses on property are closer than I expected we didn’t hear any sound other than the wind and birds outside. Very walkable area and right down the street from the Hawi shops. I would definitely recommend anyone wanting a peaceful, quaint place to experience north Kohala to stay here.
Great place. Best from where we stayed so far in Hawaii. I would choose it again.
We were very comfortable at this location. The surrounding plants and trees were beautiful! Always a cool breeze captured by the large windows.
Beautiful place. I wished I could’ve stayed longer.

wonderfully quaint, beautiful, clean, quiet, private little cabin. Very Hawaii! This was such a special little place to stay for our first visit to the Big Island. Rev. Les was quick to respond to any of our requests but we also had complete privacy. The cabin was adorable and we had everything we needed. Hawi is also a very cute little town!

Les couldn’t have been a more gracious, welcoming and jovial host. His farm and the quaint Polynesian cabin are a delightful getaway place away from the well-trodden paths on the Big Island. Les was kind enough to tell us about his farm operation and show us around. He offered helpful suggestions and historical anecdotes which you can only get from a true local.
The quaint Polynesian cabin invites you to come back and stay longer. I can only wholeheartedly recommend Les’s place.

This place is nice. Little, quiet and clean. For the price, it doesn’t get much better than this. When you’re not there, Rev asks you to keep the windows shut. This makes the place very hot when you return but once you open the windows up, turn the fan on and just chill out, you’re able to acclimate quickly. It’s Hawaii so the heat and humidity is just a part of the experience. Rev was quick to respond to any questions I had and the gate/keypad access made us feel safe and secure. Overall, a great little place!

My girlfriend and I stayed here for a spontaneous trip to Hawaii in October. The place is actually much bigger than the pictures show. It's very clean, the covered outdoors seating area is a nice place to sit in the afternoon and enjoy a drink. Hawi was a perfect location on Big Island, about an hour from Kona where we did some surfing and snorkeling and about an hour from Wai'pio Valley where we did some hiking. I don't think you could find a better deal on the island, honestly. Would definitely stay here again!

The best.

Excellent value for money, incredibly accommodating host, beautiful property.

Very clean, homie feeling studio! The kitchen is outside of the room which leads to a great view of the yard and garden for great outdoor dining experience. Has a bit of spider webs in certain areas so watch your head! The owner response fairly quickly too if you need to get in contact with him! Would 100% stay here again :)

there were so many good things about our experience in this location; but I will only mention the three most important factors that made it so great 

1. the host- Les is a wonderful host and he doesn't ignore any of your needs, he was always helpful and answered almost immediately to any of our messages or requests

2. the farm- My wife and I loved walking around the land just enjoying the scenery and picking starfruit or papayas every once in a while, i was also very fascinated how everything grows on land that is actually lava rock and learned how pineapples are grown

3. the cabin- it was really clean, really comfortable, we decided to just chill there thru the weekend instead of driving around to the beaches or other scenic location like we have done the rest of the week; it basically became part of our hawaiian experience rather then just a stop-over for the night like we originally planned
Great place for the money.
Cozy place on a quaint farm, close to town, and private space. We had a great time staying at Rev Less’ place.
Beautiful place in a very quiet setting. Rev. Les is super responsive and generous.
Affordable and comfortable. A great place to stay in the Kohala area.

We were very happy with the accommodation and the town of Hawi.  Rev Les is a great character and we enjoyed his hospitality.  He was very accommodating and so was his staff on the farm.  The bird life and critter noises around the farm were fantastic to listen to and we enjoyed picking a few starfruit and oranges.  The outdoor kitchen was adequate and great quality stuff to work with. The location is awesome, super close to Hawi and a nice quiet, rural road down to the farm.  So far, this is our favourite area of the Big Island.

Delightful cottage near Hawi Town.  Quaint farm setting.  Clean room, easy to figure out things.  Rev Les introduced us to his orchard, where we found Papaya for breakfast, along with his free range chicken eggs provided in our kitchen.  It is important to note the outdoor kitchen may be drafty and damp in a downpour- of  course, but it was very nice when the weather was pleasant..

it was great!!!
not one regret.
We loved waking up to sounds of birds, roosters and a distant cow or calf; no traffic noise other than farm ATV.

This place is very special! I expected something very rustic and cabin-like, but this place was like a beautiful little hotel room that happened to be in a cabin. It feels new and fresh and clean. I loved the camping aspect of the kitchen on the front porch, and it was a very well-equipped kitchen. The setting is beautiful and you get the farm feel, especially hearing the roosters in the morning. It's green and lush and private. The location is perfect for visiting the Kohala Coast beaches. Hawi is a darling little town with a few great restaurants and it's also close to the Polalu Valley and Waimea. I would definitely book this place again!
Nice rural setting, good dogs, chickens and fresh eggs. Thanks to the Rev..

name: V3旺角地鐵公交近在咫尺/購物首選/窗戶陽光充沛/精裝修乾淨舒適雙人房
summary: ❤️Royal Hotel位于香港九龍旺角最繁榮的彌敦道上｡處與旺角中心位置,距離旺角地鐵站和太子站步行3分鐘｡地點適中,離九龍法國醫院及浸會醫院只需十分钟車程｡附近生活條件豐富,鄰近5分鐘步程就有香港聞名的旺区通菜街(女人街)､西洋菜街(电器街)､洗衣街(波鞋街)､先達廣場､朗豪坊及多個潮流購物商場等｡附近更有很多各國餐厅､银行､找換店､便利店等生活設施,絕對是你来港尋求美食､觀光､娛樂及公幹的必須高性價比宾馆民宿｡另外,3分鐘可至中港巴士站､粵港通巴士站､機場巴士站､而且治安良好沒有閒雜人等,酒店內裝修精緻新穎整潔,令您住得安心舒適!
space: ❤️Royal Hotel have 7 rooms and all they have the priviate bathroom. Our staff clean the rooms before check in(only clean before check in not everyday) to guarantee each guest a clean and comfortable accommodation. We aim at giving the most valuable service to our guests. We handle tons of problem so everything just contact us you will get a satisfactory answer.   皇室共有7個帶獨立衛生間的房間,為了住戶能有一個乾淨舒適的環境, 每次入住前(入住前進行一次深度清潔,但不是每一天)都會有工作人員進行清潔｡且為了保證空氣的清新和流通,每間房間都安裝了排氣通風設備｡此外各项設施都運作良好,房間清潔舒適｡所有用品,毛巾,盥洗用具及設備都洁白如新,适合對住房環境及舒適度具要求的旅客｡在入主後有任何問題,歡迎您與我們聯繫,我們將盡力給您最滿意的答案｡  This room's Special Part  1.Room includes private bathroom&toilet.  2.A double bed(140cm*190cm)  3.The home area is about 6-7 square meters(Because of the premium in Hong Kong ,both the house prices and rentzs are expensive,rooms are generally small,our rooms was no exception)  4.Free WIFI is provided.  5.TV with rich tv programs.  6.24 hours hot water.  1.此房間有獨立浴室和洗手間  2.雙人床(140cm*190cm).房間大小約為6-7平方米(因香港地少人多,昂貴的房價和租金導致人均居住普遍很小,我們的房間也不例外)
description: ❤️Royal Hotel位于香港九龍旺角最繁榮的彌敦道上｡處與旺角中心位置,距離旺角地鐵站和太子站步行3分鐘｡地點適中,離九龍法國醫院及浸會醫院只需十分钟車程｡附近生活條件豐富,鄰近5分鐘步程就有香港聞名的旺区通菜街(女人街)､西洋菜街(电器街)､洗衣街(波鞋街)､先達廣場､朗豪坊及多個潮流購物商場等｡附近更有很多各國餐厅､银行､找換店､便利店等生活設施,絕對是你来港尋求美食､觀光､娛樂及公幹的必須高性價比宾馆民宿｡另外,3分鐘可至中港巴士站､粵港通巴士站､機場巴士站､而且治安良好沒有閒雜人等,酒店內裝修精緻新穎整潔,令您住得安心舒適! ❤️Royal Hotel have 7 rooms and all they have the priviate bathroom. Our staff clean the rooms before check in(only clean before check in not everyday) to guarantee each guest a clean and comfortable accommodation. We aim at giving the most valuable service to our guests. We handle tons of problem so everything just contact us you will get a satisfactory answer.   皇室共有7個帶獨立衛生間的房間,為了住戶能有一個乾淨舒適的環境, 每次入住前(入住前進行一次深度清潔,但不是每一天)都會有工作人員進行清潔｡且為了保證空氣的清新和流通,每間房間都安裝了排氣通風設備｡此外各项設施都運作良好,房間清潔舒適｡所有用品,毛巾,盥洗用具及設備都洁白如新,适合對住房環境及舒適度具要求的旅客｡在入主後有任何問題,歡迎您與我們聯繫,我們將盡力給您最滿意的答案｡  This room's Special Part  1.Room includes private bathroom&toilet.  2.A double bed(140cm*190cm)  3.The home area is about 6-7 square meters(Because of the premium in Hon
neighborhood_overview: ❤️Amazing location next to Mongkok MRT. You can go anywhere with convenience;8 minutes walk to MRT,neighborhood is full of famous tourist attractions and shopping areas such as ladies' Market(Tung Choi street),Electrical Street (Sai Yeung Choi Street),Sportwear Street(Fa Yuen Street)and many giant shopping malls.Also,there is many famous different restaurant,banks,shops and convenience stores within walking distance of the hostal making it a prime location to stay. 緊鄰旺角/太子地鐵站(三分鐘),出行十分方便｡周邊是香港著名的旅遊景點和購物熱點,女人街(通菜街)､電子街(西洋菜街)､波鞋街(花園街)還有很多的大型購物商場,例如新城市廣場,朗豪坊｡除此之外,還有很多很多不同的出名的餐廳､銀行､商店都可步行到達｡
notes: ❤️1.Please switch off the powers before leaving. 2.Smoking in anywhere inside the hotel can activate the fire extinguishing system and subject to a penalty of $1500 for this accidental activation of the system.  3.All the things in the room are belong to the hotel pls don't take away. 4.Please take care of your own personal belongings.  5.Please keep quiet and clean.  6. Check in :15:00pm     Check out: 12:00pm  If need to deposit your luggage pls contact with the host.  1.外出前請關閉所有電器(拔出房卡).  2.在走廊,部分房間嚴禁吸煙,如觸動消防系統,該住客會被罰款1500元｡  3.請照顧好個人財務｡ 4.店內所有用品均為本店所有,請勿帶走｡  5.請保持安靜和地方清潔｡  6.Check in :15:00pm  Check out: 12:00pm
transit: ❤️地鐵路線: 1.地鐵九龍線旺角地鐵站A1出口(快富街)左邊向太子方向步行3分钟即可达｡  2.地鐵路線:地鐵九龍線旺角地鐵站A2出口往右手邊方向步行3分钟即可达｡  3.地鐵路線:地鐵九龍線太子地鐵站c1出口往右手邊方向步行3分钟即可达｡  機場路线:從機場乘巴士A21,E21及N21(通宵班次)-旺角維景酒店站下車(步行3分钟)｡ MTR: 1.Get out from Mongkok A1 exit (Fife street) turn left and go straight along Prince Edward.(3 minutes) 2.Get out from Mongkok A2 exit go straight along right side.(3 minutes) 3. Get out from Prince Edward C1 exit go straight along right side.(3 minutes) Airport line: Take the airport bus A21/E21/N21(24 hours) drop at Mongkok METROPARK HOTEL ,3 minutes walk to our apartment.
access: ❤️INCLUDED WITH YOUR STAY  All bedding,cotton linen and fresh towels in room air conditioning  Unlimited high speed Wi-Fi Internet  Hairdryer available in the living room Shampoo and body lotion are provided in the bathroom.  Iron and water machine available in the corridor.  Adapter for charger is in the room. Toothbrush and toothpaste need to prepare by yourself.  所有床上用品､毛巾等都保證乾淨  無限制WIFi使用 電吹風在房間的抽屜裡  洗髮水和沐浴露在洗手間裡 插頭轉換器在房間裡 牙膏牙刷需要自己準備  You will received your own privacy in our apartment and will be able to come and go as you need to ,there are no curfews,only complete flexibility.  我們沒有門禁,您可自由出入｡出門時請隨身帶好房卡｡ Detail check in and check out fingerpost will send you after booking. 詳細的入住信息待您確認入住後會發送給你｡
interaction: ❤️SERVICE PROMISE  1. Cleanliness  2. Shower room and Toliets ､Bedroom will be deeply cleaned on your check-in date as well as on a weekly basis during your stay.  3. Communication All SMS will be replied within 30 minutes maximum,for urgent situation please call directly.  服務承諾 1.住户入住前保证房间干净整洁,所有床上用品已更换｡  2.浴室和洗手间,睡房都会在您入住前整理完毕｡  3.所有的资讯都会在三十分钟内得到回复｡
house_rules: -請好好愛惜公寓物品,保持房間清潔,如發現有公寓物品被損壞,損壞的成本將會由住客承擔｡ -請必須妥善保管自己的貴重財物,我們不會對遺失的財物負責及賠償｡ -我們希望每名住客都能有個舒適寧靜的睡眠環境,所以請住客於晚上10時後,盡量把聲浪降低｡ -請保管好匙卡,出門前拔出房卡,保持所有電器為關閉狀態｡

address.street: 旺角, 旺角, Hong Kong

reviews.comments: The host is a nice and helpful woman. Overall the room is new, clean and neat.It is small but most hotels in HK are just like that.

Miss Wan is an amazing & friendly host. Communicating with her was real easy & very responsive. The location is convenient with transport, food & services readily available in the neighborhood. Night market is incredibly fun in this area. I'll be back again!
在香港遇到了很多态度不好的店,但这家的态度非常不一样,很亲切很热情｡酒店因为在市中心,所以这个价位来说性价比还是比较高的,离旺角和太子地铁站都很近,附近也比较热闹｡还是比较推荐的
地處旺角金輪大廈 距離地鐵站還是挺近的 就是位置有點不大好找 房東還貼心來接我們~房間稍小 但是感覺挺乾淨的 物品也齊全 還不錯｡
房东人很好,是个漂亮的姐姐,会主动问有没有需要帮助的,房间大小在香港属于正常,V7就比较大,有窗,蛮干净的｡
The room size is relatively small, but it is well-maintained with amenities for your stay. The water pressure in the bathroom and flushing is all great! I would definitely recommend it!

The room is exactly like what is being shown here. HK airbnb cant expect much, the room is small but comfortable. Location is good especially go to 金華冰廳  restaurant. Overall, I am satisfied with this room.
Love this airbnb listing! Miss Wan is super friendly and nice :) Great value & super convient location!!
接待的人很好,能及时联系､确认,地址超级好找且交通便利｡房间比较小,卫生间通风和清洁处理可能需要注意｡
Nice place, nice hostess :) 因为要考试,所以给特意安排了个安静的房间,第二天退房也帮忙延迟到了中午一点,在这里说声谢谢,希望考试可以顺利,如果下次过来旅游还会住在这里｡
谢谢 很好 朋友住过推荐的｡
真的是很棒的店 很干净 位置也不错 留下很多吃的
很好 房东也很耐心 对于我们两个女生来说很安全
酒店位置还蛮容易找的,房东不错,虽住的比较小,但东西很齐全,下次去还会到这里住的嘻嘻
Wan is very helpful and prompt. We enjoyed our stay there.

It's a very strategic place, near to MRT and it's a walkable distance to ladies market as well as sport street.

Room quite small, even can’t open a small luggage inside the room. all what can say just the place near to city area and nearby train station.

Apartment is really close to the mtr and restaurants. Place look the same as shown on the picture. The room is clean and pretty but have to prepare to be a little squeezy with 2 luggage on the floor. Host is really friendly and timely on replying to our message.
很好性价比很高不要错过

check in的方式仿佛在玩密室寻宝 特别神奇好玩!房源的位置所在大楼实在是太不显眼了稍不留神就错过了｡唯一不足的就是房源太小了!可能这个锅要香港的房价来背了

A pretty good location for a short stay. It is within a quick walk to Prince Edward and Mongkok MTR and various flea markets.

Pretty cosy environment with quiet neighbors and 24hr MacDonald, supermarket and chinese medicinal stores just outside the area.
入住方式很像密室解密,走廊也很香｡这次的房间真的很满意,是我在香港住了这么多次最满意的!有窗户!原本因为我自己的疏忽忘记带转换头,拉开柜子里备有转换头真的太棒了｡还有沐浴露跟洗发水也很好｡下次还来这里住｡
交通便利,出行方便
房间紧凑,干净,位置也好找
在闹市区,交通非常方便｡小,很干净｡房东回复也很快｡除了旁边住客会有小吵外,都算满意｡谢谢!
蛮不错的,安全  交通便利  干净整洁 床睡得也很舒服,下次朋友来香港会推荐给朋友
位置超级超级好｡买东西很方便｡根据房东的描述很快就能找到房间｡自主入住也是非常方便｡行李还能寄存｡可以说是非常好啦｡
房东挺热心的,而且房源位置也好找,入住方便,房间比我想象的要干净噢!
地理位置非常好,离旺角站很近,fu lg附近的便利店和购物超级方便,dam房东回复特别及时,入住方式也dd非常棒
挺干净的,虽然房间有点小,不过在香港来说已经挺好了
离地铁口很近,很轻松就能找到的｡虽然房间很小,但是设施方面都很齐全｡入住的时候出现的一点小插曲也很快解决,是个非常好的房源｡推荐入住｡
房东非常非常的好,所有的回复都非常及时❤️民宿在旺角,到旺角附近的一些有名的街道都非常的方便,民宿楼下也有便利店､药店､小吃店等等,总而言之地理位置非常好｡房间比想象中的小很多,但是非常整洁,一些住宿方面的问题也及时得到了房东的回复｡但是房间的隔音效果很差,尤其是遇到相对素质较差的其他住客时,连续两三天在凌晨一两天被吵醒,所以介意这一点的话自己还是要考虑清楚｡

PROS: This is a good place for purely to sleep.  It is at a good location between MTR, multiple convenient store located surrounding it and flea market not far from it. The self laundry locates at L1 is also a convenience for those who wants to do their laundry like me. 

CONS: The place can barely fit 2 pax let alone with luggage. I've struggle within the small space to access my luggage and at the same time giving my partner her own space. 1 pax would be just nice for the room instead, my point of view. 

Due to the nature of the small size room, you won't feel comfortable lying in bed/hanging out in the room for 1/2 day just to rest/chill. Instead over time you will slowly develop claustrophobia.  (true story). 

The only ventilation of the room is a 2 x A4 size window and a aircon. Most of the time you will be using aircon and there isn't any air/wind from the window in which your skin will be very dry over time. 

Overall the place is decent if you want to just sleep and move on to the next activities next day and repeat, otherwise it will be just mehhh. 1 pax is recommended per room instead of 2.
还行,落个脚
蛮适合过去游玩的住宿地点,离旺角地铁站很近,房间大小的话我和朋友两个女生住刚刚好,空间有点小,行李箱的话一次只能打开一个,房东回复消息很及时,总之是一次不错的住宿体验
空间虽然小,但这个价格在各方面都很不错了,交通便利,附近有超市,很晚也能找到吃的｡入住有个小问题第二天房东马上就解决了｡

name: Apartamento T4 Praia Azul
summary: Apartamento T4 a 200 metros de praias muito agradáveis com bandeira azul. Bastante espaçoso, em zona muito tranquila (mesmo no Verão), com vistas agradáveis, decoração sóbria e bastante iluminação natural. Próximo do centro da cidade, do Rio Ave e da zona histórica de Vila do Conde
space: A cozinha está equipada com fogão, microondas/grelhador, máquina de lavar roupa e louça. Os quartos anunciados apenas com 1 cama, têm cada um deles 1 cama suplementar de correr, que pode acomodar mais 2 crianças.
description: Apartamento T4 a 200 metros de praias muito agradáveis com bandeira azul. Bastante espaçoso, em zona muito tranquila (mesmo no Verão), com vistas agradáveis, decoração sóbria e bastante iluminação natural. Próximo do centro da cidade, do Rio Ave e da zona histórica de Vila do Conde A cozinha está equipada com fogão, microondas/grelhador, máquina de lavar roupa e louça. Os quartos anunciados apenas com 1 cama, têm cada um deles 1 cama suplementar de correr, que pode acomodar mais 2 crianças. A todos os espaços da casa. Vivo bastante próximo do local, pelo que facilmente poderemos ajudar em caso de necessidade. Linguas faladas: Espanhol, Francês, Inglês. Compreensão de Italiano. Trata-se de zona residencial e de veraneio bastante tranquila, na 2ª linha de mar. Na 1ª linha de mar existe oferta variada de cafés, restaurantes, padaria e discoteca. O prédio confronta a nascente com zona natural sem construções. Supermercado a cerca de 400 metros. Jardim e parque de jogos a 500 metros. Farmác

name: Two rooms with great view sagrada familia
summary: Dos habitaciones, una mediana y otra grande, en un piso bohemio en el centro de Barcelona, a solo dos cuadras de la Espectacular Iglesia de la Sagrada familia, con vistas magnificas!
space: Dos habitaciones, una mediana y otra grande, luminosas, con mucha circulacion de aire, en un piso de 4 habitaciones. Se comparten baño, cocina, y salon comedor. Ofrecemos un desayuno muy basico, que incluye cafe, te, azucar y edulcorantes y leche de almendras :D Tambien estan a disposicion de los huespedes los ingredientes basicos para cocinar, tales como aceites, sal, hierbas aromaticas, y especies. El Parking es publico (no es nuestro, pero esta en los pies del edificio) el precio varia de acuerdo a los dias que se lo reserve. Un dia es 30, dos dias 50, 3 dias 70, etc.. En verano es mejor reservar las plazas, si lo necesita, abonando una parte con anticipación.
description: Dos habitaciones, una mediana y otra grande, en un piso bohemio en el centro de Barcelona, a solo dos cuadras de la Espectacular Iglesia de la Sagrada familia, con vistas magnificas! Dos habitaciones, una mediana y otra grande, luminosas, con mucha circulacion de aire, en un piso de 4 habitaciones. Se comparten baño, cocina, y salon comedor. Ofrecemos un desayuno muy basico, que incluye cafe, te, azucar y edulcorantes y leche de almendras :D Tambien estan a disposicion de los huespedes los ingredientes basicos para cocinar, tales como aceites, sal, hierbas aromaticas, y especies. El Parking es publico (no es nuestro, pero esta en los pies del edificio) el precio varia de acuerdo a los dias que se lo reserve. Un dia es 30, dos dias 50, 3 dias 70, etc.. En verano es mejor reservar las plazas, si lo necesita, abonando una parte con anticipación. El edificio, es una construccion antigua con fachada Catalana, perfecto para sentirse parte de esta ciudad tan particular, con unas hermosas esca
neighborhood_overview: A dos cuadras de la sagrada Familia, en el Barrio de Eixample, un barrio de la  antigua Elite Catalana, central, muy cerca de las principales atracciones turisticas y a 10 cuadras de la playa :D
notes: Pedimos encarecido respeto, tanto para con los otros huespedes, muchos de los cuales vienen a trabajar o conocer Barcelona, y buscan un lugar tranquilo para descansar, como con los vecinos del resto del edifcio. Es por ello que solo se aceptan grupos de personas responsables,  tranquilos, que deseen un lugar acogedor, diferente, alegre, y tipico Catalan.
transit: Muchas lineas de metro y bus, y tambien contamos con aparcamientos para coches en el mismo edificio. (pago)
access: El edificio, es una construccion antigua con fachada Catalana, perfecto para sentirse parte de esta ciudad tan particular, con unas hermosas escaleras de marmol y granito, con barandillas de hierro forjado. Se conservan los detalles de la epoca. Como la mayoria de los edificios, no posee ascensor, lo cual es una bueno escusa para ponerse en forma y hacer un poco ejercicio dia a dia.
house_rules: Es un lugar de descanso, y trabajo, familiar y de espíritu Joven y artista. Es por ello que no aceptamos fiestas dentro del piso, ya que es nuestro propio hogar el que estamos compartiendo. Pedimos mucho respeto por los otros huéspedes, y vecinos del edificio, no pudiéndose hacer ruidos después de las 22 hs. No se permiten visitas El check out es a las 11 am, por razones de seguridad no se permite permanecer ni dejar maletas fuera de ese horario. Ser tranquilos, agradecidos y amables :D No respetar las normas se sancionara con el cobro de una noche extra.

host.host_about:
Hola buenas tardes! Soy una joven bailarina clasica, y con mis amigos hemos deciddo rentar el piso para ahorrar dinero para remodelarlo y comprar mas y mejores muebles, y tambien para organizar un espectaculo artistico para el año 2017.

Asi mismo nos encanta la idea de tener huespedes de todo el mundo, y poder ayudarlos a que su estancia sea la mas grata posible.

En la casa hablamos Español, Ingles, y mi hermano un poquito Griego tambien.

Desde ya gracias por su confianza, y que tengan un grandioso dia.

neighborhood_overview: Ipanema é um dos bairros do Rio de Janeiro mais conhecido e frequentado da cidade. O local de região nobre está localizado na zona sul e é vizinho de outros bairros cariocas famosos, como Copacabana e Leblon. O estilo de vida em Ipanema é leve e boêmio, os bares vivem cheios e as pessoas abandonam as calças jeans para aderirem roupas mais confortáveis e frescas.
transit: A bela e encantadora Praia de Ipanema ficou mundialmente famosa depois de inspirar o compositor Vinícius de Morais na música Garota de Ipanema. O lugar é frequentado dia e noite por turistas e moradores que vão caminhar, praticar esportes, bater papo, andar de bicicleta na ciclovia, tomar água de coco nos quiosques ou apenas apreciar a beleza da praia. O Posto Nove de Ipanema se tornou um ponto de encontro e também um dos melhores pontos da praia carioca, sendo bastante frequentado por jovens e celebridades. A Pedra do Arpoador é um grande ponto turístico que também faz parte da Praia de Ipanema. O lugar tem costume de atrair pessoas para assistir ao pôr do sol.

host.host_about:
Morei quase toda a minha vida no Rio de Janeiro, sou médico e amo minha profissão. Nas horas vagas amo viajar e tenho prazer em receber bons clientes para desfrutar dos meus apartamento onde tento oferecer o melhor suporte para meus clientes, o mesmo suporte que eu gostaria de receber quando estou viajando. Sou grande fã do Rio de Janeiro e espero que gostem tanto quanto eu. 
Meu objetivo é oferecer a melhor experiência no Rio de Janeiro para meus clientes.

Hello I am Gerard, a german guy living in Barcelona for over 20 years now....I used to travel a lot for work reasons and now I would love to make your stay here in Barcelona a great and fantastic experience....

Don´t hesitate in asking us anything you would like to know.

The hosts made our stay feel comfortable, providing all ammenities of the apartment to our complete use (two bathrooms, kitchen, wifi, fridge etc). The housemate Taras wes great. He made us feel like at a friend's house, very kind and helped us a lot, giving us all suggestions and advices needed to make our stay in Barcellona nice! Definitely I would recommend everyone to stay here. Thanks and hope to meet you again in the future!

Thank you Gerard, I will definitely recommend you to others.

We did not meet Gerard but did meet his two associates. Gerard was vacationing when we were in barcelona. There were several challenges but Gerard was very professional about finding us a new place and making it a good stay. For this, we had good feelings and great appreciation. In the end, the new location, while not the sunny, large room was close to the places where two separate friends were staying/living! Again, really appreciated his efforts while he was trying to have a vacation.

Я очень рада, что имела возможность жить в этой комнате. Мне очень понравилось гостеприимство Жерара и его соседей. Хозяин очень доброжелательный и вежливый. Комната находится в удобном районе города. До ближайшего метро Рокфорт 5 минут ходьбы. До станции, с которой отправляются электрички в аэропорт 15 минут. Все достопримечательности находятся очень близко. Рядом много ресторанов, кафе, супермаркет. В то же время, в этом районе не так шумно, как возле Рамбла. Комната выглядит точно так, как на фото. Очень чисто в комнате, в кухне, в санузлах. 
В свой следующий визит в Барселону я опять выберу эту комнату.

Esperienza, ottima, rispetto della privacy è il primo punto a favore. Pulita, piena di sole, e in un punto abbastanza centrale. L'host disponibile e gentile, se dovessi ricapitare a Barcelona sicuramente ritornerei in questa casa. 100punti.
As a first time user of airbnb the benchmark was set high. Clean & comfortable bed, spacious room. Nothing was too much trouble when advice sought .  Thank you for a fantastic stay in Barcelona!

Gerard made us both feel very welcome to his home in Barcelona. He was very warm and friendly and was able to assist with any queries we had about this beautiful city.
Very clean and bright room. We had some issues with the lock to our room which were sorted by Gerard straight away. Would definitely stay here again when travelling back to a Barcelona

Gerard nos recibió cordialmente. Alquilamos la habitación que esta en la foto, con el ropero y la cubrecama de colores. Es espaciosa, da a la calle y esta ventilada y todo muy limpio la casa esta muy bien equipada, tiene lavaropa automáticos y seca ropa. la cocina esta muy bien equipada también y muy buenos baños.  Había más gente que había alquilado habitaciones pero todo bien. Prácticamente coincidimos muy poco en los horarios con lo anfitriones. Pero todo bien. El barrio es tranquilo, se puede caminar de noche sin problemas y hay panaderias, verdulerías, bares y supermercados. Esta a pocas cuadras de la estación Sants y de la parada del Bus City Tour y del metro en Rocafort y la Gran Vía. Para llegar a la rambla hay que caminar unos 25 a 30 minutos

Appartement très bien tenu, chambres spacieuse et propre.
Gérard nous a donné beaucoup d'informations pratiques avant que nous arrivions. Hôte très réactif.
L'appartement est très bien situé, par rapport au centre ville et aux métros.

L'appartamento è pulito, ordinato e corrisponde alla descrizione, la camera è piena di luce, il bagno condiviso non è stato un problema perché l'appartamento è dotato di due bagni e gli ospiti effettuano orari diversi. Abbiamo trascorso una bellissima vacanza anche perché questo appartamento è davvero centrale, collocato in quartiere tranquillo e silenzioso, a 5 minuti dalla stazione della metropolitana... questo ci ha permesso di visitare tutto senza difficoltà. Gerard è molto gentile e riservato, pronto a collaborare quando viene richiesto. Torneremo e consiglieremo sicuramente questo appartamento ai nostri a mici.
Gerard made us feel very welcome. The room was lovely and sunny. The position was very good. We could walk to the Pl. Catalunya and it was near Placa d' Espanya.

Wir hatten im Mai für drei Übernachtungen den big & sunny double bedroom gebucht. Das Zimmer ist sehr schön und hell und für 2 Personen gut geeigenet.
Die Wohnung ist sehr sauber und es gibt ein Bad mit WC und ein separates WC was gut ist, wenn die Wohnung voll belegt ist. Gerard ist ein sehr netter und professioneller Gastgeber. Er gibt den Gästen gute Tips. Die Wohnung liegt in einem ruhigen Wohngebiet. Einkaufen und Essen gehen kann man gut um die Ecke. Die Arena de Barcelona ist nicht weit. Ich würde das Zimmer jederzeit wieder nehmen.

Our stay was amazing in this room! It was the last minute decision the host responded in less than an hour and next day we had moved in. The room is exactly like on the picture. Location is perfect, walking distance to most attraction, otherwise metro station in 3 blocks. If we come back, we will definitely stay there again. Thank you!)

Unser Aufenthalt in Barcelona war sehr schön und gelungen. Die Wohnung liegt in einem schönen Stadtviertel mit vielen kleinen Bars und Cafés in denen man in Kontakt mit Einheimischen kommt (etwas abseits der Touristenmeile ;) , Metro in nächster Nähe. 
Das Zimmer ist (wie auf den Bildern abgebildet) sehr hell und groß. Wir konnten die Küche und Bad sehr flexibel mitbenützen und wir haben uns sehr wohl gefühlt. 
Gerard war uns ein guter Gastgeber und steht mit hilfreichen Tipps und Infos jederzeit zur Verfügung. Absolut herausragend war die schnelle und unkomplizierte Kommunikation! 
Danke und gerne wieder!

Gerard was a very good host. Upon arrival everything was prepared and organized. The sheets and towels were fresh and the bathrooms were very clean - spotless! We had an enjoyable stay. I would recommend Gerard's  to anyone looking for a clean and pretty centrally located place to stay in Barcleona.

I had a great time at Gerard's. I stayed there for around a month, and I felt extremely comfortable and welcome. Everything is clean, the location is excellent, and Gerard is a lovely host. Thanks Gerard!!
La descripción era correcta.
Tres bien situer , grande chambre , et tres bonne attention , et tres propre ...Tout a fait recommendable !!!

Conformément à la photo, chambre très agréable, lumineuse, spacieuse, avec 2 tables et une grande penderie ! Mais trop bruyante pour nous à cause du trafic permanent à proximité ! Nous n'avons croisé ni Helmut, ni Gérard ... peut-être une prochaine fois ! ... mais d'autres locataires d'airbnb.

Das Zimmer ist wie auf den Bildern dargestellt und die Wohnung sauber. Die Lage ist super, um Barcelona zu erkunden. Pedro hat uns in der Wohnung freundlich empfangen und war hilfsbereit. Wir hatten eine schöne Zeit in Barcelona!

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at Helmut's apartment. As described, it was a bright, sunny room! The bedroom and bathrooms were spotlessly clean. We enjoyed that the neighborhood it is in made us feel more like locals than tourists.

Overall we had a great stay in the apartment. 
The room looks just like the picture and the host (which is not Helmut) was very nice and friendly, though it is a bit annoying you have to communicate with multiple people. The apartment is very close the a metro station and it is easy to get to the airport. 

Some nights were a bit cold as only a thin blanket was provided and the wifi unfortunately didn't reach the room, so you had to stand in the kitchen. 

A small coffee machine was set up which was very nice. There is a decent amount of traffic in the neighborhood. The noise was noticeable but not a problem inside the room.
Helmut and Gerald are perfect hosts who are very nice and considerable. Their apartment is quite clean and well-located. Definitely recommend.

Overall the airbnb was satisfactory. Clean, comfortable, and close to the metro. My main issue is that the wifi is terrible and barely works; for some this may not be an issue but me it was a very big issue.

Große, moderne, helle Unterkunft in zentraler Lage mit guter Verkehrsanbindung. WLAN funktioniert nur in der Küche, die man nicht benutzen darf. Frühstück ist lediglich eine Kaffeemaschine. Den Kühlschrank darf man mitbenutzen, da "further cooking" aber nicht gewünscht ist, wird die Zubereitung von irgendwas schon schwierig. Die Bäder stehen zur gemeinsamen Nutzung zur Verfügung, lief aber immer problemlos ab. Leider waren die Böden nur oberflächlich sauber, ansonsten ist die Wohnung sauber. Ein Mülleimer und ein Spiegel im eigenen Zimmer wären schön.
如果不在意與人共享空間,這是一間十分乾淨､明亮的居住選擇,下樓就有餐廳,搭乘大眾運輸也十分方便,床鋪也非常舒適,十分推薦

Overall the flat was clean and located in a nice area. Close to the metro and train station. Our main concern regarding the stay was the misguiding description. The ad said there was a kitchen but there was only a coffee maker and a fridge and no sink to clean the coffee cups except the bathroom. Also, we had to pay a higher late check in fee than the ad stated. The wifi was terrible and barely worked. Communication with the host and co-host worked perfectly, they answered quickly and met us at the time we had agreed on.

Our stay was just okay. I would only recommend this place if you want a room to crash and nothing more.

The host is not rude, but they are neither warm nor welcoming. We had one very short and curt introductory conversation with Gerard right as we arrived and that was it. Never saw or heard from him again. This was disappointing for us as we had specifically chosen this location because of reviews saying otherwise.

The wifi does not work at all in the room. If you want any internet you need to go to the kitchen.

The room can get really HOT, so this was an issue for us as we had some very high temperatures during our stay.

There were a few people I interacted with. Helmut was not actually our host and it was Gerard who stays in the apartment. I had been asked to contact someone called Abdul before my arrival, which I did, but I never saw this person. It was confusing who to reach out to in case we had questions as we didn't have Gerard's contact and he did not respond to our knocks on his door.
Ich war das dritte Mal bei Helmut & Gerard. Mir hat es wie immer sehr, sehr gut gefallen. Ich werde es Freunde, Bekannte & Familie weiterempfehlen!!
Thanks Helmut, all good!

Everything worked fine and easy and Gerrard is a nice person! 

We enjoyed our trip to Barcelona and the Sońar Festival.

Very stylish apartment. Possibility to make coffee with nespresso machine. The room was very clean. Check in was on time. Host was very friendly and kind. Fast wifi which now reaches the room also (if you read previous reviews then it wasnt). But now wifi is perfect. Clean towels and sheets. Worth the price! Makes you feel like local!
maison très propre pas loin de centre ville j'ai beaucoup aimé

Die Unterkunft war sehr sauber und wirklich schön und individuell eingerichtet. Das Badezimmer, sowie unser Schlafzimmer waren sehr ordentlich und sauber. Die öffentliche Verkehrsanbindung ist super, mit drei Ubahnen und viele Busstationen in Fußreichweite. Gerard spricht perfekt Deutsch und hat uns somit die Kommunikation erleichtert. Der kleine Hund Bob ist nicht nur außerordentlich niedlich, sondern auch friedlich. Bei Fragen stand uns Gerard stets zur Verfügung. Unsere Privatsphäre wurde geachtet. Unser erste Aufenthalt in Barcelona war uns eine Freude.

Very nice Appartement with cute  details, close to the metro. The stay was perfect except there was only one towel per person and the breakfast was just coffe nothing more (other than we expected). Still there were stores near by and a perfect place for drinks and breakfast named Copacetic- highly recommend;)
Very clean house and friendly host. The flat is well connected to both metro and buses. The best part was cuddling Bob!
Gerard is a great host. A room was absolutely the same as on the photo. Location are also great
Great position, nice aesthetic in the apartment! And Gerard's dog was super friendly!

name: Clean, Quiet, & Sunny Dancer's Apt!
summary: You'll love staying at my clean and sunny apartment that's just a 5-minute walk from beautiful Inwood Park, and literally a minute's walk from the A train subway express stop!
space: **My base price is based on a double-occupancy (2 people). If only one person will be staying please send me a message and I will quote you my price for one person** Hello! I'm a Ballroom dancing paralegal with a great sunny studio apartment on the Upper West Side!! I have a very comfortable Full size bed and a Queen size air mattress, plus a large round wooden table for eating or working on.   I also have high speed cable internet and a 60-inch flat panel TV with Roku 3 box (which gives you access to streaming movies on both Netflix and Amazon Prime), a VHS/Blu-ray DVD/CD player and clock radio alarm that will play your vintage iPod if you have one. I do not have cable TV.  I also have a vintage record player where you can listen to vinyl if you remember what that is. Like to cook? I do too!! My kitchen is stocked with everything you'll need to prepare a great meal. Non-Smoker Owned (**NO SMOKING ALLOWED**)! Air Conditioner + Overhead Ceiling Fan + Standing Floor Fan Excellent Heat du
description: You'll love staying at my clean and sunny apartment that's just a 5-minute walk from beautiful Inwood Park, and literally a minute's walk from the A train subway express stop! **My base price is based on a double-occupancy (2 people). If only one person will be staying please send me a message and I will quote you my price for one person** Hello! I'm a Ballroom dancing paralegal with a great sunny studio apartment on the Upper West Side!! I have a very comfortable Full size bed and a Queen size air mattress, plus a large round wooden table for eating or working on.   I also have high speed cable internet and a 60-inch flat panel TV with Roku 3 box (which gives you access to streaming movies on both Netflix and Amazon Prime), a VHS/Blu-ray DVD/CD player and clock radio alarm that will play your vintage iPod if you have one. I do not have cable TV.  I also have a vintage record player where you can listen to vinyl if you remember what that is. Like to cook? I do too!! My kitchen is stock
neighborhood_overview: My building & neighborhood is very safe.  Walk out the front door and Inwood Park is just two blocks away (where you'll find the LAST FOREST IN MANHATTAN)!  You can play tennis, hike, jog, canoe/kayak, and even learn more about Inwood & Inwood Park as the park is practically it's own ecological preserve!  La Marina ( (Website hidden by Airbnb) is a very popular nearby hot spot (15 minute walk) for dinner and drinks right on the Hudson that has live music and DJs nearly every night during the summer.  Like to KAYAK? Every Sunday from Memorial Day weekend to Labor Day weekend the Inwood Canoe Club has a FREE guided 20-25 minute kayak tour of the Hudson River just north of the George Washington Bridge. They paddle from 10:00am to noon but guests are asked to arrive between 9:30am and 11:15am to ensure they get a spot. No prior experience is needed and all equipment is provided (Website hidden by Airbnb)  Inwood has delicious Spanish & Dominican food, as well as Thai, Chinese, and some oth
notes: **Note that I have a friendly red-eared slider water turtle (Pedro). He is super low maintenance and very easy to take care of.
transit: SUBWAY: You're less than a block away from the A train (which runs express until roughly 10:30pm when it will then run local and take a little longer), and a few short blocks from the #1 local train and various buses, which all run 24/7 (twenty-four hours a day!). You'll also have access to many buses to the Bronx and elsewhere that stop right in front of my apartment building!
access: Make yourself at home! You'll have access to my entire apartment. My home will feel like your home. I'm certain you'll have a Wonderful & Comfortable stay -- mi casa es su casa [bayti baytik]!
interaction: My check-in & check-out times are flexible but let me know your travel times in advance so I can plan accordingly. Feel free to email, text, or call me if you need anything or have questions or just want to meet up for a drink sometime!
house_rules: Please use caution when opening & closing curtains on the big living room window so as not to pull them off the rod. BEFORE USING THE AIR CONDITIONER - 1) Please Close All Windows in the living room before turning on the Air Conditioner. 2) Please close the curtain that separates the living room from the hallway (this will help in keeping your room cool)   *DO NOT LEAVE THE AIR CONDITIONER ON WHEN YOU LEAVE THE APARTMENT** as this wastes a lot of energy & is Very Expensive! **Please remember to turn off all lights and appliances and unplug them whenever you leave the apartment so that energy isn't wasted. FINALLY, although I understand that sometimes you might meet that 'special someone', you can't bring him/her home with you. My place is ONLY for the Airbnb guests who have booked my apartment -- NO EXCEPTIONS! I'll also make a photocopy of your passports or driver's licenses, as it gives me an added level of security and peace of mind. This is a MANDATORY REQUIREMENT of all my guests.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about:
Hello! I'm Yara, a born and raised New Yorker from Brooklyn.  After studying and working in the entertainment industry in Los Angeles, I moved back to further my dance studies (I'm an Argentine Tango performer). I'm pretty free spirited and try to enjoy all the perks of living in Inwood! I love to hike difficult trails and like buying clothes to hike in -- although I might like buying the clothes more than hiking sometimes!   : )

I'm a huge fan of Inwood Park. It's not like Central Park at all (not that CP is bad but Inwood Park wasn't man-made). There are fewer people and it's a great place to be alone and think.  You can go to the weekly farmers market which is across the street every Saturday morning and then go on a morning hike, play tennis, basketball or soccer before finally laying out to work on your tan. Later you can watch the sunset over the Hudson River or perhaps go on a sunset hike. It really is nice up here! Come see what I see!! 

I also co-run THRIFTAHOLICS com & NYC GRINDHOUSE com with my boyfriend Michael. If you like thrifting, or want to do things in NYC cheaply, or even for FREE when you get here, you should definitely check out our site. We can get you very cheap tickets to Broadway shows! 

Have a Great Visit to the Big Apple. I hope to hear from you!!!

reviews.comments: è la prima volta che utilizziamo questo servizio e devo dire che mantiene ciò che promette. La casa di Natalia è molto bella, vicinissima alla subway che ti porta in pieno centro alla 42° in circa 20 minuti e al JFK in un'ora. Si vede che siamo stati i primi ospiti, poichè non c'era tanto spazio per le nostre cose personali (considerate che eravamo solo con il bagaglio a mano), tuttavia la disponibilità sua e di Mike hanno ovviato all'inconveniente. Noi amiamo molto gli animali, tuttavia la presenza della gatta (dolcissima) può essere un problema per gli ospiti (perde molto pelo). Complessivamente comunque è stato un soggiorno molto piacevole.

This place is in a neighborhood where I used to live, and I really enjoyed being back. There weren't many surprises for me. The apartment was clean and filled with sun. The cat is delightful and so is the turtle! Even though we didn't actually meet, Natalia was a gracious and generous hostess via email. The A train is right outside. The gypsy cabs are honking 24/7, but that is New York. I recommend this place!

Inwood is my new favorite place! Natalia's apartment couldn't have been in a better location - close to everything you could possibly need. Her studio is very spacious, with the most comfortable bed ever. Natalia is extremely helpful and caring. She took the time to explain every small detail about the apartment and even bought an iron because I said I needed one! Her pets are adorable and fun to be with. Thank you Natalia, I hope I can stay here another time.

had a great time at Natalia's. She and her boyfriend were very helpful and the check in/out process was smooth. The apt was immaculate and the location of  was perfect in terms of transportation.  All in all, great stay, and a great host!

The apartment was clean upon arrival and super cozy. Natalia left us a guide to her neighborhood which saved us from having to research where  the basics were. By staying here, I was also introduced to a neighborhood that I had never visited while I lived in NYC. It's awesome.

Emilia is a super friendly cat and Pedro the turtle pretty much keeps to himself.

I'd book Natalia's apartment again!

Natalia is a great host, she is very friendly and super helpful. She was great with communication and always replied promptly even when I didn't ha ha. She even took the time to gather directions from the airport to her apartment. She also listed nearby locations for shopping and even a laundromat. How's that for going above and beyond?  I also need to point out she did all of this without a single minute of face time. That's right my girlfriend and I were well taken care of and we actually didn't see Natalia once. Which was a shame because she was really nice.

Her place very clean, quiet and in a superb location! Nearly anything you need is withing walking distance. Including transport by train or bus. She has the nicest cat, Emilia which will keep you company if you travel alone. Her turtle Pedro is really fun to watch while dinning at her table. My girlfriend and I cooked nearly every other night of our stay and Natalia's kitchen has all the basics covered. Her internet access is fast, we watched a few shows on Netflix with no problem, and speaking of shows Natalia has great taste in movies her little library has something for everyone.  

I recommend Natalia for being an excellent host, and her wonderful home for all of it's amenities and awesome decor.

My daughter & I stayed at Natalia's apartment this weekend. It was my daughter's first trip to NYC and i was glad we found a place to stay where we could get a quiet night's sleep, away from the horns honking, on the comfiest bed ever. Natalia was super easy to communicate with -- I already felt I trusted her, even before we arrived. The apartment was spacious, secure, warm & cozy...a home away from home. Will stay at Natalia's again & again!

Natalia was a good host. She was personable and friendly.  Her apt is located a block away from a subway station in the upper upper west side. Very safe area just a few minutes walk from the cloisters. He pets are super cute. Especially the cat. She's a riot! :) One thing was the automatic heater. It was a little loud in the dead of the night but we much rather be warm on such cold nights :)- Great stay!!!!

Natalia was responsive and nice.  From the beginning she contacted me and let me know she was there for any questions.  Her boyfriend Mike met us at the apartment and showed us the ropes, and Natalia provided a list of nearby restaurants, etc.  The apartment was clean and great - exactly as advertised on Airbnb.  The turtle and cat are very sweet, too.  The place is convenient to (a few steps away from) the subway, and around good, affordable restaurants & bars.  Inwood is nice, but far out - so waiting on the A train was the only down side.  I would absolutely stay again.  Thank you, Natalia and Mike!

I was in New York for an event, and was looking for a place to stay that felt like home where I could cook my own meals, as well as sleep as late as I wanted without being disturbed.  Natalia of course was nice enough to let me stay at her place, and arranged a really close place to the Port Authority to pick up the keys to the place, which really helped me out.  I was quite happy with where her place was located, especially since it was in a spanish neighborhood and I love authentic spanish food.  Her cat was a good friend to me and enjoyed all the attention I gave her, as well as the company to.  Natalia also left me a list of local restaurants and where they were located, as well as where local grocery stores were which was a big help being from out of town.   I would highly recommend her place to anyone else looking for a place to stay in New York.  I will happily stay here again next time im in New York if her place is available to stay at.  The place looks exactly like the pictures she has taken and posted, but even roomier and tons of light and fresh air come in at all times of the day, and you also get a nice view of the local neighborhood you are staying in.

My sister and I enjoyed our weekend in New York and staying in Natalia's apartment made things so much easier for us with my daughter living only 1 1/2 blocks away.  We spent very little time in the apartment and worried about her pets, but it was quiet and such easy access.  I'm sure we will do it again.

I agree with the positive opinions of the previous guests--Natalia is a pleasure to deal with and her apartment is priced just right. She communicates effectively and has a welcoming personality. 
We felt secure in the neighborhood and the neighbors were quiet during the two weeknights we were there--only thing were occasional doors closing down the hallway a few times, and as mentioned by another guest, the cab drivers use their horns a lot, evidently to greet each other.  (This is typical throughout NYC, and would make for a potential doctoral dissertation for an ambitious sociology graduate student. Best spin I can put on it.). No, the car horn is everywhere to be heard all over this town. 
Anyway they did tone it down later in the evening. 

Natalia's cat Emilia is a very considerate roommate--she does not romp around the room, pester for food, beg to be let out (she's an indoor cat), or have any disagreeable aspects to her personality, which is friendly.  For a cat owner, you will appreciate this, and if you are new to cats, don't worry. 
This cat is a class act. 
As far as trying to rate the neighborhood goes, with a 5 being a Park Ave. address, or a nice tree-lined street in the Village, etc., near a station, it isn't that, but it doesn't cost 300 per night either. I don't want to be around that type of alien situation, anyway, so I'm not rating by numbers on that. It is not only by one station that has express service, but another subway line is nearby and across the street is a coffee shop that offers varietal coffees--they list it as "pour over" on the menu as opposed to the house coffee and espresso drinks, made by the cup in one of those glass coffee pots. You will taste the "notes" of various berries and fruits, as you do with varietal wines over on the East Side, with these different coffees. I could go on further with this. 

All in all, we left feeling happy and well taken care of. We were so busy, we didn't get around to picking her brains about going thrifting and getting deals on things around town, but maybe next time...
Thank you, Natalia!

Natalia was great at communicating with me ... The neighborhood was fantastic, everything was nearby... The studio was CLEAN .. the bathroom was spotless.. I would stay again and Highly recommend Natalia studio apt.... I almost wanted to take the apt...hahahah..

Thanks Natalia!!!! =]]

Pros:  The apartment is as pictured, a large studio on the fifth floor in an elevator building.  Natalia was very accommodating and told us to help ourselves to anything in the kitchen.  The cat, Emilia, was a delight - friendly and quirky.   The bed is comfortable.  Natalia has Direct TV, HBO, and an extensive collection of movies.   Cons:  It would be nice to have a sofa to sit on; one has to sit on the bed to watch TV or read.  This is a pre-war building; the radiator heat cannot be adjusted, and it was very hot in the evening.  We had to open the window and use the fan to keep it from being too hot.  This seems like a waste of energy, but this seems to be the way it is in any of the pre-war buildings in NYC.

Natalia's place was great!  A nice size studio just steps from the subway.  She was there to greet us and give us some tips for the neighborhood as well as the city. She made us feel very comfortable staying there.  I would recommend it to anyone.

I don't need to say much except that I would definitely stay at Natalia's place again. It's clean, spacious, quiet and 30 seconds away from Isham/Inwood parks. Her and Mike are lovely people and will make your stay comfortable. They even emailed me all the instructions on how to get from JFK to Inwood prior to my arrival. Thanks Natalia & Mike.

We have spent one week at Natalia house's and it was great to leave in this apartment. We have really enjoy the time past in her neighborhood : near of subway , great mexican food (nachos hmmmmm!!!) , a lot of practice market,... 
Natalia is a good host , before the travel , during and after the departure. Actually, it was our first time with airbnb and she make us feel confident. By the way these pets are so cool , in particulary pedro the turtle....

We had a wonderful time staying in Inwood this weekend. Natalia was more than helpful, incredibly responsive, and had many great recommendations. The neighborhood is fantastic, the apartment just right for the two of us. We also very much took a liking to Pedro the turtle :). The farmer's market was a serious highlight - being French, it was a real pleasure seeing three different bakers!

We were really safe and comfy here and loved the kittie and turtle as our return hosts after long two days of fun in NYC. The flat was clean, easy to work in on internet, and all communications were smooth and friendly.  Finally we got to go on two great walks in the forest and I can tell you that is awesome. The cafe across the street is yummy and the decor of objects in the flat , so fun to look at . (My Mom wants the fan ! )The A train immediately outside was a gift, and the parking at 15 $ per 24 hr ,  a bargain if you have to garage a car! Recommended !

Dear All!

I stayed at Natalia's place for 4 days in May. I truly can say that I had an amazing time in New York. Natalia also contributed a great part to my stay. She is very communicative and responsive. Whenever you have a question, she is very quick to respond and very concerned about your well-being. I would definitely recommend  her place if you set a high value on a clean, big and tidy room in a cool area. Admittedly it takes a while to get to downtown NYC, but it is worth the ride. In case you are concerned about feeding the cat, please don't worry about it. You feed the cat in the AM and in the PM. The cat food is of course provided by Natalia. The turtle doesn't need to be fed, since it has all been taken care of by Natalia before your arrival. All in all, Natalia (and her boyfriend Mike) are great hosts and I am very happy to know them for my next trip to NYC. You all take care!

Best,

Paul

It was an absolute pleasure staying at Natalia's place. This being my first time renting at airbnb, I was a bit apprehensive to start with. Natalia ensured that all my doubts were cleared, was very responsive and went out of the way to ensure that I had a comfortable stay in her apartment.

The apartment was of perfect size and was clean and tidy, absolutely no complaints at all. Even the location is pretty good in the sense that there is a grocery store just around the corner, a  thai restaurant in front, a Baskin robins outlet next block and cab service nearby. Moreover, Manhattan was just one train ride away.

Lastly, the cat, Emelia is very quite and docile. I was worried that my family might be a bit perturbed due to its presence, but it turned out in fact to be contrary and my son liked playing with it.

Overall, I had a very comfortable stay and will not hesitate to rent out again from Natalia.

My stay at Natalia's apartment was great. It's a relatively spacious, convenient apartment right at the end of the A train line. The commute to midtown/downtown takes some time, but it's reasonable. It's decorated with all sorts of cute and quirky curiosities, many turtle-themed. Natalia herself is very friendly, helpful and easy to communicate with.

I thought caring for the cat might be a hassle; actually, having a friendly feline companion was a positive experience (even though she ran out onto the fire escape one time - Natalia returned very quickly and brought Emelia back in.)

Overall, this is a great apartment to stay in and I'd happily come back.

I loved Natalia's apartment and the Inwood neighborhood. The building is sparkling clean and super quiet. The apt. is directly across the street from one subway line and a few blocks from another. The neighborhood is lively. There are beautiful parks and a wonderful Dominican street scene. I loved coming home at night to the sounds of salsa, fruit vendors, fresh juice and delicious food. I even got my hand henna.designed in a small storefront operated by a woman from India. The hood is super safe. 

Natalia is a great host. A couple of things you may want to know is that the apt is not a one bedroom but has one big room plus kitchen and bathroom. There is no place to unpack. The cat is great company but you will be expected to empty litter box as well as feed and cuddle. 

I was traveling solo and light and had no complaints. Would definitely return and recommend to others, especially for the price.

Natalia è stata un'ospite eccellente, precisa e puntuale, attenta per tutto il periodo della nostra permanenza a verificare che le cose andassero per il meglio. La gatta, Emilia, e' molto educata e tranquilla. L'appartamento è comodo e pulito, proprio sopra una stazione della metropolitana, con supermarket e ristoranti nei pressi, in una zona tranquilla da cui si raggiunge midtown in circa mezz'ora. Se tornassimo a NY sarebbe sicuramente la nostra prima scelta.

Natalia's place is great.  Very clean and everything you need is right there.  Subway is one block away (A train) and it's two blocks from my new grandson!  The parks around are beautiful.  Great coffee shop across the street and terrrific restaurants.  We will stay there every time we come to NYC is it's available.

Staying at Natalia's place was really awesome! Natalia was very friendly and caring and gave us lots of tips of what we could do in NY and made sure that we would find our way from the JFK airport to her place.  I loved her apartment! Her cat and turtle were so cute and it was fun to have them there during our stay! I think it was nice to stay a bit outside the most central parts of NY and get to know the northern parts of Manhattan! :)

My stay at Natalia's apartment was awesome!
