Michael was there to great me when I arrived and gave me a tour of the apartment, which is very clean, spacious and cozy, few steps from the subway! 
Thanks Natalia and Michael for this great stay.

My wife and I had a great stay in Inwood! We used it as a quiet retreat for our Manhattan @ boroughs explorations, and were very happy with the apartment. It was clean and quiet, and the neighbourhood felt welcoming and safe. The apartment is large, and the bed is very comfortable. Everything was in working order, and the cat was very happy to be cuddled with in the evenings. We emptied her cat litter before leaving in the mornings, and were otherwise not much bothered by her presence.

We ate our breakfasts at the absolutely great cafe just across the street called Darling Coffee, and then took the A-train into town. It's a half hour ride on the express, so you have time to read your guidebook or observe the local New Yorkers on the train. We would absolutely recommend this apartment if you don't have to live on Time Square, the subway service is frequent and can be found almost anywhere you go. The upside is that you get away from the hustle and bustle of the big city when you want to sleep and relax. 

Unfortunately we never got to explore the forest, but that's for next time I guess :)

This location is convenient and was the perfect landing pad for my visit to NYC to attend a baby shower in the same neighborhood. I wholeheartedly recommend Natalia's to anyone who is looking for a comfy, cozy and relaxed place to land in Inwood. Natalia is a lovely host and gave me all the information I needed to get around and check in without stress. She also provided towels and linens (of course). The building is also really nice with some lovely art deco features.
Great experience!  Super friendly host and convenient amenities.  I highly recommend this one!

Natalia's apartment is very well located, with the A train right on the corner and the 1 train not far away.  There is a great coffee shop across the street, along with a decent Thai place and an upscale bar/cafe.  It's also close to Inwood Hill Park which is a beautiful and safe park to enjoy. 

Natalia met me on arrival and explained the apartment and the pet care responsibilities to me and communicated very well during my stay.  The pets are certainly easy to care for, but the sea turtle's extreme eagerness to either play or get out of his huge aquarium made me a bit uncomfortable.   

I would say this is a fairly typical New York studio apartment for a young person.  It's clean but a bit cluttered.  The building is clean and safe looking and has an elevator.  There is also an elevator to/from the subway on the corner so you won't have to lug your bags upstairs on arrival.  

If you're comfortable with pet care and the NYC subways, this is a good place to hang out for a few days.

What an easy trip. Worked with us on check in/out times. Close to subway ( 75 ft) a real Great neighborhood. Had $20 dollar lobster and steak within walking distance. Yara made it so easy as this was our first time using airb&b. Absolutely no problems. Uptown was great location to see the tourists spots while also getting a feel for living in a real Nyc neighborhood. We were out front of the building smoking at all hours of the day/night and felt safe at all times. Told Yara if I knew anyone going to Nyc I would send them her way and I mean it. Thanks again for everything. Tell Pedro and the cat hello.  Josh and Jamie

This was my first visit to USA. Natalia greatly contributed towards first positive experience. She made sure that I will have all the necessary information before arrival and accessibility needed for a great holiday. It was nice to meet Natalia at the arrival. She showed a lot of positive energy and flexibility. The apartment is sunny and comfortable placed in a quiet neighbourhood. It was nice to come back to a lively apartment and to Emilia after a long day of site seeing (instead of a grey hotel room). I think this is a right way to see NY.
Very conveniently located; especially if visiting in Inwood vicinity. There is little choice for lodging in area.

My friends and I stayed at Yara's apartment and had a great time. It was very last minute, as my friends missed their flight back to Arizona and needed a place to stay. I didn't have room for them so they suggested this thing called Airbnb. We were lucky enough to find Yara's place, which isn't too far from me, and were able to rent it last minute. We had a fun time for our girls’ slumber party. Her pets Pedro and Emelia and really cute and friendly. Her apartment was clean and comfortable, and we liked all the quirky decor, especially the horror stuff as we all love scary movies! The big Cleopatra Jones poster in the bathroom is AMAZING!! Yara herself is really cool too. Friendly and ultra-knowledgeable about the area, I even learned a few new places to go. Glad I found this chick, as now I have a new friend in Inwood!!  : )
I enjoyed my stay here. The apartment was clean and quiet, and the subway access was perfect. Host was very responsive. Recommended...

Terrific stay! Excellent experienced host: Yara was very easy to work with, her communication with us was perfect (including checking in on how we were doing). Excellent accommodations: studio with full kitchen, in well-kept safe-feeling building. Excellent location: we were visiting family who live in the neighborhood, but even if you are focused on farther downtown, the location is great - the A train stop is 1/2 block away, 1 train not much farther, coffee shops, restaurants and ATMs right on the block, even a farmer's market on Saturday mornings 1.5 blocks away. The cat and turtle were a nice addition. We couldn't have asked for a better stay. Thanks, Yara!

Yara was a good host who was able to accommodate us on very short notice. The place: While you get a good deal on a spacious apartment (New York standards), you will also have to be comfortable living with a cat and turtle. I personally would have preferred a minimalistic interior, but others may enjoy the retro collection and artsy side of this place. A real New York experience.

I thoroughly loved Yara's place! It's neat, clean and inhabited by a lovely Cat. Her place is very close to a subway station and has some great bars and restaurants nearby. Both Yara and her partner are more than welcoming and so helpful with all manner of questions you have about NYC. Top hosts! You'll love the place.

My brother and I stayed at Yara's apartment for four nights and we don't really have any complaints. The only thing was she has Incense sticks and my brother doesn't like the smell of them and even though they weren't on, my brother could still  smell it ( he's sensitive lol) but all we did was moved it to the other room and moved it back before we left. And it was fine. Other then that everything was good. We felt very safe. We got a little lost at 3am and never felt like we were in danger or anything like that. Her pets are super low maintenance. I didn't really mind caring for them since I have cats of my own. If anything it made me feel at home. Yara's cat is pretty funny actually. Train was less then a minute walk away. Yara was very accommodating to our check in hours since we had an early flight. So we were able to check in as soon as we got to NY.

There aren't enough words to say how safe and confortable I was at this home. Yara and her partner Mike are some of the nicest people I could have ever met.The pets were fun and I felt right at home with them.Yaras home was so clean and the decore was fun and lively just like her. Not only will I stay again but I feel I have made a new friend. Inwood is an amazing place a real gem in the city. I cann't tell you enough how pleased I'm with my stay Yaras home.

Both the host and her boyfriend made us feel incredibly welcome and at home! Super nice and attentive to any questions we might have had. And hangin with a turtle and the friendliest cat I've ever had the pleasure of meeting was the cherry on top!

I had a wonderful experience staying in Yara's Airbnb. Her and Mike are very welcoming and  genuinely nice people. The Airbnb was cozy and artsy with lots of taste and style and has a bunch of great classic movies to choose from, along with Netflix,  A Roku, and cable. As well as an iPad incase you need to get on the Internet.  The studio is located on the 5th floor with a view from the bed that is soothing and beautiful to watch in the morning with a cup of tea when the sun rises. Yara and mike even offerd me there personal bikes to get around the city. They have a very friendly cat who loves to get in bed and snuggle with you. the neighborhood is very safe and conveniently located next to Cafes, restaurants and a subway station on the same block. at the last minute, I asked Yara if I could stay for 2 extra days and she told me that it was fine which I thought was very nice considering the last minute change. I ended up having to leave early so I didn't stay the extra days but the next time I'm in NYC Yaras studio is the place I want to stay! (also very very affordable) I think she should also  pursue a career in interior designing! haha but thanks Yara and Mike!

By far the best airbnb experience I've had to date! Natalia was a very friendly and gracious host. I came into New York really late and by the time I got to her house, it was passed midnight. But Natalia was very welcoming! We had great communication with each other from the minute I booked her place.
The place was so clean, homey and comfy. It is literally steps from 207th street on the A train. You can't get better than that! Plus it's in the middle of great restaurants of all kinds and shopping. Staying at Natalia's studio was like heaven!!!
Best of all, she has a lovely cat, Emelia and a pet turtle, Pedro

Great apartment in a beautiful and vibrant part of NYC, close to amenities and public transportation. Natalia and Mike were responsive and helpful during our stay and made good suggestions for my parents' stay. Thanks! Will be staying here again!

Yara was absolutely nice and did anything to help.
The apartment is great

Yara was a great host, she was very responsive, kind, and provided my friends and I places to go while we were there for our stay. The place is next to public transit which makes it very convenient to go anywhere easily. Would definitely come back on my next visit to NY.
Such a cool place! Yara was a very gracious host with a cute cat and turtle. I wish I could have stayed longer!

name: ★ Amazing with terrace & wifi ★
summary: Inside a beautiful 50's vintage building, the apartment is fully-restored with a sunny terrace, on the 3º floor (stairs), situated in the middle of the heart of Porto, 400 metres from Douro river.
space: The property has a large and bright living-dining room, 4 confortable rooms, a fully equipped kitchen, 1 full bathroom, 1 toilet and an amazing & sunny terrace... about 400 metres from Douro river.
description: Inside a beautiful 50's vintage building, the apartment is fully-restored with a sunny terrace, on the 3º floor (stairs), situated in the middle of the heart of Porto, 400 metres from Douro river. The property has a large and bright living-dining room, 4 confortable rooms, a fully equipped kitchen, 1 full bathroom, 1 toilet and an amazing & sunny terrace... about 400 metres from Douro river. From check in to check out I will always be available. Located in the Poveiros square (very genuine and cental) If you come by plane or train, you can grab a Taxi (+-20Euro - day fare) or travel in our state of the art Metro Transportation, either from the airport or from the main Train Stations. We're just a 3 min walk from S. Bento Train/Metro Station or 5 min walk from Bolhão Metro Station. If you come by car, you can either try to find a parking place for free in the street, or use one of the public paid parks available in the neighbourhood. This apartment is legal and recognized rental, fully
neighborhood_overview: Located in the Poveiros square (very genuine and cental)
notes: This apartment is legal and recognized rental, fully registered at Turismo de Portugal and supervised by local authorities, Câmara Municipal do Porto and ASAE. This accreditation can be checked any time at Turismo de Portugal database. All guests should have at least one identity card (passport or ID card) and must show it at check in. MUNICIPAL TOURIST TAX (legal information) As of 1 March (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) - What is the tourist tax for? To consolidate Porto as an attractive and sustainable city. - Who is required to pay the tourist tax? Anyone older than 13 years, staying a night in Porto, pays the tax per night, per person for a maximum of seven straight nights per person and per stay. - Who is exempt from paying the tourist tax? a) People travelling for medical treatment, and continue therapy in medical facilities. Family members and/or companions are exempt also. Documentary evidence of medical and care service has to be provided (or equivalent document). b) People w
transit: If you come by plane or train, you can grab a Taxi (+-20Euro - day fare) or travel in our state of the art Metro Transportation, either from the airport or from the main Train Stations. We're just a 3 min walk from S. Bento Train/Metro Station or 5 min walk from Bolhão Metro Station. If you come by car, you can either try to find a parking place for free in the street, or use one of the public paid parks available in the neighbourhood.
access: Guests will have access to the entire apartment
interaction: From check in to check out I will always be available.
house_rules: No major rules, only treat the house as if it were your home, carefully! Feel free to ask any questions of any kind. ;) Check-out time is 12:00.  A check-out later may be available on request.  Late check-out without request costs the full deposit (150€) Guests are not allowed. Parties not allowed

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments: Le logement est spacieux, propre et très très bien situé. Un grand merci pour l accueil de filippe ! Je recommande vivement cet appartement !

Rafael was a wonderful host. He met us an hour earlier upon our arrival and the check - in time to be accommodating, he showed us around the beautiful apartment and even sat us down with a map to tell us the must-sees of Porto. There was plenty of space, fresh fruit in the kitchen and a terrace overlooking the city! I hope to come back again for a visit and I would absolutely be staying in this apartment. We walked everywhere, across the river for wine tours, to the city center, we never once took the public transportation!
Excellent place! Huge apartment with a fantastic balcony. Had a great weekend staying here. Would definitely return! Walking distance to everything. Cheers
La casa está bien situada. Las habitaciones son acogedoras. Una terraza perfecta, muy bien decorado y todo muy limpio. Repetiría sin duda.
Apartamento bem localizado, com um simpático terraço. Reúne todas as características necessárias para visitar o centro do Porto.
Merci à Rafael pour ce très bon accueil et sa gentillesse. L'appartement correspondait parfaitement à l'annonce. La terrasse était super. Nous avons passé un excellent séjour !
We can absolutely recommend a stay here. The location is really central. We met Filipe, and he was the perfect host.

Great place,
Very clean
Filipe was very flexible.
Piso muy bonito y centrico, Rafael es muy amable y atento

Me alojé en este apartamento con unos amigos con los que hacemos una quedada anual y salió todo perfecto. La casa es preciosa, está bien equipada con todo lo necesario para pasar unos días en Oporto. Estaba limpia, en buen estado, la localización es céntrica y la terraza es una gozada. La única pega que se nos rompió el picaporte de la entrada a la casa, pero recomendaría este sitio sin ninguna duda!

Filipe absolutely is the best host in the entire world. Helpful and reachable at any time, he gave us great advises about what to see and where to go. 
On top, the apartment is just amazing. It looks exactly as shown in the images, it's clean, spacious, a place where you feel home. The best part is the spacious terrace, we spent so much time there. 
I would definitely come back to Porto and stay at Filipe's. 
Thanks again for everything.
Excellent all around!

we have not only found a place to stay anytime we are in porto - but a friend as well! rafael was quick to communicate, friendly beyond what was needed, and helpful via text with any questions ("where is the best chinese food?") the apt. is very spacious - we had more than enough room for the 6 of us (teens and adults) - we even had a spare bed. the street noise is not too bad at all (3 bedrooms overlook the active street) with the use of a white noise app on your phone. a nice breeze kept the apt. cool even in august. kitchen had everything you need. would recommend this place to everyone!

We had a fantastic 4 days in Porto. All communication with Filipe was spot on and he met us at the apartment and gave us a great overview of the city and the must-sees/do's. The apartment is lovely, really spacious and furnished very tastefully. The location is excellent for accessing the sights and is surrounded by good cafes, restaurants and bars. We would love to return one day.

A great weekend at Filipe's apartment. Great location - walking distance from all the wonderful sites of Porto. The terrace a real bonus for us. Filipe was a great host and gave us some really good recommendations. Highly recommend.
とても素敵な部屋です｡駅から歩いて7分､建物の外観は綺麗ではないけど､壁面がﾀｲﾙ張りの階段を三層上がると素敵な部屋が待っています｡調理器具なども揃っているし､ﾌｨﾘｯﾌﾟはとても優しく､ﾚｽﾎﾟﾝｽも早く､快適な滞在ができました｡荷物が重いと階段が大変かもしれません｡でも素敵な部屋です｡

דירה במיקום מעולה, קרובה להכל, מלא חניונים ליד הבית. פיליפ מארח מדהים, חיכה לנו ב2 לפנות בוקר עם חיוך והמון סבלנות, במשך שעה הסביר לנו כל מה שרצינו והיה צורך על פורטו. בהחלט שווה, חשוב לציין קומה שלישית ללא מעלית. אבל שווה בהחלט. מאוד נקי.
Grand appartement très bien situé dans Porto. Hôte adorable et disponible pour ses invités, de très bons conseils. Ne pas hésiter !

thank you so much for this perfect apartment and your lovely way of welcoming us in porto!
it's an amazing location to spent a couple of days and you are a great host, rafael.
looking forward to visit you again! (and we definitely will)

thanks a lot <3 kisses and hugs 
m, a, l

Filipe was an amazing host. He gave us a great overview of the city and we queried him quite a few times for recommendations, which he promptly responded to. 

The apartment was amazing as well. We'd love to return.
Grand appartement, très bien situé pour découvrir Porto ! Filipe est un hôte attentionné et chaleureux !
Great host! Showed us a great time and had amazing recommendations for the city! The place was clean and welcoming with lots of space!

This is a really big, bright & airy apartment which is well located in Porto. Very comfortable, clean and well-appointed.  The spacious feeling and period features in this 1950's building are particularly nice.
Filipe was a great host, super friendly and greeted us with an incredible number of suggestions for places to go and things to see.
It's a very good location - just 10 minutes walk to the centre and also to the Ponte Luis bridge for sunset views of the city.
Our tips for places nearby include Letraria - excellent Craft Beer & Garden (on Rua da Alegria);  Jeremias for tasty tapas & good wine (just off Poiverios square, opposite the park) and further up the same street - Combi Coffee for fresh roasted beans.
We did find the bedroom a bit noisy at times (mainly the early morning recycling collections) so bring ear-plugs if you are a light sleeper...

Appartement spacieux, clair et bien placé. Nous étions 5 et chacune avait son espace. Nous avons bien profité de la terrasse ensoleillée pour les petits déjeuners. Filippe nous a réservé un accueil chaleureux et reste disponible et  attentif durant le séjour. Je recommande absolument.

Un super appartement, un emplacement idéal et un hôte disponible et de bon conseils.
Seul bémol l'isolation phonique...Mais ce n'est pas grand chose au vue du super séjour passé à Porto
The place and Rafael are fabulous!

Great central location in a large apartment, sunny terrace, with all basic essentials well provided. Filipe greeted us warmly, and is an excellent host who was extremely helpful and accommodating. Offered great overview of the city, suggesting places for dinner.
We were v happy with the stay, although can be slightly noisy late Fri/Sat nights, and the cockerel in the morning.
Lovely spacious apartment with a lovely terrace. The location was great,with a lovely local feel. Felipe was a great host and was available for any queries. Porto was fab.

Filipe was so welcoming and friendly when we arrived. He stayed to help us go through the map of Porto and showed us best places to go - his apartment was fabulous - very clean and very spacious.  We loved staying there and also were very grateful to know that he was only a text away if we needed.  I can't recommend his place enough - definitely worth checking out - lots to do and fab food

Great penthouse apartment just on the edge of the city centre. Filipe was incredibly helpful throughout the stay and help us with an easy checkin.  The apartment is pretty big with nice views over the city. The area has a few nice restaurants and bars within a stone's throw which makes it really convenient also. Overall, great great and a helpful host.
Todo genial. Filipe fue muy amable
Perfect apartment in a perfect location very clean, great hospitality, with a beautiful terrace.
Good stay.  Rafael is a great host.  Recommended apartment.
Very nice host and a greate apartment!

Me and my friend had a wonderful time in Porto and in Filipe's apartment. Great appertment, great location and great host. 
His city tips are very useful and make you feel welcome.

Highly recommended :)

Many thanks for everything! Hugs
公寓非常的漂亮,环境好,视野也好,位置更好,物超所值,强烈推荐!

El apartamento está bien situado, es amplio y tiene una terraza agradable. En la cocina había una cesta con fruta y algunos productos como aceite, sal, etc.
Al ser tan grande el apartamento, es muy frío, las camas tienen mantas pequeñas y finas, y únicamente hay unos calefactores pequeños en algunas habitaciones. Solicitamos más mantas y nos dijeron que las camas ya tenían una manta y que había calefactores, pero estos eran totalmente insuficientes para calentar el apartamento. Además, una de las habitaciones tenía las persianas rotas y no se podían subir.
Por otro lado, comentar que cualquier cosa que se hable con el anfitrión hay que dejarla por escrito, o no lo tendrá en cuenta, e intentará quedarse con la fianza después; ya que de palabra nos ofreció salir más tarde porque no tenía otras reservas, pero entró en la casa a la hora acordada por escrito, cuando aún estaban nuestras maletas dentro, obligándonos a salir de muy malas maneras.
Amazing apartment in a brilliant location with a lovely host!

Rafael's apartment is wonderfully located: central but not in the  middle of the chaos. Lots of restaurants around and will allow you to walk around the city.
It has plenty of room for groups or families and a wonderful terrace you will enjoy even in the winter. 
Filipe is very nice and full of energy, helpful and available. You'll enjoy knowing him!
Great hospitality. Great space. Lots of room. Grocery conveniently located directly below on street level.
The apartment was comfortable and spacious, just what we needed. Location is excellent too. We were welcomed by Rafael who was very friendly. Thanks for a great stay in Porto!
Great location for exploring Porto. Host was great at giving tips and some local knowledge.

Dette var en veldig fin og stor leilighet sentralt i Porto. Filipe var veldig hyggelig og var veldig hjelpsom. Han gav oss gode tips om hva vi kunne finne på. Vi var der i februar og det eneste negative var at det var ganske kaldt i leiligheten.
We had a great time staying in Filipe‘s appartment. He is a great host!! The appartment was very nice, perfectly situated within walking distance to all the places you want to see! Thank you, Filipe!
Great apartment, a host who responded quickly, and an awesome location. Our weekend was perfect. Would stay here again.

Filipe is a fabulous host and delivered a prime example of how to welcome and greet guests. We instantly felt at ease with an informative but no fuss check-in.  The location is perfect as it is within walking distance to all the local nightlife but distant enough from the crowds to get a great nights sleep. We would definitely stay here again. Thank you!

From the first moment we were in contact, Filipe responded super quickly and he was very helpful! He welcomed us with a big smile and a lot of information about Porto (where-to's, etc.) ! The apartment was really big and the terrace was great for sunny breakfasts. While we were there, the weather wasn't too great and the heating in the apartment was just a bit colder than we would've liked. But, as we were out almost the entire time, it didn't bother us much. 
Filipe is a great host, the apartment is well situated (close to everything and next to a supermarket), quiet and big! We would definitely stay here again.
Great place with a lot of room and a nice terrace. And what a great host!

We're a group of 6 friends and we had a great time at Felipe's apartment. It's very spacious with a nice living area. Clean. Comfy beds. Really good orientation with lots of tips. It was a bit cold so I would stay again but probably only in later spring/summer. There are a few things that need fixing e.g. the heater in the living room, a light switch, a loose sink. Kitchen is small but fine for preparing simple breakfast. Overall a very enjoyable stay.
Filipe was helpful, his house is perfectly located and with a really great terrace! I highly recommend it! Cheers

Felite is the perfect host. Warm and welcoming and gave us a super introduction to Porto, what to see where to go where to eat etc. He answers quickly to any questions you may have. We give Felipe, his apartment and Porto our warmest recommendations.

Filipe was the best host - a warm and personal welcome, we felt so comfortable and settled straight in the beautiful flat. Breakfasts on the balcony were a real highlight, and so well located to explore. Thank you!
Nous n’y avons passé qu’une nuit mais très bon accueil et surtout très bel appartement idéalement situé.

We really liked our stay at Rafael's place. The location is great, everything is nearby, the appartement is very spacious and the balcony is nice to have for breakfast or just chilling after a long day in Porto and Rafael is just the best host! The communication went very well and we felt so welcome in this apartment and in Porto! We highly recommend the stay at this place! Thank you so much Rafael!
We had a lovely time in Porto. We enjoyed the terras and they space in the appartement. Everything was clean and Filipe gave us a warm welcom. Only the bathroom and they kitchen ware rather old .
Really nice place in the middle of the center. We had an awesome time and I can really recommend this place

Filipe nous a réservé un très bon accueil, avec de très bons conseils pour les visites et les adresses locales. L'appartement est en ligne avec la description, spacieux, propre et confortable et la terrasse très agréable. Nous recommandons de séjourner chez Filipe.
Overall a great location. Close to city center and a lot of restaurants nearby. Also a market at the bottom of the apartments. It’s on the 3rd floor so be aware of the stairs to climb.

Fantastisch! Sehr geräumige Wohnung, die nicht besser gelegen sein kann, um Porto zu Fuß zu entdecken. Mitten im Leben mit tollen Restaurants und Bars nur wenige Schritte entfernt, darunter die besten Francesinhas. Hippes, alternatives Viertel mit guten Preisen, dazu ein Supermarkt direkt neben an, der täglich bis 23 Uhr geöffnet hat. Wenn noch einmal Porto, dann wieder bei Filipe! Muito obrigado!
Very nice aparment in the middle of Porto
We had a great time and the property was hosted really well

great location, so much in walking distance of the apartment.   

only thing is, it's 3rd floor with no lift but for us it was no problem.

We couldn’t have wished for a better stay in Porto! Felipe was an incredibly kind and welcoming host who gave us valuable tips. We particularly enjoyed the big terrace - perfect location for outdoor dining or drink under the sun. Highly recommended!

BY FAR the best Airbnb experience I’ve had!!! Filipe was beyond hospitable and took 20 minutes out of his time to make sure my family and I were able to make the most of our stay in Porto. He even allowed us to stay past checkout time the following day since the home wasn’t booked and we only had a single day to explore Porto. The home was absolutely beautiful! Everything far exceeding our expectations and the terrace had incredible views. I hope we are able to visit Porto again soon and stay in this beautiful home!

This is a fantastic and central place to stay. The apartment is beautiful and Filipe is a real pleasure to deal with. He is so efficient in replying quickly and dealing with any queries. It is a great option for families.

I stayed here with my boyfriend and 2 other couples. We had a super time and Felipe is truely adorable. 

A lovely appartement with a great energy, next to the best restaurants, monuments and nightlife in Porto ! Very easy to get around. 

Confortable beds and spacious rooms ! 
 
Prepare some earplugs if you are sensitive to noise in the morning because the bedrooms are on the street and no double glazing ;) 

Other than that, perfect stay ! This flat made us fall in love with Porto  thanks Felipe !
Amazing place! great location and host. Highly recommended.
Execelente localização! Anfitrião muito simpático!!
Super hôte, emplacement top , attention à l’insonorisation des fenêtres , merci Filipe pour ton accueil

The apartment was perfect for our group of 7 adults! Very nice balcony and a perfect location. We could see everything we wanted without using the metro. And Filipe was a great host! He explained us everything we needed to know about Porto.

Great experience. Rafael is a Super host and his apartment is in a great location. Just in the edge of the historic city. Restaurant across the street. 
This is a City Apartment so expect voice from traffic and restaurants. 
Excellent WiFi 
We went with Porto Walkers. Highly recommend them. 
Enjoy this amazing city, location and Super Host!
Would never refer this person---his behavior border lined harassment and cancelled last minute because of a phone number difference.

We had a wonderful time. We were a group of 6 friends and found that the flat provided plenty of space. The terrace is brilliant and the location is even better. Close to everything. You won’t get a warmer welcome either.
Absolutely loved staying here. The flat is great and in a lovely old building. Roof terrace is amazing too. Filipe was a brilliant host and made great suggestions.
Fantastic host. Great location. Can't go wrong.
Magnifique accueil de la part de l'hôte. Bonne description de la ville et des endroits à visiter.
Rafael is a wonderful and welcoming host. The terrace was a great feature that we enjoyed with a beautiful view.
Wonderful host.  Really convenient location.  Thanks for everything !
Very nice place that fits a lot of people and in an excellent location. Only downside is that for December the apartment is very cold and the heating is not enough for a big apartment like that.

Très bel appartement pour 6-7 personnes, très grand. Accueil très sympathique de Filipe et très bonne communication avant. L'appartement est idéalement situé, pour visiter la ville et pour les festivités du Nouvel An. Très belle terrasse. Malheureusement, l'appartement n'est pas bien équipé pour l'hiver. Il faisait très froid dans l'appartement qui n'avait pas été ouvert ni chauffé depuis plusieurs semaines, malgré un très beau temps à l'extérieur. Le chauffage du salon ne fonctionnait pas et les chauffages dans les chambres n'étaient pas efficaces du tout. Merci à Filipe pour les couettes supplémentaires mais nous avons quand même eu froid.

name: New 1BD Condo in Napili Ridge, Walk to Beach
summary: Newly Renovated 1 BD, 1 BTH Condo With A Brand New Queen Size Bed And New Pull Out Sofa. The complex has Pool, Laundry and Bbq area.  5 minutes walk to the crystal clear waters of Napili Bay. Perfect for snorkeling paddle boarding or just relax on the beach. Sea House Restaurant for Best Happy Hour Pupus on the Island. Restaurants, golf and tennis courts are also in walking distance. Short drive to World Class Kapalua Golf , 15 min to famouse Kaanapali Beach and 25 min to Lahaina. TAX INCLUDED!
space: Comfortable Queen size bed + Pullout sofa in living room, ceiling fen in every room plus additional portable fans.  NO AC! 55'TV HD in living room 45'TV HD in Bedroom Free Wi-Fi. Start up toiletries. Kitchen comes with : Microwave, full size oven and stove, Refrigerator with large freezer, coffee maker, toaster and blender. Beach equipment: Chairs, towels, boogie board, beach toys The neighborhood Drive time to local favorites: Lahaina Town:20 mins Kaanapali:10 mins Kapalua bay:10 mins walk Napili bay:5 min walk Getting around Our unit provides with a free assigned parking stall. Public transportation is steps away from the property Rental car should be register at the management office located Steps away from unit.
description: Newly Renovated 1 BD, 1 BTH Condo With A Brand New Queen Size Bed And New Pull Out Sofa. The complex has Pool, Laundry and Bbq area.  5 minutes walk to the crystal clear waters of Napili Bay. Perfect for snorkeling paddle boarding or just relax on the beach. Sea House Restaurant for Best Happy Hour Pupus on the Island. Restaurants, golf and tennis courts are also in walking distance. Short drive to World Class Kapalua Golf , 15 min to famouse Kaanapali Beach and 25 min to Lahaina. TAX INCLUDED! Comfortable Queen size bed + Pullout sofa in living room, ceiling fen in every room plus additional portable fans.  NO AC! 55'TV HD in living room 45'TV HD in Bedroom Free Wi-Fi. Start up toiletries. Kitchen comes with : Microwave, full size oven and stove, Refrigerator with large freezer, coffee maker, toaster and blender. Beach equipment: Chairs, towels, boogie board, beach toys The neighborhood Drive time to local favorites: Lahaina Town:20 mins Kaanapali:10 mins Kapalua bay:10 mins walk Napi
neighborhood_overview: The location is literally a 5 minute walk from an amazing beach! The Water Works store is right down the street where you can pick up snorkel gear or other awesome stuff.Drive time to  Napili Market:5 mins Lahaina Town:20 mins Kaanapali:10 mins Kapalua bay:10 min walk Napili bay:5 min walk
notes: Rental car should be register at the management office located steps away from unit. TAX IS INCLUDED IN OUR PRICE!
transit: Free Parking, 3 minutes walk to bus stop
access: Common areas: Swimming Pool. Gas BBQ. Picnic table. Laundry:Coin Operated. Free assigned Parking. Designated smoking area.
interaction: Please feel free to text or call me at anytime with questions or concerns. (PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN)
house_rules: - Check out time 10am - Additional guest $20 per night - Quiet hours 10pm to 7am - $125 cleaning fee

reviews.comments: Our stay at the condo was great.  The host was very easy to work with as far as being able to check in early and check out late, which was very appreciated considering we had two babies with us.  The only downside was that there was no AC. Given, it was my fault for not checking the listing, and although I thought we wouldn't survive a night there, you felt a nice cool breeze when you opened both front and back doors so the AC wasn't needed after all.  (One of the neighbors came to yell at me because one of the babies was crying so I had to keep the door shut) The location was perfect! It was walking distance to the very popular breakfast spot "The Gazebo" and to the Napili Bay that is very beautiful and you can see turtles.  There were a couple of issues with roaches, but it's inevitable considering they are condos and not everyone that lives in a complex is clean, although the condo was.  We would stay there again

Lovely little place for one or two to stay. Car park available at no extra cost, good kitchen which is well furnished, and a quiet place. Good access to the freeway. The beach was walking distance and the area was something from a dream. Would stay here again.

Location:
A place looks as expected, 5 min from Kapalua Beach.  We didn't have any issues with neighborhood  condos. Despite there are a lot of people in this Condo Complex (Napili Ridge), we didn't feel the place to be crowdy (as well as elsewhere in Hawaii). While the most interesting activities (IMHO) are in Lahaina, there is just 12-15 min drive. You can drive elsewhere on Maui within 3.5-4 hours (one way).
____________________________________________________________________
Facilities/Equipment:
It really looks recently renovated, all facilities and equipment are good. There is a fridge, microwave and regular oven, plates and silverware. We enjoyed having breakfast on Patio with a nice garden view. Parking lots are not the issue - you just need to fill the form and submit it to management office.
____________________________________________________________________
Cleanliness:
The place was clean as expected. Host provided to us beach and bathroom towels which was greatly appreciated
____________________________________________________________________
Overall
Great value-for-money deal for Hawaii travelers who don't want to spend tons of money for vacation. Note that rental car is required in most cases when travelling to Maui.

The place was very cute. Perfect size and a 5-10 min walk to the beach. We came when I was pretty high temps and it did get hot at night due to no AC. We made due and enjoyed our stay very much. Would definitely rebook. Thanks!

Linda-Lee's place was in a great location (walkable to the beach and a few restaurants). The remodel is truly done well. The only negative we really had was regarding no AC. When we reserved this Airbnb we didn't see it mentioned in her comments, but it's clearly stated in them now. She was super easy to communicate with and ensured we got settled in okay. Perfect getaway for a couple or small family.
Everything was simply great. Enjoyed the place. Mostly the opportunity to cook your own meals which is quite important for me. Thank you!
The flat is really pretty and bigger than I expected. I had a wonderful stay there!

Our stay at Linda’s was great. We had quick responses to our questions. The place was very clean. Quick walk to Napili beach. Kapalua trail is nearby which is an easy and scenic hike. Overall our stay was great!

We had a great time at this place !! Excellent location.  Close to the beaches (walking distance). Close to Lahaina (15 minutes drive). The condo had everything we needed and even more (we really enjoyed the beach stuff provided - chairs/boogie board and we liked the big fridge with freezer). We also used the BBQ every night and the pool. And the king size bed was a great bonus. We recommend this place !
Linda-Lee's 1-BR unit in Lahaina is professionally managed and a great place to stay. I liked that it was quiet late at night and close to a grocery store and beach!
This condo was exactly as described. We especially liked the short walk to the beach and the WiFi signal was excellent.

Upon arrival the condo was clean! I highly recommend Linda's condo for a vacation stay in Maui. You're not too far from beaches and Front Street. There is a beach about 20 minutes walking distance from the condo.
She provided a coffee maker, toaster and other kitchen items for cooking as well as food storage. Linda also contacted me and made sure I made it to the condo.

Eine sehr schöne Unterkunft nicht weit vom Napili Beach, bei dem man täglich Schildkröten beobachten kann. :) Sehr gut eingerichtete Wohnung, sehr geräumig. Bushaltestelle und Lebensmittelmarkt in der Nähe. Check in hat super geklappt und es gab einige Tips für die Umgebung bei der Ankunft.

Good home-away from home. 

The apartment had plenty of amenities and a fully stocked kitchen so you could certainly cook if you wanted to. There was even a blender and toaster. One item that was missing was a bottle opener! There are wine glasses but we couldn't find an opener... 

Although the area feels residential, it's a quick drive to many beaches and you could walk to Napili Bay, if you wanted to. It's very quiet so if you're looking for an escape from all the resorts, it serves as a good home base. 

Overall, we were very happy with our stay and appreciated the new-ness of the amenities, even if small (e.g. sponge, dish soap, etc.).

Beautiful, clean, &  organized. We love having all the amenities such as stove, fridge, coffee maker, etc. Plus having beach supplies and a cooler was a bonus too! Napili Bay is a great beach for sunset and turtle watching! We drove to Lahaina and/or to/near Kaanapali area most days and although it's a short trip (15 mins?), we didn't mind as it's a beautiful ride. The condo is close to some stores as well! We forgot there was no A/C when we arrived and thought we might get hot overnight but sleeping with the windows open and a fan was perfect for all 3 of us.

Linda's place was perfect and suited exactly what we had in mind - we were walking distance to the most beautiful beaches, as well close to shops. 
The Bus stop is at the end of the street, which was a perk as well. 
The place itself is lovely, warm and inviting – with everything you need. 
It was lovely living with residents of Maui, as we got the chance to get to know them and find the best local places to swim, eat and sight see. 
We will be back!!

The apartment had everything we could need and was in a great location - up a quiet road just a five minute walk from nice beaches and trails and a short drive from some great restaurants! Lilla was a fantastic host and drove out to help us when we accidentally locked ourselves out of the apartment late at night! I would definitely recommend this place! We had a great stay!
Great value! Quaint little no-frills place with all the amenities. Walking distance to great restaurants, snorkeling and the beautiful Kapalua Ocean Trail.

Great place, about 5 minute walk from the beach, local grocery store and shops not too far. Perfect location if you’re looking for peace and quiet away from the hustle and bustle of resort style accommodations!

Great stay. The place is spotless and a good size for a couple. Nice lanai for a drink. Bed was super comfy. The bathroom was super warm and we were always overheating after being in there! We stayed at a time where the whole complex is undergoing a facelift and therefore was quite noisy early mornings and during the day.

Linda-Lee’s condo was very clean and is in a convenient location to Napili Market and popular snorkeling spots (Honolua Bay, Kapalua Bay, Etc.) Even though the condo doesn’t have air conditioning, enough portable fans were provided that we were never uncomfortably hot during our stay. The local  groundskeeper was very nice and gave us a lot of great local recommendations.

It was amazing stay ever in the experience that I used airbnb so far! Condo was larger than I expeted and well-cleaned. If you woke 10-15mins from the property you can
find supermarket easier and also less than 10mins walk you can go to beach to! Thank you for your nice and cozy amazing place to stay for me!

The place is just wonderful. Everything was as described. The kitchen is well equipped, the couch is so comfortable. Two big TVs, one in the living room, one in the bedroom. The beach is walking distance and really beautiful. We had a great time and would definitely come back.

We had a great stay! The apartment was very clean, kitchen was modern and well stocked with cookware and appliances (blender was a nice treat). Beautiful beach was a short walk away and the area felt super safe, even for late night walks home. Public BBQ was large and in good condition. Communication with host was awesome too, all questions were promptly answered. Only minor thing to note was the exterior of the unit was under going renovations, however this didn't hinder our stay as they didn't work on weekends nor at early hours of the morning. Would happily stay here again.
Great location and price.
Very clean and close to the beach.  Would definitely stay again.
This condo was perfect for what we needed. Close enough to the beach but not in the thick of it.
Spacious condo with great facilities in older style bunch of condos. Excellent kitchen facilities and minutes walk from the beach and close to other restaurants, supermarket,etc.

Great place to stay, clean, and in a pretty good location. The property was under construction, and the screen door didn’t work and was jammed, but I’m sure it will be repaired before your stay. There are plenty of fans available in the unit to help make up for the lack of AC, but you’ll have to get creative as it does get pretty hot in there! I would still stay again though, as the price is right!

Linda’s place was great! My husband and I stayed there for our anniversary weekend and it was the perfect apartment for the two of us. The apartment was lovely, appliances were great. Although there is no ac, she provides enough fans to keep you cool (we enjoyed that). We would definitely stay here again on our next trip to Maui and would definitely recommend!!
the condo was great! and in a really good location for snorkeling and beaches. very relaxing. Linda Lee was a responsive host, and we had everything we needed.

Linda-Lee's condo is absolutely beautiful! It is decorated very stylishly and is very welcoming and comfortable. She has stocked the condo with anything that you might possibly need, hair dryers to beach supplies. 

The location itself is also very beautiful and quiet. You have a dedicated parking spot as well so that you don't have to worry no matter what time you get back. It is also within walking distance of multiple restaurants and gorgeous beaches like Napili Bay. 

If you're going to be staying in Maui, we highly recommend that you try to book this condo. You won't regret it!

Linda-Lee's place was a perfect spot for our honeymoon! We loved staying here and would recommend it for any couple who wants to visit Maui! The space was in a great location; it was only a ten minute walk to the beach, a five minute drive to the local store, and a 15-20 minute drive to Kannapali and Lahaina. Everything in the Airbnb was clean and neat. We hope we can come back and visit again soon!
ce logement est grand et propre et est  situé près de l'eau, l'hôte vous répond en quelques minutes et est très sympathique

Linda-Lee and Lilla were really helpful when it came to communications, directions and information when requested. The location is within an easy drive to all that Maui has to offer. We would give the accommodation a 3.5. We would give our hosts a 5. Though we only spent our late evenings in the accommodation we were grateful for the security and having amenities like a full kitchen and TV during our down time. Thank you ladies.
Great location, beautiful condo, highly recommend for those wanting to stay in an amazing part of the island at a reasonable rate.

Our stay in Napili Ridge was a quiet spot away from the road.
Close to the Sea House restaurant. 
Went during happy hour and had a great meal.
Very well appointed 1 bedroom apartment. It was fantastic to walk to restaurants and the beach.

name: Bright studio apartment close to Sydney Uni!
summary: This simple yet spacious studio has everything you need for a wonderful stay!  It has a queen size bed, a two seater couch, a fully equipped kitchen and Apple TV! It is located in a great location, just moments from Sydney University and the buses from Parramatta Road that can get you to the city in a few minutes. It is also within walking distance of RPA and UTS. This studio apartment has lots of natural light and is well located to catch a glimpse of sunset! Simple, adorable and affordable!
space: The apartment is located on the last floor of the building, so there are a few 3 sets of stairs you need to go up to access it.  There is a very comfortable queen bed along with a fully equipped kitchen - feel free to use everything there including the Nespresso coffee machine! There is a small ironing board too and a tv for guests with Apple TV! This includes a Netflix account for you to enjoy! Guests have access to cooking staples & toiletries, towels, and professionally cleaned linen.
description: This simple yet spacious studio has everything you need for a wonderful stay!  It has a queen size bed, a two seater couch, a fully equipped kitchen and Apple TV! It is located in a great location, just moments from Sydney University and the buses from Parramatta Road that can get you to the city in a few minutes. It is also within walking distance of RPA and UTS. This studio apartment has lots of natural light and is well located to catch a glimpse of sunset! Simple, adorable and affordable! The apartment is located on the last floor of the building, so there are a few 3 sets of stairs you need to go up to access it.  There is a very comfortable queen bed along with a fully equipped kitchen - feel free to use everything there including the Nespresso coffee machine! There is a small ironing board too and a tv for guests with Apple TV! This includes a Netflix account for you to enjoy! Guests have access to cooking staples & toiletries, towels, and professionally cleaned linen. Guests ca
neighborhood_overview: The neighbourhood is great with Sydney University, the Tramsheds, Broadway Shopping Centre within close proximity!  RPA and UTS are also within walking distance!  There are also a decent amount of great coffee joints and restaurants along Ross Street.
notes: LAUNDRY: There is no washing machine in the studio. However, you can use a laundry around the corner, where your clothes can be washed and dried for approximately AUD15. The laundry is quite affordable. Another option is to hand wash clothes and hang it outside. The clothes dries quickly under hot Australian sun.  The nearest laundry: St John's Laundry and Dry Cleaning: 176 St Johns Road, Glebe, NSW 2037.  Another laundry (15-20 minutes walk): Glebe Ezy Wash, 144C Glebe Point road. CLEANING: if for some reason something is broken or missing or not clean upon arrival, please let me know as soon as possible so I can rectify it! Guests can use off-street car spots located in front of the building (those without cones).
transit: Unless you have a car, buses are probably the best way to get to/from the city. There are numerous buses on Parramatta, just a short stroll away (150m).
access: Guests can access the whole apartment. Building bins are at street level in the room next to the clothing racks.
interaction: I'll do my best to greet everyone, but in case I can't.. the keys will be located in the mailbox (number 28). The combination to the lock will be included in the house manual.  Guests are welcome to contact me directly on my phone (or Airbnb) if any issues arise.

host.host_about:
Hi there!

My name's Brock.  I'm a down to earth Aussie dude who has lived in all different parts of Australia ( Sydney, Townsville, Melbourne, Adelaide, and rural NSW) but have now decided to call Sydney home.

I am passionate about travelling and learning more about the world and like to go on holidays every chance I get!  I also love introducing people to this beautiful country of ours and hope they enjoy it as much as I do!

I've been hosting for a while on Airbnb and have travelled as a guest with Airbnb many times. I love the platform and the opportunity it gives you to connect with new people from all over the world!

Come and stay at my place!

reviews.comments: This is a nice room,i like this kitchen, if you like cooking is good, Very serious, enthusiastic Introduction  about his house, and i like the big windows of the house,the house clean and comfortable, next time will come, thank you,Cedric
Really good location and the owner is really friendly.

Great place, looks exactly like in the pictures and it's very close to Central Station and right across the street from University of Sydney. Quiet are and nice neighborhood with plenty of parks, coffees and restaurants. Cedric was always available, supportive and was flexible to accommodate to our check in time.

My guest Nick said:
My stay in Forest Lodge was all smooth sailing. The apartment was clean and had everything you needed. Cedric was quick to respond to messages and happy to help. It was easy walking distance to Suburbs like Chippendale, Glebe and Broadway. And the chocolate croissant from Goose Bakery down the street was worth writing about too.

The aparment is well located, near the university but far from de downtown... howbut there is a good public transportation. I had a problem with wi-fi but Cedric could fix it quickly. Itis a good option in a quite place!

A very cosy place and Cedric was really helpful when we needed him. 
The place is perfect for 2 people and very clean. 
I will suggest this place for next time....

Cute apartment in a nice location. Cedric has really thought about everything you need for a short stay! Well styled and clean. Apple TV was great. Recommend heading down to see the Tramsheds in Harold Park.
Great price for the place. Good location, quick uber around. Really clean place, got all you need for a stay somewhere. Great communication with the host, but didn't bother us at all.

Cedric went above and beyond to make sure I had a great stay. He was amazing to communicate with and I felt very comfortable and at home from the moment I arrived. The place was clean, spacious and in a fantastic area I would definitely recommend this place.

Small and cosy studio very well maintained and very convenient for people looking accommodation close to the University of Sydney. Well connected by public transportation. Small problem with WIFI the first day, but quickly and efficiently solved by Cedric.

Nice studio, well located near public transport. 
Well equipped kitchen, with supermarkets are about 10 or 15 min walking distance.
Cedric was a great host. Easy to deal with. The accommodation was enjoyable as per expectation. Will book again when back in town.
A very nice place! Quite close to Sydney uni! It's clean and comfortable! And there is even a book introducing the costal walks in Sydney!
The best place to enjoy Sydney and Cedric is really helpful.
Great hospitality and location

Cedric's place is near the city, a very convenient location to all the attractions. This place is great for someone who would like to cook while they stay, having all the kitchen appliances that you need.

Cedric's apartment was spot on. It exceeded our expectations and was exactly what we needed. He was fantastic to deal with and we'll definitely be back.  Great part of town, close to lots of lovely places to eat and public transport was a breeze. The apartment was immaculate and very comfortable. Cedric thought of everything from easy check in and out, to all you need in the kitchen, bathroom and living area. The new Nespresso coffee machine, Apple TV and Wi-Fi all added to our stay being very enjoyable. Well done Cedric, you've got it right. I would recommend this apartment to anyone wishing to stay and explore everything Sydney's inner west and CBD has to offer.
Perfect place for couple getaway in Sydney.
Good place to stay in a good location. Cedric was very helpfull and answered back very quickly.
Great place. Very central to the inner west.

Cedric was extremely friendly and easy to communicate with. He even checked in on me on the second day to make sure everything was ok. The apartment was clean and was stocked with all the basic household essentials to be able to drop my luggage and relax for a few hours before heading to the closet shopping centre, Broadway. Close to public transport and the city, i would recommend Cedric's apartment to any solo or couple coming into Sydney.
It was great Cedric was responsive and the place is great
Good location

Cedric' apartment was really relaxing. I felt safe and secure and loved the sunsets out of the big windows. It was a perfect little sanctuary to come home to in the evenings after study days.  

There's a great little supermarket 10mins walk away on Missenden Rd which had everything I needed including a great healthy organic section. 

The bed was really comfortable. The wifi fast and the Netflix and coffee machine a bonus. 

Thanks Cedric.
Cedric has been a really good host. He always answered quickly if I had any questions. Really a good place to stay.
Tidy apartment close to University of Sydney and short distance from CBD

This studio apartment is very practical. In the main space there's a bed, sofa, plus table and two chairs, and there's also a kitchen and bathroom. The kitchen is modern and well-designed, and is fully-supplied with equipment, utensils, crockery, cutlery, tea and coffee, spices, etc. The bathroom is unrenovated but the shower is hot with good pressure, and the space works well. The bed was comfortable.

This top-floor apartment is not overlooked, and has a pleasant urban outlook. The location is supremely convenient to Uni of Sydney, and just far enough from Parramatta Road that noise is not a problem. There are frequent buses nearby, on several routes. Next time I won't bring a car. There are only a few on-site parking spaces, and when these are taken or reserved you may need to park some distance away if you need unrestricted parking.
还行吧｡网络不够稳定,前两天都没发上网｡浴室龙头漏水,有些影响休息,其他都还好｡

Enjoyed my stay - good neighbourhood and very walkable for groceries, coffee, laundry, and transit. Two fans kept the space cool enough and the bed was comfy. Great home base to explore the city. Easy self check-in and Alex was prompt to reply to any inquiries.

Good spot for a stay just out of the hustle and bustle. Easy walk to Glebe Point Road, cafés, pubs and eateries close by. Bed was comfy and the fans did a good job of keeping us cool even though it was pretty hot weather. Definitely good value for Sydney!

不推薦

現實和相片中介紹的不相符
窗戶封滿塵
屋內很焗 明顯很久沒有人執拾
很多螞蟻
電視接收很差
淋浴間的浴簾有很多徽菌

還有的資訊是
房間的位置在建築物的頂樓
建築物十分殘舊和荒蕪
沒有電梯 大概要上三層
This is a fantastic place to stay, close to public transport, great walks close by, peaceful and very thoughtful touches made by the hosts. Would highly recommend this place to a solo traveller.
Brock and Alex's place is very cute and super close to the Sydney University. We enjoyed our stay!

Les PLUS : Agréable studio, lumineux, pratique, bien desservi par les bus, lit très confortable, petite cuisine équipée.

Les MOINS : Le bruit des voisins (aucune insonorisation), la douche et le lavabo qui coulent et gouttent en continu, la TV qui ne fonctionne pas, aucun échange ou entrevue avec l'hôte.

This apartment is conveniently located near The University of Sydney, clean, and the bed is comfortable. However it is also a bit worse for wear - the tap and toilet run, the curtains don’t fit the windows, and ants came for my toothpaste! It was fine enough for me as I was out most of the time.
The place is very convenient to travel around the city, and it has its own charm
Great location close to Sydney uni and bus stop into the city. Place was very cosy and hosts were easy to communicate with. Would recommend Brock’s house =)
I stayed at Brock's place for two weeks. It is a nice place with a lot of light, right next to the university and in a good neighbourhood. I really enjoyed my stay!
Cute little place with everything you need for a short stay over.  Apple TV and all
Great location,  comfy bed, quiet and private.

The studio is in a safe and quiet neighborhood. During my stay I commuted to the CBD via bus and uber. The bus stop is on the corner and is an easy ride into the city. There are cafes, pubs, and convenience shops very close and within a short walking distance. Great spot for the price!
this place is exactly what it says on the label. simple studio in a good location for a fair price.  really comfy bed, usable kitchen (I've left you some ) easy check in and check out.
Great kitchen! Close to where I needed to be. Would stay again

Good view... It is exactly same on the picture. It is close to the Sydney University. 
In the room, there is the brochure to introduce Sydney trips, bites, etc and it is very helpful.
There is a convenience store away from the house. 
But the broadway Sydney mall (about 10 min walk from the house) is good for shopping, food and souvenirs.
Good location, comfortable apartment.
Great spot, easy to find and check in, booking at almost no notice worked fine.
Had a great stay and will definitely be back. Close to shops, markets and public transport. Very convenient.
Good place to stay if you’re looking for one near the city.
Quick and easy communication, had a good stay. :)
Great few days in Glebe at Brocks place!

This apartment is in a great location for bus transport to city. It’s sparkling clean, comfortable bed, lounge suite to sit & relax, kitchen amenities are great ... toaster, microwave, coffee maker, good sized fridge, oven & cooktop, dishwasher. A ‘welcome pack’ on arrival was a thoughtful touch! We stayed 5 nights, and we wouldn’t hesitate to stay there again.
